headline: New Houses Built at Songjang Farm in Jagang Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- New modern houses for hundreds of families have appeared at the Songjang Farm in Janggang County, Jagang Province of the DPRK.
Those houses, designed to preserve the rural features in a mountainous area, are a fruition of the loving care and energetic leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is continuing his long journey to provide the agricultural workers with the happiest life in the socialist ideal villages.
Present at a ceremony for moving into the new houses were Jon Yong Sop, secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jin Su, vice-chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, officials of Janggang County and agricultural workers.
A congratulatory address was made there. Then licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches made.
There was a dancing party. The farmers and their children were filled with joy. -0-

headline: DPRK Is Socialist State Centered on Masses of People: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article says it is the true picture of the DPRK that it is a genuine country bringing earlier their dreams and ideals and bright future into a brilliant entity and stark reality and a socialist state which has established the people-first principle as a solid political climate and national trait while making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
There can be no state apart from the people and no people apart from the state, and the people means the state and vice versa, the article says, and goes on:
Today our country is shedding its rays as a socialist state centred on the masses of people.
Its political idea and philosophy are to believe in the people as in Heaven and to devotedly serve them, and its supreme mission is to make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
In the DPRK, any policies have been adopted on the basis of the people's viewpoint and stand and to meet their demands and interests, always placing them above anything else and realistic measures taken for their materialization. And the work system and order have been under normal operation to take responsible care of the people's destiny and life.
It is the firm viewpoint and stand of our state that there is no more precious and absolute existence than the people, the essence of the country, and nothing is more sacred than the interests of the people.
In our country, people's laughter and happiness are regarded as a symbol of the socialist system and as the standard of evaluation of national power, and the overall work of the Party and the state is thoroughly oriented to providing the people with substantial benefits and happier and more civilized life.
The DPRK is now demonstrating its dignity and might as a socialist state centered on the masses of people. This would have been unthinkable without the outstanding ideology and leadership and the people-first politics of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un.
Thanks toKim Jong Un, the dignity and reputation of our great state are shining and the people's genuine life and happiness are being brought into full bloom. -0-

headline: Motivation Campaign in Flood-hit Areas Staged by Revolutionary School Students
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School in the DPRK launched a motivation campaign in areas of Jagang Province under recovery from flood damage.
Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School gave fresh strength and courage to the builders through their dynamic artistic performances.
The performance began with chorus "Dear Father". Through such numbers as serial songs "Cheers of the People" and poem and song "His Humanity", it impressively represented the great efforts and warm love of the respected fatherly MarshalKim Jong Unwho left immortal traces for the people in the dangerous flood-hit areas.
Students of Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, too, gave performances in different places.
The performers called on the builders, officials and people to bring about world-startling miracles without fail in the recovery campaign by invariably carrying forward the integrity of the Jagang provincial people put forward by ChairmanKim Jong Il.
The cheerful and dynamic songs sung by the fine reserves who inherited the lifeblood of the Juche revolution, the reliable pillars guaranteeing the eternal youth of the cause, made the areas advancing towards a fresh victory with the enthusiasm for loyalty, repayment, feats and miracles. -0-

There was a dancing party. The farmers and their children were filled with joy. -0-

headline: Rural Housing Construction Hastened in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The rural housing construction for this year is being hastened in different parts of the DPRK.
Pyongyang has solved the problems arising from districts and counties while taking measures to supply various kinds of building materials.
South Phyongan Province makes sure that Phyongsong City, which finished the rural housing construction first in the province, pushes forward the preparations for next year and helps its neighboring counties.
North Hwanghae Province is following up the landscaping in such regions as Songrim City and Pongsan and Sungho counties stepping up the rural housing construction at the final stage.
Similar work has been witnessed in Rason and Nampho municipalities and North and South Hamgyong, South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces. -0-

headline: Motivation Campaign in Flood-hit Areas Staged by Revolutionary School Students
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School in the DPRK launched a motivation campaign in areas of Jagang Province under recovery from flood damage.
Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School gave fresh strength and courage to the builders through their dynamic artistic performances.
The performance began with chorus "Dear Father". Through such numbers as serial songs "Cheers of the People" and poem and song "His Humanity", it impressively represented the great efforts and warm love of the respected fatherly MarshalKim Jong Unwho left immortal traces for the people in the dangerous flood-hit areas.
Students of Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, too, gave performances in different places.
The performers called on the builders, officials and people to bring about world-startling miracles without fail in the recovery campaign by invariably carrying forward the integrity of the Jagang provincial people put forward by ChairmanKim Jong Il.
The cheerful and dynamic songs sung by the fine reserves who inherited the lifeblood of the Juche revolution, the reliable pillars guaranteeing the eternal youth of the cause, made the areas advancing towards a fresh victory with the enthusiasm for loyalty, repayment, feats and miracles. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The rural housing construction for this year is being hastened in different parts of the DPRK.

headline:
Sinhung Fish Farm Associated with Leadership Exploits of Chairman Kim Jong Il
[2024.09.05.]
story_text:
One day in September Juche 88 (1999), ChairmanKim Jong Ilvisited the Songchongang Power Station No. 22.
Being brief on a master plan where scores of low-head hydroelectric stations were drawn, the Chairman asked officials about a reservoir-shaped drawing.
When an official said that it was the Sinhung Fish Farm,Kim Jong Ilasked why he was not told about the fish farm, saying that he visited it on several occasions. Noting that he would like to look around the fish farm, he told officials that however busy they might be, they should make time for the wellbeing of the people.
He visited the fish farm to learn in detail about its production.
Saying that many freshwater fish should be raised and supplied to the people, he solved problems arising in the management of the fish farm.
Like this, he always thought of the people's wellbeing. -0-

headline: Farmers of Ryongsin Farm in DPRK Move into New Houses
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of modern low- and single-storied and terraced dwelling houses have been built at the Ryongsin Farm in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, the DPRK. The farmers were filled with joy as they became the enjoyers of rural civilization.
Officials and builders in Hungdok District, Hamhung City built dwelling houses and villages in a way to make them full of national flavor and emotion and to preserve the regional features.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Choe Hung Jo, secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, builders and agricultural workers of Hungdok District. Hwang Myong Chol, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address at the ceremony.
Licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches made.
When the farmers began to move into their new houses, there was a dancing party. Officials visited new houses to share joy with their owners. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Lao President
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Overcoming All Difficulties with Full Confidence in Sure Victory
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday says in an editorial that the stirring reality of the country in which the struggle for further developing the phase of national rejuvenation is getting brisk is a fierce eruption of confidence in sure victory, optimism, enthusiasm for the revolution and patriotism cherished in the mind of all the people.
It is the fighting spirit and pluck of the revolutionaries to turn adversity into prosperity and misfortune into blessing with self-confidence in their ideal and optimism for the future, the editorial says, and goes on:
The advance of the new century of Juche is decorated with significant days in which all the people have overcome all difficulties with strenuous efforts with full confidence in sure victory and optimism under the leadership of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un.
Through the struggle of the last period our people cherished the immutable truth that they can bring about a greater victory, tiding over the challenges with due care, even though bottlenecks are manifold and the goal for struggle is gigantic, if they strive with hardened confidence in sure victory and courage.
Today, a new era of comprehensive national rejuvenation has been ushered in on this land and eventful victory and successes hastening the better future are being achieved in succession. It is unthinkable apart from the outstanding and seasoned ideas and leadership of the respected General Secretary.
We should hold his ideas and leadership with single-minded devotion, bearing deep in mind the unshakable belief that we can accomplish any great cause despite any difficulties as we are led by him.
The bright future of Korean-style socialism is for the people full of confidence, courage and revolutionary optimism.
The editorial calls upon all the people to redouble their confidence in sure victory and optimism and devote their patriotic sweat, enthusiasm and wisdom to the ongoing general advance for the eternal prosperity of the great state. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Chief of Public Information Office of Ministry of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Public Information Office of the Ministry of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Thursday issued a press statement titled "Provocateurs can never evade the heavy responsibility for escalating tension", which said:
The U.S. and the ROK are staging provocative joint military drills one after another, maximizing the military tension in the region of the Korean peninsula.
The hostile forces staged the largest-ever joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Shield from August 19 to 29 by mobilizing more than 200 fighters of various kinds, the U.S. Army unit coping with chemical, biological, radioactive and nuclear attacks and even troops of satellite countries under the "UN Command". And they have been frantically staging the joint landing drill Ssangyong from August 26.
Ssangyong drill with the involvement of division-level forces, 40-odd warships and various kinds of 80-odd military planes and armored vehicles is an extremely reckless and dangerous military racket presupposing an open invasion upon the sacred territory of the DPRK.
Meanwhile, the ROK military gangsters early in August introduced tanks and other offensive military hardware in the area five kilometers away from the southern border of the DPRK and committed a grave provocation by staging a brigade-level field mobile drill.
For the past two months the U.S. and the ROK military gangsters have desperately staged all sorts of provocative war exercises targeting the DPRK in the ground, sea and air, including a special operation drill aimed at the infiltration into the rear of the DPRK and "small-unit mobile live firing drill" involving the U.S. First Armored Division and the First Armored Brigade of the puppet ROK Army.
The provocative anti-DPRK military drills being staged by the U.S. and the ROK under the eyes of the DPRK without a time gap from the outset of this year clearly show what the source of escalating tension is and where the dark clouds of security instability are coming from on the Korean peninsula.
No such area as the Korean peninsula can be found on earth, where the joint military exercises targeting a sovereign state under different codenames such as Freedom Shield, combined joint formation drill, joint airborne infiltration drill, Iron Mace are being staged in succession.
It is the well-known fact that the accumulation of such threatening actions on the Korean peninsula, the hottest spot in the state of armistice in the world, will only spark off tensions and drive the security environment in the region into an irreversibly catastrophic situation.
The U.S. and its followers are seriously threatening regional peace and stability while getting hell-bent on unilateral military provocations. Their rash acts make clearer the origin of the provocation in a striking contrast to the peace-loving desire of the independent and sovereign states in the region.
As long as there exist the U.S. and the ROK, confrontational entities and destroyers of peace, the provocative military drills will continue, exposing the Korean peninsula to constant instability.
The present situation proves once again that the ceaseless building of the defence capabilities and their offensive application by the DPRK are the only way to neutralize the danger of war drills pursued by the U.S. and the ROK and to control the instability in the region.
The more frequently the U.S. and the ROK stage joint military drills, the more the DPRK hardens its will to defend the security and territorial integrity of the state by dint of powerful self-defensive strength, and this will lead to the strong deterrence, which the hostile forces seeking aggression are afraid and hesitate.
The Korean People’s Army will never tolerate the U.S. and ROK's military moves threatening the security environment on the Korean peninsula but firmly guarantee the security of the state and the peace in the region by dint of strength and action.
The hostile forces can never evade the heavy responsibility for escalating tension and will have to pay a dear price. -0-

headline: Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill
story_text:
One day in January, Juche 105 (2016) the respected ComradeKim Jong Unvisited the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill.
The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unsaid that he came to the textile mill to see a newly-established schoolbag production line and self-produced schoolbags.
After giving precious instructions on the problems arising in the schoolbag production at a sample room, he shouldered a schoolbag for senior middle schoolboy.
Then he said that knapsack-style bag is really convenient for schoolchildren, adding that more sponges should be padded in the shoulder straps of knapsack-style bags
Expressing very satisfaction at the schoolbags produced by the textile mill, he said that he felt gladness when he pictured the appearance of schoolchildren shouldering the schoolbags and coming and going to schools.
That day he gave instructions to build bases for producing schoolbags in the provinces, produce knapsack-style bags on the highest level and supply them to the schoolchildren across the DPRK.
Looking up to him, officials hardened their belief that the happy laughter of the children would resound higher on this land and the future of the country be very rosy under his warm care. -0-

headline: Sci-tech Successes Made at Jungphyong Greenhouse Farm in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Jungphyong Greenhouse Farm in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK has made sci-tech successes conducive to increasing the vegetable production.
The farm has turned the integrated production system into intelligent one and introduced cylindrical vegetable cultivation devices to increase the productivity twice.
It also introduced a device for recycling nutrient solution into tens of hydroponic greenhouses to lower production costs.
It is now directing efforts to producing functional vegetables while increasing the production of various fruit and leaf vegetables. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Palestinian President
Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Lao President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket from Thongloun Sisoulith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The Lao ambassador to the DPRK handed over the floral basket to an official concerned on Sept. 4. -0-

headline: Many University and College Graduates in DPRK Volunteer to Do Jobs at Schools in Remote Places
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- This year alone, more than 200 graduates from universities of education and teachers training colleges in the DPRK volunteered to do their jobs at branch schools on islands and schools in mountainous and rural areas.
In March, scores of graduates from Wonsan University of Education and Wonsan Ri Su Dok Teachers Training College, more than ten graduates from Nampho Teacher Training College and Nampho University of Education and others from universities and colleges in Kangwon Province and Nampho Municipality volunteered to do their jobs at schools in mountainous and rural areas.
Graduates of Chongjin O Jung Hup University of Education and Kim Jong Suk Teachers Training College in North Hamgyong Province volunteered to work at schools in mountainous areas in the northern end of the country. And ex-servicemen graduates and over 10 graduates from Hamhung University of Education and Hamhung Choe Hui Suk Teachers Training College in South Hamgyong Province at schools in mountainous and rural villages.
Graduates from universities and colleges in North Phyongan Province, including Sinuiju Cha Kwang Su University of Education and Sinuiju Teacher Training College, started their work as a teacher revolutionary at the schools where they dropped an anchor of their lives.
Those ex-servicemen graduates from Phyongsong University of Education and Phyongsong Teacher Training College in South Phyongan Province volunteered to work at schools in mountainous areas of Yangdok County together their families. Graduates from universities in South Hwanghae Province are devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm at branch schools on islands.
Graduates of universities of education and teachers training colleges in North Hwanghae Province, Ryanggang Province and Kaesong Municipality are devoting their clear conscience at strange places. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket from Thongloun Sisoulith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The Lao ambassador to the DPRK handed over the floral basket to an official concerned on Sept. 4. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Chief of Public Information Office of Ministry of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Public Information Office of the Ministry of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Thursday issued a press statement titled "Provocateurs can never evade the heavy responsibility for escalating tension", which said:
The U.S. and the ROK are staging provocative joint military drills one after another, maximizing the military tension in the region of the Korean peninsula.
The hostile forces staged the largest-ever joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Shield from August 19 to 29 by mobilizing more than 200 fighters of various kinds, the U.S. Army unit coping with chemical, biological, radioactive and nuclear attacks and even troops of satellite countries under the "UN Command". And they have been frantically staging the joint landing drill Ssangyong from August 26.
Ssangyong drill with the involvement of division-level forces, 40-odd warships and various kinds of 80-odd military planes and armored vehicles is an extremely reckless and dangerous military racket presupposing an open invasion upon the sacred territory of the DPRK.
Meanwhile, the ROK military gangsters early in August introduced tanks and other offensive military hardware in the area five kilometers away from the southern border of the DPRK and committed a grave provocation by staging a brigade-level field mobile drill.
For the past two months the U.S. and the ROK military gangsters have desperately staged all sorts of provocative war exercises targeting the DPRK in the ground, sea and air, including a special operation drill aimed at the infiltration into the rear of the DPRK and "small-unit mobile live firing drill" involving the U.S. First Armored Division and the First Armored Brigade of the puppet ROK Army.
The provocative anti-DPRK military drills being staged by the U.S. and the ROK under the eyes of the DPRK without a time gap from the outset of this year clearly show what the source of escalating tension is and where the dark clouds of security instability are coming from on the Korean peninsula.
No such area as the Korean peninsula can be found on earth, where the joint military exercises targeting a sovereign state under different codenames such as Freedom Shield, combined joint formation drill, joint airborne infiltration drill, Iron Mace are being staged in succession.
It is the well-known fact that the accumulation of such threatening actions on the Korean peninsula, the hottest spot in the state of armistice in the world, will only spark off tensions and drive the security environment in the region into an irreversibly catastrophic situation.
The U.S. and its followers are seriously threatening regional peace and stability while getting hell-bent on unilateral military provocations. Their rash acts make clearer the origin of the provocation in a striking contrast to the peace-loving desire of the independent and sovereign states in the region.
As long as there exist the U.S. and the ROK, confrontational entities and destroyers of peace, the provocative military drills will continue, exposing the Korean peninsula to constant instability.
The present situation proves once again that the ceaseless building of the defence capabilities and their offensive application by the DPRK are the only way to neutralize the danger of war drills pursued by the U.S. and the ROK and to control the instability in the region.
The more frequently the U.S. and the ROK stage joint military drills, the more the DPRK hardens its will to defend the security and territorial integrity of the state by dint of powerful self-defensive strength, and this will lead to the strong deterrence, which the hostile forces seeking aggression are afraid and hesitate.
The Korean People’s Army will never tolerate the U.S. and ROK's military moves threatening the security environment on the Korean peninsula but firmly guarantee the security of the state and the peace in the region by dint of strength and action.
The hostile forces can never evade the heavy responsibility for escalating tension and will have to pay a dear price. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The Russian ambassador, doyen of the diplomatic corps, and the Vietnamese ambassador and the military attache of the Cuban embassy, doyen of the military attaches corps, handed over the floral baskets and congratulatory letters to officials concerned on Thursday.
Kim Jong Unalso received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the Vietnamese ambassador and a floral basket from the Brazilian embassy here. -0-

headline: Farmers of Songhang Farm in DPRK Move into New Houses
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Songhang Farm in Kyonghung County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK was filled with joy of its agricultural workers enjoying modern new life and civilization under the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Hundreds of cozy and modern houses, built at the sunny foot of a mountain, add to the beauty of the daily-changing socialist countryside.
Present at the ceremony for moving into those new houses were Kim Jong Sop, secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, and officials and builders and agricultural workers in the county.
Pak Myong Ho, chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, made a congratulatory address. Then licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches made.
Officials visited new houses to congratulate their owners. -0-

headline: Celebration Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Meetings of working people's organizations took place on September 5 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) was held at the Pyongyang Electric Cable General Factory 326 and a meeting of agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) at the Jongbaek Vegetable Farm in Rangnang District of Pyongyang.
Pak In Chol, chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee, and Han Jong Hyok, chairman of the UAWK Central Committee, made reports at the  meetings to be followed by speeches.
The reporters and speakers said that all the people across the country are significantly celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK amid the vigorous struggle to provide a clear practical guarantee for implementing the five-year plan, firmly united around the great Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee with patriotism.
They noted that the dignity and  prestige of the Republic are shining on the highest level and a new era of a powerful country, a new history of national prosperity, is being ushered in under the respected ComradeKim Jong Un's outstanding idea on state-building and seasoned leadership.
They stressed thatKim Jong Undemonstrated the dignity of the socialist country of Juche all over the world as a genuine people's country with the national traits of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
They stressed the need to dynamically conduct the socialist patriotic movement and revolutionary mass movement, do more good things conducive to the prosperity of the country and positively display the communist virtue and beautiful traits of helping and leading each other forward.
They called for making a tangible contribution to the prosperity of the Republic, saying that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people advancing under the outstanding and tested leadership ofKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Construction of Potato Farina Production Factory Hastened
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The construction of a potato farina production factory is being stepped up in Jangjin County of South Hamgyong Province, a potato-producing region of the DPRK.
Its completion would make it possible to produce tasty processed food with potato gathered from various areas, including Jangjin County.
After finishing the foundation work in a short period, builders are recording high results in wall construction and plastering by applying rational working methods. -0-

headline: Celebration Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
Flood Victims Tour Museums in Pyongyang
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- People from flood-hit areas visited the Korean Revolution Museum and the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum while staying in Pyongyang.
At the Korean Revolution Museum, an immense edifice for the education in revolutionary traditions, they looked round various rooms comprehensively dealing with the revolutionary history and exploits of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilaccording to  the periods and contents.
At its "Hall of Revolutionary Comrades-in-Arms", they hardened their will to become patriotic citizens contributing to the national prosperity, bearing in mind the truth that the glory of life lies in sincerely supporting and following the leader to the last.
At the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, they were told about the victory tradition in the great years. They came to get more confident that the future of Juche Korea would be rosy thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is giving steady continuity to the country's history of war victory.
Meanwhile, they enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarteners from across the country. -0-

story_text:

Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms, the message wished the Vietnamese foreign minister success in his job. -0-

headline: President Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- PresidentKim Il Sungis the founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the father of socialist Korea.
After embarking on the road of revolution in his teens to liberate Korea from the Japanese imperialist aggressors, he led the anti-Japanese revolutionary war to victory and thus achieved the historic cause of national liberation.
He made tireless efforts to provide a genuine cradle of life where the people are enjoying happiness in the liberated country.
Proceeding from the character and duty of the Korean revolution after the liberation of Korea (August 15, 1945), he stressed the need to establish a democratic people's republic representing the interests of all the Korean people.
At the speech delivered at the Pyongyang Mass Rally of Welcome, he said that it was the time for the Korean people to pool their efforts to build a new, democratic Korea, calling on the public to make contributions to nation-building with strength, knowledge and money, thus arousing them to the building of a new country.
In the days of leading the preparations for the founding of the Republic, he guided the work to symbolically reflect well the demand and aspiration of the Korean people who want to have a genuine people's country and the character of the dignified independent and sovereign state in enacting the constitution, the name of the country, the national emblem, etc.
Thanks to his wise guidance, the birth of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was declared before the world on September 9, Juche 37 (1948).
The undying feats ofKim Il Sungwho built a genuine people's country are shining forever along with the development of the dignified DPRK. -0-

headline: Greetings to PM of Vietnam
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Tok Hun, premier of the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greeting to Pham Minh Chinh, prime minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on Sept. 2 to mark its 79th birthday.
The message wished the Vietnamese people greater success in their struggle for achieving the goal of building a prosperous state. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Nicaraguan President and Vice-President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea  and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from President Daniel Ortega Saavedra and Vice-President Rosario Murillo of the Republic of Nicaragua, on September 5.
In the message, they extended congratulations to the Party, government and people of the DPRK the occasion of its 76th birthday, on behalf of the government for national reconciliation and unity and the people of Nicaragua and on their own behalf.
On this historic and significant day, we are highly praising the leadership ability and prestige of the great President ComradeKim Il Sungand Leader ComradeKim Jong Ilwho are always alive in our hearts and ComradeKim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the head of state and our brother, the message said.
It reaffirmed once again the firm will to continue to strengthen the ties of historic and fraternal solidarity, friendship, cooperation and struggle between the peoples and governments of the two countries.
It extended fraternal greetings reflecting the love and respect of the Nicaraguan people toKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Floral Baskets to Statues of Great Leaders from Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations and personages sent floral baskets to the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Laid before the statues of the President and the Chairman on Friday were floral baskets in the names of the Dandong City, China, association for praying for immortality of the Palace of the Sun under theKim Il Sung-Kim Jong IlFoundation, Qiu Shuibo and Qiu Jianliang, honorary directors of the Board of Directors of theKim Il Sung-Kim Jong IlFoundation, and Jin Chengwu, Jia Desheng and Svetlana Odintzova, members of the foundation.
On the same day, floral baskets in the names of missions of international organizations here were placed at the statues of the great leaders. -0-

headline: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK led by Ko Tok U, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of PresidentKim Il Sung, on Friday.
After visiting the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, members of the congratulatory group recalled the glorious revolutionary history of the President at his old home.
They looked round the historical relics preserved there with much care. -0-

headline: Performance of Youth Art Squad Given in DPRK
Urban River Management Promoted in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Urban river management is underway in different parts of the DPRK, true to the decisions of the plenary meetings of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Pyongyang Municipality is contributing to improving its citizens' cultural and emotional life by protecting the ecology of rivers and adding beauty to their scenery. A project for building new pumping stations and expanding capacity of the existing ones to improve water quality of the Pothong River was completed and efficient methods for treatment of wastewater were introduced.
Officials and working people finished embankment projects in many sections, the creation of riverside protection forests, etc.
With the aim of turning the banks of rivers in the city of Chongjin into pleasure parks, North Hamgyong Province completed the construction of dozens of settling basins and promenades and the planting of grass in an area of more than 70 000 square meters in a short span of time.
South Phyongan Province dredged the rivers in Phyongsong City and planted trees by mobilizing all its forces and means.
Officials and working people in North and South Hwanghae provinces and Kaesong Municipality are displaying patriotic enthusiasm and devotion in the urban river improvement. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Syrian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on September 3.
In the message, the Syrian president extended congratulations toKim Jong Unon the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the friendly DPRK and heartily hoped that the DPRK would steady prosperity and development and always demonstrate its might.
Taking this opportunity, we look back upon the heroic struggle waged by the Korean people against imperialism and colonialism under the leadership of PresidentKim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK, and their great sacrifice for freedom and state building, the message said, adding:
Today when the imperialists persist in their vicious offensive, the Korean people under your leadership are carrying on the struggle against dominationism, adhering to their principles and continuing their advance, construction and development in all fields.
We will continue to make joint efforts to strengthen the historic friendly relations between the Syrian Arab Republic and the DPRK and develop bilateral cooperation in various fields in conformity with the mutual interests of the peoples of the two friendly countries.
The message wishedKim Jong Ungood health and happiness. -0-

Taking this opportunity, we look back upon the heroic struggle waged by the Korean people against imperialism and colonialism under the leadership of PresidentKim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK, and their great sacrifice for freedom and state building, the message said, adding:
Today when the imperialists persist in their vicious offensive, the Korean people under your leadership are carrying on the struggle against dominationism, adhering to their principles and continuing their advance, construction and development in all fields.
We will continue to make joint efforts to strengthen the historic friendly relations between the Syrian Arab Republic and the DPRK and develop bilateral cooperation in various fields in conformity with the mutual interests of the peoples of the two friendly countries.
The message wishedKim Jong Ungood health and happiness. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Mongolian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket from Ukhnaa Khurelsukh, president of Mongolia, on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by the Mongolian ambassador here on September 6. -0-

headline: Success Made in Growing Saplings
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers at the Kangwon Provincial Tree Nursery in the DPRK make progress in growing saplings.
With locally available raw materials, they developed various kinds of nutrient solution necessary for improving the growth of saplings through a mass technological innovation movement.
They have boosted the survival rate of tens of kinds of saplings, manuring and tending them in every growth stage in a responsible manner.
They have also updated the sapling cultivation method and production system for tree planting without regard to any season and operated well greenhouses with plastic sheets and other facilities to supply good species of saplings to many units. -0-

headline: Women's Union Officials and Members Meet to Celebrate 76th Birthday of DPRK
New Houses Built in Kumchon County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Hyonnae and Kyejong farms in Kumchon County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, are full of happy laughter of the agricultural workers enjoying a highly-civilized life in the thriving countryside under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Looking at hundreds of modern low- and single-storied dwelling houses built on the farms, the agricultural workers look back with deep emotion on the benevolence of the WPK that translates into reality everything the people desire.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in Kumchon County. Kim Son Il, chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address.
The speakers, who received the licenses for using houses, expressed thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is bringing the century-old desire and ideal of agricultural workers into brilliant reality.
The atmosphere was revved up by the cheerful peasant dancing party and performance of the county mobile artistic motivation team.
Officials visited new houses to congratulate their owners. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Abroad
Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Nicaraguan President and Vice-President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea  and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from President Daniel Ortega Saavedra and Vice-President Rosario Murillo of the Republic of Nicaragua, on September 5.
In the message, they extended congratulations to the Party, government and people of the DPRK the occasion of its 76th birthday, on behalf of the government for national reconciliation and unity and the people of Nicaragua and on their own behalf.
On this historic and significant day, we are highly praising the leadership ability and prestige of the great President ComradeKim Il Sungand Leader ComradeKim Jong Ilwho are always alive in our hearts and ComradeKim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the head of state and our brother, the message said.
It reaffirmed once again the firm will to continue to strengthen the ties of historic and fraternal solidarity, friendship, cooperation and struggle between the peoples and governments of the two countries.
It extended fraternal greetings reflecting the love and respect of the Nicaraguan people toKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Floral Baskets to Statues of Great Leaders from Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations and personages sent floral baskets to the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Laid before the statues of the President and the Chairman on Friday were floral baskets in the names of the Dandong City, China, association for praying for immortality of the Palace of the Sun under theKim Il Sung-Kim Jong IlFoundation, Qiu Shuibo and Qiu Jianliang, honorary directors of the Board of Directors of theKim Il Sung-Kim Jong IlFoundation, and Jin Chengwu, Jia Desheng and Svetlana Odintzova, members of the foundation.
On the same day, floral baskets in the names of missions of international organizations here were placed at the statues of the great leaders. -0-

headline: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK led by Ko Tok U, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of PresidentKim Il Sung, on Friday.
After visiting the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, members of the congratulatory group recalled the glorious revolutionary history of the President at his old home.
They looked round the historical relics preserved there with much care. -0-
