headline: Polices for People's Wellbeing
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The true picture of the DPRK, which has consolidated the foundation for the people's happiness, regarding it as its bounden duty and mission to make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people, is demonstrated in its policies for subordinating all activities to the promotion of people's well-being.
Its socialist policies have contributed to protecting the people's happy laughter and providing them with a better life along with the new century of Juche. This goes to prove the essential advantages of the genuine people's country and Korean-style socialism.
The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unset it as an important affair for implementing the people-oriented policies of the Workers' Party of Korea to provide the people with a cradle of happy life and ushered in a great heyday of construction on this land.
The WPK set it as a consistent and eternal state policy to provide all the schoolchildren in the country with school uniforms and things at state expense and took an important measure for its execution. Thanks to its noble intention, all the schoolchildren received new school uniforms, bags, etc.
Its outlook on the rising generation resulted in the adoption of a new policy for supplying the children across the country with nutritive foodstuffs including milk products.
At the Tenth Session of the 14th Supreme People's Assembly,Kim Jong Ununrolled a grand blueprint for making a leap forward in the material and cultural living standards of the regional people and named this Regional Development 20×10 Policy, indicating the measures to be taken for its implementation.
While giving field guidance at various regional-industry factories under construction, he took new important steps again to hasten the radical development and comprehensive rejuvenation of regions.
A number of laws and regulations have been newly enacted or amended and supplemented to protect and promote the lives and health of the people and provide them with better living conditions and environment.
This year, too, many laws have been subdivided and detailed to contribute to promoting the well-being of the working people. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Guides Shipbuilding
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, guided the shipbuilding on the spot.
He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Pak Jong Chon, Ri Il Hwan, Kim Jae Ryong and Jo Chun Ryong, senior officials of the WPK Central Committee, and Admiral Kim Myong Sik, commander of the Navy of the Korean People's Army.
Going round various production lines and a shipbuilding site, the respected ComradeKim Jong Unlearned in detail about the recent modernization of shipbuilding process.
Saying that top priority should be given to strengthening the material and technical foundation of the overall shipbuilding industry and radically raising the level of modernization in order to correctly implement the Party's policies of munitions industry and shipbuilding industry and it is important to take strong additional state measures to this end, he clarified again the revolutionary direction of struggle to open up a new period of development of the shipbuilding industry.
Repeatedly noting that the strengthening of naval force is the most important matter in firmly defending the maritime sovereignty of the country and stepping up the war preparedness at present, he stressed again that to modernize the shipbuilding industry as required by the new century is an important guarantee and prerequisite for implementing the WPK's line on building the national defences and economy.
He mentioned the need to increase the state investment and intensify the guidance based on policy and technology so that the immediate tasks and long-term plans for laying the foundation for the development of the shipbuilding industry decided and assigned by the Eighth Party Congress are pushed forward as scheduled on the basis of scientific calculation. -0-

headline: DPRK Flag, Eternal Banner of Our-State-First Principle

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects O Jin U Artillery Academy
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on September 6 inspected O Jin U Artillery Academy, a pedigree establishment for training the backbone of the artillery force in the country.
The academy is famous as it has trained commanding officers of the first arm of the heroic Korean People's Army which is reliably defending the country and the people and justice and peace while displaying its invincible might and courage. Its campus was filled with the great emotion and joy of all the teaching staff and cadets who would have the highest honor and privilege of meeting the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
WhenKim Jong Unarrived at the academy, they raised stormy cheers of "Hurrah!" as the highest respects of the artillerymen to the iron-willed brilliant commander, the symbol of the absolute might of the DPRK and the banner of all victories and glory.
He was greeted by Army Senior Colonel Yu Chang Son, headmaster of the academy, and Army Senior Colonel Choe Hun, director of its Political Department.
After receiving a salute from the headmaster,Kim Jong Unpaid homage to the colors.
An educator and a cadet of the academy presented bouquets of fragrant flowers to him, reflecting the boundless reverence of all the artillery officers and men.
Responding to the enthusiastic cheers,Kim Jong Unsent militant encouragement to all the teaching staff of the prestigious academy, which has creditably discharged its sacred mission as the basic cornerstone and driving force for bolstering up the artillery force reliably guaranteeing the continued war-victory history and the strongest military and technical edge of our revolutionary armed forces, and its cadets growing up to be commanding officers of the core arm.
He was accompanied by Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Kang Sun Nam, minister of National Defence of the DPRK, Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Jong Kyong Thaek, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Myong Sik, commander of the Navy, Ri Chang Ho, director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau, and leading officials in the military education field of the DPRK Ministry of National Defence.
Accompanying him were also Jo Yong Won, Ri Il Hwan and Kim Jae Ryong, secretaries of the C.C., WPK.
Kim Jong Unreviewed a march-past of the academy cadets.
He looked round the room for education in the revolutionary history.
He stressed that the academy, which has developed into a major center for training artillery commanding officers of the KPA under the great care of the peerlessly great men, recording immortal military feats in its history, should thoroughly implement the Party's idea of prioritizing the artillery and its policy on military education in the future, too, in order to train the competent military personnel strong in  idea and faith with the absolute loyalty to the Party and the revolution and the spirit of devotedly serving the country and the people and with high military qualifications.
Guided by leading officials, he went round the arms study room and watched drill lectures given at the ground-based artillery firing research room and the artillery tactical research room. Then he learned in detail about the updating of education at the combined information control room for education.
It is our Party's philosophy of artillery and the core of its idea of attaching importance to artillery to open the road of advance with artillery and defeat overwhelmingly the enemy with artillery and display fireworks for celebrating the war victory and thus the most important aspect in the front of military education, a fortress and the forefront for implementing the line of building a powerful army of our Party, is the education field specializing in artillery, he said.
Noting that no matter how difficult the subjective and objective situation may be, the revolution in training for the thorough combat posture of the entire army and the revolution in military education for making the entire army a cadre army and modernizing the entire army are the two fronts for building a powerful army that should be pushed forward simultaneously and vigorously without missing any one, he said that the academy should duly stand in the vanguard of a new revolution in military education for guaranteeing the eternal development of the armed forces of the DPRK.
Noting that our Party has put the military technical strength on an absolutely high level by directing the main efforts to bolstering up the artillery force of specially great strategic and tactical significance among all arms of service in the army with a keen insight into the trend of the development of modern military capabilities, he stressed that whether or not the very powerful ultra-modern military hardware can fully display their performance for actual war entirely depends on the level and role of the artillery commanders.
He appreciated that the academy has intensified lectures for judging the combat situation of a commanding officer and giving a decision on his ability to command at a simulated war through a group discussion, and called for steadily accelerating the work to modernize educational means and put education on an IT and scientific basis.
He called on all the teachers and researchers of the academy to turn out as one in the work for bringing a revolution in the artillery tactics and the military theory of artillery pieces, with a noble sense of duty that they are responsible for the future of the Juche-based artillery force, and thus improve the quality of education and thoroughly establish a revolutionary habit of studying and military discipline in the campus so that cadets can acquire deeper and richer military knowledge during their school days.
He stressed the need to improve and adjust the academic system and educational system of the academy in a practical and efficient way in conformity with the trend of the development of modern military education so that the cadets can learn the practical tactics to be applied to actual warfare without fail.
He said that all the artillery commanding officers from this academy should be a-match-for-a-hundred all-powerful artillerymen and artillery talents well versed in the Juche-based artillery tactics and ultra-modern military hardware with different striking capabilities and possessed of full combat command capability capable of rapidly, fully and overwhelmingly containing and wiping out the enemy in any situation of modern warfare.
Saying that to improve the educational conditions and environment in conformity with the academy's important duty and position in bolstering up the armed forces of the DPRK is very essential for considerably raising the quality of military education, he expressed the will to wonderfully turn the academy into a model of the military educational institutions of the entire army and a world-class military school, and took an important measure for doing so.
He indicated the ways for further strengthening the military education institutions at all levels of the KPA in line with the developing trend of modern education and for improving the educational environment.
That dayKim Jong Unhad a significant photo session with the teaching staff and cadets of the academy.
All the teaching staff and cadets expressed boundless thanks to the iron-willed brilliant commander who, with his outstanding idea of building the revolutionary armed forces and far-sighted wisdom, indicated the bright path to be followed by the academy for bolstering up the artillery force and repeatedly showed deep loving care and trust for them.
Kim Jong Unexpressed belief that the prestigious artillery academy would as ever live up to the great expectations of the Party, revolution, country and people with the proud military educational successes in training the core backbones of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK most wonderfully and perfectly.
Thunderous shouts of "Kim Jong Un" and "Death-defying Defence", raised at the campus sending offKim Jong Un, shook the sky and land.
The inspection of the artillery academy byKim Jong Unwith the steadfast will for building a powerful army to firmly consolidate the tremendous military muscle and thus reliably defend the sovereignty and interests of the DPRK, an independent power, and the security and well-being of its people for all ages, will remain long in the history of the country as a special occasion in ushering in a new heyday of strengthening the Juche-based artillery force and developing the military education. -0-

headline: Peerless Patriot Ushering in New Era of Comprehensive National Rejuvenation
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- It has been 76 years since the birth of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The DPRK has demonstrated its might as an invincible socialist state, achieving world-startling miracles and changes, and is now ushering in a new era of comprehensive national rejuvenation under the leadership of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un, a peerless patriot.
It is thanks to his outstanding ideology and leadership that the DPRK could advance and make a leap forward towards the far-reaching goal of comprehensive national rejuvenation in the face of manifold ordeals.
He clarified the eternal strategy of the Juche revolution and set it as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK and as the general orientation and goal for building a socialist state to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. And he advanced the immortal guidelines and fighting strategies for the development of the Party and the state through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities.
The idea and line of building the self-reliant national defence enabled the DPRK to rank itself among the military powers and the strategy of self-reliance made the Republic steadily create valuable assets associated with its own strength, technology and wisdom even under the persistent pressure of the hostile forces.
The ideas and theories, including the programme for the rural revolution in the new era, the policy of prioritizing talents and education, the idea and line of attaching importance to cities and counties and strengthening them and the Regional Development 20×10 Policy, serve as the basic guidelines guaranteeing the bright future of socialism.
The DPRK has made eye-opening successes in socialist construction thanks to the patriotic devotion of the respected General Secretary who is wisely leading the struggle for national rejuvenation and development.
The DPRK emerged a powerful state with the strongest defence capability and matchless offensive capability. Its national economy as a whole is advancing with the definite orientation for development and magnificent streets and modern rural houses have been built in the capital city and local areas of the country in recent a few years.
Witnessing the eye-opening reality in which all fields of economy and culture are simultaneously developing and the capital and local areas are changing all together ever year, the Korean people came to be convinced that the ideology and leadership of the respected General Secretary are the vibrant strength of our state and the fundamental source of its prosperity. -0-

headline: Statement by Chief of Foreign News Section of Department of Press and Information of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Foreign News Section of the Department of Press and Information of the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Sunday issued a press statement titled "We will continue to take practical measures to cope with the long-term nuclear confrontation with the U.S.", which said:
Recently the U.S. and the ROK held an "Extended Deterrence Strategy and Consultation Group" meeting and a "Nuclear Consultative Group simulation drill", revealing their intention to further strengthen the military conspiracy and nexus against the DPRK.
They conducted a confrontation conspiracy based on the nuclear war scenario and a "simulation drill" as its practical step, terming the DPRK's legitimate and reasonable measure for bolstering up its self-defence capabilities a "threat". This fact clearly shows the danger of the U.S. "extended deterrence strategy" to the global peace and security.
The DPRK Foreign Ministry expresses serious concern over and bitterly denounces and rejects the reckless moves of the hostile forces which are disturbing the regional strategic stability and increasing the possibility of nuclear clash by openly attempting to make a nuclear attack on a sovereign state.
The essential source of ever-worsening security environment in the Korean peninsula and the region at present is just the U.S. which is visualizing the nuclear threat to other sovereign countries while strengthening the military nexus with its vassal forces and cooking up the nuclear confrontation programmes one after another.
This year alone, the U.S. revised its "nuclear weapons employment planning guidance" for the purpose of pursuing the unchallenged nuclear edge over other sovereign states. And it, together with the ROK, cooked up the "nuclear operations guidelines" and formulated that nuclear weapons are included in the "offer of extended deterrence" to Japan.
The U.S. has also staged nuclear war drills in succession, including Iron Mace and Ulji Freedom Shield, to practically verify the plan for using nukes, while never disguising the fact that the DPRK is the target of its application.
It is a mockery of the DPRK and trickery against the international community that the U.S., which is constantly working out and updating war manuals focused on preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, talks about "denuclearization" and "dialogue".
The present situation, in which the U.S. is persistently resorting to the attempt for using nukes against a sovereign state under the pretext of "deterrence", underscores the need for the DPRK to possess more strategic and fatal nuclear deterrent capable of thoroughly defending its sovereignty and security interests and rapidly raising the capability of control over the regional security situation.
The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail will be thoroughly deterred by the DPRK's more perfect and developed nuclear forces for self-defence.
The DPRK will strictly control and manage the security situation of the Korean peninsula, which is getting ever more intense due to the U.S. and its followers' nuclear war hysteria, and continue to take practical measures to cope with the long-term nuclear confrontation with the U.S. -0-

headline: New Villages Built in Phyongsan County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- New villages have appeared at Chonghak and Wahyon farms in Phyongsan County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
The villages, with modern houses and admirable landscape based on greening, preserve the regional features.
Present at a ceremony for moving into new houses were Kim Son Il, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, Mun Chang Il, secretary of the provincial committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, builders and agricultural workers.
Speeches were made there.
The villages were wrapped in a festive mood with residents and their children dancing to the tune of delightful melody with national flags and bouquets in their hands. -0-

headline: Educational Level at Rural Schools Raised in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The educational level of all rural schools in the DPRK has risen into a higher stage.
The Ministry of Education set the standards to be reached by rural schools and dispatched officials to encourage them to conduct the work for improving the qualification of local officials and the educational level.
It also generalized the experience gained by the central teaching institute which set a model in raising the educational level of rural schools, and directed efforts to enhancing the role of the training institutes at all levels.
Teachers' retraining institutes in cities and counties made efforts to raise the qualifications of teachers at rural schools to the level of urban schools.
Tens of thousands of teachers at rural schools have improved their qualifications and abilities this year.
The ministry has pushed ahead with the work to generalize over 1 500 kinds of teaching videos produced by competent teachers so that the city's good teaching resources can be transferred to rural schools.
Meanwhile, the work is going on to provide practical educational conditions and environment for rural schools with the help of the whole society. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Site for Construction of New Naval Base
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- In order to thoroughly implement the powerful army-building line and policy of the Workers’ Party of Korea, which has set it as an urgent task to bolster up the Juche-based naval force as required by the historic turning point in building up the country’s defence capabilities and the army, the respected ComradeKim Jong Unmade a field survey for the construction of a modern naval base and clarified the orientation and ways to this end.
He was accompanied by Marshal Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kang Sun Nam, minister of National Defence of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the Korean People’s Army, Kim Myong Sik, commander of the KPA Navy, and commanders of the East and West Sea Fleets of the Navy.
Looking round the site chosen for construction of harbour facilities along the coast, he discussed with leading officials the practical issues related to the orientation of construction.
He said that the DPRK, a maritime country bounded on the east and west sides by the sea, has always attached importance to the shipbuilding industry and the development of naval force in the building of the state and the national defence capabilities.
Adding that to build a modern and multifunctional naval base is a process of key importance in developing the naval force into a powerful service in conformity with the regional security environment in a short span of time according to the strong army-building goal for the new era set forth by the Eighth Party Congress, he explained the geopolitical advantage of the site for the construction of a new naval base as a strategic vantage.
Now that we are soon to possess large surface warships and submarines which cannot be anchored at the existing facilities for mooring warships, the construction of a naval base for running the latest large warships has become a pressing task, he said, and stressed the need to build a naval port capable of mooring warships and operating the systems of weapons on board and establishing a cultured way of life in a modern base for seamen. And he said that it is an urgent task of the times to build a modern port city as a symbol of the naval force of the DPRK and a centre of the naval operational command and culture of the Navy.
He also indicated the military measures for deploying the anti-aircraft and coastal-defence weapon systems for defending the naval port.
He underlined the need to make epochal progress in implementing the Party’s line of bolstering up the naval combat power by pushing ahead with the immediate measures.
It is the most important state affair and the first task of the revolution advanced by the WPK to steadily develop the revolutionary army, the powerful vanguard and main force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and thus reliably defend the prosperity and security of the country and the people and the happiness of posterity. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Defence Industrial Enterprise
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, visited a defence industrial enterprise under the Second Economy Commission to learn about the production of military hardware.
He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Pak Jong Chon, Ri Il Hwan, Kim Jae Ryong, Jo Chun Ryong and Kim Jong Sik, leading officials of the C.C., WPK.
Going round production sites of the enterprise, the respected ComradeKim Jong Unacquainted himself with the production of military hardware in the second half of the year.
Highly appreciating the indomitable fighting spirit and extraordinary ideological and moral world of the officials and workers of the enterprise, he expressed thanks to them for carrying out the huge munitions production tasks in a responsible and correct way and making a great contribution to the development of our armed forces, true to the Party's policy on munitions industry.
Learning about the structural characteristics, performance and tactical and technical data of military hardware under development and production, he stressed the need to raise the scientification and modernization level in the munitions production and thoroughly guarantee the combat performance of military hardware.
Repeatedly expressing his satisfaction over the fact that the prospect for confidently attaining the goal of military hardware production within the five-year period decided and assigned by the Eighth Party Congress is guaranteed thanks to the dynamic struggle of the munitions industry workers, he clarified the principles and ways for the defence industrial enterprise to hold fast to in the munitions production permanently. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Tours Site for New Naval Base
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- In order to thoroughly implement the powerful-army-building line and policy of the Workers' Party of Korea, which has set it as an urgent task to bolster up the Juche-based naval force as required by the historic turning point in building up the country's defence capabilities and army, the respected ComradeKim Jong Unmade a field survey for the construction of a modern naval base and clarified the orientation and ways for the construction.
He was accompanied by Marshal Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Kang Sun Nam, minister of National Defence of the DPRK, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the Korean People's Army, Kim Myong Sik, commander of the KPA Navy, and commanders of the East and West Sea Fleets of the Navy.
Touring the chosen site for harbor facilities on the coast, he discussed with leading officials the practical issues related to the orientation of construction.
He said that the DPRK, a maritime country bounded on the east and west sides by the sea, has always attached importance to the shipbuilding industry and the development of naval force in the building of the state and the national defence capabilities, adding that to build a modern and multifunctional naval base is a process of key importance in developing the naval force into a powerful service in conformity with the regional security environment in a short span of time according to the strong-army-building goal for the new era set forth by the 8th Party Congress. And he explained the  geopolitical advantage of the site for the new naval base as a strategic vantage.
Now that we are soon to possess large surface warships and submarines which can not be anchored by the existing facilities for mooring warships, the construction of a naval base for running the latest large warships has become a pressing task, he said, and stressed the need to build a naval port capable of mooring warships and operating the systems of weapons on board and establishing a cultured way of life in a modern base for seamen. And he said that it is an urgent task in the era to build a modern port city as a symbol of the naval force of the DPRK and a center of the naval operational command and culture of the Navy.
He also indicated the military measures arising in deploying the anti-aircraft and coastal-defence weapon systems for defending the naval port.
He underlined the need to make epochal progress in implementing the Party's line of bolstering up the naval combat power by pushing ahead with the immediate measures.
It is the most important state affair and the first task of the revolution advanced by our Party to steadily develop the revolutionary army, the powerful vanguard and main force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and thus reliably defend the prosperity and security of the country and the people and the happiness of posterity. -0-

headline: Patriotic Deeds Done by Women's Union Members in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Women's union officials and members in North Phyongan Province of the DPRK are voluntarily doing good deeds at every workplace for implementing the Workers' Party of Korea's policies.
Those in Sinuiju City have helped repair embankments in the region while carrying materials at the site for construction of waterworks.
Women's union organizations in Unsan and Kujang counties have turned out in turf planting and land leveling while conducting a fresh agitation campaign to stir up the morale of soldier-builders in the construction of regional-industry factories.
Women's union members in the counties of Cholsan, Sonchon, Yomju and Nyongbyon are cultivating Evodia daniellii Benn, castor beans, sunflowers and other trees in a bid to build a base for raw materials on non-farming land.
Women's union members in Uiju County are contributing to the building of dwelling houses for flood victims.
Those in the counties of Tongchang, Phihyon, Taegwan and Sindo are devoting their conscience and sincerity to the patriotic work for socialist construction and bolstering up the national power. -0-

headline: Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
The guard of honor of the Korean People's Army lined up at the cemeteries.
Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, first vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and chairman of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly, and Jo Chun Ryong, Jon Hyon Chol and Pak Thae Song, secretaries of the C.C., WPK, and officials of the C.C., WPK, the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly, the Cabinet and armed forces organs.
Amid the playing of the wreath-laying music, wreaths in the names of the C.C., WPK, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK were placed at the wreath-laying stands of those cemeteries.
All the participants paid silent tribute to the memory of the martyrs who devoted their all to the independence and sovereignty of the country and the victory of the socialist cause, remaining true to the Party's leadership. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from President of Equatorial Guinea
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, on September 4.
In the message the president of Equatorial Guinea extended the warmest congratulations, on behalf of the people and government of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea and on his own behalf, to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand the Korean people on the 76th birthday of the DPRK.
Heartily wishing peace, progress and prosperity to the DPRK, he reaffirmed the willingness to maintain and strengthen the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the peoples in the two countries. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Vice-Minister for Int'l Organizations of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Gyong, vice-minister for International Organizations of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, released the following press statement on Sunday:
The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights recently released a report seriously fabricating and distorting the human rights situation in the DPRK under the name of the UN secretary-general.
The report is just a hideous anti-DPRK conspiratorial and confrontation document cooked up by the hostile forces with the ulterior intention to tarnish the image of our state.
I scathingly condemn the move of the hostile forces to hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN as an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation and infringement upon the sovereignty.
The report of hostile nature, which copied the false and fabricated data provided by the impure forces against the DPRK, clearly proves that the UN secretary-general is acting under the pulls and pressure of the U.S. and its followers.
The present state of the UN, which is based on the illegal human rights standard set by the U.S., not on the UN Charter and universal international human rights laws, is one of the main reasons why the human rights situation has not yet been improved in the world.
The UN secretary-general and relevant human rights organizations should take issue with the existing and poor human rights situation of the U.S. before talking about someone's non-existent "human rights issue".
Which is the country where all sorts of hatred and crimes are rampant due to social contradiction and confrontation and blacks thrash about in the high-handed practices, and which is the rogue state that brutally suppresses the peaceful demonstration of students opposing the unethical massacre of Israel in Gaza Strip?
Which country is a brazen-faced criminal state which does not feel any remorse for all sorts of heinous crimes including the sexual assaults by its soldiers stationed in other countries on the natives, far from making an apology for them, though they have been revealed one after another to create a sensation in the world?
It is clear double standards that the UN human rights organization without any courage to comment on the U.S., the top-class criminal state, groundlessly takes issue with the "human rights issue" of an individual country. And it is a deliberate negligence in fulfilling its responsibility and mission entrusted by its Charter.
The only threat to the human rights of the DPRK people is the hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and its followers.
The DPRK government will as ever remain faithful to its mission to thoroughly guarantee the people's security and well-being and genuine rights to live from the hostile forces' human rights abuses, whatever others may say. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from King of Cambodia
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Norodom Sihamoni, king of the Kingdom of Cambodia, on August 23.
In the message, the king extended warm congratulations on behalf of the people of Cambodia and on his own behalf to His ExcellencyKim Jong Unand the Korean people on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
He noted with high appreciation thatKim Jong Unhas wisely led the DPRK for the good health of all the people and the development of the state.
Expressing belief that the bilateral bonds of friendship and cooperation will get closer and develop wider in the interests of the two countries and their peoples, the message wishedKim Jong Ungood health and success in his noble work for the state and people. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Abroad
story_text: Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket from Giancarlo Elia Valori, president of the International Group of Italy, on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Wreaths Laid at Cemeteries and Graves of Martyrs and Memorial Towers
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the cemeteries and graves of martyrs and memorial towers of the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army in different parts of the DPRK on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were officials of local Party and power organs and working people's organizations, working people, youth and students and service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Public Security Forces.
Wreaths in the names of local Party and power organs, etc. and bouquets and flowers were placed at the cemeteries, graves of martyrs and the memorial towers.
The participants paid silent tribute to the memory of the martyrs. -0-

headline: Senior Party and Government Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Undying Exploits for Development of Juche-based Defence Industry
Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from King of Bahrain
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, king of the Kingdom of Bahrain, on Sept. 1.
In the message, the king said that he was pleased to extend heartfelt congratulations and best wishes, on behalf of himself and the government and people of the Kingdom of Bahrain, toKim Jong Unon the occasion of the national day of the friendly DPRK.
On this occasion, I heartily wish you always happiness in good health and the Korean people steady progress and prosperity under your wise leadership, he said. -0-

headline: Floral Baskets to Statues of Great Leaders from Abroad
Meeting and Evening Gala Mark 76th Founding Anniversary of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The people of the DPRK are striving to accomplish the great cause of historic changes, ushering in a period of overall efflorescence in socialist construction under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
They are significantly celebrating the founding anniversary of the great DPRK with the great pride.
The DPRK has firmly adhered to and thoroughly applied the unique state-building idea and the mode of Korean-style development based on the people-first principle during over 70 years since the historic day when it put an end to the history of national distress full of ups and downs and left the first sacred trace of an independent and sovereign state in which the working masses became the genuine masters of the country, fully proving the validity of the socialist cause and the inevitability of its victory.
Covering the road of development peculiar to the DPRK, its people have kept in their mind the immutable truth that the country and its people can be great thanks to the great leader and clearly proved before the world that the vigorous advance of the state and people with the transparent faith and will of self-respect and self-sustenance can never be checked by any force.
Amid the great emotion and pleasure of the people greeting the national day at the peak of glory unprecedented in the history of the country, a meeting and an evening gala took place in Pyongyang, the capital city, on September 8 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Kim Il SungSquare was crowded with lots of citizens, youth and students, who had gathered to celebrate the birth anniversary of the motherland.
Kim Tok Hun and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other senior officials of the Party and the government took their seats on the platform amid the playing of the state welcome music.
Labor innovators and meritorious persons from various fields across the country who were specially invited to the celebrations of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK also took their seats on the platform.
Present there on invitation were veteran cadres who had worked at the important posts of the Party, the government and military for a long time.
Among the audience were overseas Koreans, including a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan on a visit to the homeland on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK, diplomatic envoys, members of missions and foreigners in the DPRK.
Officials of the WPK Central Committee, officials of ministries, national agencies and armed forces organs, meritorious persons at industrial establishments and teaching staff and students of revolutionary schools took the reserved seats for invited guests.
A meeting to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK began.
A national flag-hoisting ceremony was solemnly held.
Amid the playing of the song "Our National Flag", representatives of workers, peasants, intellectuals, soldiers, sportspersons, artistes, students and students of revolutionary schools handed over to the guard of honor of the Korean People's Army the DPRK's flag reflecting its independent dignity and prestige and the aspiration and desire of the people.
Amid the solemn playing of the national anthem of the DPRK, the national flag which has been firmly defended and glorified generation after generation was hoisted.
Looking up to the national flag of glory, all the participants paid high tribute to the 70-odd years of the motherland which has provided them with great national pride, honor, worthwhile life and happiness.
Kim Tok Hun, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made a speech.
Upon authorization of the Party Central Committee and the government of the Republic, he extended warm congratulations to all the people and officers and men of the armed forces of the DPRK, who are opening up a new era of change in the face of manifold difficulties with firm faith in the validity of our cause and with determined confidence in our might, and Chongryon and other overseas compatriots organizations and compatriots, who are vigorously making a dynamic struggle for the socialist homeland.
The founding of the DPRK was an important political event in which the long-cherished desire of the working masses for their genuine power was successfully realized, he said, adding that the political philosophy of our state, the essence of which is the people-first principle, and Korean-style socialism, its embodiment, have fully demonstrated their unique advantages and invincible might despite the raging wind in stern history and visualized before the times new definition of what is a power and its new appearance.
The 76-year-long history of the DPRK which has defended the people with the power of loving care and brought a genuine life into bloom through devoted service is shining as the history of bringing up the good people who have firmly combined their destiny with the country as one and the one of winning victory together with them. It is a distinguished exploit performed by the DPRK in the history of building a human state that it created a new appearance of a genuine state in which all the people anchor their lives and love and defend the country as their lives.
He ardently called for waging a dynamic struggle with courage and confidence under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unfor the high prestige and immortal glory of the DPRK, saying that only victory is in store for the DPRK as the Korean people ardently love for socialism.
The square was full of the unshakable faith and patriotic enthusiasm of all the participants to firmly uphold the socialist system and genuine people's power won by the revolutionary forerunners at the cost of their blood and to surely accomplish the historic cause of building a powerful socialist country under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
Then followed a demonstration of the national flag of the DPRK.
The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the glorious motherland which has covered the brilliant path of the people-first principle, regarding the people as the most sacred being and Heaven for more than 70 years since it fluttered its flag over the blue sky after its foundation as the first people's country at the eastern corner.
The formation with a large national flag entered the square, proving the truth that the historic founding day of the People's Republic brings proud today when the dignity of the power desired by the Korean people in their history spanning 5 000 years has been demonstrated and guarantees its rosy future.
The demonstrators with the flag reflecting the history of the development of the DPRK were fully proud of having firmly defended Korean-style socialism, their lives and whole life, and won only precious victories under the leadership of the great leader and the great Party.
The formation of members of the Korean Children's Union, the pride of the DPRK and masters of its future, marched vigorously through the celebration square full of the dignity and pride of an independent power.
The leading officials of the state and citizens of Pyongyang welcomed the formation of young revolutionaries and patriots who are firmly preparing themselves to be pillars of a powerful country, always growing up brightly and cheerfully under the care of the socialist country regarding the policy for the rising generations as the top priority for the state.
The demonstrators with the national flag passed the square with beautiful rhythms with the ardent desire to firmly defend and uphold the sacred national flag with their patriotic blood and devoted efforts.
The masses more firmly cherished the belief that the national flag of the DPRK will shine forever as a symbol of independence, justice and victory of socialism thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a new era of great change while absolutely and unconditionally orienting and submitting every affair of the Party and the state to the people.
The square was full of the will of the people to invariably cover the road of revolution with single mind, adding more luster to the new era of self-respect and prosperity, the era of our state-first principle, under the guidance of the Central Committee of the great Party which is leading the Juche cause pioneered in Mt. Paektu to victory.
Then followed an evening gala of youth and students.
The dancers were full of high spirit and enthusiasm to add shine to the noble name of the Socialist Patriotic Youth League in the worthy struggle for the comprehensive development of the DPRK. They danced with Janggus and fans to the tune of the songs "Let's Love Our Country" and "My Country Is the Best" full of high spirit and enthusiasm to glorify the noble name of the socialist patriotic youth in the worthwhile struggle for the overall development of the country.
The participants in the evening gala danced, singing songs "Song of Youth" and "We Are Successors to Revolution" with the boundless pride and honor of being young vanguard of a great power.
Fireworks decorated the sky over the venue of the evening gala.
The evening gala revved up amid the vivid display of the stamina, enthusiasm and iron will of the red revolutionary vanguard to become young heroes who will always march straight ahead, following the great Party, and glorify the era ofKim Jong Uncharacterized with creation and change.
The meeting and evening gala for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK fully demonstrated the brave fighting spirit and irresistible might of the Korean people who are dashing toward the rosy future of the prosperous country, redoubling the might of their patriotism and unity. -0-

Which is the country where all sorts of hatred and crimes are rampant due to social contradiction and confrontation and blacks thrash about in the high-handed practices, and which is the rogue state that brutally suppresses the peaceful demonstration of students opposing the unethical massacre of Israel in Gaza Strip?
Which country is a brazen-faced criminal state which does not feel any remorse for all sorts of heinous crimes including the sexual assaults by its soldiers stationed in other countries on the natives, far from making an apology for them, though they have been revealed one after another to create a sensation in the world?
It is clear double standards that the UN human rights organization without any courage to comment on the U.S., the top-class criminal state, groundlessly takes issue with the "human rights issue" of an individual country. And it is a deliberate negligence in fulfilling its responsibility and mission entrusted by its Charter.
The only threat to the human rights of the DPRK people is the hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and its followers.
The DPRK government will as ever remain faithful to its mission to thoroughly guarantee the people's security and well-being and genuine rights to live from the hostile forces' human rights abuses, whatever others may say. -0-

headline: Floral Baskets to Statues of Great Leaders from Abroad
story_text: Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee, the chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany, the head of the Military Band of the Ministry of Defence of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea and an adviser to the Equatorial Guinean Ministry of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Rural Development sent floral baskets to the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon Mansu Hill here on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from King of Bahrain
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, king of the Kingdom of Bahrain, on Sept. 1.
In the message, the king said that he was pleased to extend heartfelt congratulations and best wishes, on behalf of himself and the government and people of the Kingdom of Bahrain, toKim Jong Unon the occasion of the national day of the friendly DPRK.
On this occasion, I heartily wish you always happiness in good health and the Korean people steady progress and prosperity under your wise leadership, he said. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK Monday:
- On the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK,
the respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived messages of greeting from the president of the Russian Federation, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam and president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and president of the Republic of Cuba and the president of the United Russia Party.
Kim Jong Unreceived a floral basket from the president of the International Group of Italy.
Foreign organizations and personages sent floral baskets to the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon Mansu Hill.
Senior Party and government officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute toKim Il Sungand
Kim Jong Il.
A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage toKim Il SungandKim Jong Il.
Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
Wreaths were placed at cemeteries and graves of martyrs and the memorial towers for the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army in different parts of the DPRK.
There took place a men's football match between the April 25 Team and the Amnokgang Team.
- A meeting and an evening gala took place to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK
- Kim Tok Hun, premier of the Cabinet, made a speech at the meeting.
- There was a ceremony for moving into new houses at the Thonghung Farm in Hochon County, South Hamgyong Province.
- The chief of the Foreign News Section of the Department of Press and Information of the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a press statement in connection with the fact that the U.S. and the ROK recently held an "Extended Deterrence Strategy and Consultation Group" meeting and a "Nuclear Consultative Group simulation drill", revealing their intention to further strengthen the military conspiracy and nexus against the DPRK.

Rodong Sinmun
- The paper editorially calls for ushering in a new era of a prosperous and powerful nation by dint of great patriotism, with which all people are in single-minded unity with the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
- The international community said that the DPRK, an invincible independent power and ideal society of mankind, represents the future of the planet.

Minju Joson
- An editorial stresses that the DPRK will shine forever as a genuine people's country under the leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Abroad
story_text: Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket from Giancarlo Elia Valori, president of the International Group of Italy, on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Senior Party and Government Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- All the Korean people are significantly greeting the founding anniversary of the glorious DPRK on the general advance for dynamically opening a broad avenue to the comprehensive national prosperity under the blueprint of great changes unfolded by the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea. They are paying the highest tribute and eternal glory to PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il, the founder and builders of dignified socialist Korea.
Kim Tok Hun, Choe Ryong Hae and Ri Pyong Chol, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, and other senior Party and government officials, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and leading officials of armed forces organs visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the DPRK.
A floral basket in the name of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas laid at the statues ofKim Il SungandKim Jong Il.
Placed at the statues were floral baskets in the names of the WPK Central Committee, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
The participants paid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
At the halls whereKim Il SungandKim Jong Illie in state, the participants paid homage to the great leaders in humble reverence for them, who devoted their whole lives to accomplishing the sacred cause of prosperity of the country and wellbeing of the people, performing great immortal exploits and laying a solid foundation for the invincible socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence. -0-

headline: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in New Era of Prosperous and Powerful Nation
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for dynamically ushering in a new era of a prosperous and powerful nation by dint of great patriotism, with which all people are in single-minded unity with the  Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Korea.
The editorial notes:
A country, in which its leader and people are in single-minded unity, is able to ensure the continuity of its brilliant development history shining with victories and glory, by dint of inexhaustible vitality and tremendous strength for development. This is the immutable truth cherished more deeply by all the people of the DPRK along with September 9.
The unity between the leader and the people just serves as the main strategic asset and the best engine for bringing earlier a rosy future of the country and the nation, and herein lies the outstanding prestige of the country that can never be broken.
The DPRK has boldly broken through harsh difficulties and ordeals disturbing its advance by dint of great strength, in which the leader and the people are firmly united in terms of ideology, purpose, morality and sense of obligation, thus accumulating in a short period such tremendous power as to be done by others in centuries. Such great might of the DPRK confidently guaranteeing the eternal prosperity amazes the world.
The world will clearly see how the people of the DPRK, who have learned how to defeat the enemy and overcome difficulties with their own efforts under the care of their peerlessly great leaders, build a superpower, dignified with independence, on their land.
Today the Party Central Committee is powerfully leading the drive for comprehensive prosperity and growth of the country, orienting its everyday revolutionary guidance toward demonstrating the mightiness of the country and unrolling a series of blueprints for transformation.
Steadfast is the determination of the Party Central Committee to translate all dreams and ideals of the people into brilliant reality by ushering in a new era of a prosperous and powerful nation without fail. -0-

headline: National Anthem of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The national anthem of the DPRK is a famous song and national treasure as it reflects well the desire of its people to build on this land a genuine people's country and a dignified and independent great power.
Whenever we sing our national anthem, it seems that we see beautiful landscape of our country and we feel very proud of being citizens of the great Republic.
The national anthem was written and completed at the proposition and under the meticulous guidance of PresidentKim Il Sung.
One day in September Juche 35 (1946), he met some writers and told them that the people wanted to sing of their great joy and emotion of enjoying freedom and happiness in the liberated country.
Adding that the Korean people are the resourceful people with a 5 000-year-long history and splendid culture, he called for reflecting in the song their national pride and honor of living in a beautiful country and having the tradition of sagacious struggle.
The great idea and feelings of the peerlessly great man just constituted the words and music of the national anthem, and it was played on September 9, 1948 when the DPRK was founded. It has touched all the people with its great influence for decades.
The song is now encouraging the DPRK people in their patriotic struggle to step up the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un. -0-

Floral Baskets to Statues of Great Leaders from Abroad

headline: Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries
Campaign for Increased Production Launched in  DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the coal industry sector of the DPRK are waging a socialist patriotic movement for increased coal production.
Officials of the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex took innovative measures to increase the operation rate of equipment and paid attention to the welfare supply service to stir up the enthusiasm of coal miners.
The February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine has increased coal production by introducing technical innovations to raise the blasting efficiency.
Workers of the Pukchang Area Youth Coal Mining Complex have produced hundreds of more tons of coal every day by increasing the proportion of mechanization at coal cutting faces.
The same is true of the Chonnae Area Coal Mining Complex. -0-

headline: Meeting and Evening Gala Mark 76th Founding Anniversary of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The people of the DPRK are striving to accomplish the great cause of historic changes, ushering in a period of overall efflorescence in socialist construction under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
They are significantly celebrating the founding anniversary of the great DPRK with the great pride.
The DPRK has firmly adhered to and thoroughly applied the unique state-building idea and the mode of Korean-style development based on the people-first principle during over 70 years since the historic day when it put an end to the history of national distress full of ups and downs and left the first sacred trace of an independent and sovereign state in which the working masses became the genuine masters of the country, fully proving the validity of the socialist cause and the inevitability of its victory.
Covering the road of development peculiar to the DPRK, its people have kept in their mind the immutable truth that the country and its people can be great thanks to the great leader and clearly proved before the world that the vigorous advance of the state and people with the transparent faith and will of self-respect and self-sustenance can never be checked by any force.
Amid the great emotion and pleasure of the people greeting the national day at the peak of glory unprecedented in the history of the country, a meeting and an evening gala took place in Pyongyang, the capital city, on September 8 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Kim Il SungSquare was crowded with lots of citizens, youth and students, who had gathered to celebrate the birth anniversary of the motherland.
Kim Tok Hun and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other senior officials of the Party and the government took their seats on the platform amid the playing of the state welcome music.
Labor innovators and meritorious persons from various fields across the country who were specially invited to the celebrations of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK also took their seats on the platform.
Present there on invitation were veteran cadres who had worked at the important posts of the Party, the government and military for a long time.
Among the audience were overseas Koreans, including a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan on a visit to the homeland on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK, diplomatic envoys, members of missions and foreigners in the DPRK.
Officials of the WPK Central Committee, officials of ministries, national agencies and armed forces organs, meritorious persons at industrial establishments and teaching staff and students of revolutionary schools took the reserved seats for invited guests.
A meeting to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK began.
A national flag-hoisting ceremony was solemnly held.
Amid the playing of the song "Our National Flag", representatives of workers, peasants, intellectuals, soldiers, sportspersons, artistes, students and students of revolutionary schools handed over to the guard of honor of the Korean People's Army the DPRK's flag reflecting its independent dignity and prestige and the aspiration and desire of the people.
Amid the solemn playing of the national anthem of the DPRK, the national flag which has been firmly defended and glorified generation after generation was hoisted.
Looking up to the national flag of glory, all the participants paid high tribute to the 70-odd years of the motherland which has provided them with great national pride, honor, worthwhile life and happiness.
Kim Tok Hun, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made a speech.
Upon authorization of the Party Central Committee and the government of the Republic, he extended warm congratulations to all the people and officers and men of the armed forces of the DPRK, who are opening up a new era of change in the face of manifold difficulties with firm faith in the validity of our cause and with determined confidence in our might, and Chongryon and other overseas compatriots organizations and compatriots, who are vigorously making a dynamic struggle for the socialist homeland.
The founding of the DPRK was an important political event in which the long-cherished desire of the working masses for their genuine power was successfully realized, he said, adding that the political philosophy of our state, the essence of which is the people-first principle, and Korean-style socialism, its embodiment, have fully demonstrated their unique advantages and invincible might despite the raging wind in stern history and visualized before the times new definition of what is a power and its new appearance.
The 76-year-long history of the DPRK which has defended the people with the power of loving care and brought a genuine life into bloom through devoted service is shining as the history of bringing up the good people who have firmly combined their destiny with the country as one and the one of winning victory together with them. It is a distinguished exploit performed by the DPRK in the history of building a human state that it created a new appearance of a genuine state in which all the people anchor their lives and love and defend the country as their lives.
He ardently called for waging a dynamic struggle with courage and confidence under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unfor the high prestige and immortal glory of the DPRK, saying that only victory is in store for the DPRK as the Korean people ardently love for socialism.
The square was full of the unshakable faith and patriotic enthusiasm of all the participants to firmly uphold the socialist system and genuine people's power won by the revolutionary forerunners at the cost of their blood and to surely accomplish the historic cause of building a powerful socialist country under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
Then followed a demonstration of the national flag of the DPRK.
The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the glorious motherland which has covered the brilliant path of the people-first principle, regarding the people as the most sacred being and Heaven for more than 70 years since it fluttered its flag over the blue sky after its foundation as the first people's country at the eastern corner.
The formation with a large national flag entered the square, proving the truth that the historic founding day of the People's Republic brings proud today when the dignity of the power desired by the Korean people in their history spanning 5 000 years has been demonstrated and guarantees its rosy future.
The demonstrators with the flag reflecting the history of the development of the DPRK were fully proud of having firmly defended Korean-style socialism, their lives and whole life, and won only precious victories under the leadership of the great leader and the great Party.
The formation of members of the Korean Children's Union, the pride of the DPRK and masters of its future, marched vigorously through the celebration square full of the dignity and pride of an independent power.
The leading officials of the state and citizens of Pyongyang welcomed the formation of young revolutionaries and patriots who are firmly preparing themselves to be pillars of a powerful country, always growing up brightly and cheerfully under the care of the socialist country regarding the policy for the rising generations as the top priority for the state.
The demonstrators with the national flag passed the square with beautiful rhythms with the ardent desire to firmly defend and uphold the sacred national flag with their patriotic blood and devoted efforts.
The masses more firmly cherished the belief that the national flag of the DPRK will shine forever as a symbol of independence, justice and victory of socialism thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a new era of great change while absolutely and unconditionally orienting and submitting every affair of the Party and the state to the people.
The square was full of the will of the people to invariably cover the road of revolution with single mind, adding more luster to the new era of self-respect and prosperity, the era of our state-first principle, under the guidance of the Central Committee of the great Party which is leading the Juche cause pioneered in Mt. Paektu to victory.
Then followed an evening gala of youth and students.
The dancers were full of high spirit and enthusiasm to add shine to the noble name of the Socialist Patriotic Youth League in the worthy struggle for the comprehensive development of the DPRK. They danced with Janggus and fans to the tune of the songs "Let's Love Our Country" and "My Country Is the Best" full of high spirit and enthusiasm to glorify the noble name of the socialist patriotic youth in the worthwhile struggle for the overall development of the country.
The participants in the evening gala danced, singing songs "Song of Youth" and "We Are Successors to Revolution" with the boundless pride and honor of being young vanguard of a great power.
Fireworks decorated the sky over the venue of the evening gala.
The evening gala revved up amid the vivid display of the stamina, enthusiasm and iron will of the red revolutionary vanguard to become young heroes who will always march straight ahead, following the great Party, and glorify the era ofKim Jong Uncharacterized with creation and change.
The meeting and evening gala for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK fully demonstrated the brave fighting spirit and irresistible might of the Korean people who are dashing toward the rosy future of the prosperous country, redoubling the might of their patriotism and unity. -0-
