The dancers were full of high spirit and enthusiasm to add shine to the noble name of the Socialist Patriotic Youth League in the worthy struggle for the comprehensive development of the DPRK. They danced with Janggus and fans to the tune of the songs "Let's Love Our Country" and "My Country Is the Best" full of high spirit and enthusiasm to glorify the noble name of the socialist patriotic youth in the worthwhile struggle for the overall development of the country.
The participants in the evening gala danced, singing songs "Song of Youth" and "We Are Successors to Revolution" with the boundless pride and honor of being young vanguard of a great power.
Fireworks decorated the sky over the venue of the evening gala.
The evening gala revved up amid the vivid display of the stamina, enthusiasm and iron will of the red revolutionary vanguard to become young heroes who will always march straight ahead, following the great Party, and glorify the era ofKim Jong Uncharacterized with creation and change.
The meeting and evening gala for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK fully demonstrated the brave fighting spirit and irresistible might of the Korean people who are dashing toward the rosy future of the prosperous country, redoubling the might of their patriotism and unity. -0-

headline: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in New Era of Prosperous and Powerful Nation
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for dynamically ushering in a new era of a prosperous and powerful nation by dint of great patriotism, with which all people are in single-minded unity with the  Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Korea.
The editorial notes:
A country, in which its leader and people are in single-minded unity, is able to ensure the continuity of its brilliant development history shining with victories and glory, by dint of inexhaustible vitality and tremendous strength for development. This is the immutable truth cherished more deeply by all the people of the DPRK along with September 9.
The unity between the leader and the people just serves as the main strategic asset and the best engine for bringing earlier a rosy future of the country and the nation, and herein lies the outstanding prestige of the country that can never be broken.
The DPRK has boldly broken through harsh difficulties and ordeals disturbing its advance by dint of great strength, in which the leader and the people are firmly united in terms of ideology, purpose, morality and sense of obligation, thus accumulating in a short period such tremendous power as to be done by others in centuries. Such great might of the DPRK confidently guaranteeing the eternal prosperity amazes the world.
The world will clearly see how the people of the DPRK, who have learned how to defeat the enemy and overcome difficulties with their own efforts under the care of their peerlessly great leaders, build a superpower, dignified with independence, on their land.
Today the Party Central Committee is powerfully leading the drive for comprehensive prosperity and growth of the country, orienting its everyday revolutionary guidance toward demonstrating the mightiness of the country and unrolling a series of blueprints for transformation.
Steadfast is the determination of the Party Central Committee to translate all dreams and ideals of the people into brilliant reality by ushering in a new era of a prosperous and powerful nation without fail. -0-

headline: Senior Party and Government Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- All the Korean people are significantly greeting the founding anniversary of the glorious DPRK on the general advance for dynamically opening a broad avenue to the comprehensive national prosperity under the blueprint of great changes unfolded by the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea. They are paying the highest tribute and eternal glory to PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il, the founder and builders of dignified socialist Korea.
Kim Tok Hun, Choe Ryong Hae and Ri Pyong Chol, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, and other senior Party and government officials, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and leading officials of armed forces organs visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, on September 8 on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the DPRK.
A floral basket in the name of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas laid at the statues ofKim Il SungandKim Jong Il.
Placed at the statues were floral baskets in the names of the WPK Central Committee, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
The participants paid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
At the halls whereKim Il SungandKim Jong Illie in state, the participants paid homage to the great leaders in humble reverence for them, who devoted their whole lives to accomplishing the sacred cause of prosperity of the country and wellbeing of the people, performing great immortal exploits and laying a solid foundation for the invincible socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence. -0-

headline: Meeting and Evening Gala Mark 76th Founding Anniversary of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The people of the DPRK are striving to accomplish the great cause of historic changes, ushering in a period of overall efflorescence in socialist construction under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
They are significantly celebrating the founding anniversary of the great DPRK with the great pride.
The DPRK has firmly adhered to and thoroughly applied the unique state-building idea and the mode of Korean-style development based on the people-first principle during over 70 years since the historic day when it put an end to the history of national distress full of ups and downs and left the first sacred trace of an independent and sovereign state in which the working masses became the genuine masters of the country, fully proving the validity of the socialist cause and the inevitability of its victory.
Covering the road of development peculiar to the DPRK, its people have kept in their mind the immutable truth that the country and its people can be great thanks to the great leader and clearly proved before the world that the vigorous advance of the state and people with the transparent faith and will of self-respect and self-sustenance can never be checked by any force.
Amid the great emotion and pleasure of the people greeting the national day at the peak of glory unprecedented in the history of the country, a meeting and an evening gala took place in Pyongyang, the capital city, on September 8 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Kim Il SungSquare was crowded with lots of citizens, youth and students, who had gathered to celebrate the birth anniversary of the motherland.
Kim Tok Hun and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other senior officials of the Party and the government took their seats on the platform amid the playing of the state welcome music.
Labor innovators and meritorious persons from various fields across the country who were specially invited to the celebrations of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK also took their seats on the platform.
Present there on invitation were veteran cadres who had worked at the important posts of the Party, the government and military for a long time.
Among the audience were overseas Koreans, including a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan on a visit to the homeland on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK, diplomatic envoys, members of missions and foreigners in the DPRK.
Officials of the WPK Central Committee, officials of ministries, national agencies and armed forces organs, meritorious persons at industrial establishments and teaching staff and students of revolutionary schools took the reserved seats for invited guests.
A meeting to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK began.
A national flag-hoisting ceremony was solemnly held.
Amid the playing of the song "Our National Flag", representatives of workers, peasants, intellectuals, soldiers, sportspersons, artistes, students and students of revolutionary schools handed over to the guard of honor of the Korean People's Army the DPRK's flag reflecting its independent dignity and prestige and the aspiration and desire of the people.
Amid the solemn playing of the national anthem of the DPRK, the national flag which has been firmly defended and glorified generation after generation was hoisted.
Looking up to the national flag of glory, all the participants paid high tribute to the 70-odd years of the motherland which has provided them with great national pride, honor, worthwhile life and happiness.
Kim Tok Hun, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made a speech.
Upon authorization of the Party Central Committee and the government of the Republic, he extended warm congratulations to all the people and officers and men of the armed forces of the DPRK, who are opening up a new era of change in the face of manifold difficulties with firm faith in the validity of our cause and with determined confidence in our might, and Chongryon and other overseas compatriots organizations and compatriots, who are vigorously making a dynamic struggle for the socialist homeland.
The founding of the DPRK was an important political event in which the long-cherished desire of the working masses for their genuine power was successfully realized, he said, adding that the political philosophy of our state, the essence of which is the people-first principle, and Korean-style socialism, its embodiment, have fully demonstrated their unique advantages and invincible might despite the raging wind in stern history and visualized before the times new definition of what is a power and its new appearance.
The 76-year-long history of the DPRK which has defended the people with the power of loving care and brought a genuine life into bloom through devoted service is shining as the history of bringing up the good people who have firmly combined their destiny with the country as one and the one of winning victory together with them. It is a distinguished exploit performed by the DPRK in the history of building a human state that it created a new appearance of a genuine state in which all the people anchor their lives and love and defend the country as their lives.
He ardently called for waging a dynamic struggle with courage and confidence under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unfor the high prestige and immortal glory of the DPRK, saying that only victory is in store for the DPRK as the Korean people ardently love for socialism.
The square was full of the unshakable faith and patriotic enthusiasm of all the participants to firmly uphold the socialist system and genuine people's power won by the revolutionary forerunners at the cost of their blood and to surely accomplish the historic cause of building a powerful socialist country under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
Then followed a demonstration of the national flag of the DPRK.
The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the glorious motherland which has covered the brilliant path of the people-first principle, regarding the people as the most sacred being and Heaven for more than 70 years since it fluttered its flag over the blue sky after its foundation as the first people's country at the eastern corner.
The formation with a large national flag entered the square, proving the truth that the historic founding day of the People's Republic brings proud today when the dignity of the power desired by the Korean people in their history spanning 5 000 years has been demonstrated and guarantees its rosy future.
The demonstrators with the flag reflecting the history of the development of the DPRK were fully proud of having firmly defended Korean-style socialism, their lives and whole life, and won only precious victories under the leadership of the great leader and the great Party.
The formation of members of the Korean Children's Union, the pride of the DPRK and masters of its future, marched vigorously through the celebration square full of the dignity and pride of an independent power.
The leading officials of the state and citizens of Pyongyang welcomed the formation of young revolutionaries and patriots who are firmly preparing themselves to be pillars of a powerful country, always growing up brightly and cheerfully under the care of the socialist country regarding the policy for the rising generations as the top priority for the state.
The demonstrators with the national flag passed the square with beautiful rhythms with the ardent desire to firmly defend and uphold the sacred national flag with their patriotic blood and devoted efforts.
The masses more firmly cherished the belief that the national flag of the DPRK will shine forever as a symbol of independence, justice and victory of socialism thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a new era of great change while absolutely and unconditionally orienting and submitting every affair of the Party and the state to the people.
The square was full of the will of the people to invariably cover the road of revolution with single mind, adding more luster to the new era of self-respect and prosperity, the era of our state-first principle, under the guidance of the Central Committee of the great Party which is leading the Juche cause pioneered in Mt. Paektu to victory.
Then followed an evening gala of youth and students.
The dancers were full of high spirit and enthusiasm to add shine to the noble name of the Socialist Patriotic Youth League in the worthy struggle for the comprehensive development of the DPRK. They danced with Janggus and fans to the tune of the songs "Let's Love Our Country" and "My Country Is the Best" full of high spirit and enthusiasm to glorify the noble name of the socialist patriotic youth in the worthwhile struggle for the overall development of the country.
The participants in the evening gala danced, singing songs "Song of Youth" and "We Are Successors to Revolution" with the boundless pride and honor of being young vanguard of a great power.
Fireworks decorated the sky over the venue of the evening gala.
The evening gala revved up amid the vivid display of the stamina, enthusiasm and iron will of the red revolutionary vanguard to become young heroes who will always march straight ahead, following the great Party, and glorify the era ofKim Jong Uncharacterized with creation and change.
The meeting and evening gala for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK fully demonstrated the brave fighting spirit and irresistible might of the Korean people who are dashing toward the rosy future of the prosperous country, redoubling the might of their patriotism and unity. -0-

headline: National Anthem of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The national anthem of the DPRK is a famous song and national treasure as it reflects well the desire of its people to build on this land a genuine people's country and a dignified and independent great power.
Whenever we sing our national anthem, it seems that we see beautiful landscape of our country and we feel very proud of being citizens of the great Republic.
The national anthem was written and completed at the proposition and under the meticulous guidance of PresidentKim Il Sung.
One day in September Juche 35 (1946), he met some writers and told them that the people wanted to sing of their great joy and emotion of enjoying freedom and happiness in the liberated country.
Adding that the Korean people are the resourceful people with a 5 000-year-long history and splendid culture, he called for reflecting in the song their national pride and honor of living in a beautiful country and having the tradition of sagacious struggle.
The great idea and feelings of the peerlessly great man just constituted the words and music of the national anthem, and it was played on September 9, 1948 when the DPRK was founded. It has touched all the people with its great influence for decades.
The song is now encouraging the DPRK people in their patriotic struggle to step up the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Men's Football Match Held
Meeting and Evening Gala Mark 76th Founding Anniversary of DPRK
Farmers of Thonghung Farm in DPRK Move into New Houses
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Farmers in remote mountain village of the Thonghung Farm in Hochon County, South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK have moved into new houses.
Hundreds of modern landscaped houses, designed to preserve the regional features, were built as the residents' homes of happiness, where they can live a highly civilized life.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Wi Chol Su, secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in Hochon County.
Ri Kwang Hyok, vice-chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, made a congratulatory speech.  Then licenses for using the houses were handed over and vowing speeches made.
The village was overflowing with joy and emotion. Officials visited new houses to share joy with their owners. -0-

headline: New Villages Built in Myongchon and Yonsa Counties of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of modern houses have been built at the Taho Farm in Myongchon County and the Namjak Farm in Yonsa County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
Present at the ceremonies for moving into new houses were Pak Myong Ho, chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, Han Yong Song and Kim Pong Gil, secretaries of the provincial committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party and power organs in Myongchon and Yonsa counties, builders and agricultural workers.
Congratulatory addresses were made at the ceremonies. Licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches made.
Officials congratulated the owners of new houses and shared joy with them. -0-

headline:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman Kim Jong Il

[Juche113.9.10.]
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Officials, working people, service personnel and schoolchildren in the DPRK visited the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon the occasion of the 76th DPRK birthday.
Placed at the statues of the President and the Chairman on Mansu Hill here were floral baskets in the names of the Party, power and armed forces organs, social organizations, ministries and national agencies, units of the Korean People's Army and the Public Security Forces, and institutions, and industrial establishments at all levels and universities in Pyongyang.
The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders, recollecting their immortal revolutionary careers and exploits.
Laid at the statues of the great leaders in different parts of the capital city, includingKim Il SungUniversity, the Ministry of National Defence and the Mansudae Art Studio, were floral baskets in the names of institutions, enterprises, units of the KPA and the PSF and bouquets and flowers.
Officials, working people, service personnel and schoolchildren across the country visited the statues of the great leaders in their residential areas to pay high tribute to them. -0-

headline: 106th Candlelight Rally and Demo Staged in ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The 106th candlelight rally and demonstration were staged in Seoul of the puppet ROK on Saturday in demand of the impeachment of puppet Yoon Suk Yeol, amid the population's wrath at Yoon, a war stooge of the U.S. and Japan, fascist dictator and man-killing demon, growing stronger with each passing day.
People from all walks of life turned out in the candlelight action to decisively oust puppet Yoon through a 100-day all-people movement.
At the rally, its participants disclosed the puppet's crimes, holding such placards as "Drive out Yoon Suk Yeol, a pro-U.S. and Japanese traitor" and "Impeach Yoon" and chanting slogans.
Then an appeal of the candlelight rally was read out. It stressed that Yoon is the only person to be impeached as he is driving the population to death.
At the end of the rally, the participants took a demonstration toward the Japanese embassy in Seoul, calling for the impeachment of puppet Yoon.
Similar rallies were held in other parts of the ROK.
Meanwhile, 107 civic and public organizations made public a declaration on the situation that day, stressing that the impeachment of Yoon is the only way out for the existence of the ROK and it should be realized within this year.
The declaration called on all the people to turn out in the struggle for ousting Yoon in 100 days without fail by their concerted efforts.
On Sept. 4, an anti-Japanese action was organized and a ceremony took place to declare its struggle outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul, amid the intensified anti-U.S., anti-Japanese struggle by organizations of various circles. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Meets Leading Party and Government Cadres, Congratulates Them on National Day and Makes Important Speech on Orientation of State Work
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The great Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee is vigorously leading the comprehensive prosperity and development of the country unprecedented since the nation building in all sectors of building a powerful country, while unfolding a series of blueprints for gigantic transformation and eye-opening efflorescence that surely guarantee the long-term development of Juche Korea with its brilliant wisdom and indomitable revolutionary faith. Its great ambition and outstanding leadership serve as an undying engine that produces our people's revolutionary enthusiasm and propels their new grand Chollima advance.
In the great stirring period when all the Party members and other people throughout the DPRK are writing a heroic epic of the DPRK, the powerful country, by dint of loyalty and patriotism, with which they formed single-minded unity with the ever-victorious WPK, the overall guidelines for further enriching and amplifying the successes in the struggle, on the basis of the comprehensive analysis of the overall state affairs this year, were solemnly clarified at the headquarters building of the Central Committee of the WPK, the strategic base of the Korean revolution, on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the DPRK, met and congratulated the leading cadres of the Party and the government on the national day of September 9 and made an important speech related to the orientation of the future state work.
When the respected ComradeKim Jong Unentered the venue for speech, all the participants paid the highest glory and tribute to him, the top representative of the dignity of the Party, state and people of the DPRK and the banner of all victories and glory, who is translating the epoch-making causes of eternal significance in the steady existence and prosperity of the DPRK into brilliant reality with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and devoted guidance, cherishing the noble soul and desire of all the generations on this land for building a powerful country.
Present there were members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and other leading cadres of the Party and the government, chief secretaries of the provincial Party committees, senior officials of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national agencies and the munitions industry sector.
Also on hand were commanding officers of the Ministry of National Defence, commanding officers of the services and leading officials of the armed forces organs.
Kim Jong Unmade an important speech "Let Us Further Strive for the Prosperity of Our Great State".
He made a comprehensive and in-depth analysis and estimation of the current situation of overall state affairs done so far this year, in which the success in attaining the goal of struggle set by the historic Eighth Congress of the Party should be confirmed, and specified the orientation and guidelines of struggle to be maintained in state affairs.
The audience was greatly excited as he, in his speech, clarified a scientific strategy to powerfully demonstrate the mightiness, steadfastness and invincibility of our state, putting the on-going great transformation, to be specially recorded in the history of the DPRK's growth and development, on a track of steady upturn with his great pioneering spirit and noble view of serving the people.
The important speech made by him on the occasion of the national day serves as a powerful practical programme and a militant banner guaranteeing dynamic leaps forward, which make it possible to further promote balanced, substantial and simultaneous changes and development in all sectors of socialist construction by surely gaining the advantages peculiar to the DPRK, correctly exploring all possibilities of development and making redoubled efforts in the historic struggle for building a rich country with strong army, our noble ideal and sacred cause.
All the participants vowed to fully equip themselves with the revolutionary idea and patriotic will of the great Party Central Committee and fulfil their important responsibility and duty in leading the high spirit of the Korean revolution advancing toward the ideal of building a prosperous powerful nation to great leaps forward and successes in the most important and responsible period, when the gigantic struggle for state development, unprecedented in its scale, depth and goal, is underway.
The full text of the historic important speech made byKim Jong Unwill be published and distributed to the Party and government organs. -0-

headline: Art Performance Given to Celebrate Birthday of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- There took place an art performance for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in the capital city of Pyongyang on Monday.
The venue for the performance in front of the Mansudae Assembly Hall was full of working people, youth and students who came to see the performance.
Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, first vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and chairman of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly, other senior officials of the Party and the government, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, labor innovators, persons of merits, officials of ministries and national agencies, service personnel of the People's Army, teaching staff and students of revolutionary schools, Pyongyang citizens and inhabitants of flood-hit areas staying in Pyongyang.
The overseas compatriots visiting the homeland on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK, including the members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, and representatives and staff members of the foreign diplomatic missions here and other foreigners were invited to watch the performance.
The national anthem of the DPRK was played.
Put on the stage of the performance, which started with "The Glorious Motherland", a monumental ode to the country, born along with its founding, were colorful numbers including famous songs on the theme of patriotism sung aloud in the past decades when gigantic struggles were waged to build and glorify our great state.
The performers sang highly of the undying glory of our Republic, which has demonstrated its might as a prospering country of miracles and heroic Korea recognized by the world under the unique state-building idea and leadership of the peerlessly great men, and the happiness of its people leading a dignified and worthwhile life as members of an independent powerful nation.
The performance reached its climax with the song "Our National Flag".
Fireworks were set off to peculiarly decorate the end of the performance. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Palestinian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on Sept. 9.
In the message the Palestinian president extended the sincerest congratulations to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unon the occasion of the DPRK birthday.
He wishedKim Jong Ungood health and happiness and the friendly DPRK government and people greater development and prosperity. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Singaporean President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Tharman Shanmugaratnam, president of the Republic of Singapore, on Sept. 9.
The message said:
Your Excellency,
On behalf of the people of Singapore, I take great pleasure in conveying to Your Excellency and your people, our warmest congratulations on this auspicious occasion of the Anniversary of the Founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and heartfelt wishes for the continued peace, progress and prosperity of your country. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Tuesday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unmet and congratulated the leading cadres of the Party and the government on the national day and made an important speech related to the orientation of the future state work. (photos accompanied)
- He made an important speech on the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK. (photos accompanied)
- Officials, working people, service personnel and schoolchildren in the country laid floral baskets at the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il.
- Overseas compatriots related to the revolutionary activities ofKim Il Sung, foreigners and Koreans in China sent floral baskets to the statues of the President and the Chairman on Mansu Hill.
- There took place an art performance for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
- A banquet was given for labor innovators, who were specially invited to the celebrations of the 76th DPRK birthday.
- The whole country significantly celebrated the 76th DPRK birthday.
- In celebration of the 76th DPRK birthday,
There were a dancing party of women's union officials and members and a maritime sports demonstration.
- The DPRK team advanced into the round of 16 at the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
- The 106th candlelight rally and demo for the impeachment of puppet Yoon Suk Yeol were staged in the ROK.

Rodong Sinmun
-Kim Jong Unreceived messages of greeting from heads of state in different countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
- Ceremonies for moving into new houses were held at the Taho Farm in Myongchon County and the Namjak Farm in Yonsa County of North Hamgyong Province.
- Events were held in different countries to celebrate the 76th DPRK birthday.

Minju Joson
- An article says that officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other compatriots in Japan are adding shine to the proud history of patriotism with the honor of being overseas citizens of the dignified DPRK under the wise leadership ofKim Jong Un.
- The foreign minister of the DPRK sent a message of greeting to her Tajikistan counterpart. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Mongolian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Ukhnaa Khurelsukh, president of Mongolian, on Sept. 9.
In the message the Mongolian president extended the sincere congratulations, on behalf of the Mongolian people and on his own behalf, to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand, through him, to the friendly Korean people on the 76th DPRK birthday.
He said that he was pleased that the friendly relations between Mongolia and the DPRK have steadily developed, on the basis of the roots of solid relations provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries, overcoming the trials and challenges of history.
He hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would be expanded and developed and friendship between their peoples be consolidated through close cooperation withKim Jong Unwho is guiding the responsible work for development and prosperity of the DPRK.
He wishedKim Jong Unand his respectable family members good health and happiness.
He also hoped that the diligent and honest Korean people would develop and prosper. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Mongolian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Ukhnaa Khurelsukh, president of Mongolian, on Sept. 9.
