He wishedKim Jong Ungood health and happiness and the friendly DPRK government and people greater development and prosperity. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Tuesday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unmet and congratulated the leading cadres of the Party and the government on the national day and made an important speech related to the orientation of the future state work. (photos accompanied)
- He made an important speech on the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK. (photos accompanied)
- Officials, working people, service personnel and schoolchildren in the country laid floral baskets at the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il.
- Overseas compatriots related to the revolutionary activities ofKim Il Sung, foreigners and Koreans in China sent floral baskets to the statues of the President and the Chairman on Mansu Hill.
- There took place an art performance for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
- A banquet was given for labor innovators, who were specially invited to the celebrations of the 76th DPRK birthday.
- The whole country significantly celebrated the 76th DPRK birthday.
- In celebration of the 76th DPRK birthday,
There were a dancing party of women's union officials and members and a maritime sports demonstration.
- The DPRK team advanced into the round of 16 at the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
- The 106th candlelight rally and demo for the impeachment of puppet Yoon Suk Yeol were staged in the ROK.

Rodong Sinmun
-Kim Jong Unreceived messages of greeting from heads of state in different countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
- Ceremonies for moving into new houses were held at the Taho Farm in Myongchon County and the Namjak Farm in Yonsa County of North Hamgyong Province.
- Events were held in different countries to celebrate the 76th DPRK birthday.

Minju Joson
- An article says that officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other compatriots in Japan are adding shine to the proud history of patriotism with the honor of being overseas citizens of the dignified DPRK under the wise leadership ofKim Jong Un.
- The foreign minister of the DPRK sent a message of greeting to her Tajikistan counterpart. -0-

headline: 76th DPRK Birthday Celebrated
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- All the people across the DPRK significantly celebrated the 76th birthday of the DPRK, the powerful and dignified motherland.
An endless stream of visitors flew into the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Illie in state.
Officials, working people, service personnel and schoolchildren visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting their images across the country including Mansu Hill to pay floral tribute to them.
Many citizens visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri, the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, cemeteries and graves of martyrs and the memorial towers for the fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army across the country, keeping in mind the noble spiritual world of the martyrs who devoted themselves to the country's independence and the victory of the socialist cause under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
National flag-hoisting ceremonies took place across the country.
Colorful art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas, adding to the joy of the holiday.
Cheerful dancing parties of young people and women's union members revved up the atmosphere of the national day.
Public service facilities in the capital city and other parts of the country were crowded with visitors.
Working people and schoolchildren enjoyed themselves at cultural recreation grounds in Pyongyang. -0-

headline: Banquet Given for Labor Innovators
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given for labor innovators and meritorious persons from various fields across the country at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday. They were specially invited to the celebrations of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), our great country.
Jo Chun Ryong and Pak Thae Song, secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., WPK, sat together with them.
The venue of the banquet was full of boundless gratitude to the great WPK and socialist system which value ordinary citizens who are devoting themselves at their posts and workplaces as the cornerstones and pillars of the country.
The national anthem of the DPRK was played.
Pak Thae Song made a speech at the banquet.
Upon authorization of the Party and the government, he warmly congratulated labor innovators and meritorious persons who made distinguished feats in the vanguard of the struggle for bolstering up the national defence capability, developing the economy and improving the people's living standard and took part in the celebrations of the national day this year.
He stressed that the pioneers who have firmly supported the prosperity of the DPRK and the advance of the revolution in major fronts of socialist construction with the utmost sincerity for the Party and the leader, the country and its people, and the genuine people who cannot live even a moment away from patriotism and have never thought of their destiny and life and their families' apart from their conscience and service dedicated to the country are the models of the times who deserve boundless blessing by the country and its people.
He expressed belief that the socialist DPRK, which is supported by the noble spirit of sacrifice to devote their all to the happiness of the rising generations and the prosperous future of the state, not for today's enjoyment, and by the unyielding spirit of service to firmly defend their workplaces and posts despite ordeals, would surely achieve the ideal of comprehensive national rejuvenation and demonstrate its dignity as a genuine people's country.
All the participants were filled with ardent determination to glorify their patriotic lives as personifiers of the Chollima spirit of the new era in the vanguard of the advance for great upsurge under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is setting the building of an ideal society of the working people as the signpost and leading it to victory. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Mongolian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Ukhnaa Khurelsukh, president of Mongolian, on Sept. 9.
In the message the Mongolian president extended the sincere congratulations, on behalf of the Mongolian people and on his own behalf, to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand, through him, to the friendly Korean people on the 76th DPRK birthday.
He said that he was pleased that the friendly relations between Mongolia and the DPRK have steadily developed, on the basis of the roots of solid relations provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries, overcoming the trials and challenges of history.
He hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would be expanded and developed and friendship between their peoples be consolidated through close cooperation withKim Jong Unwho is guiding the responsible work for development and prosperity of the DPRK.
He wishedKim Jong Unand his respectable family members good health and happiness.
He also hoped that the diligent and honest Korean people would develop and prosper. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Nampho Municipality of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- New houses have appeared at Jisa and Usan farms in Hanggu District, Nampho Municipality of the DPRK.
Those cozy houses of various styles with all living conditions, built in harmony with rural features and modern beauty, clearly prove the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's programme for the rural revolution.
Present at ceremonies for moving into new houses were Jo Yong Su, secretary of the Nampho Municipal Committee of the WPK, Rim Yong Man, vice-chairman of the municipal people's committee, and officials and agricultural workers in the district.
A congratulatory address was made at the ceremonies to be followed by speeches.
A dancing party was displayed in every village where happy laughter and songs were heard. Officials visited the new houses to congratulate their owners and share joy with them. -0-

headline: Mass Technical Innovation Movement in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Trade union organizations at all levels in the DPRK are conducting a mass technical innovation movement to promote the attainment of the 12 major goals of national economic development.
The trade union committee of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex organized the movement in a methodological way to introduce technical innovation proposal for increasing the operation rate of compressors into production.
The trade union organization of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex has registered scores of technical innovation achievements by arousing its members.
Trade union organizations at the Pujongang Power Station and the Anbyon Youth Power Station entrusted technical innovation tasks to employees and rendered assistance to them, thus making it possible to raise the generating efficiency with valuable inventions.
The same is true of the Tanchon trackmen's team and the Wonsan Footwear Factory. -0-

headline: Intellectual Property Development Exhibition Prepared in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The Intellectual Property Office in the DPRK is stepping up the preparations for the 2024 intellectual property development exhibition at the final stage.
The organizing committee for the exhibition has carried on the preparations in touch with at least 100 ministries and national agencies and provinces.
Presented to the exhibition will be more than 2 600 proposals of over 640 units, which were granted patent rights, invention rights, trademark rights, industrial design rights, name of origin and geographical representation rights, copyright and rights to new species of plants.
The identification of exhibits among various categories of intellectual property protection objects was concluded.
The work is going on to build data at the virtual exhibition hall, set up a section for the formation of exhibition-in-kind and confirm the mode of exhibition. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Wednesday:
- An editorial calls for making redoubled efforts for the prosperity of our great state, true to the important speech made by the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un.
- The press echoes what people from all walks of life have said about the important speech made byKim Jong Unon the occasion of the national day.
- Ceremonies for moving into new houses were held at Jisa and Usan farms in Hanggu District, Nampho Municipality.
- Successes have been made in different parts of the country.

Rodong Sinmun
- Meetings of active women's union members, who have distinguished themselves in displaying noble traits, were held in North and South Phyongan and Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces and Nampho Municipality.
- An article says that the political, ideological and cultural crisis of capitalism is inevitable.

Minju Joson
- An article discloses that the U.S. is the world's worst WMD proliferator and the top-class criminal state. -0-

headline: Meetings of Exemplary SWUK Members Held in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Meetings of members of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK), who have distinguished themselves in displaying noble traits, were held in North and South Phyongan and Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces and Nampho Municipality.
Present there were leading Party officials, officials of the women's union, activists in displaying noble traits and union members in those regions.
Reports were made at the meetings to be followed by speeches.
The reporters and speakers noted that the respected ComradeKim Jong Unshowed the highest trust and warm love for the union members and other women who have striven to do things helpful to the country, stressing that their warm sincerity gave great strength to the Korean revolution advancing in the face of ordeals.
They said that the women's union officials and members have displayed the communist virtues and traits of helping and leading each other forward, giving priority to the state affairs to live up to the benevolence of the Party with loyalty, and a large number of patriots have been produced in the course.
They expressed the will to always trust and follow the Workers' Party of Korea and devote their pure conscience and sincere sweat and efforts to the worthwhile patriotic work for glorifying the era of our state-first principle by the united efforts based on loyalty and patriotism.
They stressed the need to pool patriotic mind and wisdom at every worksite for implementing the decisions of the plenary meetings of the WPK Central Committee and bring about the harmony of society and families, bearing in mind the trust of the Party which put forward the women as a powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
They called upon all the women's union officials and members to bring a rosy future of the country and dynamically promote the great transformation of the times with the strong spiritual power and patriotic devotion of the Korean women, true to the ideology and leadership ofKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Papers Call for Making Redoubled Efforts for National Prosperity
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unmade an important speech "Let Us Make Redoubled Efforts for the Prosperity of Our Great State" on the occasion of the national day.
His speech serves as a powerful action programme that makes it possible to further promote balanced, substantial and simultaneous transformations and development in all sectors of socialist construction and as a militant banner guaranteeing the dynamic leap forward, leading newspapers of the DPRK editorially stresses on Wednesday.
It is the working spirit and stamina peculiar to the Korean people to win a series of bigger victories and make uninterrupted innovation and advance with more courageous vigor and strenuous efforts, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial, and goes on:
Every undertaking for us to successfully conclude this year is not so easy and there are still a lot of difficulties ahead. But we have courage and confidence in our own strength, solid foundations of self-sustenance and potentiality for development which have been consolidated in the steady and vigorous, practical struggle for a better future.
All the officials, Party members and other working people should bring admirable results, eye-opening events and achievements one after another with high self-confidence, strong will and stubborn efforts and thus definitely lead the dynamic advance of the Korean revolution for a thriving nation, their desire, to a bold leap forward and success.
The plan and determination of the Party Central Committee are science and truth, and very high and strong is our confidence and will to realize the noble ideal at an early date and bring earlier the bright future.
Victory is sure to be won as there are the outstanding and seasoned leadership of General SecretaryKim Jong Unand the people displaying their inexhaustible strength of loyalty and patriotism to the full, rallied as one in mind around the Party Central Committee.
Minju Joson in an editorial stresses that all the people should more vigorously advance along the path indicated by the great Party Central Committee with the revolutionary pride and honor of achieving the prosperity of their beloved motherland.-0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russia
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from G. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Sept. 9.
In the message Zhuganov extended congratulations toKim Jong Unon the 76th birthday of the DPRK, the significant day of the Korean people.
After the all-people elections, the DPRK, a socialist state liberated from the oppression of Japanese militarism, emerged on the world map on September 9, 1948 with Pyongyang as its capital city, the message said, adding:
The DPRK has turned into a prospering country thanks to ComradeKim Il Sungand ComradeKim Jong Iland the most respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
You are creditably carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.
These successes could be achieved, thanks to your strong political will and indomitable spirit and the efforts and devotion of the Korean people who have made significant contributions to the prosperity and future of their country.
Our two countries are interested in strengthening the strategic cooperation in all possible fields despite a number of global difficulties and challenges and should make every effort necessary to develop planned cooperation.
I am sure that our two countries can cope with international threats only when they make concerted efforts.
The message wishedKim Jong Ungood health and success in his energetic work for the prosperity of all the Korean people. -0-

headline: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Work to Ensure Accuracy of Forecast of Fishing Conditions Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The East Sea Fishery Research Institute under the Academy of Fishery Science in the DPRK conducts field survey to ensure the accuracy of forecast of fishing conditions.
The institute has timely detected the amount of fish flock and their movement on the basis of the regional characteristics and water conditions and temperature in the East and West Sea of Korea.
Its researchers took steps to ensure the accuracy of such data in the system for forecasting fishing conditions.
The institute is intensifying the research in order to develop the fishery science and technology. -0-

headline: Increased Coal Production in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers of the Jenam Coal Mine in the DPRK boost the coal production.
The coal mine secured deposit of millions of tons of coal and tens of reserve coal faces.
All pits have pushed ahead with the work to secure reserve coal while solving the problems arising in the production with their own efforts, and thus put the coal production on a steady track.
Officials and coal miners of the Mine are working hard to carry out the production tasks for the second half of the year while conducting the socialist patriotic movement for increased coal production. -0-

headline: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to Song Ko Bun Nyo, a woman centenarian living in the neighborhood unit. 109 in Mandok Workers' District, Hochon County of South Hamgyong Province.
Officials of the county and villagers congratulated the family of the centenarian.
Song had no access to schooling and had to suffer all sorts of hardships and contempt before the liberation of Korea. After the national liberation, she had worked hard at her revolutionary post out of the mind to live up to the benevolence of PresidentKim Il Sungwho provided a genuine life.
Saying that best is the socialist system of our country where doctors visit patients and people help and lead each other, forming a large harmonious family, she asked her children to work harder for the country. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Belarusian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Aleksandr Lukashenko, president of the Republic of Belarus, on September 9.
In the message the Belarusian president extended sincere congratulations toKim Jong Unon the founding anniversary of the DPRK, the national holiday.
The Korean people have so far proved their steadfast collective will and desire for independence on several occasions, the message said, adding:
The whole world witnesses the DPRK advancing proudly along the road of independent development.
Belarus is pleased with the dialogue with the DPRK developing at all levels.
The message expressed belief that Minsk and Pyongyang would make rapid progress in the work for promoting practical mutual cooperation in agriculture, public health, pharmaceutical and educational and other fields.
The Belarusian president wishedKim Jong Ungood health and success in his state activities, and the people of the DPRK progress, stability and wellbeing. -0-

headline: Greetings to Nicaraguan FM
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, on Sept. 11 sent a congratulatory message to Valdrack Ludwing Jaentschke Whitaker upon his appointment as foreign minister of Nicaragua.
Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, forged on the road of independence against imperialism, would grow stronger, she in the message wished him success in his new job. -0-

headline: DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Back Home
story_text: Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by Chairman Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, returned home by air on Sept. 11 after taking part in the 44th General Assembly of the Olympic Council of Asia held in India. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Sariwon City of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- More houses have appeared in Songsan-ri of Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
Those modern houses, built in a sunny place, are the cradle of happiness provided for the agricultural workers by the motherly Party, which is translating all the wishes of the people into reality.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new house were officials concerned and officials and working people in Songsan-ri.
A congratulatory address was made. Then licenses for the use of houses were handed over and speeches made.
As the moving into new houses began, a dancing party was displayed and every house was filled with joy of the people who are convinced that a better and more prosperous future would be brought under the policy of the Workers’ Party.
Officials visited the new houses to congratulate their owners. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, on Thursday:
- Officials vowed to implement the tasks set forth by the respected ComradeKim Jong Unin his important speech on the occasion of the national day.
-Kim Jong Unreceived messages of greeting from the president of Belarus and the chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the DPRK.
- A ceremony for moving into new houses was held in Sonsan-ri of Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province.
- Rice harvesting began in rural areas across the country.
-Kim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to a woman centenarian living in Hochon County, South Hamgyong Province.
- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee returned home after taking part in the 44th General Assembly of the Olympic Council of Asia.
- An article discloses that Japan is still under the U.S. occupation as it has failed to fully exercise its sovereignty though nearly 80 years have passed since the defeat of its militarism. -0-

headline: Technical Foundation Strengthened in Thermal Power Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Thermal power plants in the DPRK boost production by giving priority to technical innovation.
The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex has carried out its daily plan by keeping each generator in full-capacity operation through application of valuable technical achievements.
The Chongchongang Thermal Power Plant installed a new device necessary for normal operation of equipment to ensure the accuracy of the production control system. And it remodeled the slag outlet to prevent the penetration of cold air and raise the combustion efficiency of boiler.
The Sunchon Thermal Power Plant introduced an advanced method for improving the performance of equipment while reducing the steam loss at turbines.
The same is true of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant and the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Spokesperson for Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) on Friday released the following press statement "The collective confrontational cooperation against the DPRK will be accompanied by the strengthened formation of strategic axis for improving the security environment of the region":
The U.S. and its vassal forces held the second defense authority meeting between the ROK and member nations of the "UN Command" on September 10.
Their moves to revitalize a tool for war and confrontation, which usurped the signboard of the UN, on the Korean peninsula are arousing a serious concern of the international community.
Another anti-DPRK confrontation confab was held in the name of the "UN Command" whose dismantlement was declared by the international community decades ago. This is an insult to the inviolable UN and the UN Charter and one more important occasion judging who is the illegal force inciting military conflict in the Korean peninsula.
A "joint statement" adopted after the meeting shows that the U.S. is buckling down to drawing member states of the "UN Command" into different joint military drills of aggressive nature to make them proficient in its-led war scenario and substantially enhance their capabilities to fight a war.
Terming the U.S. and its vassal forces' confrontational movement an extremely dangerous political and military provocation that causes security imbalance and escalates the danger of war in the Korean peninsula and the region, we resolutely denounce and reject it.
The expansion of the "UN Command" is a prelude to the establishment of "NATO of Asian version" which will result in pushing the Asia-Pacific region deeper into the structure of new cold war, not easing the military tensions in the Korean peninsula and the region.
When taking into consideration the fact that the revival of the "UN Command" is further increasing the possibility of military conflict in the Korean peninsula by stirring up the war hysteria of the ROK military gangsters running amuck in the military confrontation with the DPRK, the danger of such moves can never be overlooked.
Moreover, if countries in different regions take part in the moves to revive the "UN Command", blindly following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, military conflict in the Korean peninsula will not be confined to the one between the DPRK and the U.S. but will inevitably lead to the start of a new world war.
It is an essential requirement for the national security and the region's peaceful development to steadily improve the strategic force capable of deterring and weakening the hostile countries' will for war provocation.
The U.S. and its vassal countries' collective military confrontation against the DPRK will serve as a motive and catalyst for accelerating the formation and development of a just strategic axis that thoroughly disallows the imbalance of power in the Korean peninsula and the region.
The DPRK will steadily take a new strategic counteraction to contain and frustrate the reckless confrontation moves of the hostile forces to disturb peace and stability in the Korean peninsula by mobilizing the illegal war organization. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Head of External Policy Office of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The head of the External Policy Office of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following press statement "The U.S. instigating NATO and agents to confrontation with Russia is a serious threat to Europe" on September 13:
Recently, U.S. Secretary of State Blinken groundlessly slandered the cooperation based on mutual benefit and equality between the Russian Federation and other sovereign states, and committed a political provocation terming it a "threat" to Europe.
This clearly shows the U.S. sinister intention to overstate the "security crisis" of European countries and shift the blame for the present Ukrainian situation on to a third party and thus more firmly rally its followers on the anti-Russian front and give "legality" and continuity to its confrontation moves.
The DPRK Foreign Ministry expresses strong regret over the fact that the U.S. top diplomat slandered independent sovereign states while distorting the essence of the Ukrainian situation with extremely irresponsible and improper words, and categorically rejects this.
The U.S. secretary of State is trying to deceive the international community, turning black into white, but such attempt can neither cover up nor deny the fact that the U.S. is the root cause of the outbreak of the Ukrainian crisis and its prolongation and instability of the situation in Europe.
It is none other than the U.S. which caused the Ukrainian crisis by inciting the reckless advance of NATO towards the east in disregard of the legitimate security interests of Russia and its territorial integrity, with the wild dream to establish unipolar supremacy.
The U.S. is also the arch criminal as it has systematically handed over to Ukraine such lethal weapons and equipment as Abrams tanks, F-16 fighters and ATACMS long-range missiles in a bid to bring a strategic defeat to Russia, in disregard of the unanimous demand and aspiration of the international community for the early peaceful settlement of the Ukrainian situation, and caused innocent civilian damage and long-term catastrophe.
It is also the U.S. which committed to deploying in Europe long-range missiles targeting Russia and has staged NATO-led war drills against Russia one after another and brought a horrible war to the whole of Europe, revealing its intention to lift a ban for Ukraine on the use of long-range weapons toward the depth area of Russia.
All facts go to prove that the U.S. is a real threat facing Europe and the international community as it is inciting conflict and confrontation, instigating NATO and agents to the confrontation with Russia and fostering the permanent war.
The Ukrainian crisis will never be an opportunity to revive the weakened position of the United States, and the Russian people will surely and triumphantly achieve their just aim.
The international community should not tolerate the reckless acts of the U.S., which is getting frantic with the moves for military confrontation after mortgaging the security of Europe in a bid to realize its hegemonic interests, but should defend the regional peace and stability by its concerted efforts.
We will as ever invariably support the just cause of the Russian people who are striving to defend sovereignty and build a fair and multipolar world, smashing the imperialists' hegemonic policy and high-handed practices. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Training Base for Special Operation Armed Force of KPA
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and President of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, inspected the training base of the special operation armed force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) to guide the drill of combatants on September 11.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas accompanied by Marshal Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the KPA, Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, and other commanding officers in the field of operation and training of the KPA General Staff.
Kim Jong Unwent round various facilities of the training base to learn in detail about the situation.
Highly appreciating the fact that all the facilities and training grounds of the base are effectively arranged to practically conduct simulated drills for real war so as to train strictly the combatants to be all-purpose ones, he stressed the need for the Ministry of National Defence and the General Staff to pay positive attention to providing conditions for further updating training facilities and putting their operation on a scientific basis in the future.
He mounted the observation post to watch the scout and raid drills being conducted by the combatants according to their training programme.
All the combatants have shed their sweat of loyalty and feats at training grounds with the firm readiness to make a sudden attack on the hearts of the enemies and open up the road of advance of the attacking units at a go when the moment of a stern decisive battle comes. They fully demonstrated the fighting mettle and spirit of the invincible revolutionary armed forces that are able to really fight and surely win victory if they fight in the training conducted in the presence ofKim Jong Un.
Watching with satisfaction the soldiers who are fully versed in the Juche-based and modern combat methods and are sweeping the training ground like lightning, he highly praised all the combatants for growing up to be stout and brave one-match-for-a-hundred combatants with the revolutionary and strong training enthusiasm and thoroughly maintaining the sure war posture.
Saying that he felt assured and proud to see the soldiers prepared as brave fighters  like bullets, he encouraged the combatants who have grown up to be reliable guards and passionate warriors of the KPA which is demonstrating only victory, and had a photo session with them.
The combatants were full of boundless emotion, joy, great pride and self-esteem, turning into enthusiastic cheers like thunder, as they received high appreciation and great honor under the warm loving care of the invincible and iron-willed brilliant commander.
Saying that as seen in today’s training, such competent and stalwart fighters are needed in the KPA, he gave important instructions calling for more firmly building up the special operation armed force of the KPA by training possessors of a-match-for-a-hundred spirit and  core combatants capable of wiping out the enemy while courageously sweeping the battlefield where bullets and shells rain thick and fast without an inch of hesitation in case of emergency.
When considering the mood and character of a modern war, to put forward the well-trained and prepared special operation armed force as the main combat force in the battlefield has an important influence on victory and defeat, and the building of special operation armed force is an important component in building the armed forces of the DPRK, he said, and set forth the militant task to put main efforts into strengthening the elite Korean-style special operation armed force by firmly holding fast to the revolution in training, ideas and equipment.
Noting that the first task is to continue to intensify the drills for real war, he said that as emphasized always, a lot of sweat in training is the way to shed less blood in a war, war is not a premeditated one and, therefore, the KPA should be fully ready to check the enemy at once and mercilessly and completely repress them even if a war breaks out at once today, and it is the first patriotism and loyalty to the state and people and the foremost revolutionary duty for the soldiers to devote their all to the intensive drills for a real war.
He said with decision that it is necessary to continue to make strict demands in training, steadily improve the contents and methods of Korean-style training and make full preparations for war so as to make the enemies shed blood when they encounter with the KPA in an emergency.
Saying that it is impossible to think about the victory of the army which is not possessed of the might of ideology and the well-prepared army with no ideology is nothing but undisciplined army and when soldiers become true patriotic soldiers who know the Party, the country and the people before learning about battles, victory always comes to their side, he called for more wonderfully cultivating and giving full play to the political and ideological advantages peculiar to the KPA and thus preparing the soldiers more firmly as the strongest in mental power.
Saying that in intensifying the ideological education among the service personnel, class education is an important task which can never be neglected even a moment, he called for intensifying the education in an offensive way to make all the service personnel cherish the transparent sense of the enemy and their outlook on the arch enemy as their faith.
The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK in which the whole ranks were prevailed by the indomitable heroic spirit and fighting spirit that no army in the world can imitate will grow stronger in the future, too and will become war deterrents making the enemy not dare to provoke, being afraid of its prestige and entity alone, he stressed.
All the combatants were filled with revolutionary enthusiasm and high spirit to become the best standard-bearers who defend our state and people most honorably and most reliably in the vanguard of the advance always by striving to build more perfect capability for real war with a firm patriotic spirit, bearing in mind the great trust and expectation ofKim Jong Unwho visited their training ground and gave them the ever-victorious war method and militant encouragement. -0-

headline: Patriotism Reflected in Song
story_text:
It was one day in July Juche 101 (2012).
The respected ComradeKim Jong Untold officials that the words of the song "The Masters of This Land Tell" are good and, in particular, its fourth stanza saying that scientists firmly defend the socialist country with faith well reflected the scientists' faith and determination to conduct scientific researches for their socialist motherland though science knows  no border.
He said that the love for our things and ambition to outpace the world originate from patriotism and that patriotism should be kept into the minds of people in a lifelike and emotional way.
Receiving his teachings, the officials came to keenly realize once again what genuine patriotism is and what important role the art of music plays in implanting patriotism in our people. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Nuclear Weapons Institute and Production Base for Weapon-grade Nuclear Materials
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, inspected the Nuclear Weapons Institute and the production base of weapon-grade nuclear materials, acquainted himself with the production of nuclear warheads and current nuclear materials and set forth important tasks for long-term plan for increasing the production of weapon-grade nuclear materials.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas accompanied by Hong Sung Mu, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
He highly praised the scientists, technicians and officials in the field of nuclear weapons production for having carried out without fail the plan for producing weapon-grade nuclear materials needed for manufacturing nuclear warheads, cherishing the firm and steadfast revolutionary spirit and faith to firmly defend the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche with the strongest nuclear force.
He went round the control room of the uranium enrichment base to learn about the overall operation of the production lines.
Being briefed on the fact that the base is dynamically producing nuclear materials by studying, developing and introducing all the system elements including centrifugal separators and various kinds of sensors and controllers with its own efforts and technology, he expressed his great satisfaction over it.
When he personally went round the worksite, he said that he felt strong to see the worksite. He stressed the need to further augment the number of centrifuges in order to exponentially increase the nuclear weapons for self-defence true to the Party's line of building up nuclear armed forces, not content with the successes and, at the same time, to further raise the individual separation ability of the centrifuge and push forward the introduction of a new-type centrifuge which has already reached its completion stage as planned so as to further strengthen the foundation for producing weapon-grade nuclear materials.
Going round the construction site for expanding the capacity for the current production of nuclear weapons, he learned in detail about the daily plan for assembling equipment.
Expressing great satisfaction repeatedly over the wonderful technical force of the nuclear power field of the DPRK, he said that the WPK has set forth a new important strategy for building up nuclear force, believing in those of the nuclear power field who have turned out as one with their ardent mind to open up the road of the revolutionary cause of Juche by dint of nuclear weapons. He encouraged the nuclear scientists faithful to the Party to unconditionally implement the Party's policy of building up nuclear force without an inch of deflection with their strong faith and high practical ability.
Noting that anti-DPRK nuclear threats perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists-led vassal forces have become more undisguised and crossed the red-line, he said the security environment facing the DPRK, the peculiarity of the Korean revolution to constantly confront with the U.S. and contain it and prospective threats require the DPRK to steadily expand and bolster up its defence capability for self-defence and the capability for a preemptive attack with the nuclear force as a pivot. He stressed again that an accelerated and sure advance should be stepped up in the struggle to always maintain the thoroughgoing counteraction posture of nuclear force and enhance it at the highest level.
He called on those in the field of nuclear weapons production who assumed the most important responsibility for the historic mission to bolster up the nuclear war deterrence of the country in quality and quantity in a substantial and accelerated way  should exert themselves to produce nuclear weapons and thus fulfill their sacred duty before the Party and the revolution more creditably.
He stressed the need to set a higher long-term goal in producing nuclear materials necessary for the manufacture of tactical nuclear weapons and concentrate all efforts on bringing about fresh leap forward, setting forth important tasks and orientation.
Upon receiving his on-site instructions, all the nuclear combatants made a firm determination to make a great leap forward in implementing the Party's line of nuclear strategy by absolutely and firmly guaranteeing the continuous and successful birth of powerful Korean-style nuclear weapons, bearing in mind the deep trust ofKim Jong Unwho further consolidated the nuclear arsenal which is the strongest in the world to firmly defend the independent development of the state, the happy life and safety of the people and the rosy road of the Juche revolution, and put forward them on the outpost of the sacred struggle. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Nuclear Weapons Institute and Production Base of Weapons-grade Nuclear Materials
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, inspected the Nuclear Weapons Institute and the production base of weapons-grade nuclear materials, acquainted himself with the production of nuclear warheads and the current production of nuclear materials and set forth important tasks concerning a long-term plan for increasing the production of weapons-grade nuclear materials.
He was accompanied by Hong Sung Mu, first deputy department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
He highly praised the scientists, technicians and officials in the field of nuclear weapons production for carrying out without fail the plan for producing weapons-grade nuclear materials needed for manufacturing nuclear warheads, cherishing the firm and steadfast revolutionary spirit and faith to firmly defend the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche with the strongest nuclear force.
He went round the control room of the uranium enrichment base to learn about the operation of production lines in all aspects.
He expressed great satisfaction after being briefed on the fact that the base is dynamically producing nuclear materials by studying, developing and introducing all the system elements including centrifugal separators and various kinds of sensors and controllers with its own efforts and technology.
Personally looking round the production site, he said that it is invigorating to see the place, and continued: In order to exponentially multiply the nuclear weapons for self-defence true to the Party's line of building the nuclear force, it is necessary to further increase the number of centrifuges, not content with the successes achieved, and, at the same time, to enhance the individual separation ability of the centrifuge and push forward with the introduction of a new-type centrifuge, which has already reached the completion stage, as planned, so as to consolidate the foundation for producing weapons-grade nuclear materials.
Going round the construction site for expanding the capacity for the current production of nuclear weapons, he learned in detail about the daily plan for the assembly of equipment.
Expressing great satisfaction repeatedly over the great technological capabilities of the nuclear power field of the DPRK, he said that the WPK has set forth a new important strategy for building up the nuclear force, believing in the combatants in the nuclear power field who have turned out as one with an ardent mind to open up a broad avenue for the revolutionary cause of Juche on the strength of nuclear weapons. The red nuclear scientists faithful to the Party should implement the Party's policy of nuclear force building unconditionally and without an inch of deflection with their strong faith and high practical ability, he encouraged.
Noting that anti-DPRK nuclear threat moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces have become more undisguised and crossed the red-line, he said the security environment facing the DPRK, the peculiarity of the Korean revolution compelling the country to constantly confront the U.S. and contain it and prospective threats require the DPRK to steadily expand and bolster up its military capability for self-defence and the capability for preemptive attack with the nuclear force as the backbone. He stressed again that a more rapid and sure advance should be made in the struggle to always maintain the thoroughgoing counteraction posture of the nuclear force and improve the posture to a high level.
The combatants in the field of nuclear weapons production, assuming the most important responsibility, that is, the historic mission to bolster up the nuclear war deterrent of the country in quality and quantity and in a sustained and accelerated way, should keep exerting themselves in production and thus more creditably fulfil the sacred duty they took on for the Party and the revolution, he instructed.
He stressed the need to set a higher long-term goal in producing nuclear materials necessary for the manufacture of tactical nuclear weapons and concentrate all efforts on making a fresh leap forward, and set forth important tasks and orientation.
Upon receiving his on-site instructions, all the nuclear combatants made a firm determination to make a great leap forward in implementing the Party's nuclear strategy and line by absolutely and firmly guaranteeing the continuous and successful birth of powerful Korean-style nuclear weapons, bearing in mind the deep trust ofKim Jong Un, who put them forward on the outpost of the sacred struggle as he further bolsters the world’s strongest nuclear arsenal which will steadfastly defend the independent development of the state, the happy life and safety of the people and the road ahead for the Juche revolution. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Training Base of Special Operation Forces of KPA
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, inspected the training base of the special operation forces of the Korean People's Army to guide the drill of combatants on September 11.
He was accompanied by Marshal Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the KPA, Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, and other commanding officers in the field of operation and training of the KPA General Staff.
Kim Jong Unwent round different facilities in the training base to learn in detail about the situation.
Highly appreciating the base which is strictly training the combatants to be versatile ones by furnishing all the facilities and training grounds in a way that drills simulating an actual war can be conducted efficiently, he stressed the need for the Ministry of National Defence and the General Staff to pay positive attention to providing conditions for further updating training facilities and putting their operation on a scientific basis in the future.
He mounted the observation post to watch the combatants conducting a drill of scouting and raiding objects according to a training programme.
All the combatants, who have shed the sweat of loyalty and feats at training grounds with the firm readiness to make a sudden attack on the heart of the enemy and open up the route of advance of the attacking units at a go when the moment of fierce decisive battle comes, fully demonstrated the fighting mettle and spirit of the invincible revolutionary armed forces, which are able to fight a real war and surely win victory once they fight, also in the training conducted in the presence ofKim Jong Un.
Looking with satisfaction at the soldiers, who were sweeping the training ground like lightning, being well versed in the Juche-based and modern combat methods, he highly praised all the combatants for thoroughly maintaining the sure war posture after growing up as stout and brave a-match-for-a-hundred combatants through revolutionary and intensive training.
Saying that he felt assured and proud to see the soldiers prepared as brave fighters like tightly-packed bullets, he encouraged the combatants who have grown up to be reliable guards and passionate warriors of the KPA which always emerges victorious and had a photo session with them.
The combatants, who received high praise and great honour in the benevolent embrace of the invincible and iron-willed brilliant commander, were full of boundless gratitude and joy and infinite pride and self-esteem, which turned into enthusiastic cheers as loud as thunder.
Saying that as seen in today’s training, such competent and stalwart fighters are needed in the KPA, he gave important instructions calling for more firmly building up the special operation forces of the KPA by training possessors of a-match-for-a-hundred spirit and core combatants capable of wiping out the enemies while courageously sweeping battlefields where bullets and shells rain thick and fast without the slightest hesitation in case of emergency.
Considering the mood and character of modern warfare, to make well-trained and prepared special operation forces as the main combat force in the battlefield has an important influence on the outcome of battles, and the building of special operation forces is an important component in the building of the armed forces of the DPRK, he said, and set forth the militant task of putting main efforts into strengthening elite Korean-style special operation forces by holding fast to the line of making a revolution in training, ideas and equipment.
Referring to the need to keep intensifying actual war drills above anything else, he said that as he always emphasizes, sweating a lot in training is the way to shed less blood in a war, a war is not preceded by any notice and, therefore, the KPA should be fully ready to control the enemies at a stroke immediately, mercilessly sweep them away and completely subjugate them even if a war breaks out right today. It is the primary patriotism and loyalty to the state and people and the foremost revolutionary duty for armed soldiers to devote their all to the intensive actual war drills, he said.
He conclusively said that it is necessary to continue to make strict demands in training and constantly improve the contents and methods of Korean-style training so as to get fully ready for war and thereby compel the enemies to shed blood when they encounter the KPA soldiers in case of emergency.
Saying that victory of an army is unthinkable if it is not possessed of the might of ideology, he stated that even a well-prepared army is nothing but an undisciplined army if it has no ideology and that victory will always on the side of the servicemen when they become genuinely patriotic soldiers who know the Party, the country and the people before knowing how to fight. He called for more wonderfully cultivating and giving full play to the political and ideological advantages peculiar to the KPA and thus preparing the soldiers more firmly as the strongest in mental power.
In intensifying ideological education among the service personnel, class education is an important task which should never be neglected even a moment, he said, calling for conducting the education in an offensive way to make all the service personnel keep as an element of their faith the unwavering anti-enemy consciousness and view of the principal enemy.
An indomitable and heroic character and fighting spirit that no other army in the world can imitate pervade all the ranks of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK and they will grow stronger in the future, too, and become a war deterrent preventing the enemy from provoking, being afraid of them for their reputation and entity alone, he said with confidence.
All the combatants were filled with revolutionary enthusiasm and high spirit to become the first standard-bearers who always defend the DPRK and its people most honourably and reliably in the vanguard of the advance by striving to build more perfect capability for fighting an actual war with a firm patriotic spirit, bearing in mind the great trust and expectation ofKim Jong Unwho visited their training ground to tell them ever-victorious war methods and give them militant encouragement. -0-

headline: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Europe
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A European regional seminar on the Juche idea titled "Sovereignty and independence, new international relations" took place in Sofia of Bulgaria on September 8 to mark the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Present there were the director general, secretary general and directors of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, chiefs of Juche idea study organizations in the region, members of the delegation of the Secretariat of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and personages of various circles in Bulgaria.
Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, Keith Bennet, vice-director general of the European Regional Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Juche idea followers in Russia, Italy, Serbia and other countries attended the seminar via video-conferencing.
Introduced at the seminar were the congratulatory messages from the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea. The secretary general of the IIJI and others made congratulatory speeches.
Matteo Carbonelli, director general of the European Regional Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, made a keynote report to be followed by speeches.
The reporter and speakers highly praised the respected ComradeKim Jong Un, who has developed in depth the Juche idea into great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and steered the trend of global independence, as the peerlessly great man.
They called for further activating the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism for national sovereignty and global independence.
A letter toKim Jong Unwas adopted at the seminar. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Spokesperson for Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) on Friday released the following press statement "The collective confrontational cooperation against the DPRK will be accompanied by the strengthened formation of strategic axis for improving the security environment of the region":
The U.S. and its vassal forces held the second defense authority meeting between the ROK and member nations of the "UN Command" on September 10.
Their moves to revitalize a tool for war and confrontation, which usurped the signboard of the UN, on the Korean peninsula are arousing a serious concern of the international community.
Another anti-DPRK confrontation confab was held in the name of the "UN Command" whose dismantlement was declared by the international community decades ago. This is an insult to the inviolable UN and the UN Charter and one more important occasion judging who is the illegal force inciting military conflict in the Korean peninsula.
A "joint statement" adopted after the meeting shows that the U.S. is buckling down to drawing member states of the "UN Command" into different joint military drills of aggressive nature to make them proficient in its-led war scenario and substantially enhance their capabilities to fight a war.
Terming the U.S. and its vassal forces' confrontational movement an extremely dangerous political and military provocation that causes security imbalance and escalates the danger of war in the Korean peninsula and the region, we resolutely denounce and reject it.
The expansion of the "UN Command" is a prelude to the establishment of "NATO of Asian version" which will result in pushing the Asia-Pacific region deeper into the structure of new cold war, not easing the military tensions in the Korean peninsula and the region.
When taking into consideration the fact that the revival of the "UN Command" is further increasing the possibility of military conflict in the Korean peninsula by stirring up the war hysteria of the ROK military gangsters running amuck in the military confrontation with the DPRK, the danger of such moves can never be overlooked.
Moreover, if countries in different regions take part in the moves to revive the "UN Command", blindly following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, military conflict in the Korean peninsula will not be confined to the one between the DPRK and the U.S. but will inevitably lead to the start of a new world war.
It is an essential requirement for the national security and the region's peaceful development to steadily improve the strategic force capable of deterring and weakening the hostile countries' will for war provocation.
The U.S. and its vassal countries' collective military confrontation against the DPRK will serve as a motive and catalyst for accelerating the formation and development of a just strategic axis that thoroughly disallows the imbalance of power in the Korean peninsula and the region.
The DPRK will steadily take a new strategic counteraction to contain and frustrate the reckless confrontation moves of the hostile forces to disturb peace and stability in the Korean peninsula by mobilizing the illegal war organization. -0-

headline: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, first vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and chairman of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK led by Ko Tok U, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on September 12.
Officials concerned were on hand.  -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Oversees Test-fire for Verifying Performance of New-type 600mm Multiple Rocket Launcher
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, oversaw the test-fire for verifying the performance of a new-type 600mm multiple rocket launcher.
A defence industrial enterprise under the Second Economy Commission developed and produced the new-type 600mm multiple rocket launcher of which performance has improved as required by the army's application of operation.
The test was conducted, aiming at further developing the launcher's driving system and verifying the combat effectiveness of the launcher in which the whole process of firepower is fully automated.
The excellent combat performance of the launcher was clearly proved and was popular among service personnel through the driving test and volley test.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unappreciated the superior of the newly-developed launcher in terms of mobility and efficiency as compared with the existing ones.
The shells for multiple rocket launcher hit the target on an island in the East Sea.
Present at the test were Kim Jong Sik, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Jang Chang Ha, director general of the Missile Administration of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Koreans in China Celebrate Birthday of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China (GAKC) and its affiliated organizations held events to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
On September 9, floral baskets in the names of the GAKC, the Association of Korean Women in China, the Association of Young Korean Nationals in China, the Beijing City branch of the Zhongnan Regional Association, the Dandong City branch of the Liaoning Regional Association and the Jilin City branch of the Jilin Regional Association under the GAKC and the family of Hwang Baek Ha, a Korean in China related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, were laid before the statue of PresidentKim Il Sungat Yuwen Middle School in Jilin and the portraits of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Iland art works depicting them at the DPRK missions in Beijing, Shenyang and Dandong.
Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and officials of the GAKC headquarters and its regional associations and other Koreans in China paid tribute to PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il, founder and builder of the DPRK, socialist Korea, and the benevolent father of overseas Koreans.
A film show of the GAKC took place in Shenyang of China.
Present there were Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and other officials of the GAKC headquarters and members of the Shenyang City branch of the Liaoning Regional Association.
The participants watched a Korean film dealing with part of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un's sacred history of revolutionary leadership.
There took place such celebration events as meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show at the Beijing City branch of the Zhongnan Regional Association and Yanbian, Jilin and Mudanjiang regional associations and other affiliated organizations of the GAKC. -0-

New Houses Built in Taedong County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- New modern dwelling houses have appeared at the Soje Farm in Taedong County, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK, under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea ushering in a new era of rural development.
Present at a ceremony for moving into those houses were Kim Man Jo, secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in the county.
Kim Hyon Chol, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made an address at the ceremony. Then licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches made.

headline: Press Statement of Head of External Policy Office of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The head of the External Policy Office of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following press statement "The U.S. instigating NATO and agents to confrontation with Russia is a serious threat to Europe" on September 13:
Recently, U.S. Secretary of State Blinken groundlessly slandered the cooperation based on mutual benefit and equality between the Russian Federation and other sovereign states, and committed a political provocation terming it a "threat" to Europe.
This clearly shows the U.S. sinister intention to overstate the "security crisis" of European countries and shift the blame for the present Ukrainian situation on to a third party and thus more firmly rally its followers on the anti-Russian front and give "legality" and continuity to its confrontation moves.
The DPRK Foreign Ministry expresses strong regret over the fact that the U.S. top diplomat slandered independent sovereign states while distorting the essence of the Ukrainian situation with extremely irresponsible and improper words, and categorically rejects this.
The U.S. secretary of State is trying to deceive the international community, turning black into white, but such attempt can neither cover up nor deny the fact that the U.S. is the root cause of the outbreak of the Ukrainian crisis and its prolongation and instability of the situation in Europe.
It is none other than the U.S. which caused the Ukrainian crisis by inciting the reckless advance of NATO towards the east in disregard of the legitimate security interests of Russia and its territorial integrity, with the wild dream to establish unipolar supremacy.
The U.S. is also the arch criminal as it has systematically handed over to Ukraine such lethal weapons and equipment as Abrams tanks, F-16 fighters and ATACMS long-range missiles in a bid to bring a strategic defeat to Russia, in disregard of the unanimous demand and aspiration of the international community for the early peaceful settlement of the Ukrainian situation, and caused innocent civilian damage and long-term catastrophe.
It is also the U.S. which committed to deploying in Europe long-range missiles targeting Russia and has staged NATO-led war drills against Russia one after another and brought a horrible war to the whole of Europe, revealing its intention to lift a ban for Ukraine on the use of long-range weapons toward the depth area of Russia.
All facts go to prove that the U.S. is a real threat facing Europe and the international community as it is inciting conflict and confrontation, instigating NATO and agents to the confrontation with Russia and fostering the permanent war.
The Ukrainian crisis will never be an opportunity to revive the weakened position of the United States, and the Russian people will surely and triumphantly achieve their just aim.
The international community should not tolerate the reckless acts of the U.S., which is getting frantic with the moves for military confrontation after mortgaging the security of Europe in a bid to realize its hegemonic interests, but should defend the regional peace and stability by its concerted efforts.
We will as ever invariably support the just cause of the Russian people who are striving to defend sovereignty and build a fair and multipolar world, smashing the imperialists' hegemonic policy and high-handed practices. -0-

headline: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Uzbekistan
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- The Social Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan held a meeting on September 7 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Present at the meeting held in Tashkent were Chairman Ko Tae Chun and members of the confederation.
Ko Tae Chun made a speech at the meeting.
He noted that PresidentKim Il Sungwon victory in the war of aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists within two years since the birth of the DPRK, restored the ruined country by dint of self-reliance, believing in the strength of the people and fully demonstrated the DPRK's dignity and might before the whole world as a country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
He said that the DPRK could reliably defend its dignity and sovereignty, despite the decades-long moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle it, entirely thanks to the outstanding and wise leadership of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il.
The DPRK is now greeting the greatest heyday of its development under the guidance of the respected MarshalKim Jong Un, he stressed. -0-
