headline: Press Statement by Spokesperson for Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry
Joint On-line Seminar Held in Brazil
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A joint on-line seminar titled "Invincible power - DPRK" was held by Brazilian political parties and organizations on September 9, the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Present there were personages of political parties, organizations and institutions, including the Brazilian Communist Party, the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics, the Center for the Study of People's Korea and the Brazilian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, and members of Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.
Speeches were made there.
A member of the National Political Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party extended warm congratulations to all the Korean people on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
He said that the DPRK, which has covered the glorious path under the leadership of the great PresidentKim Il Sungand His ExcellencyKim Jong Ilfor 76 years since its birth, braving manifold difficulties, is demonstrating only miracles and victories day by day as it is led byKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the DPRK.
The chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and the chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of People's Korea said that the DPRK is fully demonstrating its dignity and might as an independent power and invincible country all over the world and that thanks to the outstanding leadership of President of the State AffairsKim Jong Un, the Korean people will certainly win victory in their struggle to build a socialist power to be envied by the world. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Sergei Shoigu, Secretary of Security Council of Russian Federation
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, on September 13 met Sergei Shoigu, secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, who was on a visit to the DPRK.
Kim Jong Ungladly received Sergei Shoigu and shared with him the joy of meeting again after the lapse of one year. Then he had a talk with the Russian guest in a friendly, trustworthy and warm atmosphere.
Sergei Shoigu courteously conveyed the friendly greetings from Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, to the DPRK leader.
Kim Jong Unexpressed his thanks for it and conveyed his warm greetings to the respected Russian president.
At the talk, there was a wide-ranging exchange of views on the issues of steadily deepening the strategic dialogue between the two countries and strengthening cooperation to defend the mutual security interests and on the regional and international situations. The talk reached a satisfactory consensus of opinions on the presented issues.
Appreciating the dynamic development of the bilateral relations in all fields including politics, the economy and culture according to the agreement reached at the DPRK-Russia Pyongyang summit held last June,Kim Jong Unaffirmed that the DPRK government would further expand cooperation and collaboration with the Russian Federation true to the spirit of the Treaty on Comprehensive Strategic Partnership in the future, too.
That eveningKim Jong Unmet Sergei Shoigu again, and continued the constructive talk.
Seeing Sergei Shoigu off, he exchanged warm farewells with him and asked him to convey his greetings, wishing President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin of the Russian Federation good health and success in his work. And he wished the Russian people victory, prosperity, happiness and peace. -0-

headline: To Provide Coming Generation with Better Life
Article of International Affairs Analyst
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of an article contributed by Kim Myong Chol, an international affairs analyst, titled "The exclusive expansion of bloc will only accelerate the U.S. strategic defeat" says:
Three years have passed since the U.S. cooked up the exclusive nuclear security technology alliance system AUKUS with Britain and Australia.
The past three years are the period in which the true colors of AUKUS have been clearly proved as a serious threat to the nuclear non-proliferation system, a propellant of arms race and a disturber of the regional strategic balance.
The U.S. is insisting that AUKUS is not targeting any specific country and has no effect on the nuclear non-proliferation system. But it is nothing but flowery words to patronize its exclusive policy on strengthening the alliance.
The Korean peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region are plunged into a more unstable situation due to the confrontational behavior of the U.S. that is resorting to the Cold War way of thinking and inter-camp confrontation which are totally opposed to the desire of mankind for global peace and stability.

U.S. which thrust dagger onto its ally's back

As regards AUKUS, fabricated on September 15, 2021, the French foreign minister strongly denounced it as an act of thrusting a dagger onto the ally’s back, not a matter of scrapping the submarine contract which had been pushed forward between France and Australia.
The Biden administration had been advertising the "importance of alliance and the strengthened alliance", arguing that "the U.S. has come back". But the fact that it suddenly betrayed its ally in Europe is still now sparking off great shock and doubts of the international community.
However, the appearance of Australia changing as an outpost for the U.S. and the move of AUKUS widening its fence give an answer to a question why the U.S. thrust a dagger onto the back of France.
Firstly, the U.S. is turning Australia into a powerful military ally capable of containing independent and sovereign states in the Asia-Pacific region through the transfer of nuclear-powered submarine technology.
The U.S., together with the UK, is taking the lead in helping Australia possess a fleet composed of eight nuclear-powered submarines by 2055 and has expanded the ultra-modern military technology cooperation among three countries into the development of hypersonic weapons, eased the restrictions of military technology and arms export and built on an extensive scale facilities for operating its nuclear strategic assets and ultra-modern military hardware in Australia from 2022.
It has systematically delivered weapons and equipment such as Tomahawk cruise missiles, ship-to-air interceptor missiles and attack helicopters to Australia and supported the manufacture and export of missiles in Australia.
Secondly, the U.S. is trying to develop AUKUS into a multilateral military bloc in which more allies are involved.
Now, the officials concerned of the U.S. administration, whenever they have the opportunity, repeatedly claim that the door to AUKUS is open to the partners if they judge it is proper for them to join it.
The U.S.-Britain-Australia tripartite defense authority talks in April made public a "joint statement" on examining a proposal for promoting cooperation between AUKUS and Japan in the field of ultra-modern technology. And the U.S.-Japan summit held in Washington agreed on the issue on the cooperation between AUKUS and Japan in eight fields of core defence technology including artificial intelligence and cyber.
The U.S. is also mulling involving the ROK, New Zealand, Canada and other allies into AUKUS in the capacity of "partners", saying that it is necessary for AUKUS to cooperate more closely with such countries as the ROK in the Indo-Pacific region.
All facts go to prove that the U.S. thrust a dagger onto the back of its ally, proceeding from a politically-motivated calculation to expand relations of alliance with its vassal forces into a multilateral military bloc based on nuclear weapons and secure a strategic superior in the region.

AUKUS arousing backlash from international community

As soon as AUKUS made its ill-natured appearance, it has been the target of denunciation and rejection by many countries.
Russia denounced the U.S. and its allies for pursuing a long-term confrontation in the region, terming AUKUS "NATO of Asian version". China censured AUKUS for threatening a regional peace and stability and sparking arms race as a security mechanism acting according the baton of the U.S.
Meanwhile, the Southeast Asian countries neighboring Australia asserted that big powers should not do an act of infringing upon the interests of other countries with high-handed practice, saying that the Australian government is playing a “role of the police” of the U.S. in the region.
Many media and experts on security are expressing the concerns that the fabrication of AUKUS is little short of opening the "nuclear box of Pandora".
The assertion of regional countries and experts is by no means groundless.
The fact that 160 nuclear warheads can be manufactured with highly enriched uranium, the fuel for the nuclear-powered submarines to be transferred to Australia, shows that the activities of AUKUS are very likely to lead to Australia's nuclear armament.
And the reality proves that the U.S. is further inciting the wild ambition of the regional allies including Japan and the ROK for nuclear weaponization as it is transferring nuclear-powered submarines and their technology to Australia.
The “desire for joining” AUKUS is growing with each passing day among Japan, ROK and other satellites of the U.S. and it predicts that the international nuclear non-proliferation system will be hardly hit in succession.
The exclusive and confrontational nature of AUKUS targeting a third country is further arousing the caution of regional countries.
The U.S. claimed that AUKUS does not target a special state in an early period but, recently, is not hiding the fact that AUKUS targets the independent and sovereign states in the region.
High-ranking officials of the U.S. administration said that AUKUS regards China, Russia and the DPRK as the "threats" to the India-Pacific region, revealing the black-hearted intention of the U.S. to contain sovereign states through AUKUS.
Viewing the reality in which the U.S. is resorting to its "lattice-like fence alliance" policy on organically combining its allies across the world, it is a matter of time for AUKUS to merge with the U.S.-led political and military blocs including the U.S.-Japan-ROK triangular military bloc, SQUAD and QUAD. And it will further fix the structure of the new Cold War in the region.
This is a clear reason why the international community is expressing strong repugnance and caution against AUKUS.

Washington's policy on expanding blocs accelerates its strategic defeat

The present U.S. administration is loudly advertising the fabrication and expansion of various blocs like AUKUS as its "diplomatic achievements", claiming that it is promoting the U.S. strategic value and interests.
But if anyone with an elementary understanding of the external crisis facing the U.S., he will know with ease that the above-said claim is very cross-sectional.
In January this year, the U.S. magazine National Interest said that the U.S. is being put in a dilemma for its excessive interference in various regional issues and the expanded friction of regional countries resulted from it. It raised the question "Still is the U.S. the only superpower in the world?"
As a matter of fact, the U.S. policy on expanding its alliance, which is being enforced worldwide, is further weakening its strength and exposing it to a more critical situation.
First of all, the debt crisis of the U.S. is getting more serious day by day as the present U.S. administration is spending an astronomical amount of money on the arms buildup for maintenance and expansion of blocs and on the operation of overseas military bases and is running high fever in the military support for pro-U.S. states including Israel and Ukraine.
The U.S. impudent patronage for its allies, which are resorting to military confrontation and massacre of civilians, is leading to the decline in its influence in the region and serving as a catalyst for inciting anti-U.S. sentiments across the world.
In particular, the U.S. moves for the confrontation between camps to encircle and contain independent and sovereign states through the establishment of the global military alliance are compelling sovereign states to bolster up their self-defensive strength in every way and form and strengthen the just strategic axis for suppressing and foiling the aggressive military blocs.
This predicts that the more desperately the U.S. resorts to its policy on expanding blocs, the more it will plunge into an inescapable strategic maze.
The appearance of the U.S. seeking the confrontation between camps reminds one of the old Roman Empire which had been doomed to ruin, not the "only superpower".
The just international community will never tolerate the U.S. confrontation moves of violating peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world through its reckless policy for hegemony and bloc expansion but will counter them with strong strength.
Washington’s exclusive bloc expansion will be a decisive factor in accelerating the U.S. strategic defeat. -0-

headline: Joint On-line Seminar Held in Brazil
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A joint on-line seminar titled "Invincible power - DPRK" was held by Brazilian political parties and organizations on September 9, the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Present there were personages of political parties, organizations and institutions, including the Brazilian Communist Party, the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics, the Center for the Study of People's Korea and the Brazilian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, and members of Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.
Speeches were made there.
A member of the National Political Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party extended warm congratulations to all the Korean people on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
He said that the DPRK, which has covered the glorious path under the leadership of the great PresidentKim Il Sungand His ExcellencyKim Jong Ilfor 76 years since its birth, braving manifold difficulties, is demonstrating only miracles and victories day by day as it is led byKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the DPRK.
The chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and the chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of People's Korea said that the DPRK is fully demonstrating its dignity and might as an independent power and invincible country all over the world and that thanks to the outstanding leadership of President of the State AffairsKim Jong Un, the Korean people will certainly win victory in their struggle to build a socialist power to be envied by the world. -0-

headline: DPRK Team Advances into Quarterfinals of 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team beat its Austrian rival in the semi-quarter finals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup and thus advanced into the quarterfinals.
It beat its rival Austrian team by 5:2 on September 12.
It will meet its Brazilian rival in the quarterfinals on September 15. -0-

headline: Article of International Affairs Analyst
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of an article contributed by Kim Myong Chol, an international affairs analyst, titled "The exclusive expansion of bloc will only accelerate the U.S. strategic defeat" says:
Three years have passed since the U.S. cooked up the exclusive nuclear security technology alliance system AUKUS with Britain and Australia.
The past three years are the period in which the true colors of AUKUS have been clearly proved as a serious threat to the nuclear non-proliferation system, a propellant of arms race and a disturber of the regional strategic balance.
The U.S. is insisting that AUKUS is not targeting any specific country and has no effect on the nuclear non-proliferation system. But it is nothing but flowery words to patronize its exclusive policy on strengthening the alliance.
The Korean peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region are plunged into a more unstable situation due to the confrontational behavior of the U.S. that is resorting to the Cold War way of thinking and inter-camp confrontation which are totally opposed to the desire of mankind for global peace and stability.

U.S. which thrust dagger onto its ally's back

As regards AUKUS, fabricated on September 15, 2021, the French foreign minister strongly denounced it as an act of thrusting a dagger onto the ally’s back, not a matter of scrapping the submarine contract which had been pushed forward between France and Australia.
The Biden administration had been advertising the "importance of alliance and the strengthened alliance", arguing that "the U.S. has come back". But the fact that it suddenly betrayed its ally in Europe is still now sparking off great shock and doubts of the international community.
However, the appearance of Australia changing as an outpost for the U.S. and the move of AUKUS widening its fence give an answer to a question why the U.S. thrust a dagger onto the back of France.
Firstly, the U.S. is turning Australia into a powerful military ally capable of containing independent and sovereign states in the Asia-Pacific region through the transfer of nuclear-powered submarine technology.
The U.S., together with the UK, is taking the lead in helping Australia possess a fleet composed of eight nuclear-powered submarines by 2055 and has expanded the ultra-modern military technology cooperation among three countries into the development of hypersonic weapons, eased the restrictions of military technology and arms export and built on an extensive scale facilities for operating its nuclear strategic assets and ultra-modern military hardware in Australia from 2022.
It has systematically delivered weapons and equipment such as Tomahawk cruise missiles, ship-to-air interceptor missiles and attack helicopters to Australia and supported the manufacture and export of missiles in Australia.
Secondly, the U.S. is trying to develop AUKUS into a multilateral military bloc in which more allies are involved.
Now, the officials concerned of the U.S. administration, whenever they have the opportunity, repeatedly claim that the door to AUKUS is open to the partners if they judge it is proper for them to join it.
The U.S.-Britain-Australia tripartite defense authority talks in April made public a "joint statement" on examining a proposal for promoting cooperation between AUKUS and Japan in the field of ultra-modern technology. And the U.S.-Japan summit held in Washington agreed on the issue on the cooperation between AUKUS and Japan in eight fields of core defence technology including artificial intelligence and cyber.
The U.S. is also mulling involving the ROK, New Zealand, Canada and other allies into AUKUS in the capacity of "partners", saying that it is necessary for AUKUS to cooperate more closely with such countries as the ROK in the Indo-Pacific region.
All facts go to prove that the U.S. thrust a dagger onto the back of its ally, proceeding from a politically-motivated calculation to expand relations of alliance with its vassal forces into a multilateral military bloc based on nuclear weapons and secure a strategic superior in the region.

AUKUS arousing backlash from international community

As soon as AUKUS made its ill-natured appearance, it has been the target of denunciation and rejection by many countries.
Russia denounced the U.S. and its allies for pursuing a long-term confrontation in the region, terming AUKUS "NATO of Asian version". China censured AUKUS for threatening a regional peace and stability and sparking arms race as a security mechanism acting according the baton of the U.S.
Meanwhile, the Southeast Asian countries neighboring Australia asserted that big powers should not do an act of infringing upon the interests of other countries with high-handed practice, saying that the Australian government is playing a “role of the police” of the U.S. in the region.
Many media and experts on security are expressing the concerns that the fabrication of AUKUS is little short of opening the "nuclear box of Pandora".
The assertion of regional countries and experts is by no means groundless.
The fact that 160 nuclear warheads can be manufactured with highly enriched uranium, the fuel for the nuclear-powered submarines to be transferred to Australia, shows that the activities of AUKUS are very likely to lead to Australia's nuclear armament.
And the reality proves that the U.S. is further inciting the wild ambition of the regional allies including Japan and the ROK for nuclear weaponization as it is transferring nuclear-powered submarines and their technology to Australia.
The “desire for joining” AUKUS is growing with each passing day among Japan, ROK and other satellites of the U.S. and it predicts that the international nuclear non-proliferation system will be hardly hit in succession.
The exclusive and confrontational nature of AUKUS targeting a third country is further arousing the caution of regional countries.
The U.S. claimed that AUKUS does not target a special state in an early period but, recently, is not hiding the fact that AUKUS targets the independent and sovereign states in the region.
High-ranking officials of the U.S. administration said that AUKUS regards China, Russia and the DPRK as the "threats" to the India-Pacific region, revealing the black-hearted intention of the U.S. to contain sovereign states through AUKUS.
Viewing the reality in which the U.S. is resorting to its "lattice-like fence alliance" policy on organically combining its allies across the world, it is a matter of time for AUKUS to merge with the U.S.-led political and military blocs including the U.S.-Japan-ROK triangular military bloc, SQUAD and QUAD. And it will further fix the structure of the new Cold War in the region.
This is a clear reason why the international community is expressing strong repugnance and caution against AUKUS.

Washington's policy on expanding blocs accelerates its strategic defeat

The present U.S. administration is loudly advertising the fabrication and expansion of various blocs like AUKUS as its "diplomatic achievements", claiming that it is promoting the U.S. strategic value and interests.
But if anyone with an elementary understanding of the external crisis facing the U.S., he will know with ease that the above-said claim is very cross-sectional.
In January this year, the U.S. magazine National Interest said that the U.S. is being put in a dilemma for its excessive interference in various regional issues and the expanded friction of regional countries resulted from it. It raised the question "Still is the U.S. the only superpower in the world?"
As a matter of fact, the U.S. policy on expanding its alliance, which is being enforced worldwide, is further weakening its strength and exposing it to a more critical situation.
First of all, the debt crisis of the U.S. is getting more serious day by day as the present U.S. administration is spending an astronomical amount of money on the arms buildup for maintenance and expansion of blocs and on the operation of overseas military bases and is running high fever in the military support for pro-U.S. states including Israel and Ukraine.
The U.S. impudent patronage for its allies, which are resorting to military confrontation and massacre of civilians, is leading to the decline in its influence in the region and serving as a catalyst for inciting anti-U.S. sentiments across the world.
In particular, the U.S. moves for the confrontation between camps to encircle and contain independent and sovereign states through the establishment of the global military alliance are compelling sovereign states to bolster up their self-defensive strength in every way and form and strengthen the just strategic axis for suppressing and foiling the aggressive military blocs.
This predicts that the more desperately the U.S. resorts to its policy on expanding blocs, the more it will plunge into an inescapable strategic maze.
The appearance of the U.S. seeking the confrontation between camps reminds one of the old Roman Empire which had been doomed to ruin, not the "only superpower".
The just international community will never tolerate the U.S. confrontation moves of violating peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world through its reckless policy for hegemony and bloc expansion but will counter them with strong strength.
Washington’s exclusive bloc expansion will be a decisive factor in accelerating the U.S. strategic defeat. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Sergei Shoigu, Secretary of Security Council of Russian Federation
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on September 13 received Sergei Shoigu, secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation on a visit to the DPRK.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Ungladly met with Sergei Shoigu and shared with him the joy of meeting again after the lapse of one year. He had a talk with Sergei Shoigu in a friendly and trustworthy, warm atmosphere.
Sergei Shoigu courteously conveyed the friendly greetings sent by Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, to the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
Kim Jong Unexpressed his thanks for it and conveyed his warm greetings to Vladimir Putin, president of the Russian Federation.
At the talk, there was a wide exchange of views on the issues of steadily deepening the strategic dialogue between the two countries and strengthening cooperation to defend the mutual security interests and on the regional and international situation. The talk reached a satisfactory consensus on the presented issues
Appreciating the dynamic development of the bilateral relations in all fields including politics, economy and culture according to the agreement reached at the DPRK-Russia Pyongyang summit held last June,Kim Jong Unaffirmed that the DPRK government would further expand cooperation and collaboration with the Russian Federation in the spirit of the Treaty on Comprehensive Strategic Partnership in the future, too.
That eveningKim Jong Unreceived again Sergei Shoigu, secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, and continued the constructive talk.
While seeing Sergei Shoigu off, he exchanged warm farewells with him and asked him to convey his greetings, wishing the respected President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin of the Russian Federation good health and success in his work. And he wished the Russian people victory, prosperity, happiness and peace. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Tanchon City of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- New houses have been built at the Jikjol Vegetable Farm and the Taljon Farm in Tanchon City, South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
The low- and single-storied and terraced houses, which preserve the regional feature and are designed in a modern, cultural and convenient way, are the result of the great loving care by the motherly Party that is devoting itself to providing the agricultural workers with a new life peculiar to the cultural efflorescence of socialism.
Present at the ceremonies for moving into new houses were Wi Chol Su, secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in the city.
Ri Kwang Hyok, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address.
Then licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches made.
Amid the cheerful dancing party, officials visited the new houses to congratulate their owners and share joy with them. -0-

headline: DPRK Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings in Laos, Myanmar, Pakistan, Norway, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Kazakhstan and Mexico from August 27 to September 9 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Speeches were made at the meetings attended by personages of political and social circles and masses in those countries.

Senators of Pakistan and personages of the Pakistan Awami National Party, the Pakistan Trade Union Federation and the Pakistan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee said that the prosperity, glory and dignity of the DPRK are associated with the august names of the President and the Chairman who turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist state and that the DPRK would demonstrate only the victory and glory thanks to the energetic leadership ofKim Jong Un,.
A member of the Central Executive Committee of the Myanmar Journalist Association stressed that the DPRK would certainly attain its goal to become a prosperous power thanks to the outstanding leadership of HEKim Jong Un, detailing the DPRK's history of proud victory.

Congratulatory messages toKim Jong Unwere adopted at the meetings held in Pakistan, Denmark and Sweden. -0-

headline: Generating Equipment Assembled at Tanchon Power Station No. 1
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Commanding officers and members of the brigade of the hydro-power equipment assembling station of the DPRK have finished the assembling of generating equipment of the Tanchon Power Station No. 1 in a short span of time.
They are speeding up preparations for trial operation while inspecting the overall equipment. -0-

headline: Guidance over Preparations for Sowing Winter Wheat Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Agricultural Commission of the DPRK is intensifying the guidance over winter wheat sowing.
The commission has sent the agricultural guidance organs at all levels the multimedia program and technical data on the excellent farming techniques and methods of the regions and units which have proved successful in wheat farming this year so that the relevant regions and units could apply them to suit the specific conditions.
Meanwhile, measures have been taken to provide a tele-questioning and answering system for farming techniques through mobile network for sci-tech dissemination and exchange.
Officials concerned are organizing the work to give technical guidance to the farms in conformity with their specific conditions.
And agro-technical measures are being taken to solve the problems arising in practice.
The commission is ensuring that the relevant units step up the production of combined soil management machines and wheat sowers. And it learns about the repair and maintenance of farm machines at all the agricultural production units so as to surmount the shortcomings. -0-

headline: New Soil Acidity Measuring Instrument Developed in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The South Hwanghae Provincial Telecommunication Management Bureau in the DPRK has developed a new Korean-style soil acidity measuring instrument.
The measuring instrument is new in measuring principle, program, structural device and quality of material and is convenient in using.
It is not limited by season and can easily measure soil acidity anywhere.
It is applied to the agricultural sector and other various sectors of the national economy as it can measure not only soil acidity but also acidity of various solutions. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Junghwa County, North Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- New houses have been built at several villages of the Maun Farm, Junghwa County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK at a time when the programme for the rural revolution in the new era has been translated into reality.
Attending a ceremony for moving into those houses were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in Junghwa County.
Kim Son Il, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, made an address.
Then licenses for using houses were handed over and speeches were made there.
Amid the play of cheerful peasants' music and dancing party, officials visited the new houses and shared joy with their owners. -0-

headline: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tour Pyongyang
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK led by Ko Tok U, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited the Korean Revolution Museum.
The members of the congratulatory group looked round various halls, being briefed on the exploits of the peerlessly great men who built a dignified people's socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, on this land and made great contributions to the development of the Juche-oriented overseas compatriots' movement.
The group also toured the Juche-oriented Musical Art Museum, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Kangdong Greenhouse Complex, Taesongsan Ice Cream Factory, etc. and spent a good time at the Yangdok Hot Spring Resort. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Pukchang County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- New villages have appeared at the Namsang Farm in Pukchang County, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Those villages, arranged with new modern houses for several hundreds of families and covered with green foliage, show the appearance of our countryside developing into new socialist civilization.
There was a ceremony for moving into new houses with the attendance of Kim Man Jo, secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in the county.
Kim Hyon Chol, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address there. Then the licenses for using houses were conveyed and speeches made.
The villages were wrapped in a festive mood with the happy looks of agricultural workers, who received excellent houses free of charge all at once, and laughter of their children. -0-

headline: Talchon Hot Spring in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- There are many famous hot springs in the DPRK.
Talchon Hot Spring in Samchon County, South Hwanghae Province, which was registered as a natural monument, is one of the famous hot springs in the country.
The hot spring is also called Jongdal (lark) Hot Spring from a legend that this hot spring helps to heal the broken leg of a lark.
A geography book, compiled in 1481, records this hot spring.
The total amount of mineral matter of the hot spring water is 0.26 g/L, the main ions are chlorine ion, carbonic acid ion and sulfuric acid ion, and the temperature is 43~51℃.
It is efficacious for alleviating pain, soothing nerves, improving the function of autonomic nerves, promoting blood circulation, etc.
It is also good for curing chronic gastritis (hyperacidity), chronic enteritis and colitis, rheumatoid arthritis, neuralgia, peripheral neuritis, hypertensive disease and gynecopathy.
One day in December Juche 46 (1957), PresidentKim Il Sungvisited the spa and showed great loving care, saying that it should be remodeled so that it can be widely used for the medical treatment of the people.
Sanatoriums have been renovated and tens of modern medical housing blocks built at the hot spring resort.
Every year, many working people recover their health after receiving medical treatment at the resort. -0-

headline: DPRK: Progress Made in Construction of Regional-industry Factories
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the 124th Regiments of the Korean People's Army are striving to complete the construction of regional-industry factories across the country on the highest level.
They have stepped up the construction work for regional-industry factories at 90 percent. They are now concentrating efforts on the work to ensure the construction quality. -0-

headline: Technical Remolding Accelerated in Machine-building Industry of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The machine-building industry of the DPRK directs efforts to improving the performance of equipment.
The Ryongsong Machine Complex applied the CNC system to a boring machine to provide a guarantee for shortening the processing time of parts and increasing their production in quality and quantity. And it improved a number of heat-treatment equipment to raise the quality of custom-built equipment.
The Taean Heavy Machine Complex introduced a valuable technical innovation proposal to large lathes, thus increasing the productivity.
The Pyongyang Electric Cable General Factory 326 and the Ranam Coal-mining Machine Factory attained the goal for technical improvement of major equipment.
The Anju Pump Factory, the Ryangchaek Bearing Factory and other units have made progress in the modernization of equipment through a technical innovation project with the main emphasis put on boosting productivity while saving manpower, electricity and lot. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, on Monday:
- The 32nd Plenary Meeting of the 14th Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK took place.
- The daily carries a decision of the SPA Standing Committee on convening the SPA of the DPRK.
- It deals with a notice on convening the SPA of the DPRK.
- An article says that the people are the foundation and pillar of the Party and the state and the starting point and focus of all their activities.
- Successes have been made in different economic sectors.
- A ceremony for moving into new houses was held at the Namsang Farm in Pukchang County, South Phyongan Province.
- An article says that the U.S. is, indeed, the empire of evils and rogue state bringing global disorder. -0-

headline: Plenary Meeting of DPRK SPA Standing Committee Held
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 32nd Plenary Meeting of the 14th Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Sunday.
Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, first vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and chairman of the SPA Standing Committee, presided over the plenary meeting.
Present at the plenary meeting were vice-chairmen Kang Yun Sok and Kim Ho Chol, Secretary General Ko Kil Son, and other members of the SPA Standing Committee.
Officials concerned of the SPA Standing Committee, the Secretariat of the Cabinet, ministries and national agencies were on hand as observers.
The plenary meeting discussed as its agenda items the issue of convening the SPA of the DPRK, the issue of deliberating and adopting the law on socialist exchange of materials and the law on maintenance of public buildings, the issue of deliberating and adopting the amendments to the law on road traffic and the law on external economic arbitration and the issue of examining and approving the amended master plan for land development in Pyongyang-Nampho area
First, the plenary meeting adopted a SPA Standing Committee's decision on convening the 11th Session of the 14th SPA of the DPRK with unanimous approval.
Then, there was a report on the main contents of relevant draft laws and amendments deliberated at the SPA Legislation Committee.
On the basis of study and discussion on the proposed bills, the plenary meeting adopted with unanimous approval a decree of the SPA Standing Committee "On adopting the Law of the DPRK on Socialist Exchange of Materials", "On adopting the Law of the DPRK on Maintenance of Public Buildings", "On amending and supplementing the Law of the DPRK on Road Traffic" and "On amending and supplementing the Law of the DPRK on External Economic Arbitration".
It also deliberated and approved the amended master plan for land development in Pyongyang-Nampho area. -0-

headline: Decision on Convening SPA of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 11th Session of 14th Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will be convened in Pyongyang on October 7, Juche 113 (2024).
A SPA Standing Committee's decision in this regard was announced on Sunday. -0-

headline: Notice on Convocation of SPA of DPRK Issued
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 11th Session of the 14th Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is to be convened in Pyongyang on October 7, Juche 113 (2024).
The session will discuss the issue of amending and supplementing the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK, the issue of deliberating and adopting the law on light industry and the law on external economic affairs and the issue of supervising the enforcement of the law on quality control.
The registration of deputies will be held on October 6, Juche 113 (2024).
A relevant notice of the SPA Standing Committee was announced on Sunday. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's Reply Message to Syrian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a reply message to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Sept. 16.
The message said:
I express deep thanks to you for sending warm congratulations on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Expressing belief that the traditional DPRK-Syria relations of friendship and cooperation would be consolidated and developed in conformity with the aspiration and desire of the peoples of the two countries, I extend firm support and solidarity to the Syrian people in their just struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and territorial integrity. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Leaves for Russia
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, and her party left here on Monday to take part in the Fourth Eurasian Women's Forum and the First BRICS Women's Forum to be held in Russia.
They were seen off at Pyongyang International Airport by Vice Foreign Minister Kim Jong Gyu and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora. -0-

headline: Agricultural Workers Move into New Houses in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- More houses have been built in the Sosin Vegetable Farm in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang, this year too.
The modern houses are the homes of happiness provided by the Workers' Party of Korea which translates all the wishes of the people into reality.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new house held on the spot on Monday were Ri Un Sok, secretary of the Pyongyang Municipal Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in the district.
Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang Municipal People's Committee, made a congratulatory speech. Then, licenses for the use of new houses were handed over to be followed by speeches.
Songs of joy resounded at the new rural villages amid dancing parties. Officials visited the owners of new houses to congratulate them. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Tuesday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a reply message to the president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
- The DPRK foreign minister and her party left here for Russia.
- Innovative successes were made in different sectors of the national economy.
- A ceremony for moving into new houses took place at the Township Stockbreeding Farm in Ichon County, Kangwon Province of the DPRK.
- The DPRK team advanced into semifinals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.

Rodong Sinmun
- An article says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the sacred history of unity in which it began with unity and has overcome all difficulties and always emerged victorious by dint of unity.
- Personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

headline: Foreign Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Personages of political parties, organizations and institutions in different countries, including the Khabarovsk Territorial Branch Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, the Belarus Association of Friends of Korean People Named afterKim Il SungandKim Jong Il, the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and the Belarus Association for the Study of Juche Idea, laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Iland art pieces depicting them and paid tribute to them.
The Chamberlain secretary as a special envoy of the Egyptian president and the general secretary of the South African Communist Party and the first deputy secretary of its Mfumalanga Provincial Committee visited DPRK missions.
Meanwhile, the Lao Federation of Trade Unions and the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Public Security, the Ministry of Industry and Commerce, the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, the Farmers Union, the Lang Son Provincial People's Committee, the Academy of Social Sciences of Vietnam and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Maize Harvesting Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Officials and working people in the agricultural field and helpers of the DPRK are achieving success in harvesting maizes.
Yonan County in South Hwanghae Province has finished the harvesting in the first place in the province by rationally allocating manpower and increasing the operation rate of vehicles.
Agricultural workers in Pyoksong, Samchon and Anak counties ensure the full operation of farm machines, thus registering good results in harvesting.
Those in the city of Songrim and Sungho and Kumchon counties have arranged the inter-process cooperation carefully.
The same is true of farms in South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and South Phyongan provinces. -0-

headline: DPRK Advances into Semifinals of 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team advanced into semifinals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
The quarterfinals between the DPRK and Brazilian teams took place on Sunday.
The DPRK team beat its Brazilian rival 1:0 in the match. -0-

headline: Agricultural Workers Move into New Houses in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- More houses have been built in the Sosin Vegetable Farm in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang, this year too.
The modern houses are the homes of happiness provided by the Workers' Party of Korea which translates all the wishes of the people into reality.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new house held on the spot on Monday were Ri Un Sok, secretary of the Pyongyang Municipal Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in the district.
Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang Municipal People's Committee, made a congratulatory speech. Then, licenses for the use of new houses were handed over to be followed by speeches.
Songs of joy resounded at the new rural villages amid dancing parties. Officials visited the owners of new houses to congratulate them. -0-

headline: Many Threshers Produced in Jagang Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Jagang Province of the DPRK produced hundreds of threshers and sent them to farms in the province.
The province, in contact with relevant units, gave precedence to designing and solved the problems arising in manufacturing equipment, took measures to supply various kinds of parts and materials and intensified technical guidance over the thresher production.
The Kanggye Farm Machine Factory established a system of collective technical agreement and an inspection system of each process and organized production in a scrupulous way to complete the thresher production task in a short span of time.
High-performance mobile rice threshers and maize threshers were introduced to farms in the province. -0-

headline: New Dwelling Houses Built for Farmers in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for moving into new houses took place at the Township Stockbreeding Farm in Ichon County, Kangwon Province of the DPRK.
The new houses, which are designed in a cozy and modern style to match the scenery of mountainous areas, are the cradle provided for the people by the energetic guidance of the great Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea ushering in a new era in which the capital city and regions are developing simultaneously.
Present at the ceremony were Kim Myong Chol, secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in the county.
A congratulatory address was made by Ju Mun Jin, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial People's Committee. Then the licenses for use of new houses were conveyed and oath-taking speeches made.
Farmers moved into the new houses amid the cheerful peasant music and dancing party. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio has produced new documentary films.
A documentary film titled "By Advancing Childcare Policy of Love" shows the benefits of childcare policy adopted by the love of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand the efforts of officials and working people implementing the policy.
A documentary film titled "A Miracle at Ryongsong" has a great effect in learning from the fighting spirit of the workers of the Ryongsong Machine Complex who kindled the torch of the Chollima spirit in the new era.
A documentary film titled "True Citizens of Republic" of "Meritorious Persons of Socialist Patriotism" (4)   shows  officials and working people who are making genuine patriotic efforts for the prosperity and future of the country. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in North Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers at the Wongyo Farm in Singye County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, have moved into modern houses.
The newly-built villages adding beauty to the scenery of Miru Plain show well the development aspect of flourishing countryside in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new house were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials of the Party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in the county.

When moving into new houses begun, the villages were wrapped in a festive mood with the happy laughter and song of agricultural workers. -0-

headline:
Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Leadership of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
[Juche113.9.18.]
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article that the revolutionary leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unhas a extraordinary historic weight and profound epochal significance, thanks to his outstanding idea and theory which sympathize with all people, all-people leadership covering all spheres of state and social life, personality as a great man admired by the world and great feats.
The most ardent love for the country and people lies in the foundation of the rare leadership practice ofKim Jong Un, the article says, and goes on:
His revolutionary leadership is the history of miracles and victories in which the dignity and prestige of our great state and our great people have been put on an absolute level.
Fostering strength for the prosperity and development of the country is the greatest love for the country and people.
The strongest national defence capability with the nuclear force as a pivot is the status and entity of Juche Korea, the absolute strength of the DPRK and the eternal dignity of the country and its people.
Thanks to the invincible rank, elite and powerful revolutionary army which has grown remarkably strong under the care of the most brilliant commander, the security and interests of the country and its people could be firmly defended, and the Korean people could demonstrate their might as the most dignified people who are fully exercising their rights in politics, military, the economy, culture and external relations, holding fast to the sovereignty.
His revolutionary leadership is a legendary history of creation that brought about epochal changes one after another in the struggle for increasing the national power and improving the people's well-being.
It is the steadfast creed ofKim Jong Unthat new innovations and developments should be achieved in all fields to accord with the state's prestige and only progress and creation should be made in the struggle for the improvement of the people's well-being.
Regarding the spirit of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people as a noble outlook on life,Kim Jong Unushered in a new era of prosperity in which the dignified people's country built by PresidentKim Il Sungand defended by ChairmanKim Jong Ilcan be glorified for all ages. This is the great feats performed byKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Advanced Sci-tech Data Dissemination Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Sci-Tech Complex in the DPRK is actively conducting the work to disseminate advanced scientific and technological data conducive to implementing the Workers' Party of Korea's policy for developing regional industry.
Officials, together with scientists and technicians, went to different cities and counties where the construction of regional-industry factories is being conducted and disseminated over 1.4 million scientific and technological data of 10-odd themes including foodstuffs, daily necessities, garment and seafood processing.
They uploaded and disseminated over ten thousand pieces of data needed for garment and seafood processing factories and 20 000 pieces of data on aquaculture.
They provided city and county sci-tech committees of several provinces and 10-odd units with much more than 60 000 pieces of data on creating raw materials bases.
In particular, they sent thousands of pieces of data conducive to building the Sinpho City Offshore Farm as a model base for aquaculture and revitalizing its operation. -0-

headline: Genuine Master Responsible for People's Living
story_text:
One day in July Juche 76 (1987), ChairmanKim Jong Ilmet an official who returned home after working in a region.
After learning in detail about the work of the official and the farming situation there, the Chairman asked if he had visited peasants' houses.
The official said that he had visited more than ten families and that he had been asked by the peasants to settle the issue of floor paper.
With a broad smile on his face, the Chairman said that it was very good and he met the genuine master responsible for people's living.
Looking at the official kindly, the Chairman said:
Some time ago, PresidentKim Il Sungsaid that he met many officials requesting him to send tractors and fertilizer at farm villages, but he had never seen an official asking him to solve the issue of rice bowl, he was pleased to see the real master of the people's living.
The Chairman said that it is very good that the official had heard the voice of the housekeepers in the rural village asking for the settlement of the floor paper, he was glad to know what the people wanted and was glad to be able to put efforts into it. He repeatedly praised the official for having done a very good thing.
Looking up to the Chairman, the official renewed his resolve to become a true servant of the people. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Lao President
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a reply message to Thongloun Sisoulith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on Sept. 16.
The message said:
I express my deep thanks to you for sending warm congratulations on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too, I wish you greater success in your responsible work for building a prosperous socialist state. -0-

headline: New Signboards at 4-D Simulation Cinema: Story about Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's People-Oriented Policy
story_text:
One day in September, Juche 102 (2013) the respected ComradeKim Jong Unvisited the 4-D simulation cinema built at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
At the auditorium No. 5, he watched various 4-D films, appreciating the resolution of display and the performance of simulators. He had a broad smile on his face, seemingly picturing the happy appearances of the people.
At the auditorium No. 1, he underlined the need to install a signboard bearing the titles of films on a wall beside the entrance so that visitors would know what films they would see before entering the auditorium.
Listening to his instructions, the accompanying officials repented of their negligence.
Kim Jong Uncontinued to tell them that it was necessary to have such signboards hung on outside walls of other auditoriums and set up a large film show timetable of the cinema.
Receiving his instructions that everything should be done at the best level if it is for the people, the officials pledged to become faithful servants of the people. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: DPRK Missile Administration and Academy of Defence Sciences Make Public Important Scientific Research Achievements
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Missile Administration of the DPRK successfully conducted test-fires of the new-type tactical ballistic missile Hwasongpho-11-Da-4.5 and an improved strategic cruise missile on Wednesday.
The new-type tactical ballistic missile was tipped with a 4.5 tonnage super-large conventional warhead according to design.
Its test-fire was aimed at verifying the accuracy of hit at medium range of 320 km and explosive power of the super-large warhead with a missile loaded with such a warhead.
The administration also conducted a test-fire of strategic cruise missile whose performance has been highly upgraded for its combat use.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, guided the test-fires.
He expressed great satisfaction over the test results.
He said that such tests and steady improvement of performance of weapons and equipment through them are directly related to the grave threat of outside forces to the state security environment of the DPRK.
The military and political situation in the region threatening the present state security environment indicates that the work for bolstering up the military capability for self-defence should be the most important affair of the country, he said.
Our military superiority proved once again today is enough to judge the speed of development of the DPRK's armed forces, he said, stressing the need to continue to bolster up the nuclear force and have the strongest military technical capability and overwhelming offensive capability in the field of conventional weapons, too.
Only when we have strong power, can we contain and frustrate the enemies' strategic misjudgment and will to use armed forces, he said, adding this is a true deterrent for defending peace and stability.
He also oversaw several kinds of small arms including a 7.62 mm sniper rifle and a 5.56 mm automatic rifle developed by the Academy of Defence Sciences and set forth the orientation of production and the important tasks for further increasing technical foundation of the factory.
Accompanying him were Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Jo Chun Ryong, secretary of the C.C., WPK, Kim Jong Sik, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, Jang Chang Ha, director general of the Missile Administration of the DPRK, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the Korean People's Army, Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Kang Il, vice-minister of National Defence of the DPRK, and Kim Yong Hwan, president of the Academy of Defence Sciences. -0-

headline: High Production Results Registered at Power Stations and Plants in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers at power stations and plants in the DPRK direct efforts to the readjustment and reinforcement project, registering high production results as compared with the same period of last year.
The Sunchon Thermal Power Plant has concentrated its efforts on ensuring the normal operation of generating equipment according to the requirements of technical rules and standard operating regulations in keeping with seasonal changes.
The Chongchongang Thermal Power Plant took a measure against the factors exercising a negative effect on the thermal efficiency and secured materials needed for repairing equipment to carry out the plan for electricity generation according to a schedule.
The Sodusu Power Station has produced a lot of electricity every day while keeping the control over hydraulic structures and generating equipment as required by the standard regulations.
Hochongang and Jangjingang power stations put the technical management of generating equipment and water control on a scientific basis to ensure the high-water level and high-efficiency operation. -0-

headline: High Production Results Registered at Power Stations and Plants in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers at power stations and plants in the DPRK direct efforts to the readjustment and reinforcement project, registering high production results as compared with the same period of last year.
The Sunchon Thermal Power Plant has concentrated its efforts on ensuring the normal operation of generating equipment according to the requirements of technical rules and standard operating regulations in keeping with seasonal changes.
The Chongchongang Thermal Power Plant took a measure against the factors exercising a negative effect on the thermal efficiency and secured materials needed for repairing equipment to carry out the plan for electricity generation according to a schedule.
The Sodusu Power Station has produced a lot of electricity every day while keeping the control over hydraulic structures and generating equipment as required by the standard regulations.
Hochongang and Jangjingang power stations put the technical management of generating equipment and water control on a scientific basis to ensure the high-water level and high-efficiency operation. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Her Russian Counterpart
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea who is on a visit to Russia to attend the Fourth Eurasian Women's Forum and the First BRICS Women's Forum in Sankt-Peterburg, met and had a talk with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov in Moscow on Sept. 17.
In the talk, there was a good exchange of views on expanding and developing the bilateral relations in various fields in the spirit of the DPRK-Russia treaty on comprehensive strategic partnership and further strengthening the mutual cooperation in international arenas.
The talk proceeded in a comradely and warm atmosphere. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: DPRK Missile Administration and Academy of Defence Sciences Make Public Important Scientific Research Achievements
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Missile Administration of the DPRK successfully conducted test-fires of the new-type tactical ballistic missile Hwasongpho-11-Da-4.5 and an improved strategic cruise missile on Wednesday.
The new-type tactical ballistic missile was tipped with a 4.5 tonnage super-large conventional warhead according to design.
Its test-fire was aimed at verifying the accuracy of hit at medium range of 320 km and explosive power of the super-large warhead with a missile loaded with such a warhead.
The administration also conducted a test-fire of strategic cruise missile whose performance has been highly upgraded for its combat use.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, guided the test-fires.
He expressed great satisfaction over the test results.
He said that such tests and steady improvement of performance of weapons and equipment through them are directly related to the grave threat of outside forces to the state security environment of the DPRK.
The military and political situation in the region threatening the present state security environment indicates that the work for bolstering up the military capability for self-defence should be the most important affair of the country, he said.
Our military superiority proved once again today is enough to judge the speed of development of the DPRK's armed forces, he said, stressing the need to continue to bolster up the nuclear force and have the strongest military technical capability and overwhelming offensive capability in the field of conventional weapons, too.
Only when we have strong power, can we contain and frustrate the enemies' strategic misjudgment and will to use armed forces, he said, adding this is a true deterrent for defending peace and stability.
He also oversaw several kinds of small arms including a 7.62 mm sniper rifle and a 5.56 mm automatic rifle developed by the Academy of Defence Sciences and set forth the orientation of production and the important tasks for further increasing technical foundation of the factory.
Accompanying him were Pak Jong Chon, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Jo Chun Ryong, secretary of the C.C., WPK, Kim Jong Sik, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, Jang Chang Ha, director general of the Missile Administration of the DPRK, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the Korean People's Army, Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Kang Il, vice-minister of National Defence of the DPRK, and Kim Yong Hwan, president of the Academy of Defence Sciences. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:

- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a congratulatory letter and messages from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and its affiliated organizations at all levels on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of DPRK.

headline: Autumn Hygienic Campaign in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK, September and October are months for autumn hygienic campaign.
In this regard, all citizens across the country have turned out in a mass patriotic campaign to give a facelift to streets, villages and workplaces.
Institutions, enterprises, dongs and neighborhood units are directing efforts to remodeling streets, villages and workplaces in a hygienic and cultured way with the main emphasis put on removing the environmental pollution and the source of all kinds of diseases.
All units are intensifying the disinfection work after examining the origin of epidemic vectors and their habitat.
A model unit has been set in conformity with the characteristics of regions and units and a demonstration conducted to encourage emulation among sectors and units.
TV and other media are conducting information activities to rev up the social atmosphere for hygienic campaign. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Yonsan County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers at the Okdok Farm in Yonsan County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, have moved into new houses.
Hundreds of modern houses, built at the sunny foot of mountain, represent the bright prospect and rosy future of rural development in the new era.
A ceremony for moving into those houses took place on the spot amid the joy and excitement of agricultural workers and other inhabitants at the farm who were to receive new excellent houses free of charge under the people-oriented policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
Present there were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the provincial committee of the WPK, and officials of the Party and power organs and agricultural workers in the county.
Ho Yun Guk, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address at the ceremony. Then licenses for use of the new houses were conveyed and speeches of resolution made.
Amid the display of cheerful peasant music and dance, the new owners moved into their houses and officials shared joy with them. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter and Messages from Compatriots in Japan
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a congratulatory letter and messages from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and its affiliated organizations at all levels on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
In its congratulatory letter, the Chongryon Central Standing Committee paid the noblest tribute to the great leaders and GeneralissimosKim Il SungandKim Jong Il, founder and leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to the respected MarshalKim Jong Un.
Thanks to the socialist homeland, Chongryon and Koreans in Japan could demonstrate the honor of being pioneers of patriotism, models of patriotism and loyalty and a model of overseas compatriots' organizations in the face of the fierce blizzards in an alien land, the letter stressed.
Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are fully determined to turn out in the struggle for comprehensively implementing the important letter sent by MarshalKim Jong Unto the participants in the 25th Congress of Chongryon, it said.
Meanwhile, congratulatory messages came from the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Educationists Association in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Association in Japan and other central organizations and affiliated organizations under Chongryon, the Choson Sinbo Company, the Korean News Service, the Hagu Bookshop, the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, the Kumgang Insurance Company, the Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange and other affiliates, regional headquarters of Chongryon and Korean University and other Korean schools in Japan. -0-

headline: Events Held in Russia to Celebrate 76th Birthday of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia, including the Party for Peace and Unity, the Amur Regional Branch Committee and the Khabarovsk Territorial Branch Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Tynda City, the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" and the Far East State Science Library, held meetings, seminars and other events on September 6-9 to celebrate the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Speeches were made at the events attended by personages and masses of relevant units.
The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity praised the whole life of the great leader ComradeKim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK, as a noble devoted life for the people.
The reality of the prospering DPRK would have been unthinkable without the exploits of ComradeKim Jong Il, the great general, the chairperson said, stressing:
Thanks to ComradeKim Jong Un's distinguished leadership, the DPRK has made rapid progress in recent years, demonstrating its might as an independent power admired by the whole world.
The first secretary of the Amur Regional Branch Committee and the first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Branch Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Korea, once a weak colony, has developed into a full-fledged strategic state with a solid foundation of the independent national economy and the tremendous military muscle. This is a clear proof that the desire of ComradesKim Il SungandKim Jong Ilfor building a powerful country is being translated into a brilliant reality thanks to ComradeKim Jong Un, they stressed.
Personages of the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Tynda City and the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" elaborated on the birth of the DPRK, saying that it brought about lots of political, economic and social transformations in Korea.
Congratulatory messages to the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwere adopted at the events.
Meanwhile, a lecture was given by the Group for International Solidarity with the DPRK on September 7 to mark the 76th birthday of the DPRK. -0-

headline: National Exhibition of IT Successes Opens in DPRK
DPRK Civil Aviation Delegation Returns
story_text: Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A DPRK civil aviation delegation led by General Director of the National Aviation Administration Rim Kwang Ung returned home by air on Wednesday after attending the second Asia-Pacific civil aviation ministerial meeting held in India. -0-

headline: Platform Given for Women's Union Officials and Members' Story-Telling
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A story-telling platform was given for officials and members of the women's union at the Hall of Women on Sept. 18.
The performers told the audience about their experience in building up their organizations to be patriotic groups and communist mother groups devoting themselves to the country.
They referred to the noble outlook on life and spiritual world of the women of the present era, who are making contributions to the struggle for attaining the 12 major goals for the development of the national economy, set by the Workers' Party of Korea, through a brisk socialist patriotic movement and revolutionary mass movement.
Reminding the audience of the untiring efforts made by the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho personally guided the emergency rescuing operation and took a series of measures for flood victims in the dangerous flood-hit areas, they said that they find their glory of life and happiness in relieving the Party of its troubles even a bit.
They called upon all the officials and members of the women's union to add glory to the new era of national prosperity by learning from the patriotic spirit and fighting spirit of the women of the preceding generations.
Among the audience were officials and members of the women's union in Pyongyang. -0-

headline: Brisk Agitprop Activities by Publication Distributors in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Publication distributors in Nampho Municipality of the DPRK launched a brisk campaign for information and motivation through books at worksites seething with the implementation of Party decisions.
Those of the publications distribution offices in Chollima, Taean and Kangso districts have conducted explanation on such books as memoirs "Among the People", cycle of novels "Immortal Milestones" and full-length novel "Green Battlefield" at production sites of the Taean Heavy Machine Complex, the Kumsong Tractor Factory and other industrial establishments to educate their employees through the exploits of the peerlessly great persons.
Those of the publications distribution offices in Hanggu District and Ryonggang County have conducted similar activities on farm fields to encourage the agricultural workers.
Those of the publications distribution office in Waudo District visited the Nampho Children's Pharmaceutical Factory, the Waudo District Garment Factory and other units to give publicity to the noble outlook of the motherly Party on the younger generation.
Those of the publications distribution office in Onchon County conducted information activities at the construction site for regional-industry factories and raw materials bases. -0-

headline: New Achievements Made in Public Health Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Several units in the public health sector of the DPRK have made new achievements conducive to promoting the people's health.
The Microbiology Institute of the Academy of Medical Science established a method of producing vaccines to prolong the duration of immunization and reduce the inoculum.
The Kim Man Yu Hospital succeeded in the research into rational manufacturing of diagnostic reagent by genetic engineering.
Pyongyang University of Medicine developed an analytical system for applying aesthetic instruments and methods to suit the conditions of patient, thus providing a guarantee for further raising the effectiveness of treatment.
Those achievements were registered as part of the national scientific and technological successes. -0-
