headline: Many Innovators Produced in Light Industry Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- A large number of innovators at different units of the light industry sector in the DPRK fulfilled their two-year or one-year economic plans.
More than 320 workers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill carried out their economic plans for two years or one year.
At the Sinuiju Textile Mill, more than 100 workers fulfilled their two-year or one-year economic plans.
At the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, 10-odd workers fulfilled their two-year economic plans and more than 100 reeling workers carried out their yearly plans ahead of schedule.
Such innovators were produced at Songchon and Hamhung silk mills. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers here on Friday:
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a letter from the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
The DPRK foreign minister met with her Russian counterpart.
Achievements have been made in various sectors of national economy.
The DPRK women football players advanced into the finals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.

Rodong Sinmun
An article says that the DPRK people absolutely trust on the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea and are convinced of the rosy future to be brought into bloom under its care.
A ceremony for moving into new houses took place at the Okdok Farm in Yonsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
An article stresses that the ruin of the hegemony policy sought by the imperialist reactionary forces is the law of history.

Minju Joson
- An editorial calls upon leading economic officials to make a positive contribution to glorifying this year as the year of proud victory by redoubling their efforts with high awareness. -0-

headline: Special Reward Given to Kwail County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Visitors to Kwail County, South Hwanghae Province, a large-scale fruit production base of the DPRK, are greatly excited to see the sea of fruit.
Such reality is associated with the leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho provides the people with tasty and fresh fruit and his loving care for the agricultural workers in Kwail County.
One day in September Juche 106 (2017),Kim Jong Unvisited Kwail County, South Hwanghae Province, a fruit-growing area, which had brought about a large yield of fruit.
He took the hands of officials one by one that day and said with pleasure that he was relieved of his pent-up fatigue as he thought how pleased the people would be when they heard the news of the great fruit harvest in Kwail County.
He made sure that the special reward was given to Kwail County.
After acquainting himself in detail with the situation in the county a year ago, he indicated the tasks and ways for raising the fruit production as befitting the main base of the country's fruit production and took measures for doing so.
He also returned all the successes to the officials and agricultural workers there.
After watching a document related to the special reward for Kwail County that night, he sent it to the relevant field.
The story about the special reward provided under the warm loving care of the peerlessly great man touches the hearts of the people, telling about the devoted efforts made by the great father for the development of fruit farming. -0-

headline: Int'l Affairs Analyst's Comment on Despicable Behavior of U.S. and West
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Sim Min, an international affairs analyst of the DPRK, issued the following article "The U.S. and the West had better ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their despicable behavior":
New war clouds are now hanging over the whole world, due to the U.S. and NATO's evermore reckless anti-Russia hysteria.
According to media reports, a U.S.-Britain summit was held in Washington on Sept. 13 over the issue of lifting the restrictions on Ukraine's use of Western-type long-range weapons. And on Sept. 16, the NATO secretary general said that he welcomed the ongoing dialogues for lifting the restrictions on Ukraine's use of Western-made long-range missiles and that lifting the restrictions is a matter for each country to decide on its own accord.
This is not the first time to have dealt with the issue of lifting the restrictions on the use of Western long-range weapons offered to Ukraine. Anyhow, the U.S. and Britain were closeted over the issue and then the secretary general of NATO expressed the stand for support. This clearly shows that the U.S. and NATO's preoccupation to inflict a strategic defeat on Russia can never change and they are getting more desperate to attain it.
What matters is that the U.S. and NATO are well aware that to lift the restrictions is a very dangerous act like a death sentence, but are voluntarily taking such action. Seized with the incurable megalomania that they can defeat Russia, their strategic rival, they are inviting such disaster threatening their existence without any foresight and any thought of ensuing consequences.
Russia has already sent a clear signal that the lift of restrictions on the use of long-range weapons by the U.S. and NATO would be regarded as their direct engagement in the Ukrainian conflict and that the West should not act rashly if it does not want disastrous consequences.
Anyhow, if the U.S. and its followers continue to resort to such dangerous gambling which may endanger the prosperity, development and peace of mankind in a moment, they will have to get ready to face tremendous disastrous consequences and pay a dear price beyond imagination.
The U.S. and NATO are well advised to recall the fact that the two great patriotic wars recorded in the history of Russia ended after the Russian army completely destroyed the strongholds of aggressors.
The last gambling will only bring a tragic end. -0-

headline: Weakness Brings Bloodshed: Dreadful Situation in Gaza Strip Teaches
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- A new school year began in several countries of the Middle East in September.
Children in many countries and regions across the world were greatly excited to enjoy their first school day or new school year amid their parents' blessings but such joyful occasion was impossible in Gaza Strip, where a heartrending situation prevails.
According to a UNICEF's recent report, the future of children in Gaza has plunged into crisis as a new school year began in Gaza Strip but some 620 000 children are unable to return to their schools and the number of school-age children impossible to enroll is at least 45 000.
Actually, the educational sector in Gaza Strip has almost reduced to ruins
More than 80 percent of schools have been severely destroyed and the remaining school buildings are swarming with evacuees.
So children lost their dreams for the future, being deprived of their right to learn.
Worse still, Zionists are bombarding the remaining schools almost every day under the pretext of "annihilating Hamas."
Calling for "starving people in Gaza Strip to death", the Israeli troops occupying the region are indulging in massacre and vandalism. Children in the region have opted for the campaign for existence, instead of going to school.
A boy standing in a queue for long-awaited food assistance to support his family in Gaza City sadly recollected his school days last year when he sang national anthem and played sports with his classmates.
A 14-year-old girl of Rafah City who lost her all family members due to an Israeli air raid recalled that her mother had combed her hair and prepared sandwich for her on the new school year opening day every year. She cried in agony, saying she was left alone after losing her mum, dad and brothers.
A woman in Khan Younis City voiced lamentation, saying her daughter lost her right to go to school and she lost her dream of putting school uniform on her child and bringing her to school.
Such dreadful situation in Gaza Strip teaches that weakness brings bloodshed and tears only and even deprives the children of their dreams and future. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Jungsan County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- The agricultural workers at Manphung and Sokda farms in Jungsan County, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK, have received new houses amid the successive appearance of modern villages in rural areas across the country.
Modern houses of various styles with regional features were built at the farms and fruit trees and other trees of good species were planted in villages to add to their scenery.
Present at the ceremony for moving into those houses were Kim Man Jo, secretary of the provincial Party committee, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in the county.
Kim Hyon Chol, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address. Then licenses for the use of houses were conferred and speeches made.
Officials visited the new houses to congratulate their owners and share joy with them. -0-

Anyhow, if the U.S. and its followers continue to resort to such dangerous gambling which may endanger the prosperity, development and peace of mankind in a moment, they will have to get ready to face tremendous disastrous consequences and pay a dear price beyond imagination.
The U.S. and NATO are well advised to recall the fact that the two great patriotic wars recorded in the history of Russia ended after the Russian army completely destroyed the strongholds of aggressors.
The last gambling will only bring a tragic end. -0-

headline: DPRK Advances into Finals of 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Semifinals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup took place between the DPRK and U.S. teams on Sept. 18 (local time).
The DPRK team, which had put pressure on the rival team with a strong attack from the start of the match, succeeded in scoring in 22 minutes with a good left-foot shot by player Choe Il Son.
The DPRK team beat its U.S. rival 1:0 in the match.
The DPRK women's football players will play the finals with the Japanese team on Sept. 22 (local time). -0-

headline: Int'l Affairs Analyst's Comment on Despicable Behavior of U.S. and West
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Sim Min, an international affairs analyst of the DPRK, issued the following article "The U.S. and the West had better ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their despicable behavior":
New war clouds are now hanging over the whole world, due to the U.S. and NATO's evermore reckless anti-Russia hysteria.
According to media reports, a U.S.-Britain summit was held in Washington on Sept. 13 over the issue of lifting the restrictions on Ukraine's use of Western-type long-range weapons. And on Sept. 16, the NATO secretary general said that he welcomed the ongoing dialogues for lifting the restrictions on Ukraine's use of Western-made long-range missiles and that lifting the restrictions is a matter for each country to decide on its own accord.
This is not the first time to have dealt with the issue of lifting the restrictions on the use of Western long-range weapons offered to Ukraine. Anyhow, the U.S. and Britain were closeted over the issue and then the secretary general of NATO expressed the stand for support. This clearly shows that the U.S. and NATO's preoccupation to inflict a strategic defeat on Russia can never change and they are getting more desperate to attain it.
What matters is that the U.S. and NATO are well aware that to lift the restrictions is a very dangerous act like a death sentence, but are voluntarily taking such action. Seized with the incurable megalomania that they can defeat Russia, their strategic rival, they are inviting such disaster threatening their existence without any foresight and any thought of ensuing consequences.
Russia has already sent a clear signal that the lift of restrictions on the use of long-range weapons by the U.S. and NATO would be regarded as their direct engagement in the Ukrainian conflict and that the West should not act rashly if it does not want disastrous consequences.
Anyhow, if the U.S. and its followers continue to resort to such dangerous gambling which may endanger the prosperity, development and peace of mankind in a moment, they will have to get ready to face tremendous disastrous consequences and pay a dear price beyond imagination.
The U.S. and NATO are well advised to recall the fact that the two great patriotic wars recorded in the history of Russia ended after the Russian army completely destroyed the strongholds of aggressors.
The last gambling will only bring a tragic end. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers here on Friday:
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a letter from the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
The DPRK foreign minister met with her Russian counterpart.
Achievements have been made in various sectors of national economy.
The DPRK women football players advanced into the finals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.

Rodong Sinmun
An article says that the DPRK people absolutely trust on the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea and are convinced of the rosy future to be brought into bloom under its care.
A ceremony for moving into new houses took place at the Okdok Farm in Yonsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
An article stresses that the ruin of the hegemony policy sought by the imperialist reactionary forces is the law of history.

Minju Joson
- An editorial calls upon leading economic officials to make a positive contribution to glorifying this year as the year of proud victory by redoubling their efforts with high awareness. -0-

headline: Remodeling of Haeju Farm Machine Factory Accelerated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK steps up the project for remodeling the Haeju Farm Machine Factory at the final stage.
The province built up the field guidance personnel and the construction force with skilled workers and gave precedence to the supply of equipment and materials such as construction equipment, vehicles, cement and steel.
The builders finished the foundation excavation of tens of thousands of cubic meters in a short span of time and completed the construction of walls and the interior and exterior plastering.
Workers and technicians of the Haeju Farm Machine Factory provided beams and other materials for roofing project and its young employees conducted a night support shock brigade campaign.
Officials of various units and members of working people's organizations at all levels rendered material and moral assistance to the project. -0-

headline: Letter to Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a letter from the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 76th birthday of the DPRK on September 17.
In the letter, the members of the congratulatory group noted that through the celebrations of the 76th birthday of the DPRK, they keenly realized the great ambition of the respected MarshalKim Jong Unto turn the DPRK into the fortress of independence and a socialist power admired by the world by translating the desire of the great GeneralissimosKim Il SungandKim Jong Ilfor building a powerful country into reality without fail.
During their stay in the homeland they came to more clearly understand the truth that a powerful country is not based on territory, population and economic strength but on the greatness of the leader and the dignity of the people, the letter said, adding:
We will regard the special privilege of having celebrated the nation-building holiday under your care as our highest honor and glorify every moment of our life on the road of remaining loyal to you forever.
The members of the congratulatory group in the letter expressed their will to further accelerate the mass patriotic movement for the 70th anniversary of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) in keeping pace with the advance of the people in the homeland and make tangible contributions to glorifying the prestige and honor of Juche Korea in the vanguard of overseas compatriots. -0-

headline: Women in DPRK Devote Themselves to Patriotic Work
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Women's union organizations at all levels in the DPRK are vigorously conducting a patriotic mass movement at major theaters for socialist construction.
In the site for building 10 000 flats at the third stage in the Hwasong area, women's union members in Hwasong District of Pyongyang have provided the builders with supply materials and worked together, injecting vitality to the construction site.
Women's union members in Sinuiju City and Uiju County of North Phyongan Province help the builders involved in the recovery work in flood-hit areas while conducting service activities.
Those in Chongdan and Anak counties of South Hwanghae Province have devoted sincere efforts to the rice and maize harvesting on farms.
Women's union members in Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province visited the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Chongjin Steel Plant to give labor protection materials to the workers and stir up their' enthusiasm.
Those in Wonsan City of Kangwon Province have taken an active part in the project for improving the city's roads. Meanwhile, women's union members in Kumgang County launched a brisk good-conduct movement at the construction site for the Kosong Army-People Power Station. -0-

headline: Many Innovators Produced in Light Industry Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- A large number of innovators at different units of the light industry sector in the DPRK fulfilled their two-year or one-year economic plans.
More than 320 workers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill carried out their economic plans for two years or one year.
At the Sinuiju Textile Mill, more than 100 workers fulfilled their two-year or one-year economic plans.
At the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, 10-odd workers fulfilled their two-year economic plans and more than 100 reeling workers carried out their yearly plans ahead of schedule.
Such innovators were produced at Songchon and Hamhung silk mills. -0-

headline: Successes Made in Coal Industry Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the coal industry sector of the DPRK are making successes in the drive to increase the carrying capacity.
This year, they repaired a transport line of several hundred kilometers, put into good condition more than a hundred trams and produced thousands of coal wagons.
The construction and reconstruction of conveyor belts have been pushed forward at different coal mines to create favorable conditions for carrying coal in time.
Coal mines of Sunchon, Pukchang and other coal-mining complexes have pushed ahead with a mass technical innovation movement to raise the actual rate of trams and coal wagons.
Officials and employees of coal mining machine factories across the country are busy with the production of various accessories needed for normal operation of coal wagons and conveyor belts.
Tokchon, Pukchang and Sunchon coal mining machine factories produced hundreds of coal wagons and sent them to coal mines. -0-

headline: Special Reward Given to Kwail County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Visitors to Kwail County, South Hwanghae Province, a large-scale fruit production base of the DPRK, are greatly excited to see the sea of fruit.
Such reality is associated with the leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho provides the people with tasty and fresh fruit and his loving care for the agricultural workers in Kwail County.
One day in September Juche 106 (2017),Kim Jong Unvisited Kwail County, South Hwanghae Province, a fruit-growing area, which had brought about a large yield of fruit.
He took the hands of officials one by one that day and said with pleasure that he was relieved of his pent-up fatigue as he thought how pleased the people would be when they heard the news of the great fruit harvest in Kwail County.
He made sure that the special reward was given to Kwail County.
After acquainting himself in detail with the situation in the county a year ago, he indicated the tasks and ways for raising the fruit production as befitting the main base of the country's fruit production and took measures for doing so.
He also returned all the successes to the officials and agricultural workers there.
After watching a document related to the special reward for Kwail County that night, he sent it to the relevant field.
The story about the special reward provided under the warm loving care of the peerlessly great man touches the hearts of the people, telling about the devoted efforts made by the great father for the development of fruit farming. -0-

headline: To Provide People with Tasty and Fresh Fruits
Successes Made in Coal Industry Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the coal industry sector of the DPRK are making successes in the drive to increase the carrying capacity.

Tokchon, Pukchang and Sunchon coal mining machine factories produced hundreds of coal wagons and sent them to coal mines. -0-

headline: Technical Innovation Brisk at Light Industrial Factories in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Light industrial factories in Kangwon Province of the DPRK are directing efforts to the technical revolution to revitalize the production of quality consumer goods.
The Songdowon General Foodstuff Factory has put the production processes of sugar and juice on a more technically perfect basis and made the equipment for automatic measuring and packing with its own efforts and technology.
The Wonsan Knitwear Factory has solved the problems arising in ensuring high quality of bleaching of knitwear through technical innovation campaign.
Workers at the Wonsan Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory are improving the quality indices of plastic products by applying new proposals for improving the performance of equipment.
The Munchon City Foodstuff Factory has put the production of yogurt and soybean syrup on a normal basis according to technical regulations and established a disinfection system conforming to international standards to ensure the quality of products and their hygienic safety.
The Wonsan Leather Shoes Factory and the Phyonggang County Foodstuff Factory have realized diversity of products through valuable technical innovations and modernized equipment and improved productive environment. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Praised Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries, in their congratulatory messages and letters sent on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the DPRK, praised the great personality of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unushering in a gigantic new era of comprehensive national rejuvenation with his outstanding ideas and leadership.
The chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said that the whole world sees how the DPRK is thriving under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand the progressive mankind supports him, the state leader admired by the whole world.
A member of the Central Executive Committee of the Myanmar Journalist Association, the chairperson of the Friendship Society Norway-Korea and the vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt praisedKim Jong Unfor putting the national power and position of the DPRK on the peak of the era in such a short span of time.
The first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Belarus, the chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the general secretary of the Communist Party of the DR Congo said that the DPRK is a power in name and reality nobody can dare to provoke, a genuine people's country where the ideal of the people is realized in an all-round way, and a state developing by dint of self-reliance, adding that the credit for this brilliant fruition goes to the seasoned leadership of HEKim Jong Un.
The chief of the Organization of Youth and Students for the Study of the Juche Idea in Karachi of Pakistan, the chairperson of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the chairman of the Finland-Korea Society stressed that the future of the DPRK is very rosy as it is guided by the greatest man leading the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory.
The general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the general secretary of the Communist Party of Switzerland, the chairman of the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People and other personages of different countries paid the highest tribute toKim Jong Unwho is confidently leading the country and its people to the bright future. -0-

headline: WPK's Historic Course of Regional Rejuvenation Will Be Certainly Accomplished: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article says that the historic cause of regional rejuvenation is a gigantic revolutionary work unprecedented in the course of development of the DPRK.
The policy for regional development in the new era, which is adopted and carried out by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to realize the long-cherished desire of the regional people, is a great action programme of practice adopted under the condition that even the feasibility of its implementation has been confirmed in all aspects on the basis of a correct analysis of our strength, the article says, and goes on:
The political and ideological might of the DPRK and the irresistible single-minded unity firmly guarantee the victory of the historic cause of regional rejuvenation.
The ever-growing unity and revolutionary enthusiasm of all the people and their indomitable fighting spirit are the biggest strategic resources for the WPK opening a broad avenue to regional rejuvenation.
The might of the self-supporting economy and the unlimited potentiality of our development firmly guarantee the successful implementation of the historic cause of regional rejuvenation.
It is the determination and will of our Party that the regional development policy should not be confined to the construction of light industry factories but be a comprehensive policy including public health and science and education.
The outstanding and seasoned leadership of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unis a decisive guarantee for carrying out the regional development policy most thoroughly and perfectly.
The policy for regional development in the new era is certain to be realized as there are the wise leadership of the great Party Central Committee, the united strength of the people boundlessly loyal to the cause of the Party and the already accumulated experience and the solid potentiality of the self-supporting economy. -0-

- A session of the Permanent Commission of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK took place.

headline: Measures for Increased Coal Production Taken in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Coal Industry and coal mining complexes across the DPRK are taking practical measures to ensure steady and sustained productive growth.
Officials and workers at the Tukjang Area Coal Mining Complex are steadily consolidating the material and technical foundations for production while carrying out their task of readjustment and reinforcement as planned.
The Namdok, Phunggok and Inpho youth coal mines under the Pukchang Area Youth Coal Mining Complex manufactured new equipment to save manpower and increase productivity.
The Kaechon Area Coal Mining Complex has directed big efforts to increasing the transport capacity while giving priority to the supply of tunneling equipment and tools to the faces.
The Hamnam and Chonnae area coal mining complexes have conducted economic activities to provide a guarantee for increased production. -0-

headline: Achievements in Construction of Regional-industry Factories in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The construction of regional-industry factories in twenty cities and counties is progressing apace at a high level thanks to the patriotic devotion of soldier-builders of the 124th Regiments of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
Soldier-builders in charge of the construction of the regional-industry factories in Hamju County have secured the tools needed for the finishing project in a far-sighted way and pushed ahead with installing window frames and interior plastering.
Commanding officers of the 124th Regiments of the KPA dispatched to Songchon, Yonthan, Tongsin, Usi, Kosan, Kyongsong and Onchon counties are displaying the habit of making the assessment of the construction in strict accordance with the quality indices.
Officers and men dispatched to Unsan and Jangphung counties are carrying out the projects according to schedule while introducing efficient construction equipment and tools and taking measures for improving quality.
Soldier-builders of the 124th Regiments involved in the construction in Sukchon, Jaeryong, Ichon, Orang and Kumya counties are devoting their pure conscience to industrial buildings. -0-

headline: Mt Myohyang Area, World Network of Biosphere Reserves
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Mt Myohyang is famous not only in the DPRK but also in the world.
The Myohyangsan Biosphere Sanctuary was registered as the third World Network of Biosphere Reserves in the DPRK in May Juche 98 (2009). It situates in Hyangsan County and Huichon City of Jagang Province, Kujang County of North Phyongan Province and Nyongwon County of South Phyongan Province.
The biosphere sanctuary is a typical temperate mountain ecosystem and a center of gene, species and ecosystem diversity in the country.
A wide variety of species is growing, from lowland to highland plants in the biosphere sanctuary. It is also inhabited by hundreds of kinds of vertebrates including dozens of mammals and more than one hundred of species of birds.
It houses tens of endangered and endemic species of plants and dozens of endangered species of animals.
There are also the International Friendship Exhibition House, a treasure house in praise of the great men, and many precious cultural sites and beautiful sceneries. The Myohyangsan Biosphere Sanctuary is a wonderful tourist resort. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Returns
story_text: Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Pak Sang Gil returned home by air on September 21 after visiting Vietnam, Laos, Thailand and Indonesia. -0-

headline: Motivation for Increased Production Brisk in Chollima Steel Complex
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The Chollima Steel Complex in the DPRK conducts the motivation for increased production.
Chollima District in Nampho Municipality is launching an ideological offensive to further consolidate the successes achieved in this year's struggle, thus giving full play to the patriotic enthusiasm and creative ingenuity of the workers of the complex.
The explanation of the greatness of the Workers’ Party of Korea, motivation in the morning rush hour and other on-the-spot motivation are raising the revolutionary enthusiasm and fighting spirit of the masses.
At the steel shop of the complex, officials of the district implanted into the workers the loyalty and patriotic spirit of the preceding generations who supported the Workers' Party of Korea with steel.
At the rolling shop, officials of the district posts and telecommunications centre and the district hospital are making every workplace seethe with steady innovations and leap forward toward the struggle for attaining steel goal through verbal motivation and songs.
Youth league organizations in the district gave art motivation performances strong in political and ideological character and appeal in order to give full play to the workers’ fighting spirit.
Women's union members sang songs in congratulations of the workers and handed over aid materials to them. -0-

headline: 76th Birthday of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Political personages of different countries issued press statements and articles on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks in a press statement said that the DPRK, once dominated by centuries-old backwardness and poverty, turned into a socialist country adhering to independence and advancing by dint of self-reliance, thanks to the wise leadership of the great leader ComradeKim Il Sung.
And he wished the heroic Korean people fresh victory in building a powerful socialist country under the leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is creditably carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.
The general secretary of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo in a press statement noted that PresidentKim Il Sungled the revolution and construction to victory with his steadfast independent faith, built a genuine people's country and devoted himself to the people.
The chairman of the Supreme Council of the National Socialist Party of Romania stressed, in an article "Independence and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" posted on an internet homepage, that the DPRK regards independence as its lifeblood.
The road covered by the DPRK is a history of struggle for defending its sovereignty, he said, adding that the DPRK's steadfast spirit of independence gives  many countries and nations a clear way for carving out their destiny independently in the present complicated world. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Attends Fourth Eurasian Women's Forum and First BRICS Women's Forum
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, attended the Fourth Eurasian Women's Forum and the First BRICS Women's Forum held in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia from Sept. 18 to 20.
Present at the international forums were high-ranking women politicians and representatives of business, academic and social circles of over 120 countries including the DPRK, Russia, Vietnam, Laos, Belarus, Uzbekistan, Serbia, Uganda and Qatar.

Kim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il. -0-

The builders of the power station are pushing ahead with the work for improving the surroundings and the project for building dwelling houses. -0-

headline: Meetings of Exemplary Women's Union Members Held in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings of members of the women's union, who distinguished themselves in displaying noble traits, took place in Pyongyang, Rason and Kaesong municipalities and Jagang, North and South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces.
Present at the meetings were leading Party officials, officials of the women's union, activists in displaying noble traits and members of the women's union in the relevant areas. Reports were made to be followed by speeches.
Reporters and speakers said that  many women’s union members have absolutely supported the Workers' Party of Korea's policies and devoted themselves to the development of the grateful socialist system in the efforts for remaining loyal to the Party's idea and leadership.
The virtue and traits displayed by the members of the women's union are the fruition of the wise leadership and special care shown by the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho adds luster to the rights and dignity of women and gives loving care and trust to them with his noblest political administration, they stressed.
They expressed their determination to invariably carry forward the road of loyalty under the leadership of the Party Central Committee, full of fresh confidence and optimism, cherishing the faith that the future of the DPRK is rosy thanks to the great Party.
They called upon all the officials and members of the women's union to become women revolutionaries and communist mothers in the great era ofKim Jong Unwho glorify the socialist country with ardent and patriotic devotion and bring into bloom the families and society with noble virtues and traits. -0-

headline: Motivation for Increased Production Brisk in Chollima Steel Complex
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The Chollima Steel Complex in the DPRK conducts the motivation for increased production.
Chollima District in Nampho Municipality is launching an ideological offensive to further consolidate the successes achieved in this year's struggle, thus giving full play to the patriotic enthusiasm and creative ingenuity of the workers of the complex.
The explanation of the greatness of the Workers’ Party of Korea, motivation in the morning rush hour and other on-the-spot motivation are raising the revolutionary enthusiasm and fighting spirit of the masses.
At the steel shop of the complex, officials of the district implanted into the workers the loyalty and patriotic spirit of the preceding generations who supported the Workers' Party of Korea with steel.
At the rolling shop, officials of the district posts and telecommunications centre and the district hospital are making every workplace seethe with steady innovations and leap forward toward the struggle for attaining steel goal through verbal motivation and songs.
Youth league organizations in the district gave art motivation performances strong in political and ideological character and appeal in order to give full play to the workers’ fighting spirit.
Women's union members sang songs in congratulations of the workers and handed over aid materials to them. -0-

headline: 76th Birthday of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Political personages of different countries issued press statements and articles on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks in a press statement said that the DPRK, once dominated by centuries-old backwardness and poverty, turned into a socialist country adhering to independence and advancing by dint of self-reliance, thanks to the wise leadership of the great leader ComradeKim Il Sung.
And he wished the heroic Korean people fresh victory in building a powerful socialist country under the leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is creditably carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.
The general secretary of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo in a press statement noted that PresidentKim Il Sungled the revolution and construction to victory with his steadfast independent faith, built a genuine people's country and devoted himself to the people.
The chairman of the Supreme Council of the National Socialist Party of Romania stressed, in an article "Independence and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" posted on an internet homepage, that the DPRK regards independence as its lifeblood.
The road covered by the DPRK is a history of struggle for defending its sovereignty, he said, adding that the DPRK's steadfast spirit of independence gives  many countries and nations a clear way for carving out their destiny independently in the present complicated world. -0-

headline: Mt Myohyang Area, World Network of Biosphere Reserves
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Mt Myohyang is famous not only in the DPRK but also in the world.
The Myohyangsan Biosphere Sanctuary was registered as the third World Network of Biosphere Reserves in the DPRK in May Juche 98 (2009). It situates in Hyangsan County and Huichon City of Jagang Province, Kujang County of North Phyongan Province and Nyongwon County of South Phyongan Province.
The biosphere sanctuary is a typical temperate mountain ecosystem and a center of gene, species and ecosystem diversity in the country.
A wide variety of species is growing, from lowland to highland plants in the biosphere sanctuary. It is also inhabited by hundreds of kinds of vertebrates including dozens of mammals and more than one hundred of species of birds.
It houses tens of endangered and endemic species of plants and dozens of endangered species of animals.
There are also the International Friendship Exhibition House, a treasure house in praise of the great men, and many precious cultural sites and beautiful sceneries. The Myohyangsan Biosphere Sanctuary is a wonderful tourist resort. -0-

headline: Model Sci-tech Learning Space Movement Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Industrial establishments across the DPRK are fully displaying the vitality of the model sci-tech learning space movement.
Officials at the Educational Books Printing Plant have worked out a detailed plan for operating the sci-tech learning space and prepared the employees to be intellectual workers and those responsible for the development of science and technology.
The Paektusan Institute of Architecture has arranged well an e-library and built up database for the field of architectural design to provide the designers with necessary data in good time.
Workers at the Samilpho Electronic Goods Factory are playing a role in technical innovation by deeply learning the specialized knowledge and employees of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex are raising the technical knowledge and skills to a higher level through scientific and technological studies.
Similar activities are witnessed at the Paekunsan General Foodstuff Factory, the Tonghungsan Unha Garment Factory, the power transmission and distribution station of Ryanggang Province. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Xi Jinping
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a reply message to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on September 15.
The message said:
I express thanks to you for extending sincere congratulations on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the DPRK.
It is the common desire of the peoples of the two countries to steadily consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship with a long historical tradition.
I am convinced that good results will be continuously made in accomplishing the common cause of the two parties and countries for dynamically promoting socialist construction, providing the peoples with substantial well-being and safeguarding the global peace and the regional security.
I wish the Chinese people greater success in building a modern socialist country this significant year marking the 75th birthday of the People's Republic of China under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with you, general secretary, as its core. -0-

headline: May Day Stadium
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The May Day Stadium, located on Rungna Islet in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is a comprehensive and modern mass sports service center conducive to the country's sports development and the cultural and emotional life of the people.
The stadium has a football ground with 150 000 seats, track, referees room, inspection registration room coincident with the international standards, and sports and cultural and welfare facilities and service facilities including swimming pool, table tennis ground and room for relieving fatigue.
The stadium could be remodeled as required by the present era thanks to the initiative and meticulous guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
One day in September Juche 102 (2013), he visited the May Day Stadium and looked round various places with his grand plan to turn it into a proud stadium in the world.
That day he set forth the task for remodeling the stadium and personally solved all the issues arising in the remodeling, saying that the remodeling of the stadium is an important work for further developing the Juche-based sports and demonstrating the national power and civilization of the country amid the ever-growing sports enthusiasm.
He visited the renovation site in June next year and stressed the need to carry out the project in a creative and innovative way with the Juche-oriented and world-wide insight, guiding the colors of the seats and other detailed elements.
In October that year he watched a women's football match together with Pyongyang citizens at the May Day Stadium, which was successfully remodeled as a symbol of the sports facilities of the country, and gave precious instructions for turning the stadium into an important base for developing the country's sports and making a positive contribution to the people's cultural and emotional life.
Since the stadium was face-lifted, diverse political and sports and cultural events and sports games took place with splendor. -0-

headline: Declining Years of Life Turned into “Stay Period of Execution of Death Penalty” in Japanese Society
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The declining years of the old people are getting more miserable in the corrupt Japanese society where money is everything.
The old people are called "living corpses" and "social scum" even by their children, and are subject to all sorts of maltreatment and humiliation. They finally choose the fate of calm death while leading a lonely life, separated from their families.
According to the data released by the Police Agency of Japan recently, 37 227 people died while living alone from January to June this year.
Of them, 28 330 people were aged over 65, accounting for 76.1%.
This is an inevitable phenomenon in Japan where the way of thinking "parents are needed for money" and the social climate based on it prevail.
It is an everyday occurrence in Japan that a son strangled his old father to death and a daughter killed her old mother for the reason that it is difficult to take care of her. It is obvious that it is not easy to die in peace in such a devil society where parents were sentenced to "death" by their children.
Of course, there are such social "protection facilities" as "the old people’s welfare service facilities" and "the old people’s homes", but they are more terrible.
Numerous old persons were killed in different parts of Japan. An employee of an old people’s welfare service facility, who became irritated by taking care of an 81-year-old person, beat the person to death and an old people's home killed an old person by injecting poisonous medicine in order to take away the remaining money.
It is foolish for the old people, who are exposed to the threat of life while being subject to maltreatment even by their children, to think that they will entrust their destiny to others.
The old people who cannot find a safe place and are in the position of losing their lives by their children are, after all, choosing a comfortable "lonely life". Such phenomena are rampant day by day.
In a word, the single life of the old in Japan is a choice of the last resort to avoid "death penalty" by social evil.
All facts go to prove that the Japanese society where the old have to spend the last years of their life as days of horror and pain called the "stay period of execution of death penalty" is a theatre of evil virtues, debris of human ethics and a veritable hell. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, on Monday:
- An editorial calls for turning out as one in concluding this year's farming with success.
- Successes have been made in different economic sectors and units.  Rice harvesting is in full swing in different parts of the country.
- Articles deal with the noble outlook on life of the meritorious persons of socialist patriotism.
- An article discloses the Indo-Pacific strategy of the U.S. for seeking to confrontation and wrecking peace. -0-

headline: Modernization in Machine-building Industrial Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Different units in the machine-building industrial sector of the DPRK are pushing ahead with the work to modernize machines and equipment.
The Taean Heavy Machine Complex has improved the speed control device of large-sized 16-meter lathe to raise the operation rate of equipment and precision in processing products and made achievements in modernizing the main equipment including 200-mm boring machine.
The Central Machine Industry Institute under the Ministry of Machine-building Industry directs efforts to completing the designs of putting industrial establishments in the machine-building industrial sector into a modern basis.
The Jonchon Rock Drill Factory has solved technical problems arising in modernizing production processes and equipment through creative cooperation between technicians and workers and collaboration with scientific research units. -0-

headline: National Symbols Raise Patriotism of DPRK People
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The ardent patriotic feelings of the people in the DPRK to add luster to the great socialist country are reflected in national symbols.
The name of the country carries the meaning of the people's state which guarantees a genuine political freedom and rights and happy material and cultural life for the working masses.
The national emblem, national flag and national anthem symbolize the revolutionary traditions carried forward by the DPRK, the invincible single-minded unity that all the people are firmly rallied around the leader, the brilliant culture of the nation and the future of the country and the faith and will to develop the country into a dignified people's country.
The Korean language is a developed language with rich pronunciation, beautiful sound, diverse expression and well-organized grammar.
The national symbols including magnolia, pine tree and Phungsan dog embody the soul and spirit of the Korean people who are resourceful, diligent, strong, courageous and peace-loving.
All the Korean people love the national symbols which give rise to patriotic feelings.
National flag-raising is being held in different parts of the country on the occasions of national holidays and major anniversaries, and educational institutions at all levels are hoisting national flags every Monday during lessons.
Families are flying the national flags by the windows on holidays and it is a trend to wear a dress depicting the national symbol.
Scientists are working hard to protect national flower, national tree, national dog, etc. and spread them across the country. Architects, artists and embroideries, too, are making efforts to depict the national symbols in their works. -0-

headline: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning out as One in Concluding This Year's Farming
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial says that the agricultural sector is faced with the important and responsible task to unconditionally attain the goal of grain production, the primary one of economic construction this year, by making high-yielding successes.
All the officials and working people should turn out as one in harvesting and threshing, bearing in mind that the present is an important and responsible period for defending Korean-style socialism and promoting the prosperity and development of the country, the editorial says, and goes on:
What is basic in successfully finishing farming is to conclude harvesting and threshing at the right time.
It is necessary to push ahead with harvesting, threshing and procurement in a three-dimensional way.
Harvesting, threshing and procurement should be conducted simultaneously as soon as ears ripen by using various threshers on a large scale so as to ensure that the crop estimate leads to a real one.
The officials in the agricultural sector should work hard transcending the ability and limitation to successfully attain the goal of grain production, bearing deep in mind that the fate of this year's farming hinges on their shoulders.
The whole Party, the entire country and all the people should concentrate their efforts on the struggle for the successful conclusion of this year's farming.
The editorial calls upon all the people to finish harvesting and threshing at a high speed with their courageous efforts and strong practical ability and thus make a great victory in the major thrust area. -0-

headline: DPRK Team Proves Successful at 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team beat its Japanese rival in the finals of the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup held in Colombia and won the trophy.
Our team played a match with its Japanese rival on September 22.
About 15 minutes after the start, player Choe Il Son of our team succeeded in scoring with a strong left-foot shoot after dribbling past Japanese players from the right side of the offensive field.
In the final match, the DPRK team beat its rival 1:0.
Choe Il Son became a top scorer, scoring six goals in total.
At the awarding ceremony the trophy and gold medals were awarded to the DPRK women footballers who came first and the best player prize and top scorer prize to Choe. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Vice Department Director of WPK Central Committee Kim Yo Jong
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released on Tuesday the following press statement titled "An abnormal object appeared at Pusan Port: U.S. strategic assets would not find their resting place in the Korean peninsula."
The Aerospace Reconnaissance Agency, an independent intelligence organ directly under the head of state of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, captured an abnormal object at a wharf, a subject of its constant attention at Pusan Port of the ROK at 10:03:10 on Monday and reported its reconnaissance data.
A nuclear submarine appeared on the wharf where a U.S. aircraft carrier used to moor at.
The latest nuclear submarine, which has never appeared openly since it was commissioned in 2020, made its appearance at the Pusan operation base for the first time in history. It can be hardly regarded as a "sightseeing voyage".
Given the U.S. has been demonstrating its overall strength recently while making public the "might" of its nuclear strategic assets in order, one can easily guess the true aim of the open portcall of the nuclear submarine which should have been concealed under the “surface of water.”
In June the U.S. forces launched Minuteman-3 intercontinental ballistic missiles twice and on September 18 they opened to the public the test-flight image of B-21 Raider, a next-generation stealth strategic bomber, for the first time.
The U.S. let the latest nuclear submarine of the U.S. Navy anchor in Pusan Port of the ROK, thus took out all its cards called "three nuclear strategic assets".
This clearly reveals the frantic military and strategic attempt of the U.S. hell-bent on intentionally demonstrating the "superiority of strength" before the world.
The U.S. is now experiencing unprecedented strategic inferiority in the Korean peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region and is very afraid of the reality in which the entity of the strong power of independence against the U.S. and the fortress for defending justice is beginning to make its appearance in the region.
Therefore, it is deploying all nuclear strategic assets in the Korean peninsula and its vicinity while cooking up various large and small military blocs in the region to contain the DPRK and independent sovereign states by force of arms and to "bind" the group of its followers who feel uneasy and impatient.
The Wilmington Declaration making the "nuclear threat" from anyone the subject of discussion was fabricated at the QUAD summit meeting held in Delaware State of the U.S. some days ago and the promise for the U.S.-Japan-ROK cooperation to cope with the so-called "ever-increasing nuclear threat" was made at the U.S.-Japan summit held on the same day.  They are also typical products of the U.S. geopolitical sinister intention to politically and militarily encircle and stifle the DPRK and regional countries.
The U.S. latest nuclear submarine's visit to the port of the ROK is a proof that the U.S. ambition to often take up nuclear strategic assets, boast of its strength, increase its threat to the rival and "enjoy" its hegemonic privilege by dint of its malicious strength at any cost is getting ever more extreme.
No matter how the U.S. may demonstrate its "overwhelming capability" by rising to the surface even a submarine whose mission is to mount a final nuclear strike under the sea, nothing will change.
The DPRK's nuclear war deterrent to cope with and contain various threats from outside is bound to be bolstered up both in quality and quantity continuously and limitlessly as the security of the state is constantly exposed to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail.
The U.S. nuclear submarine's call at Pusan Port may be a break time for the U.S. marines and a comfort for the U.S. stooges, but it can never be an object of fear in the face of the super-powerful entity standing over against the U.S.
The U.S. strategic assets will never find their resting place in the region of the Korean peninsula.
We will continue to inform that all the ports and military bases of the ROK are not safe places.
The U.S. is by no means a "pronoun of security". -0-

headline: 107th Candlelight Rally and Demonstration Staged in Puppet ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The whole of the puppet ROK is seething with the massive resistance to put an end to the pro-U.S, pro-Japanese moves, war confrontation hysteria, heinous fascist dictatorship and murderous rule of puppet Yoon Suk Yeol, who is forsaken by everybody.
The 107th candlelight rally and demonstration on the theme of "Let us impeach Yoon Suk Yeol in unity!" were held on a wide scale in front of the building of the puppet National Assembly in Seoul on Sept. 21.
A large number of people from all walks of life including workers, peasants, university students and members of opposition parties turned out in the massive candlelight action to impeach puppet Yoon.
Members of opposition parties said that Yoon Suk Yeol, who was driven into the worst ruling crisis is hell-bent on the moves for a nuclear war as a spy of Japan, to say nothing of the U.S., and declared a war against the people through fascist dictatorship.
In their speeches, the representatives of the candlelight actions from different regions warned that the 100-day all-people campaign for the impeachment of Yoon will be the period to sentence the bankruptcy to the wild ruling ambition of Yoon who is planning to ignite a war and stay in power by depending on outsiders.
Citizens from across the ROK said in their speeches that the people's mindset is the only impeachment and that they would fight till the moment Yoon Suk Yeol goes to ruin by the massive candlelight resistance of people from all walks of life.
An "appeal for the nationwide candlelight demonstration in September" was read out at the rally.
The appeal said that the people's anger is growing stronger and Yoon can never calm down the angry public mindset. What remains is a resistance and impeachment, the appeal added.
Yoon Suk Yeol facing the overwhelming public opposition in the whole region is little short of being sentenced to death, the appeal called upon the people from all walks of life to unite and impeach Yoon as early as possible.
Earlier, the university students’ group of sit-in strike urging the impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol held a ceremony for declaring the sit-in strike and a press conference in front of the building of the puppet National Assembly. -0-

headline: Successes Made in Salt Industry Bureau, DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The Salt Industry Bureau of the DPRK carried out its yearly economic plan ahead of schedule.
The Kwisong Salt Works, Kwangryangman Salt Works and other salt works started production in February on the basis of preparations for salt production in winter. They produced hundreds of tons of salt in the first month.
The salt works introduced rational technology to raise the salinity and, at the same time, pushed ahead with the work to raise the level of mechanization in salt production in a planned way. -0-

headline: Immortal Traces Recorded at Rungna People's Pleasure Park
Greetings to Armenian PM
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Tok Hun, premier of the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greeting to Nikol Pashinyan, prime minister of the Republic of Armenia, on September 21 on the occasion of its national day.
The message wished the Armenian people prosperity and welfare. -0-

headline: Efforts to Raise Efficiency of Generating Equipment in Hydro-power Field
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the hydro-power field of the DPRK are pushing ahead with the work to increase the efficiency of generating equipment.
Officials of the Jangjingang and Hochongang power stations have confirmed on-site the operation of floodgates and the water passage capacity of waterways and worked out rational measures to raise the capacity to the maximum, thus putting the power production on a normal basis at a high level.
The Pujongang and Thaechon power stations are concentrating efforts on introducing efficient water turbines.
Researchers of the Electric Power Industry Institute and the Electric Power Information Institute under the Ministry of Electric Power Industry went to the Sodusu and Taedonggang power stations have introduced digital speed regulators and digital exciters, thus making it possible to achieve stable and sustained development of electric power production.
On this basis, they are pushing ahead with the work to introduce real-time efficiency measuring system into several hydro-power stations including Suphung and Thaechon power stations. -0-

headline: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to Kim Su Jong, a woman centenarian living in the neighborhood unit No. 21, Upsong-dong of the city of Kanggye in Jagang Province of the DPRK.
Officials of the Kanggye City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and villagers shared joy with families and relatives of the centenarian.
She led a genuine life as a human being in the liberated country and in the genuine people's country glorified by the Party. She worked hard at her post for decades.
Even after becoming a pensioner, she helps her children do more work for the grateful socialist system. -0-

headline: Mass Movement Conducted by Trade Union Organizations
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Trade union organizations at all levels are contributing to the mechanization of agriculture through a mass technological innovation movement.
Workers of the Jongju Tractor Accessory Factory in the DPRK have turned out in a technical innovation movement to manufacture a new jig capable of ensuring the accuracy of processing accessories, thus pushing ahead with the improvement of quality.
The trade union organization of the Anju Tractor Accessory Factory helped the masses to solve technical problems arising in production and invent and introduce technical innovation proposals for increasing the production efficiency of equipment.
Workers of the Sariwon Tractor Accessory Factory established production lines in a practical way by displaying their initiative and ingenuity.
Members of the trade union of the Kwaksan Trailing Farm Machine Factory settled technical problems arising in the manufacture of annealing furnace with insulating bricks and thus contributed to fulfilling the plan.
Employees of the Haeju Tractor Accessory Factory and other units have contributed to the technical upgrading of production lines through technical innovation. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Back Home
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, and her party returned home on Monday after taking part in the Fourth Eurasian Women's Forum and the First BRICS Women's Forum  held in Russia.
They were greeted by Vice Foreign Minister Kim Jong Gyu and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora at Pyongyang International Airport. -0-

headline: Great Leadership Bringing New Heyday of Development of Juche-Oriented Education
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The law on the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education was adopted at the Sixth Session of the Twelfth Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK held in September Juche 101 (2012).
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwisely led the work for the development of education with his steadfast will to firmly guarantee the eternal future of the country through a fresh turn in the educational work.
He published many works in the new century of Juche to indicate the path for successfully bringing about a radical improvement in education in the new century.
He presented the slogan "Let us make a leap forward by dint of science and guarantee the future by dint of education!" and put forward the famous proposition that if science is a locomotive leading economic development, the mother of science is education.
In his report made at the Eighth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, he again referred to the general goal of education for turning the country's education into one that can shoulder the future of the country, and set forth the goals and concrete tasks for developing education to turn the country into a developed country in education, a talent power, by dynamically bringing about a radical improvement in education in the new century.
He made sure that the Party and state measures were taken one after another for the development of education and gave ceaseless field guidance to the educational field.
Under his leadership, the Juche-oriented education greeted a new heyday of its development.
Remarkable achievements have been made at major universities and senior middle schools through the introduction of advanced teaching methods.
The Academy of Pedagogical Science, the center for education science research of the country, and modern educational institutions and educational facilities were newly built and the construction of teacher training colleges is being pushed forward in different parts of the country.
Every year many schools and kindergartens have been built or remodeled on the high level and factories producing bags, uniforms and shoes for students across the country.
The future of the DPRK that will shine as a developed country in education and a talented power is being accelerated as it is led byKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Ideological Education Intensified by UAWK Organizations
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) in Kaesong Municipality are conducting ideological education to prepare its members as true patriotic agricultural workers.
The municipal committee of the union organizes visits to educational bases, thus instilling into the mind of the members of the union the absolute trust in the Party and the leader and the love for our socialist system.
Through the meeting with the meritorious persons of socialist patriotism, the agricultural workers vow to value their dear native places and workplaces and remodel them by their own efforts and devote their sincere efforts to the posts entrusted to them by the Party.
The Yongang Farm and Sinso Farm in Kaephung District are arousing the spiritual strength of the masses to uphold the intention of the Party with patriotic practice.
Farms in Panmunjom District, too, instill into the mind of all members the pride of being citizens of a powerful country and the consciousness of defending and glorifying socialism with rice.
The UAWK organizations in Jangphung County are further sublimating the loyalty and patriotism of the masses in combination with their practices through the education in patriotism. -0-

In his report made at the Eighth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, he again referred to the general goal of education for turning the country's education into one that can shoulder the future of the country, and set forth the goals and concrete tasks for developing education to turn the country into a developed country in education, a talent power, by dynamically bringing about a radical improvement in education in the new century.
He made sure that the Party and state measures were taken one after another for the development of education and gave ceaseless field guidance to the educational field.
Under his leadership, the Juche-oriented education greeted a new heyday of its development.
Remarkable achievements have been made at major universities and senior middle schools through the introduction of advanced teaching methods.
The Academy of Pedagogical Science, the center for education science research of the country, and modern educational institutions and educational facilities were newly built and the construction of teacher training colleges is being pushed forward in different parts of the country.
Every year many schools and kindergartens have been built or remodeled on the high level and factories producing bags, uniforms and shoes for students across the country.
The future of the DPRK that will shine as a developed country in education and a talented power is being accelerated as it is led byKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Research Activities of Scientists Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK have made achievements in carrying out the research tasks for major objects including the work to implement the Workers' Party of Korea's policy for regional industry development, build the Wonsan Kalma coastal tourist area, construct the 50 000 houses in the capital city, put the second-stage remodeling of the Kumsong Tractor Factory on a modern basis and turn Samjiyon City into a world-class mountain tourist resort.
The cooperation between institutes, branches and units has been deepened, with the result that several major research tasks were completed in the first half of the year.
They are conducting technical preparation for paper production process and technical guidance for the production of wheat grading machine, water purification equipment, etc. in the work to implement the Party's policy for regional industry development.
They have also pushed forward to manufacture hundreds of equipment including soap production equipment, air purifier and plastic tank to be installed at regional-industry factories. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Spokesperson for DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released Tuesday the following press statement "The signboard of 'maintaining peace and stability' can never be a lever for the U.S. to justify its policy of inter-camp confrontation":
Recently, the U.S. slandered the DPRK's exercise of its righteous and legitimate sovereign rights with the QUAD summit meeting as an occasion and perpetrated a grave political provocation of inciting the atmosphere of collective pressure on the DPRK.
The White House is claiming that the meeting targets no specific nation, but the "joint statement" fabricated and made public this time shows that QUAD is nothing but a political and diplomatic tool serving the implementation of the U.S. strategy for uni-polar domination.
The Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea expresses serious concern over the fact that the U.S. has become more brazen in its most hostile confrontational attempt while wantonly violating the DPRK's rights to sovereignty and development, and strongly denounces and rejects it.
Today, QUAD, the end product of the U.S. Cold War mentality and policy of inter-camp confrontation, has become a dangerous factor that deepens mistrust and antagonism between countries in the Asia-Pacific region and provokes international instability.
The U.S. tried to cover up the confrontational colors of QUAD with such rhetoric as "tightened cooperation" in climatic change, food security and public health but it is a well-known fact that its justification for existence and main object are to establish a U.S.-led "rules-based international order."
This time the U.S. turned QUAD into a de facto international "maritime police organization" under the pretext of "freedom of navigation", terming sovereign countries' exercise of legitimate rights "threats." This clearly proves that the entity is just an appendage of Washington's Indo-Pacific strategy.
The current U.S. administration further sticks to the anachronistic "minority" politics but it only proves that its high-handed and arbitrary practices no longer work in the international arena and its diplomatic platform is narrowing.
The U.S. policy of fomenting inter-camp confrontation that challenges justice and goes against the trend of the times is a harmful root cause of exposing world peace and security to the most serious threat.
The DPRK will never tolerate any hostile acts of encroaching upon its national sovereign rights, security and interests but as ever make responsible efforts to establish a multi-polarized international order based on independence and justice. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in South Phyongan Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- New villages were built at Sinjidong and Sinsong farms in Hoechang County, South Phyongan Province to provide the agricultural workers with more civilized and affluent living conditions and environment.
The dramatic change in the farms is precious fruition of the energetic leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is bringing about Korean-style socialist rural civilization with his tireless devotion.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Kim Man Jo, secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, builders and agricultural workers in Hoechang County.
Jang Myong Il, vice-chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, made an address there. Then license for the use of houses were conveyed and speeches made.
When moving into new houses begun, the villages were wrapped in a festive mood with pleasure and dancing of agricultural workers and inhabitants. -0-

headline: Absolute Standard of All Work
story_text:
One day in October Juche 104 (2015), the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unvisited the then Paekhak-dong in Sonbong area, Rason Municipality of the DPRK, which was wonderfully built as a socialist fairyland after recovering from flood damage.
Seeing the houses associated with the love and sincerity of soldier-builders for the people for a long time,Kim Jong Untold the officials that the interior finishing project should be done in a qualitative way.
He said that the quality of public buildings should be assessed by the people who actually use them. When the people to live in the newly-built houses say that they are good, it can be said that the houses have been constructed well, he added.
Looking at the officials in the excitement, he stressed that we should listen to the voices of the people and regard them as the standard whenever and wherever we do anything.
Looking up to the respected General Secretary, the officials keenly realized that the absolute standard of all work is just the people's aspiration and demand and interests and convenience. -0-

story_text: Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of students in their final year at Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Ryu Chang Sun, head of its administrative department, arrived in Pyongyang by air on Tuesday. -0-

headline: Director of Int'l Department of C.C., WPK Meets Lao Ambassador
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Song Nam, director of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a friendly talk with Keo Mackhaphon, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
Present there were officials of the International Department of the WPK Central Committee and staff members of the Lao embassy. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Amid a high-speed tunneling emulation being held in the coal industry of the DPRK, progress is made in securing reserve coal faces.
Hundreds of reserve cutting faces have been secured in the third quarter of the year across the country to make a breakthrough in increasing coal production. -0-
