headline: Cement Production Increased in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex in the DPRK have produced much more cement than the same period of last year.
The complex is directing primary efforts to ensuring safe operation of kilns by intensifying preventive repair while solving the technical problems arising in production by its own technical force.
The Sangwon Limestone Mine has carried much more raw materials than planned everyday while inventing and introducing an innovative plan for improving the quality of limestone and repairing and maintaining trucks in a responsible manner.
The operators of the central control room are keeping real-time monitoring of the operation of equipment and contacting with the workshops to control all processes ranging from feeding to packing.
Workers of the calcining shop are carrying out their daily production plans while raising the operation rate by putting the operation of kiln on a scientific and technological basis.
Workers of the cement shop have introduced rational working methods in every process and put the operation of equipment on a normal basis, bringing about good results. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Back Home
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Economic Guidance Officials to Further Enhance Their Role
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Today when the people's enthusiasm for struggle is very high and the historic cause of comprehensive national development is successfully being realized across the country, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea expects the leading state economic officials to boldly and innovatively conduct the economic work with a more intense sense of responsibility, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Wednesday.
All the economic guidance officials should be deeply mindful of the responsibility they have assumed before the times and the revolution and fulfill their important mission to the last so as to prove their loyalty to the Party, the editorial says, and goes on:
In order to further enhance the spirit of all-people advance towards attaining the goal of this year's struggle, it is important for the leading officials to conduct economic operations in a responsible manner more than ever before.
All leading officials should give priority to creating conditions and environment favorable for the production and management activities of enterprises as befitting masters entirely responsible for the economic work of the country, and take effective measures to continuously increase the real income of the working people and execute them.
It is necessary to correctly analyze all subjective and objective circumstances and predict and judge possible situations, find out the correct methodology for increasing production, improving quality and carrying out plans and organize and conduct prospective and essential work for the medium and long-term development plan in an initiative and creative way.
All the leading economic officials should conduct their work boldly and innovatively with a more intense sense of responsibility and thus vigorously push ahead with the development of the national economy under the guidance of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho is leading the Korean-style socialism to a new change and development. -0-

headline: Agitprop Activities of UAWK Organizations
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) at all levels are conducting vigorous agitprop activities to stir up the agricultural workers' revolutionary enthusiasm.
Union officials in Pyongyang displayed revolutionary slogans and watchwords on farm fields and conducted ideological activities to encourage the agricultural workers out in grain harvesting.
Those in Sinpho City and Sinhung and Hongwon counties of South Hamgyong Province have carried on the frontline-style political work, thus contributing to recording good results in harvesting.
Those in Munchon City of Kangwon Province formed an agitation squad and toured farms to redouble the enthusiasm of agricultural workers out in harvesting.
The same is true of Mundok County in South Phyongan Province, Kangso District in Nampho Municipality, North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces. -0-

headline: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Nepal, Cambodia, Belarus, Britain, France and Serbia on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Speeches were made at the seminars attended by political and social figures and citizens of those countries.
The chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Juche praised the careers of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il, the founder and leaders of the DPRK, who believed in the people as in Heaven.
The vice-chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia said that the DPRK has turned into an invincible nation with strong self-defensive capabilities and a power no force dares provoke, under the wise guidance of the preceding leaders and His ExcellencyKim Jong Un.
The chief of the Belarusian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said that the DPRK has covered a proud road of victory under the outstanding and tested guidance of ComradesKim Il Sung,Kim Jong IlandKim Jong Unfor the 76 years since its foundation.
The chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK said that the founding of the DPRK was the birth of a genuine people's state which enabled the Korean people to enjoy an independent life as masters of the state and society.
A member of the Serbian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the DPRK has undergone a remarkable change thanks to the great leaders.
A message of greeting to the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwas adopted at the seminar held in Britain. -0-

headline: DPRK Wins Two Bronze Medals at 29th FIG Acrobatic Gymnastics World Championship
story_text: Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK players Ri Hyo Song and Ro Hye Song took the third place in the mixed pair balance and the mixed pair combined of the 29th FIG Acrobatic Gymnastics World Championship held in Portugal. -0-

headline: Modernization of Equipment Propelled in Light Industry of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The light industry sector of the DPRK is pushing ahead with the modernization and maintenance of equipment.
The Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill repaired tens of spinning, drawing and other machines and remodeled flexible rapier looms.
Textile mills across the country are bringing about signal progress in improving the performance of equipment.
The Pyongyang Hosiery Factory has enhanced the level of its workers' technical knowledge and skills to make them contribute to improving the performance of equipment and the quality of products.
The Pyongyang Children's Knitwear Factory and Sunchon and Haeju knitwear factories have repaired tens of equipment and kept them in good conditions to increase the production.
Similar achievements have been witnessed at footwear factories across the country and the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory and other units. -0-

headline: New Goat Farms Built in South Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province in the DPRK has built modern goat farms in city and counties to lay a solid material and technical foundation for smoothly producing and supplying tasty and nutritious dairy products to the children.
The city and counties in the province are opening a prospect to put the production of milk products on a normal basis of high level by increasing the number of goats of supra-species. -0-

headline: National Exhibition of Plants Opens in DPRK
New Teaching Management Information System Developed in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A research group of the Pedagogic Informatics Institute under Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK developed and introduced "Kyojong" 1.0, a teaching management information program based on full credit system.
This program is drawing attention in the educational sector as it is suitable for the specific conditions of the country while corresponding to the world trend of educational development.
It has been proved effective in practice after being introduced into major universities in the country.
It won a high appreciation at the recent national sci-tech presentation in the field of pedagogic informatics. -0-

headline: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Nepal, Cambodia, Belarus, Britain, France and Serbia on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
Speeches were made at the seminars attended by political and social figures and citizens of those countries.
The chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Juche praised the careers of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il, the founder and leaders of the DPRK, who believed in the people as in Heaven.
The vice-chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia said that the DPRK has turned into an invincible nation with strong self-defensive capabilities and a power no force dares provoke, under the wise guidance of the preceding leaders and His ExcellencyKim Jong Un.
The chief of the Belarusian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said that the DPRK has covered a proud road of victory under the outstanding and tested guidance of ComradesKim Il Sung,Kim Jong IlandKim Jong Unfor the 76 years since its foundation.
The chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK said that the founding of the DPRK was the birth of a genuine people's state which enabled the Korean people to enjoy an independent life as masters of the state and society.
A member of the Serbian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the DPRK has undergone a remarkable change thanks to the great leaders.
A message of greeting to the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwas adopted at the seminar held in Britain. -0-

headline: New Teaching Management Information System Developed in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A research group of the Pedagogic Informatics Institute under Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK developed and introduced "Kyojong" 1.0, a teaching management information program based on full credit system.
This program is drawing attention in the educational sector as it is suitable for the specific conditions of the country while corresponding to the world trend of educational development.
It has been proved effective in practice after being introduced into major universities in the country.
It won a high appreciation at the recent national sci-tech presentation in the field of pedagogic informatics. -0-

Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Thursday:
- Successes have been made in various economic sectors and units. Winter wheat and barley sowing is in full swing in rural areas.

headline: Efforts to Reduce Loss of Power in Transmission Brisk in DRPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Efforts are made to reduce the loss of power at transmission and distribution units across the DPRK.
The Pyongyang Municipal Power Transmission and Distribution Station is directing efforts to increasing the capacity of transformers and ensuring the power factor of the electric power system on a high level.
The South Hamgyong Provincial Power Transmission and Distribution Station has carried on the project for arranging substations in the load center.
The South Phyongan Provincial Power Transmission and Distribution Station has settled sci-tech problems arising in reducing the loss of power in transmission by its own efforts and technology.
Similar work has been done at South Hwanghae and Kangwon provincial power transmission and distribution stations, too. -0-

headline: Modernization of Equipment Propelled in Light Industry of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The light industry sector of the DPRK is pushing ahead with the modernization and maintenance of equipment.
The Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill repaired tens of spinning, drawing and other machines and remodeled flexible rapier looms.
Textile mills across the country are bringing about signal progress in improving the performance of equipment.
The Pyongyang Hosiery Factory has enhanced the level of its workers' technical knowledge and skills to make them contribute to improving the performance of equipment and the quality of products.
The Pyongyang Children's Knitwear Factory and Sunchon and Haeju knitwear factories have repaired tens of equipment and kept them in good conditions to increase the production.
Similar achievements have been witnessed at footwear factories across the country and the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory and other units. -0-

headline: New Goat Farms Built in South Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province in the DPRK has built modern goat farms in city and counties to lay a solid material and technical foundation for smoothly producing and supplying tasty and nutritious dairy products to the children.
The city and counties in the province are opening a prospect to put the production of milk products on a normal basis of high level by increasing the number of goats of supra-species. -0-

headline: Mansudae Art Troupe
Achievements Made in Railway Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Several units of the Ministry of Railways of the DPRK have made valuable technical innovations conducive to ensuring the safety of railways.
The Pyongyang Rolling Stock Accessory Factory perfected the production line for making the new-type railway fixtures.
The Sinsongchon Railway Branch laid a foundation for ensuring the quality of railway fixtures by manufacturing and introducing a new heat-treatment furnace necessary for establishing the production line of graphite iron.
The Sunchon Sleeper Production Company has modernized the process of iron bar and manufactured rotary iron bar cutters, while the Chongjin Concrete Sleeper Factory manufactured and introduced double gravel washers.
The Hamhung Rolling Stock Accessory Factory manufactured an analytical experimental apparatus, introduced a shock-absorbing system and thus contributed to ensuring the safety of press and mold equipment.
The Kilju Concrete Sleeper Factory has improved the quality of concrete sleepers and other units have conducted the mass technical innovation movement for ensuring the safety of railways. -0-

headline: Efforts for Strengthening Material and Technical Foundation in Coal Industrial Sector
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Various units in the coal industrial sector of the DPRK are concentrating efforts on strengthening the material and technical foundation.
The February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine under the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex has established and introduced new tunnel maintenance technology and developed new additives to improve the quality of castings.
The Kujang Area Coal Mining Complex has directed efforts to further rounding off the material and technical foundation of coal mine maintenance bases. As a result, various kinds of accessories are produced at the maintenance bases of the complex and coal mines under it, the tunneling speed has been further increased and progress made in improving coal mining and carrying capacity.
The Pukchang Area Youth Coal Mining Complex and the Hamnam Area Coal Mining Complex are supplying equipment and materials to survey teams while reinforcing them.
The Tokchon Area Coal Mining Complex is directing big efforts to strengthening maintenance bases of survey teams and introducing efficient survey equipment. -0-

headline: Tourism in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Today is the World Tourism Day.
Since the DPRK joined the World Tourism Organization in September Juche 76 (1987), it has paid deep attention to the development of tourism to develop friendship, cooperation and exchange with the peoples of different countries and provide its people with rich and civilized cultural and emotional life.
Tourism in the DPRK has entered the stage of new development under the wise guidance of the Workers’ Party of Korea and the government of the Republic.
Many excellent cultural and tourist facilities including the Masikryong Ski Resort have been built, injecting great vitality to the development of the country's tourism.
According to the far-reaching plan of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Wonsan Kalma coastal tourist area with the favorable conditions for coastal tourist activities is now being built more perfectly to be operated from next year.
The DPRK has pushed ahead with the work to expand and develop tourism in a long-term way on the basis of the experience gained in the construction of the Wonsan Kalma coastal tourist area.
It is taking long-term measures for making the positive use of various coastal tourist resources in the field of tourism in the future as it is bounded on two sides of the east and west by the sea and has beautiful scenic sites on the east coast including Mt. Kumgang, Mt. Chilbo, Majon, Kumya, Ri Won and Yombunjin.
The work to turn Samjiyon City of Ryanggang Province into a world-class mountainous tourist resort is also going on.
Such tourist resorts will contribute to providing the DPRK people and foreign tourists with diverse cultural and emotional life. -0-

headline: Mansudae Art Troupe
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Fifty-five years have passed since the Mansudae Art Troupe was organized.
The art troupe, named by PresidentKim Il Sungand organized by ChairmanKim Jong Ilon September 27, Juche 58 (1969), is the firstborn and model art troupe of the DPRK.
After taking its first step under the meticulous guidance ofKim Jong Il, it has created hymns of praising leaders and national masterpieces, full of the breathing of the times, that are loved by the people through its revolutionary artistic activities over the past fifty-odd years, thus enriching the treasure house of the Juche-oriented art.
Many pieces created by creators and artistes of the art troupe including songs "Long Life and Good Health to the Leader" and "We Will Remain Faithful to the President Generation after Generation" and dance "Azaleas of the Homeland" and music and dance story "Song of Paradise" were recorded in the history of the DPRK as monumental masterpieces.
Creators and artistes have successfully adapted immortal classics and songs created during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle as revolutionary operas, chorus and female instrumental ensemble, thus opening up a new phase of the Juche-oriented art.
They have conducted artistic activities of various forms in ebullient worksites and construction sites in the annals of the revolution to boost the masses' enthusiasm for the revolution and struggle and also demonstrated the art of the DPRK developing under the leadership of the Party in different countries.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsaid that the Mansudae Art Troupe is a prestigious art troupe personally organized and developed byKim Jong Ilinto a model of the Juche-oriented art.
He has led the creators and artistes of the younger generation to carry forward the revolutionary and forward-looking creative trait of the preceding generation that created the Mansudae spirit.
Over the past fifty-odd years, many winners of the Party and state commendations, titles of honor, February 16 Art Prize and international concours have been produced among creators and artistes of the art troupe. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Praised Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Congratulatory messages and letters sent by personages of different countries on the occasion the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK highly praised the personality of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unas a peerlessly great man who is ushering in an era of the most brilliant power unprecedented in the Korean nation's history spanning 5 000 years.
The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union said that the DPRK is a socialist state in which all rights and freedom of the working people are guaranteed in practice, not in words.
The chairman of the National Salvation Front of Russia said that the firm position and international prestige of the DPRK provided by the wise leadership ofKim Jong Unare the fundamental factor of ensuring peace and stability and a guarantee for achieving more successes in socialist construction.
The chairman of the Supreme Council of the National Socialist Party of Romania said that the era of socialist development and progress continues to be inherited by His ExcellencyKim Jong Unwho successfully carried forward the cause of PresidentKim Il Sungand LeaderKim Jong Il, adding that the DPRK has turned into a power which no one dares provoke as it is led byKim Jong Un.
A vice-director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea noted that the DPRK is making a history of miracles in all fields of politics, economy, culture and military affairs thanks to HEKim Jong Un.
The chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party and the co-chairperson of the Bulgarian Communists Union and Worker's Party (Communist) said thatKim Jong Unindicated the way for the prosperity and development of the DPRK and happiness of its people and opened up an era of great upsurge.
The secretary general of the Lebanon Federation of Workers and the chairman of the Finnish Communists' League expressed belief that the Korean people would defend the sovereignty of the country and accomplish the cause of building a socialist power under the outstanding and seasoned leadership ofKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Front-style Political Work Brisk at Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A front-style political work is being conducted to boost the revolutionary enthusiasm and fighting spirit of the members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade in the flood-hit areas of North Phyongan Province of the DPRK.
The political work being conducted by the Pyongyang and Rason municipal brigades is further encouraging the young builders to redouble their spiritual strength.
The performances given by the members of youth mobile explanatory teams and youth mobile artistic motivation teams including the South Phyongan Provincial Brigade, the Kaesong Municipal Brigade and the Cabinet Brigade are revving up the atmosphere of the construction sites.
The similar activities are witnessed at the South Hwanghae, North Hamgyong and Kangwon provincial brigades. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Several units of the Ministry of Railways of the DPRK have made valuable technical innovations conducive to ensuring the safety of railways.

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Woman Centenarian
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to Ri Son Nyo, a woman centenarian living in the people's neighbourhood unit No. 72 of Songsan Workers' District, Unsan County, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK.
Born into a poor family before liberation, she experienced the sorrow of a stateless nation. She has enjoyed a genuine life under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Upon receiving the birthday spread, she made a bow toKim Jong Un.
Officials of the Unsan County Party Committee and villagers congratulated her family members on the auspicious event.
Her family members and relatives were filled with the determination to devote their patriotic sweat and passion to the struggle for defending and glorifying the most advantageous socialist system of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Greetings to Swedish FM
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, on Sept. 26 sent a congratulatory message to Maria Malmer Stenergard upon her appointment as foreign minister of the Kingdom of Sweden.
Expressing belief that the bilateral relations would develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries,  the message wished her  successes in her new job. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in North Phyongan Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers of the Ryongdu Farm in Tongchang County, North Phyongan Province of the DPRK moved into modern houses.
The houses have been built at the foot of the sunny mountain while preserving the peculiarity of the mountain farm. They are a precious fruition of the wise leadership and tireless efforts of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho put forward the housing construction as a primary important policy task and has energetically led the work for carrying it out.
Present at the ceremony for moving into those houses were Kim Chol U, secretary of the provincial committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials, builders and agricultural workers to move into the houses in the county.
Choe Yong Man, chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory speech. Then license for the use of houses were conveyed and speeches made.
When moving into new houses begun, the villages were wrapped in a festive mood with pleasure and dancing.
Officials visited the families of farmers who moved into new houses, congratulating them. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in North Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers have moved into new houses at the Sokryon Farm in Rinsan County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
The new modern villages are entities of the future and development of the socialist cultural countryside which is in full bloom with the era of the Workers' Party.
Present at the ceremony for moving into those houses were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials of the Party and power organs and agricultural workers in the county.
Kim Son Il, chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory speech. Then license for the use of houses were conveyed and speeches made.
The heartfelt voices of the farmers paying respects to the motherly Workers' Party of Korea were heard from every house. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived congratulatory messages and letters from foreign countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
- The press introduces achievements made in various economic sectors and units, including brisk harvesting and threshing at farms across the country.
- A ceremony for moving into new dwelling houses took place at the Sokryon Farm in Rinsan County, North Hwanghae Province.

Rodong Sinmun
- A meeting was held to convey a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the workers, technicians and officials of the Rahung Railway Factory on the occasion of its 70th founding anniversary.
- An article deals with the positive response of people across the country to the WPK's policy on regional development.
- Another article notes that the DPRK-Syria friendly relations are being consolidated on the road of independence against imperialism.

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived congratulatory messages and letters from different countries on the occasion of the 76th birthday of the DPRK.
Congratulations came from the president of Nepal, the president of the People's Republic of Bangladesh, the sultan of Brunei Darussalam, the emir of the State of Kuwait, the president of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the president of the Republic of Philippines, the emir of the State of Qatar, the president of the Republic of Tajikistan, the president of Turkmenistan, the president of the headline: Scores of New Reserve Coal Cutting Faces Secured in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers of the Pukchang Area Youth Coal Mining Complex in the DPRK are putting spurs to carrying out their plan for the second half of the year.
Members of the youth shock brigade and tunneling platoons conducted a high-speed tunneling campaign, securing tens of reserve cutting faces at coal mines in the complex and providing a guarantee for pushing ahead with coal production.
Meanwhile, successes have been witnessed at coal mine maintenance bases. -0-

Minju Joson

headline: DPRK Will Never Give up Its Nuclear Weapons: KCNA Commentary
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- G7 has turned into the most hideous confrontational group against the DPRK under the control of the U.S.
For a typical example, its foreign ministers issued a "presidential statement" at a confab held on Sept. 24, occasioned by the 79th UN General Assembly session in New York.
The statement is run through with ridiculous and impudent remarks urging the DPRK to abandon its nuclear arms, not content with terming its self-defensive nuclear force an "illegal one that violated UNSC resolutions."
This is just bombast urging the DPRK to dismantle its absolute guarantee for national security and give up its right to existence. Furthermore, it is a grave politically-motivated provocation and wanton violation which denies the sovereignty of the DPRK and the constitutional status that reflects the unanimous will of all the Korean people.
The DPRK has already specified the policy of its state nuclear force as its supreme law, a political and institutional mechanism for firmly guaranteeing the eternal security of the country and its people.
G7 comprises a war criminal nation, which used A-bombs against humanity, possessed of the world's biggest nuclear arsenal, countries that armed themselves with nuclear weapons long ago with black-hearted intentions and a dangerous nation seeking nuclear weapons to realize their revengeful wild ambition.  Nevertheless, it tried to deprive the DPRK of its inalienable right to arming itself with self-defensive nuclear means. This constitutes the worst crime that can never be pardoned.
G7 has persisted in seriously threatening the security environment of the DPRK.
The U.S. and Japan have frantically staged various war drills aimed at the use of nuclear weapons against the DPRK on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity, operating their triangular military alliance with the ROK in full swing. Worse still, other member states of G7 have joined one after another in the racket for stifling the DPRK. This clearly proves that G7 is a "group that deserves a special prize" for tangibly "contributing" to destroying peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region.
No wonder, G7 member states are most active in taking part in the U.S.-led campaign for reviving and expanding the illegal "UN Command" in a bid to gain the right to their participation in the "second Korean war," and among them are defeated nations of the Second World War.
Against this backdrop, they held a confab during a UN General Assembly session discussing the tragic situations of Europe and the Middle East, where they called for someone's "denuclearization" that had flied far. This is just a revelation of their dead-end wild ambition for depriving the DPRK of its nuclear deterrent for self-defence at any cost under the manipulation of the U.S.
G7 is foolish enough to deny the national law of the DPRK as it has neither qualifications nor authority to represent the international community.
Though belatedly, it has to know that its any attempt against our nuclear weapons can never work.
Moreover, they should know that the DPRK will never give up its nuclear weapons in any case.
All the people of the DPRK will defend their constitution at the cost of their lives.
We warn G7 not to stick to such a futile deed.
G7 will have to pay dearly for violating the national law of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Pyongyang Citizens Fervently Welcome Young Footballers
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK women footballers took the first place at the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup held in Colombia. They won the trophy again as it did in 2006 and 2016, emerging as the world's strongest team.
They returned home on Saturday.
Vice-Premier of the DPRK Kim Myong Hun, Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Il Guk, Minister of External Economic Relations Yun Jong Ho who is chairman of the DPRK Football Association, officials concerned, and the families of players were standing at the apron of the airport terminal to greet them.
When a plane carrying our women footballers entered the apron, crowds broke into cheers of "Welcome" and "Congratulation".
Sportspersons and working people presented bouquets to the players and coaches who got off the plane with gold medals, and congratulated them, putting garlands around their necks.
Parents embraced their daughters with great pride and joy.
Women footballers left Pyongyang International Airport on an open vehicle decorated with flowers.
The streets of Pyongyang were filled with the fervent atmosphere of welcoming the young footballers who excited the women's football world again.
They extended thanks to the cheering citizens, reminding themselves of the time when they played games, warmly encouraged by all the people across the country. -0-

headline: Greetings to DPRK Foreign Minister
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), received messages of greeting from her counterparts of different countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Messages came from the foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, the foreign minister of the Republic of Cuba, the vice-prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic who is foreign minister, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Republic of Lebanon, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Syrian Arab Republic, the deputy prime minister of the Kingdom of Cambodia who is minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, the prime minister of the State of Palestine who is minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates, and the foreign ministers of the Republic of Philippines, the Republic of Azerbaijan, the Islamic Republic of Iran and the Republic of Indonesia, the deputy prime minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam who is foreign minister, the minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Bulgaria, the foreign minister of the Republic of Belarus, the foreign minister of the Czech Republic, the foreign minister of the Republic of Poland, the minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Serbia, the minister of Foreign Affairs, Immigration and Overseas Compatriots of the Republic of Tunisia, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria and the foreign minister of the People's Power of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela. -0-

headline: DPRK Premier Inspects Agricultural Sector and Rehabilitation of Flood-hit Areas of North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Tok Hun, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, inspected the agricultural sector and the rehabilitation of flood-hit areas in North Phyongan Province.
Learning about the farming in Pakchon and Kwaksan counties, he called upon the agricultural officials to provide practical guidance over farming in order to successfully conclude this year's farming, mindful of the importance of their duty in attaining the grain production goal set by the Party.
He stressed the need for farms to put spurs to raising the per-hectare yield to the maximum, correctly measure the ripening rate of rice ears in each area and field, and concentrate efforts and means on  qualitatively finishing the rice harvesting in the right time.
He called for applying scientific methods to do early-ripening crops farming well next year on the basis of the successes and experience gained in the early crop farming this year, and carrying out without fail the plan for each immediate farming process including winter wheat and barley sowing.
At the sites for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas of Sinuiju City and Uiju County, he encouraged the builders who are devoting themselves to the projects, true to the noble intention of the Party Central Committee to provide the people in the flood-hit areas with a stable life as early as possible, and learned in detail about the projects.
He called upon the construction units to push forward with the construction projects as scheduled under a detailed plan and pay primary attention to ensuring quality in construction and strictly preserving the requirements of construction methods, given the projects including housing construction proceeding in a three-dimensional way in different areas.
The field consultative meetings took measures after discussing the issues of directing efforts to the study of farming techniques appropriate to weather conditions, properly keeping and managing the harvested grains, making good preparations for next year's farming, increasing the proportion of mechanization in construction, building up the ranks of skilled workers, supplying materials and equipment in good time and paying deep attention to ensuring the living of builders. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Vice Department Director of WPK Central Committee Kim Yo Jong
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement "The U.S. additional military support to Ukraine will be a trigger for bringing a nuclear disaster to the world" on Sunday:
The U.S. killed hundreds of thousands of innocent people by dropping nuclear bombs for the first time in history in the last century. It is now running amuck to plunge the whole earth into a horrible nuclear disaster.
It is a serious mistake and foolish act for the U.S. to announce its plan to offer again military aids worth 8 billion U.S. dollars to the neo-Nazis puppet regime of Ukraine.
I strongly denounce the U.S. for its intentional escalation of tensions to trigger off prolongation and expansion of the dispute and plunge the whole European region into the holocaust of a nuclear war by providing Ukraine with an astronomical amount of military hardware.
The U.S. and the West should neither ignore nor underestimate Russia's stern warnings.
Can the U.S. and the West deal with the consequences to be entailed by their current fearless war gamble against Russia, a nuclear superpower?
To help Ukraine attempt at further adventurous military actions is just a dangerous gamble. It is also an irresponsible act of making many people stake their lives on luck only, exposed to a great calamity.
Calamity is inevitable unless insanity of Zelenskiy is stopped.
The U.S., though belatedly, should know that it can get a mere chance for preventing the looming calamity only when it cools down its head heated with anti-Russia confrontational hysteria and takes a step back after abandoning such a foolish and silly guy as Zelenskiy seeking to strike the interior of Russia, a nuclear superpower.
Taking this opportunity, I would like to give a serious warning over Zelenskiy's backbiting against the DPRK at a recent UNSC meeting.
The malicious Zelenskiy clique, who has killed innocent Russian citizens by recklessly using the good-for-nothing weapons offered by the U.S. and the West, has gone so preposterous as to let out a string of rubbish terming our country an "accomplice nation" in the Ukrainian war. This is a reckless politically-motivated provocation that can never be justified.
As for the logic of Zelenskiy, the U.S. and the West deserve the title of top-class accomplice for having lavished the greatest amounts of weapons and ammunitions on the Ukrainian battlefields.
The world began to feel bored with the poor acting of Zelenskiy.
It is uncertain what he would do more with begging and sympathy but he'd better step down for world peace and security before it would be too late.
History is on the side of justice.
The U.S. and its followers are bound to pay dearly for pursuing high-handedness and challenging justice. -0-

headline: Greetings to DPRK Foreign Minister
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), received messages of greeting from her counterparts of different countries on the occasion of the 76th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
Messages came from the foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, the foreign minister of the Republic of Cuba, the vice-prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic who is foreign minister, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Republic of Lebanon, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Syrian Arab Republic, the deputy prime minister of the Kingdom of Cambodia who is minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, the prime minister of the State of Palestine who is minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates, and the foreign ministers of the Republic of Philippines, the Republic of Azerbaijan, the Islamic Republic of Iran and the Republic of Indonesia, the deputy prime minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam who is foreign minister, the minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Bulgaria, the foreign minister of the Republic of Belarus, the foreign minister of the Czech Republic, the foreign minister of the Republic of Poland, the minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Serbia, the minister of Foreign Affairs, Immigration and Overseas Compatriots of the Republic of Tunisia, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria and the foreign minister of the People's Power of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela. -0-

headline: DPRK Will Never Give up Its Nuclear Weapons: KCNA Commentary
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- G7 has turned into the most hideous confrontational group against the DPRK under the control of the U.S.
For a typical example, its foreign ministers issued a "presidential statement" at a confab held on Sept. 24, occasioned by the 79th UN General Assembly session in New York.
The statement is run through with ridiculous and impudent remarks urging the DPRK to abandon its nuclear arms, not content with terming its self-defensive nuclear force an "illegal one that violated UNSC resolutions."
This is just bombast urging the DPRK to dismantle its absolute guarantee for national security and give up its right to existence. Furthermore, it is a grave politically-motivated provocation and wanton violation which denies the sovereignty of the DPRK and the constitutional status that reflects the unanimous will of all the Korean people.
The DPRK has already specified the policy of its state nuclear force as its supreme law, a political and institutional mechanism for firmly guaranteeing the eternal security of the country and its people.
G7 comprises a war criminal nation, which used A-bombs against humanity, possessed of the world's biggest nuclear arsenal, countries that armed themselves with nuclear weapons long ago with black-hearted intentions and a dangerous nation seeking nuclear weapons to realize their revengeful wild ambition.  Nevertheless, it tried to deprive the DPRK of its inalienable right to arming itself with self-defensive nuclear means. This constitutes the worst crime that can never be pardoned.
G7 has persisted in seriously threatening the security environment of the DPRK.
The U.S. and Japan have frantically staged various war drills aimed at the use of nuclear weapons against the DPRK on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity, operating their triangular military alliance with the ROK in full swing. Worse still, other member states of G7 have joined one after another in the racket for stifling the DPRK. This clearly proves that G7 is a "group that deserves a special prize" for tangibly "contributing" to destroying peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region.
No wonder, G7 member states are most active in taking part in the U.S.-led campaign for reviving and expanding the illegal "UN Command" in a bid to gain the right to their participation in the "second Korean war," and among them are defeated nations of the Second World War.
Against this backdrop, they held a confab during a UN General Assembly session discussing the tragic situations of Europe and the Middle East, where they called for someone's "denuclearization" that had flied far. This is just a revelation of their dead-end wild ambition for depriving the DPRK of its nuclear deterrent for self-defence at any cost under the manipulation of the U.S.
G7 is foolish enough to deny the national law of the DPRK as it has neither qualifications nor authority to represent the international community.
Though belatedly, it has to know that its any attempt against our nuclear weapons can never work.
Moreover, they should know that the DPRK will never give up its nuclear weapons in any case.
All the people of the DPRK will defend their constitution at the cost of their lives.
We warn G7 not to stick to such a futile deed.
G7 will have to pay dearly for violating the national law of the DPRK. -0-

headline: Pyongyang Citizens Fervently Welcome Young Footballers
Pyongyang Citizens Fervently Welcome Young Footballers
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK women footballers took the first place at the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup held in Colombia. They won the trophy again as it did in 2006 and 2016, emerging as the world's strongest team.
They returned home on Saturday.
Vice-Premier of the DPRK Kim Myong Hun, Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Il Guk, Minister of External Economic Relations Yun Jong Ho who is chairman of the DPRK Football Association, officials concerned, and the families of players were standing at the apron of the airport terminal to greet them.
When a plane carrying our women footballers entered the apron, crowds broke into cheers of "Welcome" and "Congratulation".
Sportspersons and working people presented bouquets to the players and coaches who got off the plane with gold medals, and congratulated them, putting garlands around their necks.
Parents embraced their daughters with great pride and joy.
Women footballers left Pyongyang International Airport on an open vehicle decorated with flowers.
The streets of Pyongyang were filled with the fervent atmosphere of welcoming the young footballers who excited the women's football world again.
They extended thanks to the cheering citizens, reminding themselves of the time when they played games, warmly encouraged by all the people across the country. -0-

headline: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Becoming True Patriots in Era of Our State-First Principle
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun notes in an editorial on Sunday that the patriotic might of all the DPRK people is a strong motive power for promoting the era of our state-first principle.
The past ten-odd years, which can be said as the ones reflecting the hard-fought history of the Korean revolution, are the period of excitement that clearly showed what miracles and changes the boundless patriotic might of the Korean people single-mindedly united around the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) have created, the editorial says, and goes on:
To become true patriots who glorify the era of our state-first principle is an essential requirement for cementing the might of the single-minded unity peculiar to Juche Korea in every way.
The overall prosperity of the state does not come of its own accord for desiring, nor is the gift of someone. It can be achieved only through the struggle of all the people full of patriotism.
Today high are the revolutionary spirit and patriotic enthusiasm of our people to carry out the revolutionary tasks assigned by their motherland in a responsible manner at every worksite of socialist construction.
The era of our state-first principle calls true patriots.
All the people should become ardent loyalists who share the idea, intention and step with the WPK Central Committee, cherishing the firm faith that the era of our state-first principle shines and the rosy future of our prosperous country is guaranteed as they are led by the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un.
The editorial calls upon all the people to devote their patriotic blood and sweat to the struggle for the prosperity of great our state under the leadership of the respected General Secretary and thus add luster to the era of our state-first principle, a new era of self-respect and prosperity. -0-

headline: DPRK Premier Inspects Agricultural Sector and Rehabilitation of Flood-hit Areas of North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Tok Hun, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-president of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, inspected the agricultural sector and the rehabilitation of flood-hit areas in North Phyongan Province.
Learning about the farming in Pakchon and Kwaksan counties, he called upon the agricultural officials to provide practical guidance over farming in order to successfully conclude this year's farming, mindful of the importance of their duty in attaining the grain production goal set by the Party.
He stressed the need for farms to put spurs to raising the per-hectare yield to the maximum, correctly measure the ripening rate of rice ears in each area and field, and concentrate efforts and means on  qualitatively finishing the rice harvesting in the right time.
He called for applying scientific methods to do early-ripening crops farming well next year on the basis of the successes and experience gained in the early crop farming this year, and carrying out without fail the plan for each immediate farming process including winter wheat and barley sowing.
At the sites for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas of Sinuiju City and Uiju County, he encouraged the builders who are devoting themselves to the projects, true to the noble intention of the Party Central Committee to provide the people in the flood-hit areas with a stable life as early as possible, and learned in detail about the projects.
He called upon the construction units to push forward with the construction projects as scheduled under a detailed plan and pay primary attention to ensuring quality in construction and strictly preserving the requirements of construction methods, given the projects including housing construction proceeding in a three-dimensional way in different areas.
The field consultative meetings took measures after discussing the issues of directing efforts to the study of farming techniques appropriate to weather conditions, properly keeping and managing the harvested grains, making good preparations for next year's farming, increasing the proportion of mechanization in construction, building up the ranks of skilled workers, supplying materials and equipment in good time and paying deep attention to ensuring the living of builders. -0-

Among them are the president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, the prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, the prime minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the prime minister of the Syrian Arab Republic, the prime minister of Nepal, the prime minister of Mongolia, the prime minister of the Kingdom of Cambodia, the prime minister of the State of Palestine who is minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates, the prime minister of the State of Qatar who is foreign minister, the prime minister of the Republic of Armenia, the prime minister of the Republic of Bulgaria, the prime minister of the Republic of Serbia and the prime minister of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria. -0-

headline: Branch Schools Built and Remodeled in South Hwanghae Province, DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK has pushed ahead with the building and remodeling of branches of the schools at all levels in the province, thus providing students with better educational conditions and environment.
The building and remodeling of dozens of branches were completed in the province and the remaining project has been brisk, sprucing up the appearance of the branches.
The province has pushed ahead with the work to complete the construction and remodeling of branches planned for this year and equip them with necessary school fixtures and educational facilities in cities and counties, thus providing conditions for improving the education of branches. -0-

headline: DPRK Men Football Team Qualified for 2025 AFC U-20 Asian Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Matches of group E for the qualification for the 2025 AFC U-20 Asian Cup are taking place in Tajikistan.
The DPRK team beat its Sri Lankan rival 4:0, its Tajik rival 2:0 and its Oman rival 1:0. It drew with its Malaysian rival 0:0 in the group league matches.
It took the first place in the group with ten points and thus was qualified for the 2025 AFC U-20 Asian Cup. -0-

headline: Kim Chaek University of Technology
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Chaek University of Technology of the DPRK is a pedigree establishment for training people talented in science and technology and a reliable scientific research base which is vigorously promoting the development of science and technology and the economic construction of the country.
The university, which was founded as the first comprehensive university of industrial technology of the country in September Juche 37 (1948), has developed into the highest seat of sci-tech education for training people talented in science and technology under the care of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il.
Giving field guidance at the university on September 2018 which marks the 70th founding anniversary, the respected ComradeKim Jong Unsaid that it is a university which has made a great contribution to the education in science and technology in the DPRK, the independent development of the national economy and the strengthening of the national defence capability.
True to his noble intention, the university has produced many October 8 Model Instructors and winners of University Student Scientific Research Prize and made a lot of achievements in scientific researches, thus contributing to training talents and developing the country's economy.
The pedagogical structure of education type has been turned into one of research type and new faculties and subjects including the sectors of biomedical science and aerospace have appeared to be a university with a comprehensive academic structure.
Students have prepared themselves as talents of creation- practice-type who will shoulder the building of a powerful socialist country, and displayed their ability in national competitions and international arenas, demonstrating the honor of the university.
The university has developed programs necessary for establishing standardized integrated production systems at regional-industry factories and worked out technical plans for their introduction, thus contributing to implementing the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on regional development.
It has completed the technical development for establishing rare earth industry and started the construction of an intermediate test process for the development and production of application products. And it has concentrated all its efforts on important researches conducive to bolstering up the national power of the country. -0-

headline: Moving into New Houses at Vegetable Farm in Hyongjesan District
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers at the Hyongsan Vegetable Farm in Hyongjesan District, Pyongyang Municipality, moved into new houses.
A ceremony for moving into new houses was attended by Choe Hak Chol, secretary of the Pyongyang Municipal Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in the district. At the ceremony, Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang Municipal People's Committee, made an address. Then, licenses for the use of new houses were handed over and speeches made.
When the moving into new houses began amid a cheerful dancing party, officials visited the new houses of agricultural workers to congratulate them. -0-

headline: Area of Mt. Chilbo in DPRK, One of World Network of Biosphere Reserves
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Mt. Chilbo, called as "Hambukkumgang" from olden times, is famous for its scenery of mountain and sea.
The area of Mt Chilbo was registered as one of the World Network of Biosphere Reserves for the fourth time in the DPRK in Juche 103 (2014).
The area covers more than 50 000 hectares and has diverse ecosystems.
It is inhabited by more than 270 kinds of vertebrates, over 820 kinds of higher plants, 10 kinds of special plants and tens of endangered species of animals and plants.
There are many edible fruit trees like Tricholoma matsutake, the specialty of the mountain, wild grape and fruit of Actinidia arguta, over 60 kinds of edible herbs and over 130 kinds of medicinal plants including wild insam and fruit of Schizandra chinensis which are traditional Koryo medicinal materials.
In the area of Mt Chilbo, there are many historical remains and relics of the primitive, ancient and medieval ages showing the time-honored history of the country including the Kaesim Temple and more than 10 natural monuments.
The area has been visited by many tourists from long time ago, as it has 160-odd scenic spots, and thick and splendid forests, wonderful peaks and scenery of Sea Chilbo are harmonized with each other.
200 kms-long ring roads including one hundred and tens of kms of the main roads, branch roads and sightseeing roads are formed in the area so that the tourists can visit all scenic spots in Inner Chilbo, Outer Chilbo and Sea Chilbo.
Mt Chilbo, a famous mountain in the East Sea, has been turned into a cultural recreation ground for the people under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. -0-

headline: DPRK Women Contribute to Socialist Construction
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Many women in the DPRK are covering the road of loyalty and patriotism true to the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a powerful country, deeply aware of the responsibility and duty they have assumed before their families and society.
More than 3 000 women's union members in Uiju County, North Phyongan Province sent hundreds of thousands of blocks produced through their positive shock brigade activities to the projects for rehabilitate the flood-hit areas.
Women in Sinpho City, South Hamgyong Province provided sincere welfare service for the soldiers involved in the construction of a modern offshore farm and contributed to producing building parts and elements.
Women in Songrim City, North Hwanghae Province and Jasong County, Jagang Province have carried out their plans for harvesting silk from cocoons every year, true to the Party's policy on sericulture.
Similar activities are witnessed at South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces and Kaesong Municipality, Pothonggang District of Pyongyang Municipality, Kangso District of Nampho Municipality, etc. -0-

headline: Material and Technical Foundations of Raw Materials Bases Strengthened
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- North Hwanghae Province in the DPRK directs efforts to strengthening the material and technical foundations of raw materials bases in cities and counties.
In particular, it set a goal to build workteam rooms equipped with lodging and boarding conditions, stock-breeding places and greenhouses at scores of workteams of raw materials bases and is putting spurs to its realization.
The province built a workteam of the Unpha County Raw Materials Base Station as a model and has pushed ahead with the work to generalize its experience to cities and counties.
Songrim City and Hwangju and Koksan counties finished the projects in a short span of time by meticulously organizing labor and supplying equipment and materials.
Other areas of the province have made successes in renewing the workteams of raw materials bases.
The province is producing various kinds of farm implements and high-efficient farm machines and sending them to raw materials bases. -0-

headline: Study Tour of Revolutionary Sites in Kangwon Province, DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kangwon Province of the DPRK has made the visitors deeply grasp the noble spirit and transparent ideological and spiritual world of the revolutionary forerunners through the study tour of the Ryongpho Revolutionary Site and the Ponghwajae Temporary Secret Base of the Wonsan City Revolutionary Battle Site.
The Ryongpho Revolutionary Site is a significant place associated with PresidentKim Il Sung's exploits performed in winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. The President inspected the place in April Juche 40 (1951) to inspire service personnel of the Korean People's Army with matchless courage and invincible strategy and aroused the people to victory in the war.
Going round the historical relics and data, the visitors keenly realized that the victory in war is the victory of the peerlessly illustrious commander's outstanding military ideas, Juche-based war methods and superb strategy and tactics.
The Ponghwajae Temporary Secret Base of the Wonsan City Revolutionary Battle Site shows the feats of members of a small unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army who aroused the broad masses to the all-people resistance for national liberation, true to the Juche-oriented revolutionary line set forth by the President at the historic Xiaohaerbaling Meeting in August 1940.
Officials, working people, youth and students looked round trees bearing such slogans as "Passionate young people, let's oppose the conscription and labor draft and go to Mt Paektu to follow CommanderKim Il Sung".
Through the study tour, they were resolved to wage a more dynamic struggle for attaining the goal set forth by the Eighth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea under the leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un. -0-

headline: Kim Chaek University of Technology
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Chaek University of Technology of the DPRK is a pedigree establishment for training people talented in science and technology and a reliable scientific research base which is vigorously promoting the development of science and technology and the economic construction of the country.
The university, which was founded as the first comprehensive university of industrial technology of the country in September Juche 37 (1948), has developed into the highest seat of sci-tech education for training people talented in science and technology under the care of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il.
Giving field guidance at the university on September 2018 which marks the 70th founding anniversary, the respected ComradeKim Jong Unsaid that it is a university which has made a great contribution to the education in science and technology in the DPRK, the independent development of the national economy and the strengthening of the national defence capability.
True to his noble intention, the university has produced many October 8 Model Instructors and winners of University Student Scientific Research Prize and made a lot of achievements in scientific researches, thus contributing to training talents and developing the country's economy.
The pedagogical structure of education type has been turned into one of research type and new faculties and subjects including the sectors of biomedical science and aerospace have appeared to be a university with a comprehensive academic structure.
Students have prepared themselves as talents of creation- practice-type who will shoulder the building of a powerful socialist country, and displayed their ability in national competitions and international arenas, demonstrating the honor of the university.
The university has developed programs necessary for establishing standardized integrated production systems at regional-industry factories and worked out technical plans for their introduction, thus contributing to implementing the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on regional development.
It has completed the technical development for establishing rare earth industry and started the construction of an intermediate test process for the development and production of application products. And it has concentrated all its efforts on important researches conducive to bolstering up the national power of the country. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Guides Campaign of Recovering from Flood Damage in North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, gave field guidance over the rehabilitation projects in the flood-hit areas in North Phyongan Province on September 29.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas accompanied by Jo Yong Won and Ri Il Hwan, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
He was greeted by commanding officers of the military units involved in the rehabilitation projects in relevant regions on the spot.
Looking a map showing the bird's eye view of the residential quarters to be newly built, he learned in detail about the progress made in the construction.
He highly appreciated the efforts of all the builders who are achieving fresh innovative successes day by day, bearing in mind the patriotic appeal to make redoubled efforts for the prosperity of our great state.
He repeatedly stressed that it is the most urgent task facing the Party and the government at present to alleviate the pain of the flood victims as early as possible and restore the production and living order in the flood-hit areas to the normal level. And he said that all the builders should complete the housing construction on the highest level in the shortest time by directing redoubled efforts and sincerity to provide the people in the flood-hit areas with houses for happy living.
He once again asked for putting primary efforts to thoroughly ensuring the quality of the construction as the rehabilitation of the flood-hit areas is not merely an issue of removing the aftermath of natural disaster but an important process of implementing the Party's far-reaching programme for regional development.
He said that every edifice representing the era of changes reflects our ideology, policy and aesthetic perspective and thus the construction is a visual expression of politics. He stressed the need for all the builders to thoroughly keep the requirements of design and construction methods and wage a strong struggle in time, never conniving at a slightest practice of neglecting quality improvement, bearing in mind that to ensure the quality of construction precisely means the exact implementation of the Party's policies and an important political issue of deepening the people's trust in the Party.
He went round the construction site of the dwelling houses together with the accompanying cadres.
Watching the builders' work, he expressed thanks to their spiritual world and devotion boundlessly loyal to the country and people.
Saying that soldier-builders and members of the youth shock brigade who volunteered for the flood-hit areas are vanguard fighters who have taken the lead in the honorable struggle for the great people whom the Party is upholding as Heaven, he stressed the need for officials to always pay deep attention to ensuring their living conditions and said that the Party will take important measures for this.
Learning about the embankment project in the island areas, he indicated the ways for building permanent embankments.
Noting that the ongoing campaign for recovering from flood damage is another political process that occupies an important place in raising the stage of development of rural civilization set forth in the Party's programme for the rural revolution to a higher stage, he called for powerfully conducting political information and agitation, which instill into the minds of all the builders as an faith the self-respect and honor of the state and the consciousness of performers who are to directly carry on the sacred struggle for the well-being of regional people.
He clarified important guidelines related to the reconstruction, including the issue of timely and preferentially supplying materials and equipment needed for the project by meticulously organizing transport, the issue of speeding up the frame work to the maximum and raising the quality level by spending more time in the final construction and the issue of improving the surrounding environment and afforestation in the cultured and modern residential quarters in a proper way and in a ornamental and practical way.
He expressed expectation and belief that the soldier-builders and members of the youth shock brigade would perform brilliant feats in the honorable theatre for providing the people in the flood-hit areas with stable and enlightened life at an early date with consciousness and firm confidence that they are the creators and masters of the new era who are carrying forward the gigantic cause of comprehensive national development.
All the builders, looking up to the outstanding teacher and great father who inspected the reconstruction site to indicate bright plan for performing miracles and give inexhaustible strength and courage, vowed to fully demonstrate the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses by carrying out the on-site instructions ofKim Jong Ununconditionally and thoroughly without an inch of deflection, thus turning the land of the country which has overcome the natural calamity into a socialist paradise where the people's happiness is in full bloom. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Monday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Ungave field guidance over the rehabilitation projects in the flood-hit areas in North Phyongan Province. (photos accompanied)
- Successes have been made in different economic sectors and units.

Rodong Sinmun
- Kangwon Province has focused its efforts on education through the study tour of revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites.

Minju Joson
- An article says that the DPRK people have accelerated the victorious advance of socialism by dint of virtue, justice and collectivism under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. -0-

He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won and Ri Il Hwan, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, and Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.

Learning about an embankment project in the island areas, he indicated the ways for building permanent embankments.
Noting that the ongoing campaign for repairing flood damage is another political process that occupies an important place in raising to a higher level the stage of development of rural civilization set forth in the Party's programme for the rural revolution, he called for powerfully conducting political information and motivation work for instilling into the minds of all the builders as an element of faith the self-respect and honour of the state and the consciousness of performers who directly carry on the sacred struggle for the well-being of regional people.
He clarified important guidelines related to the rehabilitation, including the issue of preferentially supplying materials and equipment needed for the projects in time by meticulously organizing transport, the issue of speeding up framework building to the maximum and raising the quality level by directing more time to the final process of construction and the issue of improving the surrounding environment and carrying out afforestation properly in ornamental and practical aspects, given that civilized and modern residential quarters would be built.

headline: Ryongmun Cavern in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- At the foot of Mt Ryongmun in Kujang County, North Phyongan Province of the DPRK, there is the Ryongmun Cavern known as the underground scenery unparalleled in the world.
The entrance of the cavern is about 302 meters above sea level and it is surrounded by thick forests.
The section of the cavern is not long but has graceful and splendid karst objects.
Two streams of white falls resembling Isonnam Falls of Mt Myohyang drop from rock walls of various colors, and there are on the ceiling a "dolphin" running up to the sky with a joy after seeing the rare Ryongmun Carven and a "squid" drawing the interest of visitors while hanging its legs long.
The Phungnyon Tower at the Phungnyon Village bringing the feeling of rich harvest is a stalagmite like grain stack. In front of the tower are a "female farmer" taking an ear of corn in her hand and stalagmites such as ears of millets and kaoliangs hanging under eaves.
The scenery of the Sokhwa Village representing the snow scene, ornamented with white frost flowers, is also arousing the administration of all people.
There are in the Ansim Cave a "seagull' of Mt Chilbo, a famous mountain in the East Sea, that is unable to leave for the ecstasy and a "peacock" seen as if it folds its beautiful wings.
The Ryongyon Cave where "ever-agarics" grow delicious-looking and the Jangsok Village where long and wide rocks layer like visors add beauty to the mysterious Ryongmun Carven.
The Ryongmun Cavern with the fantastic scenery has been spruced up under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea, contributing to the cultural and emotional life of the people. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Vice-Minister of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Kang Il, vice-minister of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Tuesday issued the following press statement titled "The U.S. reckless military bluff and moves for escalating tensions will only increase security instability of its mainland":
Pentagon's confrontational attempt to permanently deploy nuclear strategic assets to the Korean peninsula and its vicinities to intentionally demonstrate the "upperhand in strength" and put military pressure on the sovereign states in the region is being manifested in a diverse way.
Shortly ago, the latest nuclear submarine of the U.S. Navy openly revealed its shape at Pusan Port of the ROK. And, this time, B-1B bomber, one of the three air strategic assets of the U.S. Air Force, will be reportedly to fly in the sky above the Korean peninsula and conduct a demonstration flight, timed to coincide with a military parade on the “ROK army day”.
The U.S. bluffing military demonstration is nothing but a "hallucinant" to save even a bit its military face driven into a strategic disadvantage in the Korean peninsula and calm down a sense of collapse of its stooge having a poor sleep at night from chronic nuclear phobia.
In June the U.S. B-1Bs flew over the sky of the Korean peninsula to stage a joint air drill with military gangsters of the ROK and a precision guided bomb dropping drill for the first time in several years. And nuclear carrier Theodore Roosevelt entered the Pusan operational base to insist on the "combined defence posture" and "demonstration of extended deterrence". All those facts clearly show where the intemperate hysteric confrontation racket of the ROK is based on.
The Korean People's Army (KPA) is keenly watching the frequent deployment of U.S. strategic assets and their traces in the Korean peninsula and is fully ready to thoroughly defend the security environment of the state from any threat.
It is the invariable stand of KPA that the U.S. which is seized with violence and high-handed practices, should be governed from the stand of strength.
Now that the U.S. unannounced deployment of strategic assets has fixed as an incurable bad habit, a measure of unpredictable strategic nature corresponding to it should be an inevitable and legitimate right of a sovereign state, and fresh methods of adding serious concern to the security of the U.S. mainland should be surely produced.
We can examine such fresh action plans any time and carry them out.
The armed forces of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the military provocative acts of the hostile forces escalated in three dimensions in the Korean peninsula and its vicinities, but take a thoroughgoing action corresponding to them and steadily improve their powerful war deterrent capable of initiatively coping with any instable situation of security caused by the U.S. irresponsible acts. -0-
