headline: Different Economic Sectors of DPRK Focus Efforts on Readjustment and Reinforcement
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Different economic sectors of the DPRK are directing efforts to readjustment and reinforcement for improving the national productivity.
The chemical industry sector is now striving to timely carry out its plan for readjustment and reinforcement to be completed until this year.
The Ministry of Chemical Industry has discussed the ways for carrying out the projects for readjustment and reinforcement under a sure scientific guarantee and taken measures.
Many units in the machine-building industry sector are working hard to produce and supply machines and accessories in a qualitative way and by the appointed time so as to help relevant sectors attain their goals for readjustment and reinforcement.
The Ministry of Mining Industry has also assign to mines and smelteries the projects for remodeling and dispatched its officials to worksites to take measures, learning about whether the assignments specified in the plans are carried out. -0-

headline: Schoolchildren of Japanese Society, Tundra of Human Rights
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese Tokyo Shimbun said that a new term begins at many schools from tomorrow. It noted that today is the day with the greatest possibility of danger in which pupils may commit suicide. It said that if a school makes pupils like to die, they should not allow to go to it.
The opening day of the school term to be full of pleasure and hope serves as an occasion of nightmare encouraging pupils to commit suicide in the Japanese society.
The schools, inviolable places in which children should learn to their heart’s content and bring their abilities into bloom, have turned into "torture grounds" where children suffer from intolerable mental and physical pain.
Schools do not take the stand to prevent violence and maltreatment and protect children but ignore and encourage them.
One can know well the poor situation of the Japanese schools only through a suicide case of a schoolgirl of a middle school in Hyogo Prefecture that had been proven some years ago.
The schoolgirl submitted to the school even a document to complain of her distress and ask for the school's help in order to get rid of the torture from an extracurricular club.
However, the school turned down her request by tearing the document into pieces and had connived at violence, leading her to commit suicide.
It also did not made a proper survey of her death but made public some contents, covering the motive of her miserable suicide for several years.
In February, a schoolgirl of a middle school in Nagasaki Prefecture committed suicide after writing her will to cry for  maltreatment in the campus. This tragedy was discovered through media's coverage in April.
From January to June this year, 229 students of primary, middle and high schools in Japan committed suicides, exceeding the number of suicide cases in the same period of last year.
Whenever such a tragic fact related to children is open to the public, the Japanese authorities often promise "improvement" while talking about "gigantic" plans such as "strategy for future of children".
But the plight of children is getting worse owing to social evils and they abandon even their dream of learning and choice death.
The reality goes to prove that the "organizer" of the tragic crime of leading children to commit suicide is none other than the Japanese authorities and social system.
Japan in which the jungle law is rampant even in the sacred campus is, indeed, a tundra of human rights without future. -0-

headline: Spokesperson for Foreign Ministry of DPRK Gives Answers
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Tuesday as regards the fact that Israel's recent large-scale military attack and terrorist acts against Lebanon caused huge casualties:
Israel is resorting to massacre, terrorism and assassination, talking about the "right to self-defence" and "security". Its brutality and shamelessness are arousing great hatred and resentment of the international community.
It is a hideous war crime and unethical crime that Israel killed many civilians by committing indiscriminate military attack and terrorist acts against Lebanon.
Not content with the thrice-cursed massacre that stunned the world people in Gaza Strip of Palestine, Israel which is now encroaching upon the right of the Arab people to existence in the Middle East including Lebanon and the U.S. manipulating it are, indeed, the cancer-like entities of regional peace and stability and the common enemy of the Arab people.
The key to ensuring durable peace in the region of the Middle East is to guarantee the legitimate national right of the Palestinian people to establishing an independent state and put an end to Israel's invasion and hostile acts against the Arab countries as soon as possible.
We strongly denounce Israel which is expanding its large-scale massacre of innocent civilians to the whole Middle East and the organizational heinous terrorist acts of the U.S. which guards the former, and express invariable support and solidarity to the Arab people in their struggle for defending sovereignty, right to existence and territorial integrity. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to General Secretary of C.C., CPC
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greeting to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), on October 1.
The message said:
General Secretary,
I extend warm congratulations to General Secretary and, through you, to the CPC, the government of the PRC and all the Chinese people on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea, the government of the DPRK and the Korean people, on the occasion of the 75th founding anniversary of the PRC.
Over the past 75 years since the founding of the new China, the Chinese people have actively pushed ahead with the building of socialism with Chinese characteristics, overcoming all trials and challenges of history under the leadership of the CPC, and the overall national power and international prestige of the PRC are growing stronger day by day.
In particular, great successes are being made in the course of advance to thoroughly implement the spirit of the 20th Congress of the CPC and build a modern socialist country comprehensively.
We are convinced that the Chinese people will achieve the second century target without fail, firmly united around the CPC with General Secretary as its core.
It is the consistent stand of our Party and the government of the Republic to steadily consolidate and develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
I believe that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger in conformity with the requirements of the new era and the aspirations and desire of the peoples of the two countries.
I wish the PRC prosperity and the Chinese people happiness. -0-

headline: Spokesperson for Foreign Ministry of DPRK Gives Answers
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Tuesday as regards the fact that Israel's recent large-scale military attack and terrorist acts against Lebanon caused huge casualties:
Israel is resorting to massacre, terrorism and assassination, talking about the "right to self-defence" and "security". Its brutality and shamelessness are arousing great hatred and resentment of the international community.
It is a hideous war crime and unethical crime that Israel killed many civilians by committing indiscriminate military attack and terrorist acts against Lebanon.
Not content with the thrice-cursed massacre that stunned the world people in Gaza Strip of Palestine, Israel which is now encroaching upon the right of the Arab people to existence in the Middle East including Lebanon and the U.S. manipulating it are, indeed, the cancer-like entities of regional peace and stability and the common enemy of the Arab people.
The key to ensuring durable peace in the region of the Middle East is to guarantee the legitimate national right of the Palestinian people to establishing an independent state and put an end to Israel's invasion and hostile acts against the Arab countries as soon as possible.
We strongly denounce Israel which is expanding its large-scale massacre of innocent civilians to the whole Middle East and the organizational heinous terrorist acts of the U.S. which guards the former, and express invariable support and solidarity to the Arab people in their struggle for defending sovereignty, right to existence and territorial integrity. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Meets Players and Coaches Who Won 2024 FIFA U-20 Women’s World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK’s laudable girl football players, who were welcomed by their motherland as victorious heroes after demonstrating the dignity and mettle of their great state before the world by winning gold medals, greeted a moment of joy and happiness to be cherished as an honour throughout their life.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, met the players and coaches who won the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women’s World Cup at the headquarters building of the WPK Central Committee on September 30.
Present there were Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and Sin Yong Chol, secretary of the DPRK Football Association.
Entering the yard of the Party Central Committee with the proud winners’ trophy and gold medals, the players and coaches were filled with boundless reverence and gratitude for the benevolent father, who gave them matchless strength and courage to make sure that they always run with confidence in sure victory in the fierce matches for glorifying the honour of their motherland, and bestowed warm blessings and great favours, giving credit to them for all the successes.
When the respected ComradeKim Jong Unappeared, the players and coaches broke into cheers of “Hurrah!” in tears of great emotion and rushed to him, whom they wanted to see so much.
The fatherly Marshal gladly received the proud daughters of the country, and congratulated them on creating another legendary tale about the DPRK’s women football by beating their strong rivals of Austria, Brazil, the US, Japan and other countries, scoring 25 amazing goals in seven matches from the group league matches to the finals of the world cup.
In particular, he highly praised Choe Il Son who won the Golden Ball award for the most valuable player and Golden Boot award for the top scorer in the championships, and senior coach Ri Song Ho who led the team to victory after victory.
He said that the proud victory won by our girl footballers, bearing in mind the expectations of the country and the people, serves as an encouraging event and patriotic deed that added optimism and joy to the whole country.
Sports is very great meaningful in promoting the progress and advantages of the nation, he said, adding that every precious success made by the DPRK’s sportspersons in international games is further uniting the people and dynamically arousing them to the vigorous struggle with characteristic appeal and influence.
He warmly wished that the players, who displayed the bright prospect of the DPRK’s women football, would firmly hold the Asian and world championship titles and further consolidate their position.
In congratulation of them, he had a picture taken with them, who had the glory and fortune of having given a great joy and optimism to all the people across the country.
Unable to repress their deep emotion at the great love and trust shown by the fatherly Marshal, the players and coaches made a firm determination to bring more gold medals and brilliant gold trophies of patriotism to the glorious DPRK, their motherland. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Meets Players and Coaches Who Won 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's laudable women football players who were welcomed by their motherland as victorious heroines after demonstrating the dignity and spirit of the great state before the world by winning gold medals greeted the time of joy and happiness to be cherished as the honor of their life.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, met the players and coaches who won the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup at the headquarters building of the WPK Central Committee on September 30.
Present there were Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and Sin Yong Chol, secretary of the DPRK Football Association.
Entering the yard of the Party Central Committee with a proud trophy cup and gold medals, the players and coaches were filled with the boundless reverence and gratitude for the benevolent father who gave the matchless strength and courage to them to make sure that they always run with confidence in certain victory in the fierce matches for glorifying the honor of their motherland, and bestowed warm blessings and great favors, giving credit to them for all successes.
When the respected ComradeKim Jong Unappeared, the players and coaches broke into cheers of "Hurrah!" in tears of emotion and moved into the arms of him whom they wanted to see so much.
The fatherly Marshal gladly received the proud daughters of the country, and congratulated them on creating another legendary tale about the DPRK's women football by beating their rivals of Austria, Brazil, the U.S., Japan and other countries, scoring 25 amazing goals in seven matches from the group league matches to the finals of the world cup.
In particular, he highly praised player Choe Il Son who won the Gold Ball Prize, the one for the top player, and Gold Football Boots Prize, the one for the top scorer in the world cup, and chief coach Ri Song Ho who led the team to victory after victory.
He said that the proud victory won by our women footballers, bearing in mind the expectation of the country and its people, serves as an encouraging event and patriotic deed that added optimism and joy to the whole country.
Sports is of a very great meaning in promoting the progress and advantages of the nation, he said, adding that every precious success made by the DPRK's sportspersons in international games is further uniting the people and dynamically arousing them to the vigorous struggle with peculiar appeal and influence.
He warmly wished that the players who showed a bright prospect of the DPRK's women football would firmly hold the Asian and world championships and further consolidate their position.
He had a significant picture taken with the women footballers who had the glory and fortune giving a great joy and optimism to all the people across the country.
Unable to repress their deep emotion at the great love and trust shown by the fatherly Marshal, the players and coaches made a firm determination to bring more gold medals and brilliant gold trophies of patriotism to the glorious DPRK, their motherland. -0-

headline: International Day of Older Persons Marked in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Colorful sports and cultural activities are going on in the DPRK to mark International Day of Older Persons (October 1).
The aged people across the country spend a pleasant and happy time, recollecting their youthful days.
In the DPRK the aged people are leading a happy life thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on the care of the aged.
As the people-oriented policies of the state which takes care of the life and health of the aged are being enforced invariably, the right and interests of the revolutionary forerunners including war veterans and persons of distinguished services as the aged are ensured and they are leading a worthwhile and happy life in good health.
As the living environment of the aged is improving day by day and the number of macrobians increases, advantageous policies are enforced such as protecting them, introducing their experience and giving more social benefits to the aged of over 90.
This year alone, the number of centenarians enjoying a happy life in good health is increasing day by day, adding pleasure to the large socialist family.
Sanatoriums for war veterans and old people's homes have been built across the country, so that they are respected as revolutionary forerunners and elders under the care of the society.
The aged people of the DPRK are displaying patriotism, while doing good things by themselves in order to repay the benefits of the Party and the state. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Vice-Minister of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Kang Il, vice-minister of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Tuesday issued the following press statement titled "The U.S. reckless military bluff and moves for escalating tensions will only increase security instability of its mainland":
Pentagon's confrontational attempt to permanently deploy nuclear strategic assets to the Korean peninsula and its vicinities to intentionally demonstrate the "upperhand in strength" and put military pressure on the sovereign states in the region is being manifested in a diverse way.
Shortly ago, the latest nuclear submarine of the U.S. Navy openly revealed its shape at Pusan Port of the ROK. And, this time, B-1B bomber, one of the three air strategic assets of the U.S. Air Force, will be reportedly to fly in the sky above the Korean peninsula and conduct a demonstration flight, timed to coincide with a military parade on the “ROK army day”.
The U.S. bluffing military demonstration is nothing but a "hallucinant" to save even a bit its military face driven into a strategic disadvantage in the Korean peninsula and calm down a sense of collapse of its stooge having a poor sleep at night from chronic nuclear phobia.
In June the U.S. B-1Bs flew over the sky of the Korean peninsula to stage a joint air drill with military gangsters of the ROK and a precision guided bomb dropping drill for the first time in several years. And nuclear carrier Theodore Roosevelt entered the Pusan operational base to insist on the "combined defence posture" and "demonstration of extended deterrence". All those facts clearly show where the intemperate hysteric confrontation racket of the ROK is based on.
The Korean People's Army (KPA) is keenly watching the frequent deployment of U.S. strategic assets and their traces in the Korean peninsula and is fully ready to thoroughly defend the security environment of the state from any threat.
It is the invariable stand of KPA that the U.S. which is seized with violence and high-handed practices, should be governed from the stand of strength.
Now that the U.S. unannounced deployment of strategic assets has fixed as an incurable bad habit, a measure of unpredictable strategic nature corresponding to it should be an inevitable and legitimate right of a sovereign state, and fresh methods of adding serious concern to the security of the U.S. mainland should be surely produced.
We can examine such fresh action plans any time and carry them out.
The armed forces of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the military provocative acts of the hostile forces escalated in three dimensions in the Korean peninsula and its vicinities, but take a thoroughgoing action corresponding to them and steadily improve their powerful war deterrent capable of initiatively coping with any instable situation of security caused by the U.S. irresponsible acts. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to General Secretary of CPC Central Committee
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, sent a message of congratulations to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People’s Republic of China, on October 1.
In the message he extended warm congratulations to the Chinese president and, through him, to the CPC, the government of the PRC and all the Chinese people on behalf of the Workers’ Party of Korea, the government of the DPRK and the Korean people, on the occasion of the 75th founding anniversary of the PRC. He continued:
Over the past 75 years since the founding of the new China, the Chinese people have actively pushed ahead with the building of socialism with Chinese characteristics, overcoming all trials and challenges of history under the leadership of the CPC, and the overall national strength and international prestige of the PRC are growing stronger day by day.
In particular, great successes are being made in the course of advance to thoroughly implement the spirit of the 20th Congress of the CPC and comprehensively build a modern socialist country.
I am convinced that the Chinese people will attain the second centenary goal without fail, firmly united around the CPC with you, the General Secretary, as its core.
It is the consistent stand of the WPK and the government of the DPRK to steadily consolidate and develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
I believe that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger in conformity with the requirements of the new era and the aspirations and desires of the peoples of the two countries.
I wish the PRC prosperity and the Chinese people happiness.-0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Tuesday as regards the fact that Israel's recent large-scale military attack and terrorist acts against Lebanon caused huge casualties:
Israel is resorting to massacre, terrorism and assassination, talking about the "right to self-defence" and "security". Its brutality and shamelessness are arousing great hatred and resentment of the international community.

headline: Different Economic Sectors of DPRK Focus Efforts on Readjustment and Reinforcement
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Different economic sectors of the DPRK are directing efforts to readjustment and reinforcement for improving the national productivity.
The chemical industry sector is now striving to timely carry out its plan for readjustment and reinforcement to be completed until this year.
The Ministry of Chemical Industry has discussed the ways for carrying out the projects for readjustment and reinforcement under a sure scientific guarantee and taken measures.
Many units in the machine-building industry sector are working hard to produce and supply machines and accessories in a qualitative way and by the appointed time so as to help relevant sectors attain their goals for readjustment and reinforcement.
The Ministry of Mining Industry has also assign to mines and smelteries the projects for remodeling and dispatched its officials to worksites to take measures, learning about whether the assignments specified in the plans are carried out. -0-

headline: My Home
Ryongmun Cavern in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- At the foot of Mt Ryongmun in Kujang County, North Phyongan Province of the DPRK, there is the Ryongmun Cavern known as the underground scenery unparalleled in the world.
The entrance of the cavern is about 302 meters above sea level and it is surrounded by thick forests.
The section of the cavern is not long but has graceful and splendid karst objects.
Two streams of white falls resembling Isonnam Falls of Mt Myohyang drop from rock walls of various colors, and there are on the ceiling a "dolphin" running up to the sky with a joy after seeing the rare Ryongmun Carven and a "squid" drawing the interest of visitors while hanging its legs long.
The Phungnyon Tower at the Phungnyon Village bringing the feeling of rich harvest is a stalagmite like grain stack. In front of the tower are a "female farmer" taking an ear of corn in her hand and stalagmites such as ears of millets and kaoliangs hanging under eaves.
The scenery of the Sokhwa Village representing the snow scene, ornamented with white frost flowers, is also arousing the administration of all people.
There are in the Ansim Cave a "seagull' of Mt Chilbo, a famous mountain in the East Sea, that is unable to leave for the ecstasy and a "peacock" seen as if it folds its beautiful wings.
The Ryongyon Cave where "ever-agarics" grow delicious-looking and the Jangsok Village where long and wide rocks layer like visors add beauty to the mysterious Ryongmun Carven.
The Ryongmun Cavern with the fantastic scenery has been spruced up under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea, contributing to the cultural and emotional life of the people. -0-

headline: International Day of Older Persons Marked in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Colorful sports and cultural activities are going on in the DPRK to mark International Day of Older Persons (October 1).
The aged people across the country spend a pleasant and happy time, recollecting their youthful days.
In the DPRK the aged people are leading a happy life thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on the care of the aged.
As the people-oriented policies of the state which takes care of the life and health of the aged are being enforced invariably, the right and interests of the revolutionary forerunners including war veterans and persons of distinguished services as the aged are ensured and they are leading a worthwhile and happy life in good health.
As the living environment of the aged is improving day by day and the number of macrobians increases, advantageous policies are enforced such as protecting them, introducing their experience and giving more social benefits to the aged of over 90.
This year alone, the number of centenarians enjoying a happy life in good health is increasing day by day, adding pleasure to the large socialist family.
Sanatoriums for war veterans and old people's homes have been built across the country, so that they are respected as revolutionary forerunners and elders under the care of the society.
The aged people of the DPRK are displaying patriotism, while doing good things by themselves in order to repay the benefits of the Party and the state. -0-

headline: Frontline-style Motivation Activities Brisk in Theatres for Rehabilitating Flood-hit Areas of Jagang Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The frontline-style motivation activities are now going on in the drive for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas of Jagang Province of the DPRK.
Since the rehabilitation project started, tens of units including art troupes and mobile artistic motivation teams in Pyongyang and local areas have encouraged the builders and working people through more than 5 000 frontline-style motivation activities.
Artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe deeply instilled into the builders the noble outlook on the people of the Workers' Party of Korea which defends and glorifies the dignity and interests of the people, and further encouraged their enthusiasm.
The performers of the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Ministry of National Defence sang in high praises of the indomitable spirit of the strong army which is ready to flatten even a mountain and empty a sea once it is ordered by the Workers' Party of Korea to do so.
Artistes of the central artistic information team for increased production, the artistic information team of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the railway artistic information team further encouraged the offensive spirit of the members of the Party regiments at the construction sites.
Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School and the February 16 Kanggye Art School helped the builders and working people harden their confidence in the future to be more highly civilized with their songs and narrative works.
Members of a motivation team for increased production comprising officials of the Pyongyang Municipal Committee of the WPK went to the construction site of the Pyongyang Municipal Regiment of Party Members to rev up the atmosphere of the construction site through dynamic artistic activities.
Artistes of artistic information teams in provinces and mobile artistic motivation teams in cities and counties are also conducting information activities by loudspeaker vans and artistic motivation activities. -0-

headline: Looking round Historical Relics in Pakyon Area
First National Conference of Officials of Personnel Administration Sector Held
New Finishing Building-materials Production Bases Built in Every Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- New finishing building-materials production bases have been built or expanded in every province of the DPRK.
North Hwanghae Province built the Kyongam Tile Factory.
The design team completed the design on a high level in line with the trend of the development of the building-materials industry, and the technical forces of the province settled technical problems arising in putting the production processes into a modern basis, and thus established the production processes in a streamlined way.
North Hamgyong Province has turned the Chongjin Wood Processing Factory into a comprehensive base for producing wooden products, making it possible to supply more wooden products needed at the construction sites of rural houses and other sites of the province.
Kangwon Province has set the goal of turning the Anbyon Ceramic Factory into a comprehensive building-materials production base capable of mass-producing sanitary  ware along with various kinds of tiles.
Meanwhile, production buildings with modern equipment and advanced production processes are being built one after another in different provinces, cities and counties. -0-

headline: International Day of Older Persons Observed in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Old persons in the DPRK greeted International Day of Older Persons with joy.
Congratulatory performances and sports and amusements contests took place in Pyongyang Municipality and other parts of the country, together with specific service at public catering and welfare service establishments.
Old persons, including war veterans and meritorious persons in the municipality, enjoyed an opera "Eternal Victors" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
Old people from flood-hit areas, who are staying in Pyongyang under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state, spent a pleasant time on International Day of Older Persons.
Public catering establishments, including Okryu, Chongryu and Hyangmanru restaurants, served various kinds of dishes to old persons.
The old people in different parts of the country enjoyed the day through diverse cultural and emotional life. -0-

headline: 2024 Top Ten IT Model Units Selected in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) --Kim Il SungUniversity, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the electronic trade development company of the Ministry of External Economic Relations, the Chollima Tile Factory, the Saegil Farm in Sinchon County, Pyongyang Teachers Training College, Moranbong Secondary School No. 1, the Taedonggang Beer Factory, the Songdowon General Foodstuff Factory and Okryu Restaurant were selected as the 2024 Top Ten IT Model Units.
Those units have made substantial successes in increasing production, improving the quality of products and optimizing management activities as their leading officials are pushing ahead with the IT work on their own initiative in a responsible manner.
Most of them have been selected as the second, third and fourth top ten IT model units. -0-

headline: New Finishing Building-materials Production Bases Built in Every Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- New finishing building-materials production bases have been built or expanded in every province of the DPRK.
North Hwanghae Province built the Kyongam Tile Factory.
The design team completed the design on a high level in line with the trend of the development of the building-materials industry, and the technical forces of the province settled technical problems arising in putting the production processes into a modern basis, and thus established the production processes in a streamlined way.
North Hamgyong Province has turned the Chongjin Wood Processing Factory into a comprehensive base for producing wooden products, making it possible to supply more wooden products needed at the construction sites of rural houses and other sites of the province.
Kangwon Province has set the goal of turning the Anbyon Ceramic Factory into a comprehensive building-materials production base capable of mass-producing sanitary  ware along with various kinds of tiles.
Meanwhile, production buildings with modern equipment and advanced production processes are being built one after another in different provinces, cities and counties. -0-

headline: Activities of February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians dispatched to the non-permanent central committee for promoting the Regional Development 20×10 Policy is intensifying its activities.
The shock brigade is solving sci-tech problems arising in manufacturing trial products of equipment which would be furnished at the regional-industry factories to be built this year, and in their test operation, normal operation and supply of raw materials.
It also conducted a workshop of hundreds of business members on selecting Evodia daniellii Benn high in production in different cities and counties and introduced a system of supporting the decision-making in the creation of "gold mountains" and a system of supporting the prediction of landslide occurrence suited to the specific characters of the relevant regions.
And it is solving scientific and technological problems arising in the reality in a mobile way.
Meanwhile, it has trained skilled workers and disseminated advanced scientific and technological data in a responsible manner and completed the question and answer writing on technical skills. -0-

headline: Rice Harvesting and Threshing in Full Swing in North Hwanghae Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers in North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK have turned out in harvesting to successfully conclude this year's farming.
Farms in Pongsan and Kumchon counties mobilized and concentrated all their forces and means on harvesting.
Agricultural workers in Thosan and Unpha counties have taken foresighted measures to prevent grain loss and decay.
Farms in Sariwon City and Sangwon County have surveyed the ripening rate of crops in every field and by species of crops and arranged the inter-process cooperation carefully.
Similar successes are made in Songrim City and Hwangju, Phyongsan and Sungho counties. -0-

headline: Activity of Scientific Farming Promotion Team Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The scientific farming promotion team in the DPRK has directed big efforts to increasing the grain yield this year.
Its members conducted on-site technical course and passing-on technique in cities and counties to minimize the flooding damage and prevent major damage by harmful insects on crops, thus providing a guarantee for high and stable yield.
The team is carrying out an objective and accurate estimate of rice and maize yield in the whole country at the final stage by using satellite information analysis and crop growth simulation technologies.
The dissemination of agricultural science and technology has been conducted in a vigorous way.
The team organized a tele-technical consultative meeting several times and provided real-time questioning and answering service through an agricultural science and technology service system. And it made it possible to immediately take measures for the problems arising at worksites. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Spokesperson for DPRK NCC for Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Financing of Terrorism
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the National Coordinating Committee (NCC) of the DPRK for Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism released the following press statement on October 3:
The Asia-Pacific Group on Money Laundering decided to deprive the DPRK of its observer position at the APG's 26th general assembly held in the United Arab Emirates on September 24.
The reason why the DPRK joined the group as an observer was to clearly show that it has nothing to do with all sorts of crimes, including money laundering and fomentation of terrorism.
The transparency of the DPRK was proved objectively and fully through the sincere implementation of its obligations, including its accession to the UN Convention against Transnational Organized Crime in 2016 and the amendment and supplement of its domestic law on anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism after it joined the group.
However, the group which yielded to and followed in the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to deprive the DPRK of its normal rights to development at any cost has persistently turned its face away from the sincere efforts and transparent measures taken by the DPRK.
In particular, the group has designated the DPRK as a "state subject to countermeasures" every year since 2011 under the pressure of the U.S., which has groundlessly branded it as the "money laundering criminal state" and the "state sponsor of terrorism", and has forced other countries to ban all financial transactions with the DPRK.
The decision of the group to deprive the DPRK of its position as an observer is an inevitable result pursuant to the hostile policy of the U.S. considering the independent and just sovereign states as a thorn in its flesh.
This proves that the group, which should have promoted the sound development of international relations and the regional peace and security, has turned into a mouthpiece group playing at the hands of the U.S. keen on realizing world domination.
We have no regret that we have not held intercourse with the group which has been reduced to a political tool of the U.S.
The DPRK has a consistent principled stand against money laundering and financing of terrorism and it will continue to strive for it. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Thursday:
- Successes have been made in different economic sectors.
- A reception was given to welcome the DPRK women's football team which won the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to Ri Jae Ryong, an indomitable patriotic fighter.
- The 2024 Intellectual Property Development Exhibition opened.

Rodong Sinmun
- An article says that the Workers' Party of Korea is the great motherly Party upholding the people with its devoted service and good results.
- Another article notes that the imperialists' ever-escalating moves for aggression are the last-ditch efforts to foresee their downfall.

Minju Joson
- An article deals with the days of September when all-people patriotic enthusiasm was considerably enhanced. -0-

headline: Work for Breeding Yellow Corbina Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Fisheries in the DPRK is pushing ahead with the project to breed yellow corbina.
The ministry has directed attention to forming the commanding forces for the construction of spawning pond of yellow corbina and supplying necessary materials, while intensifying its control and guidance so that the project is carried out as required by the design, technical regulations and construction methods.
It dispatched researchers of the Institute of Fisheries to the spot and has provided conditions for them to solve sci-tech problems related to the artificial propagation of yellow corbina.
The construction of the spawning pond is progressing apace. Relevant units under the South Hwanghae Provincial Fishery Management Bureau are stepping up the construction of more than 10 major buildings, including the office building, welfare building and fry breeding grounds and settling ponds, at the final stage.
Researchers of the Institute of Fisheries are striving to perfect the technology of artificial propagation. -0-

headline: WPK Is Great Motherly Party: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article that all the people's absolute trust in the Workers' Party of Korea is based on its noble people-first political idea.
Thanks to the WPK, the political and ideological might of Juche Korea has been consolidated a thousand fold and the ideal society where the people will enjoy happiness is being clearly blueprinted, the article says, and goes on:
The WPK is a great party which regards it as its mode of existence and climate to make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
The greatest love for the people and the supreme service to them are to train all of them into fully developed independent and creative ones. Herein lies the fundamental secret how the WPK has adorned the long course of journey with victory and glory without any twists and turns and stalemate, braving the historical turns and watersheds.
The WPK has enforced the most advantageous socialist policy, reflecting the simple voice of the people in its lines and policies, and has built a series of new places of civilization to lead the people to a new civilization and a new life. Its energetic leadership trained the Korean people into the great people single-mindedly united around it and with strong self-respect and creativity.
The legendary practical ability of the WPK, which brings about perfect fruition in a short span of time with the unprecedented efforts, if the people wishes, is creating a series of wonderful entities desired by the people on this land and bringing happiness into full bloom.
It is the firm will of the DPRK people that they will greet all glory and happiness as they are led by the boundlessly benevolent WPK which upholds the people with the most positive and self-sacrificing devotion. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Spokesperson for DPRK NCC for Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Financing of Terrorism
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the National Coordinating Committee (NCC) of the DPRK for Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism released the following press statement on October 3:
The Asia-Pacific Group on Money Laundering decided to deprive the DPRK of its observer position at the APG's 26th general assembly held in the United Arab Emirates on September 24.
The reason why the DPRK joined the group as an observer was to clearly show that it has nothing to do with all sorts of crimes, including money laundering and fomentation of terrorism.
The transparency of the DPRK was proved objectively and fully through the sincere implementation of its obligations, including its accession to the UN Convention against Transnational Organized Crime in 2016 and the amendment and supplement of its domestic law on anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism after it joined the group.
However, the group which yielded to and followed in the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to deprive the DPRK of its normal rights to development at any cost has persistently turned its face away from the sincere efforts and transparent measures taken by the DPRK.
In particular, the group has designated the DPRK as a "state subject to countermeasures" every year since 2011 under the pressure of the U.S., which has groundlessly branded it as the "money laundering criminal state" and the "state sponsor of terrorism", and has forced other countries to ban all financial transactions with the DPRK.
The decision of the group to deprive the DPRK of its position as an observer is an inevitable result pursuant to the hostile policy of the U.S. considering the independent and just sovereign states as a thorn in its flesh.
This proves that the group, which should have promoted the sound development of international relations and the regional peace and security, has turned into a mouthpiece group playing at the hands of the U.S. keen on realizing world domination.
We have no regret that we have not held intercourse with the group which has been reduced to a political tool of the U.S.
The DPRK has a consistent principled stand against money laundering and financing of terrorism and it will continue to strive for it. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Thursday:
- Successes have been made in different economic sectors.
- A reception was given to welcome the DPRK women's football team which won the 2024 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.

Rodong Sinmun

Minju Joson
- An article deals with the days of September when all-people patriotic enthusiasm was considerably enhanced. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of C.C., WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement on Thursday:
The sound of a hollow drum is louder.
Empty vessels make the greatest sound. An event marking the "ROK Armed Forces' Day" held in Seoul on Tuesday was like it.
This time the ROK invited lots of cohorts and staged a series of such farces as ceremony and street march to commemorate the "ROK Armed Forces' Day".
It displayed more than 80 kinds of military hardware, including the "three-axis system" and manned or unmanned weapon system, talking with all rhetoric about the appearance of "a strong national army" and "demonstration of deterrent against the north".
To say a word about such event, it was no more than a foolish farce, with neither trace nor echo like that a group of curs passed across a stream.
However, that event was so loudly advertised by the ROK. So, I am going to comment on it with a few sentences.
Really distinctive was that a U.S. forces' B-1B strategic bomber appeared as the main player of the event and reviewed the ROK army.
Amid the U.S. B-1B strategic bomber flying over Seoul, the military chief of the ROK and his stooges and the three services of the puppet armed forces were courteously lining up to pay regards to it. The scene was so pitiful to see alone. It may be unique in the world military parade history and the best scene that can be produced only in the colonial ROK.
Great irony is that, not content with the B-1B, the puppets put on the stage an odd monster called "Hyonmu-5" ballistic missile, embellished with absurd sophism that it is little short of a tactical nuclear weapon class as its warhead weights eight tons.
Perhaps, the ROK puppets have a strange way of thinking that a conventional warhead, if its powder increases in weight, can be transformed into a nuclear warhead.
It may be appropriate for demonstration or appeasement, but the world people cannot but question about its military use.
Who would make such a "huge cart" for the launch of merely eight-ton warhead. The reason is that it only looks like a monster to launch the eight-ton warhead.
I can simply explain the military effectiveness and might of our multiple rocket launchers by comparison with it.
The launching capacity of our one multiple rocket launcher, which is not equal to half the size of the "deformed cart", is calculated to be equal to 900 tons of explosive power in terms of the explosive capacity of a conventional warhead.
If a man has a certain degree of common sense, he could not talk about the "end of regime" of someone with a weapon of worthless large bulk.
They must know the shame.
If it had not been opened to public, the "mysterious ghost weapon" would have been more effective in propaganda.
However desperately they may try to show that they are not being pushed back from the confrontation of strength, this is a foolish act before the nuclear weapons state. And they proved by themselves once again that they can never cross the wall of inferiority in strength, the fate of a non-nuclear weapon state.
Media boasted of the transporter erector launcher's mobile ability of sidewise movement, which is only a necessary function when parking.
Next, let us mention Yoon Suk Yeol's remarks that the event was more significant with the establishment of a "strategic command" of the ROK.
The group, which has failed to possess a single strategic weapon, cooked up the "strategic command". This is little short of a mange-affected dog wearing a helmet.
No matter how much the dog may wear helmets, it can't be a tiger or a lion.
Nevertheless, Yoon clamored in full tide of passion that they have a "core strategic force giving faith and trust to the population". It is nothing but a hungry dog barking with joy of getting a bone.
Yoon, who entrusted the security to his master and bragged about his strength by relying on it, had been a little naïve in my view.
Tragedy is that Yoon could not realize at all that all the recent despicable behaviors are hastening the time-table for self-destruction.
Though the head of our state put a precondition of the word "if", he re-clarified the stand to use all the offensive forces of the country without hesitation if the ROK attempts a military confrontation with the DPRK, being overconfident of the ROK-U.S. alliance.
The confrontation outcry, raised by Yoon Suk Yeol with war fever this time, is no more than a last-ditch scream of a guy at death's door.
Even if he was mad over bluffing, it was none other than an exposure of anxious and impatient psychology without filtering.
What the ROK clans clearly showed through the recent farce from the beginning to the end is that the ROK, trained completely into a cheap mercenary of the U.S. and reduced to a bullet-shield for realizing its master's ambition for hegemony, is fearlessly dashing into the bottomless pit of downfall, together with the U.S. falling into decay and ruin with each passing day.
Then, the world people will surely comment on it. Is the event marking the ROK "army day" a "boast of strength" by the group of curs or a funeral procession of colonial mercenary army?
The answer is clear. -0-

headline: Work for Breeding Yellow Corbina Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Fisheries in the DPRK is pushing ahead with the project to breed yellow corbina.
The ministry has directed attention to forming the commanding forces for the construction of spawning pond of yellow corbina and supplying necessary materials, while intensifying its control and guidance so that the project is carried out as required by the design, technical regulations and construction methods.
It dispatched researchers of the Institute of Fisheries to the spot and has provided conditions for them to solve sci-tech problems related to the artificial propagation of yellow corbina.
The construction of the spawning pond is progressing apace. Relevant units under the South Hwanghae Provincial Fishery Management Bureau are stepping up the construction of more than 10 major buildings, including the office building, welfare building and fry breeding grounds and settling ponds, at the final stage.
Researchers of the Institute of Fisheries are striving to perfect the technology of artificial propagation. -0-

headline: Birthday Spread to Patriotic Fighter
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to Ri Jae Ryong on his 80th birthday on October 2.
The birthday spread reflects the loving care of the motherly Workers' Party of Korea wishing that Ri, who had kept his revolutionary principles to the end with high loyalty and clear conscientiousness to the Party and the revolution, would enjoy good health in his old ages.
Born into a poor peasant family before the liberation of Korea, Ri fought resolutely on the road of genuine patriotism and worthwhile struggle for the country.
Our Party has paid close attention to him so that he could lead a worthwhile life as a patriotic fighter in good health under the socialist benefits and invited him as a delegate and special guest to important national events and gave him endless glory.
Deeply moved by the great benevolence ofKim Jong Un, Ri and his family and relatives hardened their firm will to invariably advance along the road of loyalty and patriotism to contribute to the comprehensive prosperity and development of our socialist state, keeping in mind the Party's loving care growing deeper with each passing day. -0-
