Amid the U.S. B-1B strategic bomber flying over Seoul, the military chief of the ROK and his stooges and the three services of the puppet armed forces were courteously lining up to pay regards to it. The scene was so pitiful to see alone. It may be unique in the world military parade history and the best scene that can be produced only in the colonial ROK.
Great irony is that, not content with the B-1B, the puppets put on the stage an odd monster called "Hyonmu-5" ballistic missile, embellished with absurd sophism that it is little short of a tactical nuclear weapon class as its warhead weights eight tons.
Perhaps, the ROK puppets have a strange way of thinking that a conventional warhead, if its powder increases in weight, can be transformed into a nuclear warhead.
It may be appropriate for demonstration or appeasement, but the world people cannot but question about its military use.
Who would make such a "huge cart" for the launch of merely eight-ton warhead. The reason is that it only looks like a monster to launch the eight-ton warhead.
I can simply explain the military effectiveness and might of our multiple rocket launchers by comparison with it.
The launching capacity of our one multiple rocket launcher, which is not equal to half the size of the "deformed cart", is calculated to be equal to 900 tons of explosive power in terms of the explosive capacity of a conventional warhead.
If a man has a certain degree of common sense, he could not talk about the "end of regime" of someone with a weapon of worthless large bulk.
They must know the shame.
If it had not been opened to public, the "mysterious ghost weapon" would have been more effective in propaganda.
However desperately they may try to show that they are not being pushed back from the confrontation of strength, this is a foolish act before the nuclear weapons state. And they proved by themselves once again that they can never cross the wall of inferiority in strength, the fate of a non-nuclear weapon state.
Media boasted of the transporter erector launcher's mobile ability of sidewise movement, which is only a necessary function when parking.
Next, let us mention Yoon Suk Yeol's remarks that the event was more significant with the establishment of a "strategic command" of the ROK.
The group, which has failed to possess a single strategic weapon, cooked up the "strategic command". This is little short of a mange-affected dog wearing a helmet.
No matter how much the dog may wear helmets, it can't be a tiger or a lion.
Nevertheless, Yoon clamored in full tide of passion that they have a "core strategic force giving faith and trust to the population". It is nothing but a hungry dog barking with joy of getting a bone.
Yoon, who entrusted the security to his master and bragged about his strength by relying on it, had been a little naïve in my view.
Tragedy is that Yoon could not realize at all that all the recent despicable behaviors are hastening the time-table for self-destruction.
Though the head of our state put a precondition of the word "if", he re-clarified the stand to use all the offensive forces of the country without hesitation if the ROK attempts a military confrontation with the DPRK, being overconfident of the ROK-U.S. alliance.
The confrontation outcry, raised by Yoon Suk Yeol with war fever this time, is no more than a last-ditch scream of a guy at death's door.
Even if he was mad over bluffing, it was none other than an exposure of anxious and impatient psychology without filtering.
What the ROK clans clearly showed through the recent farce from the beginning to the end is that the ROK, trained completely into a cheap mercenary of the U.S. and reduced to a bullet-shield for realizing its master's ambition for hegemony, is fearlessly dashing into the bottomless pit of downfall, together with the U.S. falling into decay and ruin with each passing day.
Then, the world people will surely comment on it. Is the event marking the ROK "army day" a "boast of strength" by the group of curs or a funeral procession of colonial mercenary army?
The answer is clear. -0-

headline: Intellectual Property Development Exhibition Opens in DPRK
WPK Is Great Motherly Party: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article that all the people's absolute trust in the Workers' Party of Korea is based on its noble people-first political idea.
Thanks to the WPK, the political and ideological might of Juche Korea has been consolidated a thousand fold and the ideal society where the people will enjoy happiness is being clearly blueprinted, the article says, and goes on:
The WPK is a great party which regards it as its mode of existence and climate to make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
The greatest love for the people and the supreme service to them are to train all of them into fully developed independent and creative ones. Herein lies the fundamental secret how the WPK has adorned the long course of journey with victory and glory without any twists and turns and stalemate, braving the historical turns and watersheds.
The WPK has enforced the most advantageous socialist policy, reflecting the simple voice of the people in its lines and policies, and has built a series of new places of civilization to lead the people to a new civilization and a new life. Its energetic leadership trained the Korean people into the great people single-mindedly united around it and with strong self-respect and creativity.
The legendary practical ability of the WPK, which brings about perfect fruition in a short span of time with the unprecedented efforts, if the people wishes, is creating a series of wonderful entities desired by the people on this land and bringing happiness into full bloom.
It is the firm will of the DPRK people that they will greet all glory and happiness as they are led by the boundlessly benevolent WPK which upholds the people with the most positive and self-sacrificing devotion. -0-

headline: Activity of Scientific Farming Promotion Team Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- The scientific farming promotion team in the DPRK has directed big efforts to increasing the grain yield this year.
Its members conducted on-site technical course and passing-on technique in cities and counties to minimize the flooding damage and prevent major damage by harmful insects on crops, thus providing a guarantee for high and stable yield.
The team is carrying out an objective and accurate estimate of rice and maize yield in the whole country at the final stage by using satellite information analysis and crop growth simulation technologies.
The dissemination of agricultural science and technology has been conducted in a vigorous way.
The team organized a tele-technical consultative meeting several times and provided real-time questioning and answering service through an agricultural science and technology service system. And it made it possible to immediately take measures for the problems arising at worksites. -0-

headline: "Hideous Crime-woven State" Is Proper Name of Japan
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Traces of Japan's blood-stained past crimes are being disclosed one after another.
Recently Russia opened to public an old document proving that Japan used germ weapons against the Soviet Union in the battles near the Khalkhin-Gol River in August 1939.
The document is a record on interrogation of a noncommissioned officer of Unit 731 captured after the battle of Khalkhin-Gol. According to it, the Japanese army committed a crime of spreading typhoid germ on several occasions by the river during the retreat to pollute the area where the Red Army units were concentrated.
The data proving the germ warfare of Japan were disclosed by testimonies of survivors in May and August.
Japan inflicted a miserable death upon innocent people through the development and use of biochemical weapons during the Second World War. This is a hideous crime against humanity that can never be covered up.
The data on the germ warfare and living-body tests of Unit 731 of the Japanese Army, which have been disclosed so far, are unprecedented in history, stunning the world people.
From 1932, the murderers conducted cruel living-body tests including human anatomy, freezing experiment and germ infusion experiment on Koreans, Chinese and Russians, and thus actively served the Japanese imperialists in realizing their ambition for the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
The dark tentacles of the Japanese war criminals obsessed with revanchism were also stretched deep to the root of the barbarous germ warfare committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean people during the last Korean War.
The chemical weapons left by the secret germ warfare units of the Imperial Japanese Army such as units 731, 100, 516 and Nami 8604 after the defeat of Japan in the occupied areas still cause serious damage to the precious lives of inhabitants and the regional ecological environment.
That's why the international community has bitterly denounced Japan for shamelessly evading its historical, political and legal responsibility that can never be shifted onto others.
The damage by biochemical crimes is to be rapidly spread to all mankind, going beyond a specific country and region.
Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries are working hard to repeat another hideous unethical crime, not content with embellishing their past crimes.
Shortly ago, they shamelessly blustered that they would discharge the nuclear-contaminated water twice additionally this year. They have already released tens of thousands of tons of nuclear-contaminated water in the Pacific from last year.
The descendants of the germ warfare criminals, who inflicted untold pain and misfortune upon the people in the region, are now working hard to make the whole world and mankind experimental fields and subjects for their purposes.
The hideous crimes against humanity which can be committed only by the barbarians under the mask of human beings are the same now as they were in the days gone.
The "hideous crime-woven state" is a proper name and pronoun of shameless Japan as an unpardonable war criminal. -0-

headline: Immortal Exploits for Developing University
Preparations for Operating Regional-industry Factories Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK is pushing ahead with the preparations for operating regional-industry factories.
Kilju and Myonggan counties are building new production buildings of raw material bases. Hoeryong City and Puryong County are applying the experience and methods created in the farming of raw materials bases and cultivating Evodia daniellii Benn, oil-chestnut and other crops.
The province ensures that the selected members from cities and counties possess higher technical knowledge and skills at the best units  for the normal operation of regional-industry factories.
It is also  enlisting officials and workers in the tele-education system of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and Chongjin University of Agriculture  and training them to be practitioners who can solve the problems arising in the management and operation of the factories. -0-

headline: WPK Translates Dream and Ideal of People into Reality
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A new era of great changes, the new world of the cultural efflorescence of socialism idealized by the DPRK people, is open in the DPRK under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
With the progress of the project for 50 000 flats in the capital city, new streets have been built every year, rural houses peculiar to regions in different parts of the country, thus radically changing the appearance of the socialist rural community, and such monumental edifices as the Kangdong Greenhouse Complex, whose modernity, cultural character and  practicality are fully ensured have been built, adding happiness to the people.
All these are a precious fruition of the political idea of believing in the people as in Heaven and devoting itself to their wellbeing and the spirit of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people by the WPK that regards the work for the promotion of their rights, interests and wellbeing as the most important state affair and spares nothing for them.
It is the firm will of the WPK that even the sky and land should be transformed for the good of the people.
The past ten-odd year-long journey is shining as the immortal course in which the leadership of the WPK which has turned countless difficulties into great victories for the good of the people has been clearly demonstrated.
The WPK built a socialist paradise on the areas hit by natural disasters in the spirit of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people, safeguarded the people's wellbeing from the worldwide malignant epidemic and built many production bases conducive to improving the people's living standard.
Today the WPK is setting a higher goal with no satisfaction from the work for the good of the people and attaining it successfully.
It advanced the Regional Development 20×10 Policy to make the people enjoy a rich and civilized life as soon as possible and has accelerated the construction of regional-industry factories in different parts of the country.
It has simultaneously pushed ahead with the construction of modern public health facilities, sci-tech dissemination bases and grain management facilities.
The DPRK people's faith that they do not fear any disaster and difficulties but the day when they are well off is sure to come as they are led by the great Party is a precious truth learnt in their life, not from books.
The words "As we have the great Party" often used by the DPRK people reflect their boundless trust in the WPK which serves and struggles for them. -0-

headline: Autumn Golf Fan Contest Held in DPRK
New Houses Built in Thosan County of North Hwanghae Province, DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- New villages have been built at the Yangsa Farm in Thosan County, North Hwanghae Province, the DPRK.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in Thosan County.
Kim Son Il, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, made an address at the ceremony. Then, licenses for the use of new house were handed over and speeches were made.
When moving into new houses began, joy of the people enjoying a new life and new civilization under the benevolence of the Workers’ Party of Korea spread dance, and the laughter and song resounded in every village.
Officials visited the families of agricultural workers moving into new houses to congratulate them. -0-

headline: Project for Ore Transport System Completed at Komdok Mining Complex of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Komdok Mining Complex in the DPRK successfully completed the project for rationally readjusting the ore transport system.
The conveyer system no. 9 and the conveyer pit no. 72, which will play an important share in ore production and prospective production, have been newly built. So, the material and technical foundations were laid to transport all the ores produced in the deep and upper areas by long-distance belt conveyors and a prospect for radically increasing the production of nonferrous metals opened up.
An inaugural ceremony of the newly-built conveyor system and conveyer pit took place at the Komdok Mining Complex on Thursday.
Present there were Ri Jong Nam, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials and employees of the General Bureau of Tanchon Area Mining Industry and the Komdok Mining Complex, the commanding officers and  members of the August 28 Youth Shock Brigade.
Ryu Kwang Myong, manager of the Komdok Mining Complex, made an inaugural address at the ceremony. -0-

headline: Construction of Sinpho City Offshore Farm Accelerated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The non-permanent central committee for promoting Regional Development 20×10 Policy in the DPRK is pushing ahead with the  construction of the Sinpho City Offshore Farm.
The committee has confirmed the equipment and materials needed for operation of the farm in  contact with commissions, ministries and national agencies and has taken measures to secure them.
It is taking measures to raise the employees' technical knowledge and skills.
It is promptly acquainting itself with the problems arising in the supply of building materials and solving them in time.
A design of building arrangement has been completed and a project for building the farm as a model of offshore farming is being propelled. -0-

headline: National Forum of Koreans in Japan Held
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The "Forum of Our Nation-2024" took place in Tokyo, Japan on September 29 under the sponsorship of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan (Chongsanghoe).
Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man, First Vice-Chairman and concurrently Director of the Organizational Department Pak Ku Ho, Vice-Chairman Nam Sung U, Vice-Chairman Jo Il Yon, Vice-Chairman Song Kun Hak, Vice-Chairman So Chung On, Director of the Rights and Welfare Department Im Kyong Ha, Director of the Economic Department Hyon Tae Sik and Director of the Financial Department Kim Kyong Ho of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), chairpersons of the Chongryon Headquarters, leading officials of the central organizations and affiliates of Chongryon, Kim Min Gwan, chairman of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, and other members of Chongsanghoe in different parts of Japan and Koreans.
The forum was held on the theme titled "'Let us greet a new era of prosperity of Chongryon!', 'Let us bring about a brilliant era of efflorescence of national education in Nishi Tokyo!', 'Potential of Nishi Tokyo!'" out of the single desire to give full play to the inexhaustible strength of Korean compatriots from all walks of life and make the first breakthrough for the efflorescence of national education and the prosperity of the Korean compatriots' community.
A video of congratulations from the homeland was shown at the event.
Then followed an art performance, video show and presentation that demonstrate the patriotic tradition for national education in Nishi Tokyo and the advantages of national education.
There were also a video show, announcement of work plan and expression of determination full of confidence to glorify the 80th founding anniversary of Nishi Tokyo Korean Primary and Secondary School No. 1 and Nishi Tokyo Korean Primary and Secondary School No. 2 and open up the efflorescence of national education from Nishi Tokyo at any cost toward the 100th founding anniversary of the schools.
Hwang Chol Su, chairman of the Executive Committee of the National Forum and chairman of Chongsanghoe in Nishi Tokyo, made a speech at the event. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Training Base of Special Operation Units of KPA in Western Area
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, inspected the training base of the special operation units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in the western area on October 2 to learn about the drills of combatants.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas accompanied by Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Yong Bok, deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, and Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the KPA.
He was greeted by commanding officers of the special operation units at the training base.
At the training base, combatants of several special operation brigades are undergoing intensive training according to the combat and political training programme.
That day there took place various drills of the combatants of special operation units at the base.
The drills were aimed at judging the combat readiness of the unit combatants and perfectly preparing them mentally, physically, tactically and technically so that they can reliably and successfully carry out their special operation tasks under any combat situation.
The core leading units, which have grown up to be the pivotal force of the armed forces of the DPRK absolutely and firmly defending the sovereignty of the DPRK and the happiness of its people, fully demonstrated through the training that day their might and mettle as the most elite combat units both in name and in reality, displaying the firm will and high spirit to attain their combat goals by occupying the enemy’s headquarters at a stroke once the mission is given in contingency.
Watching with satisfaction the combatants perfectly versed in different combat situations,Kim Jong Unhighly praised all of the combatants for having firmly prepared themselves politically, ideologically, militarily, technically and physically, bearing in mind the honorable mission of defending the country and its people.
Watching the drills pulsating with the fighting spirit and heroic stamina of winning only victory in combat and annihilating the enemy without fail, he said that the DPRK gets stronger  thanks to such brave and proud soldiers who have grown up to be a-match-for-a-hundred and all-powerful fighters capable of fighting any type of war anytime with confidence and warmly encouraged their patriotic enthusiasm and militant bravery.
He stressed once again that the special operation forces of the KPA are now becoming the pivotal and core force in the DPRK's war deterrence and capability for fighting a war.
Underlining the need to making a stride forward more clearly in the development of the armed forces of the DPRK by steadily expanding and strengthening the special operation forces into the strongest combat forces, he set forth new policies related to the orientation of the building of the special operation forces.
He said that as he mentioned last time, it is necessary to firmly hold fast to and apply the revolution in training, ideology and equipment in the building of the special operation forces and thus more perfectly prepare them so that they take their place as the main force of war and play a decisive role in winning victory in war. He stressed the need to steadily study and apply a new methodology of Korean style in training and make combatants master it and thus create the absolute standard incomparable with any army.
That day he informed the commanding officers of a ceremony held by the enemies in Seoul on Oct. 1 called the "ROK army day".
He said that the puppet Yoon Suk Yeol, who had never been rid of his anti-DPRK intent, read a written commemorative address full of his lengthy counteraction will, prompted by the delusion of persecution to our Republic, and thus showed the security uneasiness and irritating psychology of the puppet forces. Through such coarse address, he made a bluff of "resolute and overwhelming response of the ROK-U.S. alliance" and the "end of regime", clamoring about the character of the ROK-U.S. alliance based on nuclear weapons, and fully betrayed the bellicose temerity,Kim Jong Unsaid, adding that they acknowledged themselves that they are the forces destroying regional security and peace and that the world would not but laugh at such poor rhetoric and visible action.
He said that the puppet Yoon bragged about overwhelming counteraction of military muscle at the doorstep of the state possessed of nuclear weapons and it was a great irony that caused the suspicion of being an abnormal man.
He said that the enemies' threatening rhetoric, action, trick and attempt did not check the DPRK's powerful military strength and will not take away our nuclear weapons forever. The DPRK has irreversibly secured the absolute strength as a nuclear power and the system and function for using it while overcoming the long-standing challenges, he noted.
He affirmed that "if" the enemy, seized with extreme foolishness and recklessness, attempt to use armed forces encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, full of excessive "confidence" in the ROK-U.S. alliance in disregard of our repeated warnings, the DPRK would use without hesitation all the offensive forces it has possessed, including nuclear weapons.
Saying that to pray for a good luck of survival in a military conflict with the nuclear weapons state would be a foolish thing that should not do, he said that if such situation comes, the permanent existence of Seoul and the Republic of Korea would be impossible.
He stressed that this is a realistic prediction of the physical destructive power which the world people cannot but admit, not a rhetoric threat.
We should continue to cultivate our strength, and bear in mind again that strength in our hands is the only guarantee for keeping under control the enemy and defending ourselves, he said, adding that the KPA should firmly defend the Party, revolution, country and people by dint of its powerful military muscle, remaining more loyal to its sacred mission.
The tough and transparent stand and policies to fight the enemy clarified byKim Jong Undoubled the commanding officers and all the service personnel with great confidence, courage and pluck.
Kim Jong Unhad a photo session with the officers and men involved in the drills, encouraging their high ideological and mental world and the will to defend the country.
All the combatants of the KPA special operation units broke into cheers of hurrah, reflecting their pledge of loyalty to the great brilliant commander, who came to their training base, gave them meticulous guidance and showed deep loving care and trust for them repeatedly, and made a firm pledge to firmly prepare themselves as brave combatants capable of carrying out any militant duty most thoroughly and most perfectly at any time by continuing to strive for bolstering up the limitless capabilities for fighting war and rounding off combat preparations  as desired byKim Jong Un, bearing deep in mind the consciousness that they are the advance detachment for defending the sovereignty and interests of the state. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Friday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Uninspected the training base of the special operation units of the Korean People's Army in the western area. (photos accompanied)
- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), released a press statement ridiculing an event marking the “ROK Army day" held by the puppet ROK as a "boast of strength" by the group of curs or a funeral procession of colonial mercenary army.

headline: Autumn Sports Contest of Aged People and Amateurs-2024 Held
Poem and Song Presentation of Workers and Trade Union Members Held
Sculpture and Craftwork Festival Opens
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
Foundation Day of Korea Marked
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Foundation Day of Korea was commemorated with an event at the Mausoleum of King Tangun on October 3.
Present there were Kang Yun Sok, vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Kim Myong Hun, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of the Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang.
First there was an ancestral rite for Tangun.
Hwang Kwang Il, director of the Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, made a report.
Saying that this year marks the 30th anniversary of the reconstruction of the Mausoleum of King Tangun as a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party, the reporter praised PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilas peerless patriots and peerlessly great sages who glorified the time-honored history and tradition of the Korean nation.
The 5 000-year national history and precious cultural heritages are shedding more brilliant rays along with the era of our state-first principle thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Un, he added. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities

The core leading units, which have developed as the pivotal force of the armed forces of the DPRK absolutely and firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and the happiness of its people, fully demonstrated through the drills their might and mettle as elite combat units both in name and in reality, displaying the soaring spirit and firm will to attain their combat goals by occupying the enemy’s headquarters at a stroke once a mission is given in case of contingency.
Watching with satisfaction the combatants perfectly versed in different combat situations,Kim Jong Unhighly praised all the combatants for having firmly prepared themselves politically, ideologically, militarily, technically and physically, bearing in mind the honourable mission of defending the country and its people.
Watching the drills pulsating with the fighting spirit and heroic stamina of the combatants to win only victory in combat and annihilate the enemy without fail, he said that the country really gets stronger as there are such brave and proud soldiers, who have grown up to be a-match-for-a-hundred and all-powerful fighters capable of fighting any type of war anytime with confidence, and spoke highly of their patriotic enthusiasm and militant bravery.
He stressed once again that the special operation forces of the KPA are now the pivotal and core force in the Republic’s war deterrent and capability for fighting a war. Underlining the need to make a stride forward more clearly in the development of the armed forces of the DPRK by steadily expanding and strengthening the special operation forces into the strongest combat forces, he set forth new policies related to the orientation of the building of the special operation forces.
He said: As I mentioned before, it is necessary to firmly hold fast to the policy of making a radical improvement in training, ideology and equipment and apply it in the building of the special operation forces and thus prepare them more perfectly so that they can take their place as the main force of war and play a decisive role in winning victory in the war. These units should steadily study and apply a new methodology of Korean style in training, make the combatants master it and thus create an absolute standard incomparable with that of any army.
That day he told the commanding officers about a ceremony held by the enemy in Seoul on October 1, called the "ROK army day."
He said:
The puppet Yoon Suk Yeol, obsessed with anti-DPRK intent, read a commemorative address running through with his will for counteraction out of his delusion of persecution by our Republic. This is a reflection of the security uneasiness and restless psychology of the puppet forces. Through careless words, he made a bluff of a “resolute and overwhelming response by the ROK-US alliance” and the “end of regime,” clamouring about the character of the ROK-US alliance based on nukes, and fully betrayed the bellicose temerity. This means that they themselves acknowledged that they are the forces destroying regional security and peace. The world would not but laugh at such poor rhetoric and showy action.
The puppet Yoon bragged about overwhelming counteraction of their military muscle at the doorstep of a state possessing nuclear weapons, and it was a great irony that caused misgivings about whether he is an abnormal man.
The enemy’s threatening rhetoric, actions, tricks and attempts have failed to check the growth of our powerful military strength and will never deprive us of our nuclear weapons. We have secured an irreversibly absolute strength as a nuclear power and the system and functions for using it by overcoming the challenges for a long time.
"If" the enemy, seized with extreme foolishness and recklessness, make a step forward and attempt to use their armed forces to encroach upon the sovereignty of our Republic, full of excessive “confidence” in the ROK-US alliance, in disregard of our repeated warnings, the DPRK will use without hesitation all the striking forces in its possession, including nuclear weapons.
To pray for a good luck of survival in a military conflict with the nuclear weapons state would be a foolish thing that should not be done. If such situation is created, the permanent existence of Seoul and the Republic of Korea would be impossible.
This is not a rhetorical threat, but a realistic prediction of the physical destructive power, which the world people cannot but admit.
We should continue to cultivate our strength and bear in mind again that the strength in our possession is the only guarantee for keeping the enemy under control and defending ourselves.
The KPA should firmly defend the Party, revolution, country and people by dint of its powerful military muscle, remaining more loyal to its sacred mission.
The hard-line and thoroughgoing stand and policies against the enemy, clarified byKim Jong Un, redoubled the great confidence, courage and pluck of the commanding officers and all other service personnel.
Kim Jong Unhad a photo session with the officers and men, who participated in the drills, highly praising their ideological and mental world and their will to defend the country.
All the combatants broke into cheers of hurrah as a reflection of their pledge of loyalty to the great brilliant commander, who came to their training base, gave them meticulous guidance and bestowed loving care and trust on them repeatedly, and made a firm determination to firmly prepare themselves as brave combatants capable of carrying out any combat mission most thoroughly and perfectly at any time by continuing to strive for bolstering up the limitless capabilities for fighting war and perfecting combat preparations as desired by him, mindful of the consciousness that they are the point men in defending the national sovereignty and interests. -0-

headline: Preparations for Operating Regional-industry Factories Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK is pushing ahead with the preparations for operating regional-industry factories.
Kilju and Myonggan counties are building new production buildings of raw material bases. Hoeryong City and Puryong County are applying the experience and methods created in the farming of raw materials bases and cultivating Evodia daniellii Benn, oil-chestnut and other crops.
The province ensures that the selected members from cities and counties possess higher technical knowledge and skills at the best units  for the normal operation of regional-industry factories.
It is also  enlisting officials and workers in the tele-education system of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and Chongjin University of Agriculture  and training them to be practitioners who can solve the problems arising in the management and operation of the factories. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Friday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Uninspected the training base of the special operation units of the Korean People's Army in the western area. (photos accompanied)
- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), released a press statement ridiculing an event marking the “ROK Army day" held by the puppet ROK as a "boast of strength" by the group of curs or a funeral procession of colonial mercenary army.
- An enlarged plenary meeting of the DPRK Cabinet took place.
- A poem and song presentation of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place and the 5th National Sculpture and Craftwork Festival opened to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK.
- An inauguration ceremony of the project for building a new ore conveyer system took place at the Komdok Mining Complex.
- A ceremony for moving into new houses was held at the Yangsa Farm in Thosan County, North Hwanghae Province.
- An event took place to mark the Foundation Day of Korea.
- The "Forum of Our Nation-2024" of the Koreans in Japan took place in Japan.

Roodng Sinmun
- Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School conducted motivation activities in the theatres for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas of North Phyongan Province.
- An article says that the "hideous unethical criminal state" is a name-tag peculiar to Japan.

Minju Joson
- An article stresses the need to gather and cultivate medicinal herbs in the right time and in a qualitative way. -0-

headline: Motivation Activities of Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School gave an art performance in the theatre for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas of North Phyongan Province in the DPRK, inspiring the soldier-builders and members of the youth shock brigade.
The students of the revolutionary school sang in praises of the belief that more beautiful and excellent future is sure to  come in the near future thanks to the benevolent care of the Workers' Party of Korea through such numbers as the poem recitation "Our Father".
Their performance doubled the enthusiasm of the members of the youth shock brigade to complete the project at the highest quality in the shortest time. -0-

- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here.
- Missions of the international organizations here laid floral baskets at the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon Mansu Hill.

Rodong Sinmun

headline: Intensive Lecture and Information Team Campaign Brisk in Kangwon Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- An intensive lecture and information team campaign is getting brisk in Kangwon Province of the DPRK.
Party information workers in the province, together with extra-official lecturers and merited lecturers, conducted intensive agitation at farms and raw-material bases.
At farms in Anbyon County, including Ogye and Wollang farms, they appealed to the agricultural workers to gather crops without wasting and finish the winter wheat and barley sowing in the right time, while giving a profound explanation of information data on the greatness and the Party's policies.
Their campaign is also brisk at the Township Farm and the Sokgun Farm in Cholwon County, the construction sites for regional-industry factories and raw material bases in Kosan and Ichon counties and Wonsan and Munchon cities and Sepho County. -0-

headline: Educators of DPRK Respected in Public
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- October 5 is World Day of Teachers.
In the DPRK where national trait of attaching importance to education has been established, educators are being respected by society as committed revolutionaries who bring up the future of the country.
A social atmosphere of respecting and putting forward the teachers has been improved and the enthusiasm for supporting the educational sector is mounting in different parts of the country.
The Workers' Party of Korea and the state have treated the teachers devoting themselves to education as patriots and provided them with excellent houses free of charge.
In recent years, they have selected ten best teachers every year and estimated their merits in making a remarkable success in the van of the educational revolution. They have also taken various preferential measures for teachers.
The educators across the country are devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm to the educational work and the training of talents. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulations from Military Attaches Corps Here
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
The military attache of the Cuban embassy, doyen of the corps, conveyed the floral basket and letter to an official concerned on Friday. -0-

headline: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Great Leaders
story_text: Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets in the names of the UN resident coordinator office and the missions of UNDP, UNICEF, UNFPA, FAO, WFP and WHO here were laid at the statues of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilon Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. -0-

headline: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Great Leaders
Framework of Houses Hastened in Flood-hit Areas of North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The framework of houses is progressing apace in the flood-hit areas of North Phyongan Province of the DPRK.
Young builders of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade have pushed ahead with the framework of houses.
The High-Speed Youth Shock Brigade ensured the supply of materials in a far-sighted way and raised the operation rate of construction equipment while inventing and introducing advanced building methods.
The same is true of the youth shock brigades of Pyongyang Municipality and South Hamgyong, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces.
With the resolve to fulfill their duty as masters in the rehabilitation campaign, officials and builders of the North Phyongan Provincial Regiment of Party members and the provincial housing construction shock brigade are speeding up the construction project while ensuring the quality of construction. -0-

headline: Newspaper Calls for Giving Play to Spiritual Strength of Masses
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The officials, leading personnel of the revolution and standard-bearers in implementing the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), should skillfully apply the leadership method of the Party, Rodong Sinmun stresses in an editorial Saturday.
The masses of the people are now striving to bring about a great new victory, the editorial says, adding:
Now is the time for officials of each unit to more thoroughly apply the leadership method of our Party in the revolutionary practice and thus orient the will and mind of the masses to attaining this year's goal.
The leadership method of our Party is a powerful weapon for victoriously advancing the revolution and construction by inspiring the spiritual strength and creative ability of the masses, and the success in carrying out this year’s tasks facing each unit depends on its officials.
The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unsaid in an important speech on the occasion of the national day that urgent efforts should be made to further enrich and build on the successes achieved this year by making the most of the remaining months, and the most important thing to this end is to further raise and expand the boundless patriotism and loyalty of all the Party members and other working people and service personnel and lead these spirits to successful fruition.
The best strategy for heightening the elated fighting spirit of the masses lies in thoroughly and perfectly applying the leadership method of our Party.
Only when all officials become thoroughgoing incarnates and embodiments of the leadership method of our Party, can they fulfill their duty in carrying out the Party’s decisions perfectly.
All officials should fully apply the leadership method of our Party, mindful that the success of this year's struggle depends on their work method, working manner and activity, and thus make the masses give full play to their noble loyalty and indomitable revolutionary spirit at all theaters of socialist construction. -0-

headline: Increased Production in Machine-building Industrial Sector of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the machine-building industrial sector of the DPRK are putting spurs to the production of machinery, materials and accessories to be sent to regional-industry factories.
The workers and technicians at the Taean Heavy Machine Complex introduced jigs and equipment to improve the quality of welding and increased the production while ensuring the surface roughness of products by using a new abrasive.
Through a mass technical innovation movement, the Pyongyang Electric Cable General Factory 326 manufactured and installed a new dryer into a plastic extruder to remove moisture from raw materials.
Similar successes were made at the Kumjingang Machine Factory under the Ryongsong Machine Complex, the Munchon Valve Factory and the Songchongang Electric Appliances Factory. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Chinese President
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), on October 6.
The message said:
I extend warm congratulations on behalf of the CPC and the Chinese government and people and on my own behalf to you and to the WPK and the DPRK government and people on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the PRC and the DPRK.
As the two countries established their official diplomatic relations 75 years ago, a new historic chapter was opened in the relations between the two countries, and this is of epoch-making and important significance.
For 75 years, the two countries have advanced hand in hand on the road of promoting socialist construction while supporting and strengthening exchange and cooperation with each other in the struggle to consolidate the people's power and defend the national sovereignty, and have closely cooperated in the work to promote the regional peace and stability and safeguard the international equity and justice.
The traditional China-DPRK friendship has stood the changes of the times and the trials of ever-changing international situation and become a precious asset common to the two countries and the two peoples.
I attach great importance to the development of the China-DPRK relations and have jointly led and promoted the in-depth development of the China-DPRK relations while maintaining close communications with you, Comrade General Secretary, through several meetings and personal letters and messages in recent years.
In the new era and under the new situation, the Chinese side is ready to jointly promote, together with the DPRK side, the stable and further advance of the socialist cause in the two countries and provide the two peoples with better welfare by continuing to write a new chapter of the traditional China-DPRK friendship through strengthened strategic communications and coordination and deepened friendly exchange and cooperation with the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries as an occasion.
I hope that Comrade General Secretary would enjoy good health and everything would go well.
I wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness and wellbeing. -0-

headline: Successes Made in Rehabilitation of Flood-hit Areas of Jagang Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- New dwelling houses are now taking shape in the flood-hit areas of Jagang Province of the DPRK.
The Pyongyang Municipal Regiment of Party Members built up the ranks of workers in charge of construction and supervision, enforced the system of taking charge of each block, and intensified the guidance and cooperation to build every structure in conformity with construction standards.
The South Phyongan provincial and the Kangwon provincial regiments of Party members introduced the experience of advanced units and applied effective methods of using formwork to complete the project at a high level in a short span of time while saving manpower and materials.
Similar successes are being achieved by the North Hwanghae provincial, the South Hamgyong provincial and the Jagang Provincial regiments of Party members.
Huichon and Songwon counties are ensuring both quality and speed in housing construction by building up the ranks of skilled workers and updating construction tools.
Wiwon, Junggang, Janggang and other counties, too,  organized demonstration lectures, including interior and exterior plastering and installation of various door frames and electric wiring, so that all the builders know well the requirements of technical regulations and apply them to construction. -0-

headline: Housing Construction Hastened in Hwasong Area of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The construction of 10 000 flats at the third stage in the Hwasong area of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is progressing apace.
The construction headquarters makes sure that all the construction units conduct the review with the main emphasis placed on raising the quality and further enhance the sense of responsibility and role of construction workers.
Meanwhile, landscaping of a new street is progressing apace.
Soldier-builders have finished the installation of plastic window and ensured both quality and speed.
The regiment of the Phyongjin Management Bureau for Construction gives detailed assignments and reviews and evaluates the results in line with the technical regulations and requirements of the construction.
Officials and builders of the first and second brigades of ministries and national agencies are carrying out various projects as required by the construction methods. -0-

headline: 28th Seminar of World Political Parties on Building New Society Held in Mexico
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The 28th seminar of world political parties on building a new society was held in Mexico from September 26 to 28.
Present there were leaders of various political parties and members of the parliament of Mexico, representatives of more than 100 political parties and organizations from over 50 countries including the DPRK, China, Vietnam, Laos, Nicaragua, Brazil and Venezuela.
Congratulatory speeches were made at the seminar to be followed by speeches.
Speakers referred to the ways for the Latin American countries to eliminate social inequality and free themselves from the economic yoke of imperialism and capitalism.
They called for strengthening the unity and solidarity among the anti-imperialist independent forces and, in particular, cooperation with the countries in the Asia-Pacific region in keeping with the present situation in which the world geopolitical center is moving to the Asia-Pacific region.
They called upon all the revolutionary and progressive political parties, organizations and anti-imperialist independent forces of the world to further intensify their unity and cooperation in the struggle against the imperialist powers to gain complete independence and sovereignty and promote the well-being of the working masses and progress of mankind.
A solidarity resolution supporting the just struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people was adopted at the seminar. -0-

headline: Foundation of Producing Dairy Products Strengthened in North Hamgyong Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK directs big efforts to strengthening the foundation of producing dairy products.
In close cooperation with relevant units, the province has newly built and expanded goat farms in Orang and Yonsa counties and provided them with high-performance equipment for milk powder production and fodder processing equipment.
And it secured thousands of goats and over one hundred dairy cows to put the milk production on a normal basis.
Goat farms in Chongjin City and other regions are directing efforts to increasing the number of goats of good breed and increasing the milk output.
The working people in Kilju, Hwadae and Kyonghung counties have introduced methods suited to the actual conditions and raised the weight ratio on the basis of scientific breeding  of domestic animals, while preparing winter fodder in a far-sighted way.
The province sees to it that the cities and counties  ensure the normal operation of vehicles and freezing and storing facilities  and thus supply fresh and nutritious dairy products to the children in good time. -0-

headline: Support to Educational Sector Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- North Phyongan Province of the DPRK is rendering material and moral assistance to the educational sector.
The Party and government bodies in the province, cities and counties are intensifying an organizational and political work to improve the level of educational development in the region.
The remodeling of Sinuiju Cha Kwang Su University of Education is being progressed apace and  Ponbu Primary School in Sinuiju City affiliated to Sinuiju Teacher Training College has been remodeled.
Thaechon and Unsan counties have provided cement, steel, timber and other materials to the mountainous sub-schools on the basis of learning about their actual conditions, thus pushing ahead with the planned projects.
The city of Sinuiju and Kujang and Sonchon counties have provided schools with  modern educational equipment and furniture.  They are also paying attention to the teachers’ living conditions.
The same is true of the cities of Jongju and Kusong and Kwaksan County.
The provincial people’s committee and the provincial telecommunications management bureau are conducting a brisk mass movement to further consolidate the material and technical foundations of the educational sector. -0-

headline: Statement of Spokesperson for DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued the following statement titled "NATO, a freak brought up by U.S. extreme double logic and double standards, should be thrown into dump of history as soon as possible" on Sunday:
NATO in its recent statement let loose a string of extremely unreasonable remarks that it condemns all countries fostering and extending the Ukrainian war while groundlessly slandering the independent cooperative relations between sovereign states including the DPRK.
The publication of the statement timed to coincide with the visit by the new NATO secretary general to Ukraine clearly shows that NATO is going to appear on the first-line trench of the anti-DPRK confrontation front, not content with extremely taking advantage of its boss's hostile policy toward the DPRK.
The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK expresses strong regret at the fact that NATO, no more than a tool of the U.S. for war, slandered the intensified legal cooperation between independent sovereign states while distorting the essence of the Ukrainian incident, and resolutely denounces and rejects it.
Far from seriously repenting of its mistake in creating the Ukrainian incident, NATO, the very one which exposed the security environment in the European region to the grave crisis called outbreak of a nuclear war, is going to shift the blame for it onto others and justify its policy of aggression. This is just the same as the shameless act of the U.S. engrossed in extreme double standards and illogical way of thinking.
It is none other than the U.S. which is confusing right and wrong while insisting that its arms buildup and war drills involving even its mainland forces aiming at a specified state in the Korean peninsula are for "defending freedom" and the exercise of the right to self-defence and essential defence activities taken by the DPRK to cope with them are for "threatening peace".
NATO has been spending an astronomical amount of military expenses on the offer of lethal equipment to Ukraine and openly inciting it to attacks on the Russian territory. However it is taking up a gangster-like logic that their war acts are an effort for "preventing" war and the establishment of normal relations between sovereign states is an act of fostering and extending war, which is just like a guilty party filing the suit first and a bad habit disseminated by the U.S.
We are strictly fixing our eyes on the reality in which a war monster called NATO that should have disappeared from the arena of history along with the end of the Cold War last century is stretching its black tentacles to the Korean peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region in order to provide another justification in the wake of playing a war gamble called the Ukrainian incident to find a justification for existence of itself stained with blood.
It is the biggest geopolitical tragedy that NATO, a product of the U.S. ambition for hegemony which is based on the gangster-like double logic and double standards and has lived on the escalation of tension and war moves, is still existent.
The provocative acts of NATO getting more undisguised on the Korean peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region according to the U.S. illogical thinking and scenario only bring into bold relief the reason for its thorough death, not the additional justification for existence of the ill-famed war specter.
If NATO continues to try hard to infringe upon the dignity, sovereignty, security and interests of the DPRK while persistently pursuing hostile policy toward it, NATO blindly following the U.S. will be held wholly responsible for the tragic consequences to be entailed by it.
The DPRK will continue to make important efforts to defend itself from the hostile threat of the U.S. and its followers, preserve regional peace and security and build a multi-polarized world based on international justice. -0-

headline: Housing Construction Hastened in Hwasong Area of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The construction of 10 000 flats at the third stage in the Hwasong area of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is progressing apace.
The construction headquarters makes sure that all the construction units conduct the review with the main emphasis placed on raising the quality and further enhance the sense of responsibility and role of construction workers.
Meanwhile, landscaping of a new street is progressing apace.
Soldier-builders have finished the installation of plastic window and ensured both quality and speed.
The regiment of the Phyongjin Management Bureau for Construction gives detailed assignments and reviews and evaluates the results in line with the technical regulations and requirements of the construction.
Officials and builders of the first and second brigades of ministries and national agencies are carrying out various projects as required by the construction methods. -0-

headline: Statement of Spokesperson for DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued the following statement titled "NATO, a freak brought up by U.S. extreme double logic and double standards, should be thrown into dump of history as soon as possible" on Sunday:
NATO in its recent statement let loose a string of extremely unreasonable remarks that it condemns all countries fostering and extending the Ukrainian war while groundlessly slandering the independent cooperative relations between sovereign states including the DPRK.
The publication of the statement timed to coincide with the visit by the new NATO secretary general to Ukraine clearly shows that NATO is going to appear on the first-line trench of the anti-DPRK confrontation front, not content with extremely taking advantage of its boss's hostile policy toward the DPRK.
The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK expresses strong regret at the fact that NATO, no more than a tool of the U.S. for war, slandered the intensified legal cooperation between independent sovereign states while distorting the essence of the Ukrainian incident, and resolutely denounces and rejects it.
Far from seriously repenting of its mistake in creating the Ukrainian incident, NATO, the very one which exposed the security environment in the European region to the grave crisis called outbreak of a nuclear war, is going to shift the blame for it onto others and justify its policy of aggression. This is just the same as the shameless act of the U.S. engrossed in extreme double standards and illogical way of thinking.
It is none other than the U.S. which is confusing right and wrong while insisting that its arms buildup and war drills involving even its mainland forces aiming at a specified state in the Korean peninsula are for "defending freedom" and the exercise of the right to self-defence and essential defence activities taken by the DPRK to cope with them are for "threatening peace".
NATO has been spending an astronomical amount of military expenses on the offer of lethal equipment to Ukraine and openly inciting it to attacks on the Russian territory. However it is taking up a gangster-like logic that their war acts are an effort for "preventing" war and the establishment of normal relations between sovereign states is an act of fostering and extending war, which is just like a guilty party filing the suit first and a bad habit disseminated by the U.S.
We are strictly fixing our eyes on the reality in which a war monster called NATO that should have disappeared from the arena of history along with the end of the Cold War last century is stretching its black tentacles to the Korean peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region in order to provide another justification in the wake of playing a war gamble called the Ukrainian incident to find a justification for existence of itself stained with blood.
It is the biggest geopolitical tragedy that NATO, a product of the U.S. ambition for hegemony which is based on the gangster-like double logic and double standards and has lived on the escalation of tension and war moves, is still existent.
The provocative acts of NATO getting more undisguised on the Korean peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region according to the U.S. illogical thinking and scenario only bring into bold relief the reason for its thorough death, not the additional justification for existence of the ill-famed war specter.
If NATO continues to try hard to infringe upon the dignity, sovereignty, security and interests of the DPRK while persistently pursuing hostile policy toward it, NATO blindly following the U.S. will be held wholly responsible for the tragic consequences to be entailed by it.
The DPRK will continue to make important efforts to defend itself from the hostile threat of the U.S. and its followers, preserve regional peace and security and build a multi-polarized world based on international justice. -0-

headline: Foundation of Producing Dairy Products Strengthened in North Hamgyong Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK directs big efforts to strengthening the foundation of producing dairy products.
In close cooperation with relevant units, the province has newly built and expanded goat farms in Orang and Yonsa counties and provided them with high-performance equipment for milk powder production and fodder processing equipment.
And it secured thousands of goats and over one hundred dairy cows to put the milk production on a normal basis.
Goat farms in Chongjin City and other regions are directing efforts to increasing the number of goats of good breed and increasing the milk output.
The working people in Kilju, Hwadae and Kyonghung counties have introduced methods suited to the actual conditions and raised the weight ratio on the basis of scientific breeding  of domestic animals, while preparing winter fodder in a far-sighted way.
The province sees to it that the cities and counties  ensure the normal operation of vehicles and freezing and storing facilities  and thus supply fresh and nutritious dairy products to the children in good time. -0-
