headline: Congratulations to Syrian PM
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Tok Hun, premier of the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a congratulatory message on October 4 to Mohammad Ghazi al-Jalai on his appointment as prime minister of the Syrian Arab Republic.
Expressing belief that the traditional bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would develop more vigorously by the joint efforts, the message wished the prime minister success in the work for rehabilitating the economy and stabilizing the people's living. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Chinese President
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), on October 6.
The message said:
I extend warm congratulations on behalf of the CPC and the Chinese government and people and on my own behalf to you and to the WPK and the DPRK government and people on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the PRC and the DPRK.
As the two countries established their official diplomatic relations 75 years ago, a new historic chapter was opened in the relations between the two countries, and this is of epoch-making and important significance.
For 75 years, the two countries have advanced hand in hand on the road of promoting socialist construction while supporting and strengthening exchange and cooperation with each other in the struggle to consolidate the people's power and defend the national sovereignty, and have closely cooperated in the work to promote the regional peace and stability and safeguard the international equity and justice.
The traditional China-DPRK friendship has stood the changes of the times and the trials of ever-changing international situation and become a precious asset common to the two countries and the two peoples.
I attach great importance to the development of the China-DPRK relations and have jointly led and promoted the in-depth development of the China-DPRK relations while maintaining close communications with you, Comrade General Secretary, through several meetings and personal letters and messages in recent years.
In the new era and under the new situation, the Chinese side is ready to jointly promote, together with the DPRK side, the stable and further advance of the socialist cause in the two countries and provide the two peoples with better welfare by continuing to write a new chapter of the traditional China-DPRK friendship through strengthened strategic communications and coordination and deepened friendly exchange and cooperation with the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries as an occasion.
I hope that Comrade General Secretary would enjoy good health and everything would go well.
I wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness and wellbeing. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greeting to Xi Jinping
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC).
The message said:
On behalf of the Workers’ Party of Korea, the government of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea and the Korean people, I extend warm greetings to you, Comrade General Secretary and, through you, to the Communist Party of China, the government of the People’s Republic of China and all the Chinese people on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the PRC.
With the official diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the PRC established 75 years ago, the DPRK-China relations of friendship came to enter a new historical stage of development.
Over the past 75 years, the two parties and the two countries have vigorously advanced along the road of socialism, standing all sorts of trials and challenges of history with the firm faith in the validity of their cause.
It confirms with the fundamental interests of the two countries to invariably carry forward and develop the DPRK-China friendship with a long history and good traditions.
Our Party and the government of the Republic will steadily strive to consolidate and develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and China as required by the new era.
Shortly ago, the Chinese people celebrated the 75th founding anniversary of the People's Republic of China.
We hope that the Chinese people will achieve steady and fresh successes in the course of building a modern socialist country on a full scale under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with you as its core.
I wish the People's Republic of China prosperity and its people happiness. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Regional-industry Factories under Construction in North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, visited the regional-industry factories under construction in North Phyongan Province and guided the construction project.
Accompanying him were Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Jong Kyong Thaek, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Jong Myong Do, first deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Yong Bok and Ri Chang Ho, deputy chiefs of the KPA General Staff, and other KPA commanding officers and cadres of the WPK Central Committee.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas greeted on the spot by the commanding officers of KPA units involved in the construction project.
The officers and men, involved in the construction of regional-industry factories in the province, are pushing ahead with the construction project at the final stage after setting it as a primary requirement to ensure quality in construction, true to the important taskKim Jong Unadvanced while giving field guidance at regional-industry factories under construction in different areas.
Going round the construction sites,Kim Jong Unlearned in detail about the construction work.
Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that soldier-builders have ensured high quality in construction as required by modernization and standardization, he noted with high appreciation that they did construction well. Fully reflected in each building are our army's spirit and stand of devotedly implementing the Party's policies, and this is patriotism, loyalty to the Party and the revolution and love for hometown, he added.
To establish a correct ideological viewpoint is important in construction, too, and there is nothing impossible to do when people are stimulated ideologically, he said, noting that the service personnel have grown up, through construction process, to be pioneers of the times and masters of creation who know the true meaning of patriotism and uphold the country and people with pure conscience and practice. This is a precious success that can not be compared with anything, he added.
Saying it is hard to find here such defects revealed in the construction of regional-industry factories in some cities and counties, he noted that they have made fresh progress in improving quality by actively applying the excellent Korean-style building methods created in practice. He added that the construction regiments dispatched to cities and counties should learn from the experience gained in the construction of regional-industry factories in the province.
He said it is worthy of appraisement that the People's Army has strengthened the force of commanding officers of construction units at all levels, promptly solved the problems arising in the construction and powerfully pushed ahead with the construction project, mindful of the noble intention of the Party Central Committee which set forth the construction of regional-industry factories as an important task for hastening the regional development.
A new change is now being made in the view of officials and builders on construction and the traits of giving priority to quality are prevailing over the whole area of construction, he noted, saying it is an affirmative trend guaranteeing the development of our architecture.
As is always emphasized, architectural structures reflect our ideology, policy and aesthetic view and the indications of the times and, accordingly, architecture is an extension and an epitome of politics, he said, adding that even if a structure is erected, it should be built wonderfully and perfectly as a symbol of the era, in no way inferior to the younger generation, shouldering upon the honor of our times and our generation.
He taught in detail such important and principled orientations and ways for expanding the regional construction as the issue of designing advanced public health facilities, facilities for science, education, life and cultural amenities and grain management facilities in a rational and practical way suited to the use of relevant buildings, the issue of thoroughly ensuring the practical utility and modernity in design of industrial buildings and the issue of building up the force of skilled workers.
He expressed belief that the soldier-builders dispatched to the province would as ever uphold the implementation of the Party's Regional Development 20×10 Policy with signal successes in construction and play the role of pacesetters in the vanguard of the 10-year revolution for the regional development.
The officers and men of the unit were filled with steadfast determination to contribute to the prosperity of our great state and the promotion of the people's well-being by pushing on the gigantic creation campaign for bringing about a epochal change of regions, cherishing the great trust and expectation of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unas their lifeblood. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Oversees Live Artillery Firing by Graduates of O Jin U Artillery Academy
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, oversaw a live artillery firing by the 75th-term graduates of O Jin U Artillery Academy on the eve of their advance into the active commanding officers of core arm of the Korean People's Army.
Accompanying him were Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Jong Kyong Thaek, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Jong Myong Do, first deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, and Kim Yong Bok and Ri Chang Ho, deputy chiefs of the KPA General Staff.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas greeted at a firing range by commanding officers of the academy.
Inspecting O Jin U Artillery Academy, a pedigree establishment for training core artillery forces of the DPRK early in September, he clearly indicated the important guidelines for training all its graduates, who will shoulder the future of the Juche-based artillery forces, into all-round, a-match-for-a-hundred artillerymen and artillery talents possessed of full combat command capability. Then he made a promise to make time to oversee the live firing by the graduates.
The firing range was filled with militant enthusiasm of the teachers and cadets of the academy who were to show to him their marksmanship they have refined single-mindedly with the day's highest honor and deep gratitude of meeting the great iron-willed brilliant commander on their campus and perceiving the truth of the Party's philosophy of the artillery.
At the observation post,Kim Jong Unlistened to the plan for artillery firing and the decision of the rector of the academy according to the simulated battle conditions.
The cadets of the academy quickly judged the firing data and launched the firing all together.
Shells, charged with high spirit of the academy cadets to annihilate the enemy and safeguard the territory of the country with merciless and fierce shellfire, hit the targets one after another.
The academy cadets fully displayed their actual war capabilities, which they have firmly prepared, mindful of the idea of the Party Central Committee for getting well versed in the Juche-based artillery tactics and artillery pieces of different missions and making full preparations for overwhelmingly containing and destroying the enemy promptly under any situation.
Watching the cadets' skilled handling of artillery pieces and good marksmanship with satisfaction,Kim Jong Unappreciated that the academy has attached importance to the military theoretical education and the training for real war, and expressed great satisfaction over the live firing results.
He stressed the need to make the cadets continue to strive to attain new goals by further raising the standard of judgment in accuracy and concentration in live firing in the future.
The live firing results shown by cadets of the academy today are a demonstration of the validity and vitality of the Party's policy on military education and bringing about a radical turn in training and a proud level reached by the field of artillery education, he said, calling on the academy to thoroughly implement the requirements of the Party's policy on hitting the targets without test firing and improve the quality of the artillery education with the main stress put on constantly training the guerrilla war tactics to wipe out the enemies through rapid mobile and surprise operations in conformity with the actual conditions in the operational area.
Saying that to raise the standard of overall sci-tech knowledge and practical quality of the artillery commanding officers and men is the more urgent and pressing task, he set forth the goals to be attainted by the artillery education sector in the future.
He said that the graduates' records are a voucher to the ability of military studies and a guarantee for the security of the country and the people. He stressed that the graduates from the academy should ensure the steady progress of the artillery forces with their high political consciousness of being commanding officers in charge of core arm of our army, operational and tactical insight and excellent precision marksmanship.
After watching the live artillery firing, he went to the firing position and warmly congratulated the reliable reserve commanding officers who demonstrated the honor of the academy with marksmanship of nerve missing targets.
Expressing belief and confidence that the graduates of the academy would become an engine for making the artillery positions of the entire army the solid support points for hastening the war victory and always remain faithful to the honorable duty of the KPA commanding officers with absolute loyalty to the Party and revolution, the country and the people and the spirit of devoted service, he had a photo session with them.
Looking up with great excitement toKim Jong Unwho personally guided the live firing of the graduates to take a step for the commanding officers of the first arm of our revolutionary armed forces and instilled high confidence and matchless courage into them, the cadets raised stormy cheers of hurrah.
Commanding officers, teachers and cadets of the academy hardened their will to make positive contributions to demonstrating the might of the artillery forces as the strongest arm in the world by upholding the leadership of the great brilliant commander, who is devoting himself to the development of the Juche-based artillery forces while making ceaseless field inspection of the army, with perfect execution. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), on October 6.

Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), on October 6.
The message said:
I extend warm congratulations on behalf of the CPC and the Chinese government and people and on my own behalf to you and to the WPK and the DPRK government and people on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the PRC and the DPRK.
As the two countries established their official diplomatic relations 75 years ago, a new historic chapter was opened in the relations between the two countries, and this is of epoch-making and important significance.
For 75 years, the two countries have advanced hand in hand on the road of promoting socialist construction while supporting and strengthening exchange and cooperation with each other in the struggle to consolidate the people's power and defend the national sovereignty, and have closely cooperated in the work to promote the regional peace and stability and safeguard the international equity and justice.
The traditional China-DPRK friendship has stood the changes of the times and the trials of ever-changing international situation and become a precious asset common to the two countries and the two peoples.
I attach great importance to the development of the China-DPRK relations and have jointly led and promoted the in-depth development of the China-DPRK relations while maintaining close communications with you, Comrade General Secretary, through several meetings and personal letters and messages in recent years.
In the new era and under the new situation, the Chinese side is ready to jointly promote, together with the DPRK side, the stable and further advance of the socialist cause in the two countries and provide the two peoples with better welfare by continuing to write a new chapter of the traditional China-DPRK friendship through strengthened strategic communications and coordination and deepened friendly exchange and cooperation with the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries as an occasion.
I hope that Comrade General Secretary would enjoy good health and everything would go well.
I wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness and wellbeing. -0-

headline: Greetings to Syrian FM
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui sent a message of greeting to Bassam Sabbagh on October 4 on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of the Syrian Arab Republic.
Expressing the willingness to further strengthen the traditional bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries and the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. joint struggle, the message wished him success in his work for the development of the country's external relations. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Oversees Live Artillery Firing Drill of Graduates of O Jin U Artillery Academy
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, oversaw a live artillery firing drill of the 75th-term graduates of O Jin U Artillery Academy on the eve of their appointment as active commanding officers of the core arm of the Korean People’s Army.
Accompanying him were Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, Jong Kyong Thaek, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Jong Myong Do, first deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, and Kim Yong Bok and Ri Chang Ho, deputy chiefs of the KPA General Staff.
Kim Jong Unwas greeted at the firing range by commanding officers of the academy.
Inspecting the academy, a “pedigree” establishment for training core artillery forces of the DPRK, early in September, he had clearly indicated the important guidelines for training all its undergraduates, who will shoulder the future of the Juche-based artillery forces, into all-round, a-match-for-a-hundred artillerymen and artillery talents possessed of full combat command capability. Then he had made a promise to make time to oversee a live firing by its graduates.
The firing range was filled with militant enthusiasm of the teachers and cadets of the academy, who were to show him the marksmanship they had refined single-mindedly with the day’s highest honour and deep gratitude of meeting the great iron-willed brilliant commander on their campus and learning the truth of the Party’s philosophy of the artillery.
At the observation post,Kim Jong Unwas briefed of the plan for artillery firing and the decision of the rector of the academy according to the simulated battle conditions.
The cadets of the academy quickly judged the firing data and launched the firing all together.
Shells, charged with the high spirit of the cadets to annihilate the enemy and safeguard the territory of the country with merciless and fierce shellfire, hit the targets one after another.
The cadets fully displayed the actual war capabilities, which they had stoutly cultivated, mindful of the ideas of the Party Central Committee of getting well versed in the Juche-based artillery tactics and artillery pieces of different missions and making full preparations for promptly responding to any situation and overwhelmingly containing and destroying the enemy.
Watching their skilled handling of artillery pieces and good marksmanship with satisfaction,Kim Jong Unsaid that he could see that the academy had attached importance to the military theoretical education and the training for real war, and expressed great satisfaction over the live firing results.
He stressed the need to make the cadets continue to strive to attain new goals by further raising the standards of judgement in accuracy and concentration in the future live firing.
The live firing results shown by cadets of the academy today are a demonstration of the validity and vitality of the Party’s policy on military education and on bringing about a radical turn in training and a proud level reached by the field of artillery education, he said, calling on the academy to fully meet the requirements of the Party’s policy on hitting the targets without test firing and improve the quality of artillery education with the main stress put on constantly teaching the guerrilla war tactics to wipe out the enemies through rapid mobile and surprise operations in conformity with the actual conditions in the operational areas.
Saying that to raise the standards of overall sci-tech knowledge and practical qualifications of the artillery officers and men is a more urgent and pressing task, he set forth the goals to be attained by the artillery education sector in the future.
He said that the graduates’ records are a voucher to their ability of military studies and a guarantee for the security of the country and the people. He stressed that the graduates from the academy should ensure the steady progress of the artillery forces with their high political consciousness of being commanding officers in charge of core arm of our army, operational and tactical insight and excellent marksmanship.
After watching the live artillery firing drill, he went to the firing position and warmly congratulated the reliable reserve commanding officers who demonstrated the honour of the academy with marksmanship of never missing targets.
Expressing belief and confidence that the graduates of the academy would become an engine for making the artillery positions of the entire army the solid support points for hastening the war victory and always remain faithful to the honourable duty of the KPA commanding officers with absolute loyalty to the Party and revolution, the country and the people and the spirit of devoted service, he had a photo session with them.
Looking up with great excitement toKim Jong Unwho personally guided the live firing of the graduates who are to take the first step as the commanding officers of the first arm of our revolutionary armed forces and instilled high confidence and matchless courage into them, the cadets raised stormy cheers of hurrah.
Commanding officers, teachers and cadets of the academy hardened their will to make positive contributions to demonstrating the might of the artillery forces as the strongest arm in the world by upholding with perfect practice the leadership of the great brilliant commander, who is devoting himself to the development of the Juche-based artillery forces while making continuous field inspection of the army. -0-

headline: 28th Seminar of World Political Parties on Building New Society Held in Mexico
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The 28th seminar of world political parties on building a new society was held in Mexico from September 26 to 28.
Present there were leaders of various political parties and members of the parliament of Mexico, representatives of more than 100 political parties and organizations from over 50 countries including the DPRK, China, Vietnam, Laos, Nicaragua, Brazil and Venezuela.
Congratulatory speeches were made at the seminar to be followed by speeches.
Speakers referred to the ways for the Latin American countries to eliminate social inequality and free themselves from the economic yoke of imperialism and capitalism.
They called for strengthening the unity and solidarity among the anti-imperialist independent forces and, in particular, cooperation with the countries in the Asia-Pacific region in keeping with the present situation in which the world geopolitical center is moving to the Asia-Pacific region.
They called upon all the revolutionary and progressive political parties, organizations and anti-imperialist independent forces of the world to further intensify their unity and cooperation in the struggle against the imperialist powers to gain complete independence and sovereignty and promote the well-being of the working masses and progress of mankind.
A solidarity resolution supporting the just struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people was adopted at the seminar. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Regional-industry Factories under Construction in North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, visited the regional-industry factories under construction in North Phyongan Province and guided the construction project.
Accompanying him were Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People’s Army, Jong Kyong Thaek, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Jong Myong Do, first deputy chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Yong Bok and Ri Chang Ho, deputy chiefs of the KPA General Staff, other KPA commanding officers and cadres of the WPK Central Committee.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwas greeted on the spot by the commanding officers of the KPA units engaged in the construction project.
The officers and men, involved in the construction of regional-industry factories in the province, are pushing ahead with the construction project at the final stage after setting it as a primary requirement to ensure quality in construction, true to the important taskKim Jong Unadvanced while giving field guidance at regional-industry factories under construction in different areas.
Going round the construction sites,Kim Jong Unlearned in detail about the construction work.
Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that soldier-builders have ensured high quality in construction as required by modernization and standardization, he noted with high appreciation that they did construction well. Fully reflected in each building are our army’s spirit and stand of devotedly implementing the Party’s policies, and this is an expression of patriotism, loyalty to the Party and the revolution and love for hometown, he added.
To establish a correct ideological viewpoint is important in construction, too, and there is nothing impossible to do when people are stimulated ideologically, he said, noting that the service personnel have grown up, through the construction process, to be pioneers of the times and masters of creation who know the true meaning of patriotism and uphold the country and people with pure conscience and practice. This is a precious success that is incomparable to anything, he added.
It is hard to find here such defects as those revealed in the construction of regional-industry factories in some cities and counties, he said, stating that they have made fresh progress in improving quality by actively applying the excellent Korean-style building methods created in practice. He called on the construction regiments dispatched to cities and counties to learn from the experience gained in the construction of regional-industry factories in the province.
He said it is worthy of praise that the KPA has built up the force of commanding officers of construction units at all levels, promptly solved the problems arising in the construction and powerfully pushed ahead with the construction project, mindful of the noble intention of the Party Central Committee which set forth the construction of regional-industry factories as an important task for hastening the regional development.
A new change is now being made in the view of officials and builders on construction and the traits of giving priority to quality are prevailing over the whole area of construction, he noted, saying it is an affirmative trend guaranteeing the development of our architecture.
As is always emphasized, architectural structures reflect our ideology, policy and aesthetic view and the indications of the times and, accordingly, architecture is an extension and epitome of politics, he said, adding that even if we erect a single structure, we should build it wonderfully and perfectly as a symbol of the era that we can show to our younger generations with a clear conscience, on the honour of our times and our generation.
He instructed in detail such important and principled orientations and ways for expanding the regional construction as the issue of designing advanced public health facilities, facilities for science, education, life and cultural activities and grain management facilities in a rational and practical way suited to the use of relevant buildings, the issue of thoroughly ensuring the practical utility and modernity in design of industrial buildings and the issue of building up the force of skilled workers.
He expressed belief that the soldier-builders dispatched to the province would as ever uphold the implementation of the Party’s Regional Development 20×10 Policy with signal successes in construction and play the role of pacesetters in the vanguard of the 10-year revolution for the regional rejuvenation.
The officers and men of the KPA units were filled with the strong determination to contribute to the prosperity of the great state and the promotion of the people’s well-being by pushing on with the gigantic creation campaign for bringing about an epochal change of regions, cherishing the great trust and expectations of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unas their lifeblood. -0-

headline: Many Units in Coal Industry Sector Fulfill Yearly Tunneling Plans
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Many units in the coal industry sector of the DPRK have fulfilled their yearly tunneling plans ahead of schedule.
Among them are lots of workteams at the Tokchon Area Coal Mining Complex, the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex and the Kaechon Area Coal Mining Complex. -0-

headline: Greetings to Chinese Foreign Minister
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Sunday sent a message of greeting to Wang Yi, foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
The message noted that the two countries have supported and closely cooperated with each other in various fields including politics, economy and culture for the past 75 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations.
It is an important duty for the diplomatic field of the two countries to steadily consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship and jointly and dynamically promote the socialist cause under the present complicated international situation, it said.
Choe in the message hoped that the Chinese people would achieve fresher successes in their efforts for achieving the prosperity of the Chinese nation under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Xi Jinping as its core. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in DPRK
Motivation Activities Brisk on Farm Fields
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Nampho Municipality of the DPRK is intensifying a motivation campaign to arouse the agricultural workers to harvesting and threshing.
Onchon County displayed revolutionary slogans and watchwords on worksites and concentrated all its agitation forces and means to boost the spirit of the agricultural workers.
Chollima District has aired broadcasts calling for successfully finishing this year's farming with patriotism to encourage officials and working people to turn out in the immediate farming.
Meanwhile, members of the mobile artistic motivation teams at the Sinhung Farm in Hanggu District, the Taedae Vegetable Farm in Waudo District and others have conducted brisk motivation activities to contribute to finishing the harvesting ahead of schedule and raise the rate of threshing to 120 percent. -0-

headline: WPK Emblem
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The emblem of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is formed of a hammer, a sickle and a writing brush.
Seeing the emblem of the WPK inscribed in its sacred flag on the occasion of the Party founding anniversary (October 10), the people of the DPRK recollect the undying feats of the peerlessly great man who developed the WPK into a powerful party rooted among the working masses.
One day in July Juche 35 (1946) after the founding of the WPK, PresidentKim Il Sungcalled officials concerned to clarify the principled issues arising in creating the design of the Party emblem.
He gave detailed instructions on the design, saying that the emblem of our Party should represent the working class, peasants and working intellectuals together to symbolically show the character of a unified party of the working masses.
Creators arranged the hammer, sickle and writing brush in order from the class viewpoint.
Watching the design drawn by creators, the President recommended that the hammer, sickle and writing brush should be crossed in the middle of their handles, hammer placed in the left, sickle in the right and brush in the middle. And he advised that the brush be placed in the middle, slightly higher than others, saying this means that all the workers and peasants should possess a high level of knowledge and culture and make a tangible contribution to the building of a prosperous and civilized independent and sovereign state.
After examining the design revised by creators, he said that each symbol should be properly and distinctively drawn in such a way that everyone can clearly understand the order of hammer, sickle and brush in the Party emblem.
Thanks to his wise leadership, noble intention and energetic and meticulous guidance, the emblem of the WPK, unique and perfect in ideological content and formative art and clearly symbolic of the Party's character and noble mission, came into being. -0-

headline: 28th General Meeting of Chongsanghoe Held
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The 28th regular general meeting of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan (Chongsanghoe) was held in Tokyo, Japan on September 28.
Present there were Pak Ku Ho, first vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Jo Il Yon, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Hyon Tae Sik, director of its Economic Department, and members of Chongsanghoe.
A congratulatory message from the homeland was introduced at the meeting.
Kim Min Gwan, chairman of Chongsanghoe, made an opening address and Song Myong Nam, chairman of its Central Standing Management Board, made a report.
The reporter referred to the successes made by Chongsanghoe in the work for supporting national education and revitalizing the lower-echelon organizations during the period under review.
He said that the 30th formation anniversary of Chongsanghoe, organized by the great leader GeneralissimoKim Jong Iland specially trusted by the respected MarshalKim Jong Un, would be greeted as an important occasion of demonstrating its appearance as the reserves of the main force steadily leading the patriotic movement including national education, the wide youth organization in which young Koreans of various circles are firmly united with good virtue and affection, and an attractive economic organization.
Speeches were made at the meeting.
Then "Chongsanghoe Prize" was awarded to exemplary members.
At the meeting, Kim Min Gwan was reelected as the chairman of Chongsanghoe and O Hyong Se was elected as the chairman of its Central Standing Management Board.
Pak Ku Ho made an address. He called on Chongsanghoe to play a leading role in opening up a new era of prosperity of Chongryon by helping compatriots of all strata pool their inexhaustible efforts and thus adorn its 30th formation anniversary in high spirits and with innovative achievements. -0-

headline: Greetings from Chinese FM
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Sunday received a message of greeting from Wang Yi, foreign minister of the People's Republic of China, on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
The message noted that the China-DPRK relations have steadily developed in depth and achieved rich successes in exchange and cooperation in all fields for 75 years.
It said that the traditional China-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations have entered a new historic period and are maintaining stable development under the guidance of General Secretary Xi Jinping and General SecretaryKim Jong Unin recent years.
Saying it is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to successfully defend, consolidate and develop the China-DPRK relations, the message expressed the willingness to promote the greater development of the China-DPRK relations in line with the important common understanding reached by the top leaders of the two parties and two countries and the common desire of the two peoples. -0-

headline: 109th Candlelight Rally and Demo Staged in Puppet ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A massive candlelight resistance for impeaching puppet Yoon Suk Yeol is mounting in the puppet ROK.
The 109th candlelight rally and demonstration took place in Seoul on October 5 in demand of the impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol and the special investigation into Kim Kon Hui.
Many people of various circles turned out in the struggle, enraged by the reckless military confrontation hysteria, wholesale fascist suppression and shameless criminal scandals of puppet Yoon in the worst ruling crisis.
At the rally held on the theme of "Destroy kingdom of Kon Hui!", the participants chanted slogans, holding such posters as "Let's impeach Yoon Suk Yeol fomenting war danger to get rid of the ruling crisis!".
An appeal of the candlelight action was read out at the rally.
The final struggle against Yoon began, the appeal said, calling upon all the people to turn out in the candlelight action for impeaching the Kim Kon Hui-Yoon Suk Yeol group attempting "martial law".
Speakers there charged that the present regime is seeking to get rid of the ruling crisis with help of war and "martial law", noting that the crisis of military clashes is rapidly escalating due to the reckless war provocations.
The people's demand for impeachment has been confirmed through the Yoon Suk Yeol group's defeat in the last parliamentary election, the public petitioning movement for impeachment with more than 1.43 millions involved, and the public opinion against Yoon, they said, declaring that they would carry on the struggle to the last for the impeachment of Yoon.
The participants staged a demonstration, chanting such slogans as "Destroy the kingdom of Kon Hui!"
Meanwhile, a rally of civic and social organizations of various circles was held in Seoul on Oct. 5, amid the total abrogation of bills on the special investigation into Kim Kon Hui-related scandal and special investigation into the death of a soldier of the marine corps of the ROK puppet army, which were refused by puppet Yoon.
Members of the students' group urging a bill on impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol held a press conference outside the Ryongsan Police Station in Seoul that day, demanding the impeachment of puppet Yoon, special investigation into Kim Kon Hui and the release of students. -0-

headline: Okryu Children's Hospital Associated with Loving Care of Tender-hearted Father
Invincible Workers' Party of Korea Guided by Great Leader
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Today the Workers' Party of Korea has grown stronger into an invincible party which is confidently guiding the socialist cause despite severe hardship.
This reality would be unthinkable without the outstanding leadership of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho is cementing the leadership ability and fighting efficiency of the WPK in every way.
Kim Jong Unhas energetically led the struggle to dynamically accelerate the modeling of the whole Party on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and steadily enhance the leadership role of the Party in the new century of Juche.
At the Fourth Conference of the WPK in April Juche 101 (2012), he solemnly clarified the revolutionary faith and will of the WPK to uphold great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its eternal guiding ideology.
At the Seventh WPK Congress, too, he specified it again as the general task in the Party building to develop the WPK into the one of the great leaders.
He prioritized the strengthening of the Party cells and the primary Party committees as the two major tasks for strengthening the whole Party and clarified the practical programmes that serve as guidelines for further enhancing the functions and role of the basic Party organizations at the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Party Committees and the Fifth Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the WPK.
In his important speech at a lecture given on the 76th founding anniversary of the WPK, he indicated the ideal goal of the work for establishing the monolithic leadership system of the Party Central Committee at present.
He visited the Central Cadres Training School of the WPK, the highest institute of training Party cadres, and gave a historic lecture before its teaching staff and students on October 17, 2022. At that time he advanced the orientation of the Party building in the new era, a crucial milestone in the development of the Party and the revolution.
His great leadership has developed the Party further into an ideologically pure entity and an integral organization with the leader as the one and only center and into a guiding force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
The great WPK is demonstrating its dignity and might to the world, guided byKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a new heyday of strengthening the whole Party with his outstanding ideology and seasoned leadership. -0-

headline: Nampho Municipal Revolutionary Museum Visited by Many People in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Nampho Municipal Revolutionary Museum in the DPRK has been visited by many people with the resolve to defend and add shine to the leadership exploits of the Workers' Party of Korea and steadily carry forward the tradition of loyalty and patriotism shown by the pioneers in the Chollima era.
On display at the museum are photos showing the undying leadership exploits of the Party, which developed Nampho Municipality into a modern port city and a region playing an important role in the country's economic development, and the greatness of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unushering in a new era of comprehensive national prosperity. Also displayed there are precious historical relics and data on the revolutionary activities.
Recently, officials of the Party and power organs and working people’s organizations in the municipality and working people, youth and students of many units including the Chollima Steel Complex, the Kumsong Tractor Factory, the West Sea Barrage Office, the Nampho Municipal Schoolchildren's Footwear Factory, the Nampho Municipal School Uniform Factory, the Taedae Vegetable Farm in Waudo District and the Nampho University of Education have visited the museum to deeply grasp the revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great persons. -0-

headline: Truth behind Murder of Empress Myongsong
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese aggressors were a horde of brutes indulging in unethical crimes unprecedented in history.
Their brutal murder of the Empress Myongsong, a power holder of the feudal Joson dynasty, clearly proves the ferocity of the Japanese aggressors.
The Japanese aggressors' moves to colonize Korea reached their extremes in the late 19th century. However, Japan's domination over Korea reached the brink of collapse due to interference and pressure by big powers, and the Empress Myongsong's enforcement of anti-Japanese policy served as another big blow to Japan.
The Japanese aggressors, unable to fulfil their wild ambition, sought a way out in eliminating the Empress Myongsong.
They, who hatched a criminal plot to murder the first lady of the country, appointed Lieutenant General Miura Goro as its spearhead and dispatched him to Korea.
The military gangster, granted the absolute authority to mobilize any means necessary for murdering the Empress Myongsong, worked out a detailed plan for carrying it out.
On October 8, 1895, atrocities were launched under the direction of Miura.
The Japanese murderers infiltrated into the Korean Imperial Palace, confined the emperor and the prince, where they were, and ransacked the palace to find the empress.
They went on a killing spree, murdering all court ladies on their way. They finally found the empress breathing the last breath among the dead ladies. They dragged her body wrapped in quilt to a pile of firewood they had already prepared, poured oil and set fire on it.
Later, the Japanese imperialists, who brutally killed the Empress Myongsong, got more undisguised in their moves to subjugate Korea, and occupied Korea by force of arms at last.
The murder case was a hideous state-sponsored terrorism directly linked with the implementation of the policy of aggression on Korea.
The Japanese imperialists can never evade the responsibility for the past crimes. -0-

headline: Invincible Workers' Party of Korea Guided by Great Leader
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Today the Workers' Party of Korea has grown stronger into an invincible party which is confidently guiding the socialist cause despite severe hardship.
This reality would be unthinkable without the outstanding leadership of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho is cementing the leadership ability and fighting efficiency of the WPK in every way.
Kim Jong Unhas energetically led the struggle to dynamically accelerate the modeling of the whole Party on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and steadily enhance the leadership role of the Party in the new century of Juche.
At the Fourth Conference of the WPK in April Juche 101 (2012), he solemnly clarified the revolutionary faith and will of the WPK to uphold great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its eternal guiding ideology.
At the Seventh WPK Congress, too, he specified it again as the general task in the Party building to develop the WPK into the one of the great leaders.
He prioritized the strengthening of the Party cells and the primary Party committees as the two major tasks for strengthening the whole Party and clarified the practical programmes that serve as guidelines for further enhancing the functions and role of the basic Party organizations at the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Party Committees and the Fifth Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the WPK.
In his important speech at a lecture given on the 76th founding anniversary of the WPK, he indicated the ideal goal of the work for establishing the monolithic leadership system of the Party Central Committee at present.
He visited the Central Cadres Training School of the WPK, the highest institute of training Party cadres, and gave a historic lecture before its teaching staff and students on October 17, 2022. At that time he advanced the orientation of the Party building in the new era, a crucial milestone in the development of the Party and the revolution.
His great leadership has developed the Party further into an ideologically pure entity and an integral organization with the leader as the one and only center and into a guiding force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
The great WPK is demonstrating its dignity and might to the world, guided byKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a new heyday of strengthening the whole Party with his outstanding ideology and seasoned leadership. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Pays Congratulatory Visit to Kim Jong Un University of National Defence
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) --Kim Jong UnUniversity of National Defence, which has made distinguished contributions to building up the incomparably powerful self-defence capability of the DPRK, while glorifying its proud history and tradition as the country’s comprehensive base for education in defence science and technology in the long course of the revolution for accomplishing the great cause of building a rich country with a powerful army, is greeting its 60th founding anniversary with great pride.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, visited the university, the supreme temple dedicated to the training of talents in the Juche-oriented defence science and technology, on October 7 to congratulate its teaching staff and students on its 60th founding anniversary.
All the teaching staff and students of the university and the officials in the field of munitions industry and meritorious graduates, who visited their university, were full of great emotion and joy as they would get the greatest glory and happiness of receiving ComradeKim Jong Unin the campus on its diamond jubilee at the time when socialist Korea is demonstrating its dignity and prestige all over the world with its tremendous defence capability rapidly growing stronger thanks to the Party's far-reaching plan for building a military power and its ever-victorious leadership ability.
AsKim Jong Unarrived there, enthusiastic cheers went up.
All the participants paid the highest glory and respect toKim Jong Un, the symbol of the mightiness and ever-victorious banner of Juche Korea who ushers in a new era of the greatest and most dignified power in the history of the development of the DPRK with his iron faith, pluck, far-sighted wisdom and energetic and immortal leadership, as he regards the self-reliant defence as the mainstay of the defence and development of the revolution.
He received a salute from Col. General Jon Il Ho, president of the university.
An educator and a student of the university presented him with bouquets of fragrant flowers in humble reverence.
He warmly congratulated the reliable teaching staff and students who are upholding the Party's far-reaching cause of building a military power with the steadfast revolutionary spirit, matchless scientific and technological capabilities and proud academic achievements at the university, the source of the inexhaustible self-defensive military capability firmly guaranteeing the mightiness and invincibility of the state.
He was accompanied by Jo Chun Ryong, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Jong Sik, first deputy department director of the WPK Central Committee, Jang Chang Ha, director general of the Missile Administration of the DPRK, Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Jong Kyong Thaek, director of the KPA General Political Bureau.
Kim Jong Unmade a historic speech in commemoration of his congratulatory visit to the university.
Saying that it is a great pleasure of the WPK and the people and an auspicious event of the whole country to mark the 60th founding anniversary of the supreme academy of defence science and technology of the DPRK, which was born with the most sacred and just mission and has added brilliance to its name with the proud feats and academic achievements that it made for the country and revolution, he warmly congratulated all the lecturers, researchers, officials and students of the university on behalf of the WPK Central Committee, the government and all the armed forces of the DPRK.
Clarifying the immutable truth that the university of national defence is the most precious strategic asset for the revolutionary Party and people, he referred to the historic significance of the founding of the university which was born 60 years ago as a creation of the steadfast revolutionary will of the WPK to defend to the end the gains of the revolution won at the cost of blood by firmly holding its destiny in its own hands and the crystallization of its firm faith and ideal to provide an eternal guarantee for dignity and prosperity by building up great strength, and to its proud history and remarkable feats.
Analyzing the true colours and unchangeable nature of the imperialist aggressive entity which the DPRK has been confronting and its ever-more frantic provocative acts, he demonstrated the perfectness and validity of the DPRK's logic of building self-defence capability that it should have physical strength capable of always deterring the enemy and keeping the situation under control. He solemnly declared that the WPK and the government of the DPRK would never allow the balance of forces to be disrupted on the Korean peninsula, but bring about a continuous leap forward in defence science and industry and limitlessly bolster up the war deterrent for self-defence.
Underscoring the need to neutralize the imperialists' aggressive and adventurous military activities with absolute superiority of the Juche-oriented defence sci-tech capabilities, he set forth the basic duty the university assumes in accomplishing the important historic mission and just cause of building a new world, in which war, hegemony and injustice are not tolerated, by dint of the Juche-oriented weapons loaded with the might of revolutionary ideology and the spirit of death-defying resistance, and important tasks for fulfilling it.
Expressing the firm will of the Party Central Committee to successfully build the university into the supreme temple where the revolutionary talents and world-famous inventors representing the future of the DPRK's munitions industry and defence science are continually trained and into a prestigious and renowned defence science research centre, so as to guarantee the eternal well-being and prosperity of the country, he expressed belief that all the lecturers, researchers, students and graduates of the university would demonstrate forever the supremacy of the revolutionary industry with the fruition of noble revolutionary spirit and educational development and excellent academic successes and powerful entities, mindful of the expectations of the Party, country and people.
When he finished his speech, the participants responded with cheers of single-hearted loyalty as they looked up to the great teacher who clarified the great strategy of struggle for firmly defending and glorifying forever the ever-victorious prestige and honour of our state gained with the great revolutionary ideology and indomitable spirit and through the costly struggle and has guided the defence scientists in the drive to break through the cutting edge for boosting the defence capabilities.
He extended militant greetings to the teaching staff, students and graduates who were filled with the burning enthusiasm to absolutely guarantee the implementation of the Party’s policy on defence science with death-defying patriotic devotion, steady exertions and remarkable educational and scientific achievements by redoubling the absolute sense of mission they have assumed before the Party, revolution, country and people.
He went round the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the university.
He recalled with deep emotion the immortal exploits of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilwho declared the establishment of the centre for training talents in defence science and technology for the eternal dignity and might of the Korean revolution in the first half of the 1960s when the historic advance for the simultaneous promotion of economic construction and defence buildup, the embodiment of the WPK's idea of defending the country by national efforts, started and who developed it into a national defence university with worldwide prestige and reputation.
Saying that the proud history of the university, which has produced more than 180 DPRK heroes and labour heroes and dozens of winners of the highest orders in the past 60 years, is the epitome of the brilliant feats it performed as it played a core and pivotal role in accomplishing the historic cause of increasing national self-defence capabilities, he noted that the legendary reputation of the university, which has paved the way for the victorious advance of the country with loyalty to the Party and the revolution and great ability, should flutter as a banner in the vanguard of the struggle for securing the greatest military technological capability in the world.
The present world in which the destiny of a country and nation is decided by the national defence capability clearly proves that there is a sure guarantee for the existence of a state and its prosperity in systematically training a large contingent of talented personnel in the field of defence science and technology who have made the validity of their cause and ardent patriotism part of their mental qualities, he said, urging the university to train more revolutionary talents representing the future of the munitions industry and defence science, directly related to the future destiny of the country and revolution, and thus fulfill the important mission it has assumed before the times.
He repeatedly stressed the steadfast will of the Party to develop the university into the best one with the highest ability in the country and the most prestigious research-type one in the world where the integration of education, scientific research and production has been realized on the highest level, and took a benevolent measure to successfully spruce up its educational conditions and environment in a comprehensive way as required by the new era.
He met the meritorious officials, scientists and technicians in the field of national defence industry, who visited their alma mater on the occasion of its diamond jubilee, and had a picture taken with them.
Then he had a photo session with the teaching staff and students of the university greeting its 60th founding anniversary, which will be eternally recorded in the history.
All the teaching staff, students and graduates extended their gratitude to the benevolent father who visited the university to illuminate the path of a new revolution in the defence education with his original ideological and theoretical wisdom and extraordinary scientific insight and to show them warm love.
All the teaching staff and students raised stormy cheers out of loyalty and resolution while warmly seeing offKim Jong Unwho was leaving the university after showing love and trust to be handed down through generations.
The noble trace left by the respected ComradeKim Jong Unin the pedigree institution for training talents in defence science and technology will shine forever in history as a significant occasion which injected great vitality into the implementation of the WPK's far-reaching strategy for further consolidating and glorifying the irreversible position of the DPRK, which has emerged as the world’s military power, and as an important milestone in the revolution in national defence education. -0-
