topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Banquet Given in Celebration of 79th Founding Anniversary of WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the green zone park of the Central Cadres Training School of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on October 10, the 79th founding anniversary of the glorious WPK.
The venue of the banquet was filled with the excitement and joy of the participants greeting the significant day marking the ruling history of 79 years in the sacred place of the revolution which emerged as a powerful fortress guaranteeing the eternal future of the ever-victorious WPK.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, attended the banquet.
When the respected ComradeKim Jong Unarrived with his beloved daughter at the venue amid the playing of welcome music, all the participants greeted with warm applauses the general secretary of the WPK who is ushering in a heroic era of epochal changes for the pure succession and development of the WPK, prosperity of the country and well-being of the people with his profound ideological and theoretical activities and outstanding leadership practice.
Present there on invitation were members of the central leadership body of the Party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and teachers and researchers of the Central Cadres Training School of the WPK.
Also on hand were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and other leading members of his embassy as invited individual guests of the head of state.
Ri Il Hwan, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, made a congratulatory speech at the banquet.
All the participants toasted good health ofKim Jong Unwho always leads the great country and people to victory and glory with his brilliant wisdom and outstanding and seasoned leadership, and our great Party, country and people. -0-

headline: Dancing Parties of Women's Union Members Held in DPRK
Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Palestinian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on October 10.
The message said:
Please accept my respects.
We extend sincere congratulations to Your Excellency on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the veteran Workers' Party of Korea.
We take this glorious occasion to wish Your Excellency good health, happiness and success and the friendly DPRK government and people and the WPK greater progress and prosperity.
We pay high tribute to Your Excellency. -0-

headline: Mt Kumgang in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Mt Kumgang, a famous mountain in the DPRK, is a world-famous scenic spot.
The biosphere sanctuary of Mt Kumgang covers a vast area of over 262 580 hectares in Kosong, Kumgang and Thongchon counties of Kangwon Province.
Mt Kumgang is a complex of all natural beauties.
It consists of Outer Kumgang, Inner Kumgang and Sea Kumgang.
It is characterized by peculiar scenery of mountains and valleys.
On the peaks of the mountain, including Piro Peak and Chail Peak, there are many fantastic rocks of magic types, such as Samson Rock, Kwimyon Rock, Lion Rock and Rabbit Rock.
There are observation platforms, natural stone gates and natural caves.
The Manphok Ravine is the most famous of many valleys in the mountain.
In the mountain, there are more than 1 220 kinds of higher plants and many special plants and over 250 kinds of vertebrates, more than 30 kinds of wild animals and over 100 kinds of birds.
The mountain has Buddhist temples and precious cultural heritages.
Mt Kumgang was registered as a world biosphere sanctuary, the fifth of its kind in the DPRK, in July 2018. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Performance Given to Mark 79th Founding Anniversary of WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A performance was given at the Central Cadres Training School of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK, revving up the atmosphere of significantly greeting the holiday of the great WPK which was born as the guiding force of the revolution with a hammer, sickle and writing brush inscribed on its sacred red flag and leads the country and people to the steady success and prosperity.
The pedigree establishment for training the core of the WPK, symbolic of the absolute prestige of the WPK and the invincible cause of the revolution, was full of noble respect for the glorious history and exploits of the WPK which has carried forward the ideal and spirit of its founding in a pure, thorough and perfect way and demonstrated the dignity, honour and heroism of our great state to the whole world.
Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, enjoyed the performance.
WhenKim Jong Unarrived amid the playing of welcome music, stormy cheers of “Hurrah!” were raised.
All the participants paid the highest tribute toKim Jong Un, banner of all victories and glory, who is vigorously ushering in a new era of the comprehensive national rejuvenation while glorifying the immortal dignity and honor of the socialist ruling party with the longest history in the world with his outstanding revolutionary ideology and veteran and seasoned leadership.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwarmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers, extending congratulations to all the participants on the Party founding anniversary.
Among the audience were Presidium members of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and other members of the central leadership body of the Party, officials of the WPK Central Committee, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of armed forces organs, Party officials of ministries, national agencies and Pyongyang and teaching staff and students of the school.
Present there on invitation were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and other leading embassy members as invited individual guests of the head of state.
The performance began with women's chorus and men's chorus "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea". Put on the stage were hymns of the WPK and songs of patriotism which our people sang in praise of the great Party in the heroic path of accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
Through the immortal odes to the WPK, the performers sang in high praise of the world of the absolute trust and loyalty to the WPK which is creating the great history of building a rich country with strong army and ushering in a golden age with its outstanding leadership while demonstrating the kinship with the popular masses unprecedented in the world political history.
The songs in praise of the benevolent WPK which is getting stronger with victory century after century and dignified with the great exploits before the time and history and warm with the benevolence of translating all dreams of the people into reality raised the noble ideological emotions that the WPK is, indeed, the eternal conscience, heart and glory of the people.
The song "Care of My Destiny" depicting with rich feeling and poetic words of life the pure and clean loyalty to share the destiny with the WPK which gives happiness and honor to all the people, overcoming all trials, touched the heartstrings of the audience as it impressively represented the peculiar feelings sealed like bloodline between the Party and the popular masses.
The audience applauded "Song for the Motherland" and "Passion" sincerely and grandly singing the patriotic desire and passion for the eternal prosperity of the most beautiful, the greatest country.
The performance reached the climax with female chorus and male chorus "Our National Flag" and female solo and male chorus "National Anthem of the DPRK" as it excited the audience with the songs of singled-hearted loyalty and faith inexhaustible to the end of the world and times.
Fireworks were displayed amid the emotional cheers.
Kim Jong Unwarmly acknowledged the performers and the audience, expressing satisfaction over the successful performance.
All the participants raised stormy cheers with their burning determination to boundlessly remain faithful to the sacred cause of glorifying the glorious era ofKim Jong Uninto a golden age of developing the WPK with his great inheritance, outstanding leadership and warm loving care.
The performance for celebrating the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK significantly decorated the birthday of the motherly Party while boosting the all people-ideological emotion to greet every victory and honor along with the dignity of the WPK great in founding and in the whole history of its development. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings to from Russian Party Leader
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from G. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on October 10.
In the message, the chairman extended sincere congratulations to the respected ComradeKim Jong Un, all the members of the WPK and all the people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK.
In the difficult years, the Workers’ Party of Korea united the nation with the socialist idea, advanced new prospects and directions of activities for the people and served as a force that instilled hope for a just and happy new future of an independent and sovereign state, the message said, and went on:
The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, led by the Workers’ Party of Korea founded by ComradeKim Il Sung, has proved in practice the vivid vitality and validity of the socialist idea beyond the age as a model of bravery and stubbornness in attaining the set goal, and its international prestige has further risen and the number of countries recognizing it has continued to increase.
The message sincerely hoped that the Korean people would continue to advance successfully along the road of building a prosperous socialist society. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Palestinian President
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the armed forces of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on October 10.
The message said:
Please accept my respects.
We extend sincere congratulations to Your Excellency on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the veteran Workers' Party of Korea.
We take this glorious occasion to wish Your Excellency good health, happiness and success and the friendly DPRK government and people and the WPK greater progress and prosperity.
We pay high tribute to Your Excellency. -0-

headline: Mt Kumgang in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Mt Kumgang, a famous mountain in the DPRK, is a world-famous scenic spot.
The biosphere sanctuary of Mt Kumgang covers a vast area of over 262 580 hectares in Kosong, Kumgang and Thongchon counties of Kangwon Province.
Mt Kumgang is a complex of all natural beauties.
It consists of Outer Kumgang, Inner Kumgang and Sea Kumgang.
It is characterized by peculiar scenery of mountains and valleys.
On the peaks of the mountain, including Piro Peak and Chail Peak, there are many fantastic rocks of magic types, such as Samson Rock, Kwimyon Rock, Lion Rock and Rabbit Rock.
There are observation platforms, natural stone gates and natural caves.
The Manphok Ravine is the most famous of many valleys in the mountain.
In the mountain, there are more than 1 220 kinds of higher plants and many special plants and over 250 kinds of vertebrates, more than 30 kinds of wild animals and over 100 kinds of birds.
The mountain has Buddhist temples and precious cultural heritages.
Mt Kumgang was registered as a world biosphere sanctuary, the fifth of its kind in the DPRK, in July 2018. -0-

headline: Present Situation of U.S.-ROK Alliance on Defence Cost Sharing Negotiations
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Myong Chol, an international affairs analyst of the DPRK, issued the following article titled "Present situation of the U.S. and the ROK alliance on defence cost sharing negotiations":
Recently, the U.S. and the ROK concluded the negotiations for signing the 12th special agreement on defence cost sharing which had been held since April.
According to it, the ROK is expected to bear about 1 130 million US dollars, 8.3 percent above the previous year, in 2026, the first year of the agreement. And they agreed to adjust the annual rate of increase in the next four years in reflection of consumers' price index, etc.
A spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State said that the alliance between the U.S. and the ROK has been the linchpin of peace, security, and prosperity for Northeast Asia, the broader Indo-Pacific region, and beyond, adding that the agreement will be a significant accomplishment for both sides, and will strengthen their alliance and their shared defense.
Through the triumphant face of the master who celebrated the early agreement of the negotiation for the defence cost sharing by itself, the world people can feel once again the satisfaction of the U.S. forces in the ROK who will lead a luxurious life while receiving a huge amount of money on the pretext of defending the other state's security and the servility of the poor colonial stooge who have to beg for security while paying huge blood taxes collected from the people.
Since 1991, the ROK has been charged with the construction of bases for the U.S. forces' presence, payment of local employee wages, etc. Since then, the rising rate has increased steadily and produced the present high figure.
But the U.S., the master like a famished lion, has forced the sharply increased defence cost sharing, while talking about the "theory of withdrawal of the U.S. forces from the ROK" by opening the "lion's mouth" widely.
The lightning conclusion of the negotiation is a good thing for the ROK, which experienced the desperate situation by tremendous amount of money imposed by its master during the past administration.
However, the present U.S. administration, which is near the end of its term, hastily concluded the negotiations with its sinister purpose though the 11th "special agreement on the defence cost sharing" concluded in 2021 has been expired for one year.
The U.S. is bent on rallying its followers into new military blocs while reenergizing its-led bilateral and multilateral alliances, claiming that it cannot prevent the rapid growth of the anti-U.S. independent forces that are accelerating the definite change in the international mechanical structure by itself.
In particular, the puppet ROK depends on its political, economic and military sovereignty to the U.S. in the aspect of carrying out its long-term strategy to contain the DPRK and its neighboring countries and maintain the hegemony in the region. The ROK is the U.S. "asset" to easily use for its strategy.
The present U.S. administration admitted that it "fairly" set the cost sharing. This is a revelation of its sinister intention to emphasize the firm commitment made by the U.S. in its defence of the ROK and to keep using it as a shock brigade in establishing the U.S.-led "free order" by thrilling the stooges.
The ROK groups were keen on the new agreement on cost sharing in the light of their smart calculation to meet their interests to the maximum with the present chief executive who seems to be easy to deal with before the master of the White House is replaced.
However, how can the agreement which was made based on the far-fetched magnanimity of the master with a half heart to appease its dispirited ally and the selfish purpose of its servant contribute to the security of the ROK?
The precedent that the U.S. forced to include in the defence cost sharing the expense for the deployment of the U.S. strategic assets and for the maintenance of THAAD under the pretext of protecting the ROK clearly shows the true picture of the U.S.-style mode of dealing.
Demanding the revision of the "note on crisis control of the U.S. - ROK alliance" in 2019, the U.S. insisted that the range of the alliance's crisis control should be revised not only "in contingency of the Korean peninsula" but also "in contingency of the U.S." In this regard, the "expense for supporting the U.S. forces in the ROK for contributing to the defence of the Korean peninsula" which included the U.S.-ROK "special negotiation on defence cost sharing" can not preclude the possibility of being diverted to the accomplishment of duty in Taiwan and other regions of the Korean peninsula anytime in the future, pursuant to the U.S. Indo-Pacific strategy and its policy of bolstering strategic flexibility.
This eloquently proves that the defence cost sharing between the U.S. and the ROK, which was limited to the upkeep of the U.S. forces in the ROK, can be expended in a multi-purpose way for implementing the U.S. strategy for hegemony and that the increasing rate of the defence cost sharing from the ROK side is bound to be drawn a steep ascending curve.
The negotiation on defence cost sharing, which was concluded hastily, is a product of the political and strategic calculation and sinister scheme of the empire of evils to use the ROK puppets, who are at greater risk of security uneasiness and future danger of huge cost sharing, as a shock brigade for carrying out the strategy for world supremacy while more tightly seizing them as a faithful watchdog by showing "magnanimity" and "good will" and imposing huge amount of money on them continuously.
The conclusion of the negotiation shows that there can be no change in the basic attribute of the subordinating and unequal relations between the master and the servant, no matter how much the relations between the U.S. and the ROK are beautified with flattering words "alliance".
Whenever the master of the White House is replaced, the puppet ROK has to be seized with uneasiness over various issues ranging from security and economy to the cost of the U.S. forces' presence in it as a deserted woman. This fatalistic situation clearly shows the weakness of the U.S.-ROK alliance advertising the "supreme blood alliance" and "true friendly relations".
This is the present situation of the U.S.-ROK alliance, intertwined with mutual deception and selfish pursuit of benefit, and the fair evaluation of the world people. -0-

headline: Song for Homeland
Crucial Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Friday issued the following crucial statement "The trigger for defending sovereignty and security will be pulled up without hesitation":
The ROK is crossing the red line in its provocation against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
The most hostile and malicious rogue state, the ROK, committed such a grave political and military provocation as infiltrating drones into Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
Drone infiltrations were conducted by the ROK on October 3 and 9. They were followed by perpetration of such a hideous crime as scattering a huge number of anti-DPRK smear leaflets over the central part of Pyongyang through a midnight drone infiltration on October 10.
Smear leaflets, run through with inflammatory rumors and rubbish tarnishing the national sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and malignantly hurting its socialist system, were scattered in the central part of the capital city.
Not content with scattering leaflets along the border by balloons, the ROK infiltrated even into the sky of the DPRK's capital such drones which can be regarded as military attack means. The case is a serious provocation that can neither be overlooked nor be pardoned.
Its provocation beyond the limit line constitutes an open infringement on the sacred national sovereignty and security of the DPRK and a wanton violation of the international law and a grave military attack, for which the ROK must pay a dear price.
The ROK should neither justify the recent case in a trite way nor think of shirking its responsibility by making far-fetched assertions again.
The case is a typical instance that vividly betrays the national position of the ROK belonging to the most shameless, childish and vulgar category in the world and meanness of its clans.
It also evidently shows that the danger of armed conflict is created on the Korean peninsula due to the reckless and adventuristic acts of the ROK.
The international community should strongly denounce the bravado of the ROK, which is steadily escalating the danger of military conflict in the region while unhesitatingly committing provocations hard to sustain their aftermath, and unanimously call for thoroughly deterring them.
International law does not allow free flight of foreign aircraft or flying objects in the territorial airspace of a country, as well as "harmless flight".
The recent intrusion into the airspace is a grave crime encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and a clear target of the exercise of the right to self-defence.
The ROK chose self-destruction and is hastening its doom.
In the world, there is no country which will not react to the violation of its airspace and the drones of a hostile country flying over its capital.
We regard the recent provocation of the ROK as a serious political and military provocation that deserves retaliation according to the right to self-defence, without any further explanation and necessity.
The recent adventurous provocation of the enemies urgently requires our army to promptly judge what kind of action measure should be taken to discharge its sovereignty-defending mission granted by the DPRK Constitution and make a decision on launching the relevant retaliatory action.
The Ministry of National Defence, the General Staff and the army at all levels of the DPRK set about the preparations to cope with different occasions of the developing situation.
First, all the offensive means of the DPRK, to be involved in getting the military structures near the southern border and in the ROK collapsed, will get ready to carry out their activities promptly at any moment.
The stand expressed by our head of state some days ago that the DPRK has no intention to attack the ROK, does not mean that we are not ready to attack the ROK.
With the possibility of using all means of attack in readiness, we seriously warn the ROK as an ultimatum again to the last.
The ROK should immediately stop such irresponsible and dangerous provocation that may cause an armed conflict and lead to a war between the two sides.
If the ROK commits such a provocation as infiltrating a drone into airspace of the DPRK once again, the DPRK will launch an action immediately without any warning.
Taking this opportunity, we make it clear once again that the source and cause of all these disasters making the world people uneasy are in the ROK which has scattered political agitation scum into our inviolable territory despite our repeated warnings.
The ROK, which wantonly violated the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK, will face a horrible situation if it continues provocations, not bearing in mind this last warning of the DPRK.
The trigger safety device is now off.
The time for our attack is not decided by us.
We will watch everything in full preparedness.
Criminals should no longer gamble at risk for the lives of their people. -0-

headline: WPK Birthday Significantly Celebrated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK significantly celebrated the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Many people visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche where PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il, founder and builder of the Workers' Party of Korea, lie in state.
The visitors entered the park of the square and paid homage to the great leaders.
Officials, working people, service personnel and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting the peerlessly great men on Mansu Hill and in other parts of the country to lay floral baskets, bouquets and flowers at them.
Many people visited the Monument to Party Founding.
There were national flag-raising ceremonies in different parts of the country.
At the Pyongyang International House of Culture where the 5th National Sculpture and Craftwork Festival is held in celebration of the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK, the visitors looked round sculptures and craftworks reflecting the wishes of all the people to the great motherly Party.
Celebration and oratorical meetings were held by working people's organizations in South Phyongan, Jagang and North Hamgyong provinces and Kaesong Municipality, etc.
Performances were given in Pyongyang and other parts of the country to celebrate the October holiday.
The dancing parties of young people and women's union members revved up the festive mood.
Service facilities in the capital city and other parts of the country were crowded with visitors.
The Central Zoo, the Natural History Museum, the Munsu Water Park and other bases for cultural and emotional life were filled with happy laughter of citizens. -0-

headline: Japanese Delegation Here
story_text: Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese organization for the study of the Juche idea headed by Yoko Hayashi, vice-chairperson of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, arrived here by air on Thursday.-0-

headline: New Houses Built in Ryonggang County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A new village has appeared at the Ryonghung Farm in Ryonggang County, Nampho Municipality of the DPRK.
The new scenery of the farm village is a fruition of the energetic guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unto provide the agricultural workers with more wonderful and civilized living conditions.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Jo Yong Su, secretary of the Nampho Municipal Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and agricultural workers in Ryonggang County.
Rim Yong Man, vice-chairman of the Nampho Municipal People's Committee, made a congratulatory address. Then licenses for the use of houses were handed over and speeches made.
A performance was given by members of the county mobile artistic motivation team, and officials visited the new houses to share joy with their owners. -0-

headline: Evening Gala and Firework Display Held in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- An evening gala of youth and students and a firework display took place atKim Il SungSquare in the capital city of Pyongyang on October 10 to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
The evening gala began amid the playing of the song "The Mother's Birthday".
The young people danced to the tune of songs such as "Our Leader Loved by People" and "Glory to Our Great Party".
Singing songs praising the Party, the participants continued dancing with joy and optimism with which they are glorifying the most precious days of their life under the benevolent care of the respected fatherly MarshalKim Jong Un.
The venue for the evening gala was filled with the revolutionary spirit of the passionate youths to work hard to implement the Party's decision with youthful enthusiasm and mettle.
Fireworks were set off and the song "Song of Youth" played amid the cheerful dance.
The night sky of October was alight with fireworks of various shapes, and the square was full of joy of youth and students and citizens marking the auspicious holiday. -0-

headline: Crucial Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings to from Russian Party Leader
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from G. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on October 10.
In the message, the chairman extended sincere congratulations to the respected ComradeKim Jong Un, all the members of the WPK and all the people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK.
In the difficult years, the Workers’ Party of Korea united the nation with the socialist idea, advanced new prospects and directions of activities for the people and served as a force that instilled hope for a just and happy new future of an independent and sovereign state, the message said, and went on:
The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, led by the Workers’ Party of Korea founded by ComradeKim Il Sung, has proved in practice the vivid vitality and validity of the socialist idea beyond the age as a model of bravery and stubbornness in attaining the set goal, and its international prestige has further risen and the number of countries recognizing it has continued to increase.
The message sincerely hoped that the Korean people would continue to advance successfully along the road of building a prosperous socialist society. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Friday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Uncontributes a discourse "Officials Should Become Communist Revolutionaries Who Possessed the Party's Original Ideals and Spirit as Their Mental Qualities" to Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Workers' Party of Korea.
- A performance was given to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK. (photos accompanied)
- A reception was given on the same occasion.
- On the occasion of the above-said anniversary,
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived messages of greeting from the president of the State of Palestine and the chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
Members of the WPK central leadership body visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to the great leaders.
- An evening gala of youth and students and a dancing party of women's union officials and members took place to celebrate the 79th WPK anniversary.
- The 79th birthday of the WPK was significantly celebrated in the country.
- Old women in Songrim City of North Hwanghae Province and Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province received centenary birthday spreads.
- Production increases at 120 percent in contrast to the last year at the Ryonpho Greenhouse Farm.
- A delegation of the Japanese organization for the study of the Juche Idea arrived here.
- An international affairs analyst's article notes that the U.S.-ROK negotiations on sharing defence costs are the outcome of the evil empire's politically-motivated black-hearted design to tighten the chain put on its faithful dogs, the ROK puppets, by showing "magnanimity" and "benevolence" for them and use them as its faithful brigade for realizing its strategy for dominating the world, while continuously imposing the huge burden of defence cost on them. -0-

headline: Members of WPK Central Leadership Body Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Dancing Parties of Women's Union Members Held in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of officials and members of the women's union took place at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph here on October 10 to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
The dancing party began amid the playing of the song "Glory to Our Great Party" representing boundless gratitude and respect for the motherly Party.
The participants danced, full of great pride of enjoying all blessings in the genuine people's country, a dignified socialist power led by the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
They were full of the will to steadfastly carry forward the baton of loyalty of the women of the preceding generations who made a tangible contribution to the prosperity of the country.
The dancing party showed well the enthusiasm of the women's union officials and members to fully display the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women in the drive to usher in a new era of comprehensive national rejuvenation, following the great Party on the road of invariable patriotism.
Officials and members of the women's union in other parts of the country had such dancing parties on the same day. -0-

headline: Great Achievements in Glorifying National History
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- At the foot of Mt Taebak in Kangdong County of Pyongyang, there is the Mausoleum of King Tangun, the founder of the Korean nation.
The mausoleum is a precious cultural treasure as it fully reflects the developed culture and the political, economic and military might of Ancient Korea in terms of history, based on the traditional tomb style of the nation.
It was reconstructed magnificently to suit the spirit of Tangun's Korea, a powerful country in the East, on October 11, Juche 83 (1994).
The mausoleum, successfully reconstructed as an eternal treasure of the Korean nation, is associated with the undying leadership exploits of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Il.
The President gave historians several precious instructions to intensify the study of Tangun. He was very pleased with the discovery of the Mausoleum of King Tangun, the ancestral father of the Korean nation, and his remains and relics in the county of Kangdong in early 1993, and saw to it that the mausoleum was rebuilt into the great one in Pyongyang, as befits the tomb of the founding-father.
On September 27 that year, he visited Kangdong County and personally chose the site for the mausoleum and unfolded a blueprint to build it as befits the mausoleum of the founder.
On July 6, 1994, the last period of his great life, he was busy guiding a consultative meeting of senior officials in the economic field, but he examined the final miniature of the mausoleum.
The Chairman made sure that it was correctly proved that Tangun was a real man through modern science and technology, and took measures to preferentially supply everything needed for the reconstruction of the mausoleum.
On October 29, 1994, he looked round the rebuilt mausoleum and said that it should be perfect as it is a historic national treasure to be handed down to posterity and set forth tasks for preserving and managing it.
The mausoleum shows the exploits ofKim Il Sungand
Kim Jong Ilwho glorified the ancestral father of the Korean nation and the history of the nation spanning 5 000 years, and adds to the pride and self-esteem of the Korean nation. -0-

headline: Birthday Spreads to Centenarians
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent birthday spreads to Kim Pong Nam, a woman centenarian living in the people's neighborhood unit No. 41 of Sinryang-ri, Songrim City of North Hwanghae Province, and Sim Sun Than, a woman centenarian living in the people's neighborhood unit No. 32 of Sinbo-ri, Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province, on their 100th birthdays.
Deeply moved by his loving care, the centenarians expressed their deep gratitude toKim Jong Un.
Officials of Songrim and Hyesan city committees of the Workers' Party of Korea visited their families to congratulate them. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday:
- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued a crucial statement to condemn the ROK for its infiltration of drones into Pyongyang, a serious political and military provocation.
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to a woman centenarian living in Kilju County, North Hamgyong Province.
- The Russian ambassador to the DPRK hosted a reception on the occasion of the 76th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
- Successes have been made in various economic sectors.

Rodong Sinmun
- A political essay says that only victory and glory are always in store for the Workers' Party of Korea advancing toward the building of communist society, the ideal of mankind, by steadfastly carrying forward the Party's original ideals and spirit.
- An article calls upon all the people to turn out in the drive to bring about a miraculous victory this year.
- The 2024 Intellectual Property Development Exhibition closed.

Minju Joson
- The paper echoes what officials have said after receiving a historic discourse given byKim Jong Unto Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the WPK Central Committee.
- An editorial says that the officials should enhance their Party spirit, revolutionary spirit and popular spirit as intended by the Party Central Committee. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of WPK Central Committee
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement titled "ROK military is hard to evade its responsibility for chiefly grave infringement upon DPRK sovereignty and accomplice" on October 12:
The most childish Republic of Korea which is utterly ignorant is resorting to a stereotyped method to suit to the nature with which it was born in order to evade the responsibility for the recent drone intrusion case.
As soon as the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued a crucial statement, military gangsters of the ROK were busy trying to evade the responsibility while making a shameless and childish excuse, saying that they did not do it and have not yet grasped the situation and the military did not send drones to the north and should confirm that a non-governmental organization send drones.
It is a miscalculation if the military thinks that it can easily pass through the crucial infringement upon the sovereignty of our state, even though the military impudently asserts that they did not do it, and avoid the concern and eyes of the international community.
It would be evidently problematic if the military did not identify that drones by a non-governmental organization crossed the border at random.
The ROK military has loudly advertised its "watertight detection and tracking ability."
Does the military become blind suddenly at a flying flock of birds, mistaking it for “drones from the north”?
It has asserted that even the fact that the drones from its region crossed the border several times should be confirmed and, so I wonder what the ROK people ask for the military.
Even the leaflet-scattering over the capital city of the opposite country will be regarded as a grave politically-motivated provocation and an infringement upon sovereignty but the fact that the means which carried the leaflets is the very drones is the core of the seriousness of the recent incident.
If the military has connived at the fact that its people committed an act of openly infringing upon other's sovereignty by use of drones recognized by the world as an undeniable military multi-purpose means and at the fact that such infringement means that can be considered to be provocative can occur an incident fostering the danger of arms conflict, crossing the border of the other belligerent country the border, it is a deliberate connivance and conspiracy and only provides a clear proof that the leading figures in the drone infiltration case are none other than the military gangsters.
Even though they boasted that they are the "strong ROK army", talking about "together with the people" on the "ROK army day" some days ago, they are using the people as a shield without hesitation at a blind alley. Their sordid wordplay only reveals the meanness and baseness of the military of the ROK.
As their assertion shows, it means that though our non-governmental organizations, not the army, scatter political agitation leaflets in the sky over the presidential office in Seoul with drones, it is not problematic.
I'd liked to watch how the government of the ROK and, in particular, the military gangsters will respond to such real thing.
In conclusion, the ROK military directly committed the drone infiltration case or the provocation of infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK was committed under its positive fostering and connivance.
Indeed, the minister of National Defense of the ROK, when his petty excuse of shifting the blame to the non-governmental organization did not work on, expressed his uncertain attitude, saying that “it is impossible to confirm it strategically[ in terms of national security and strategic security.”
Such attitude of neither denying nor admitting the case proves that the military admitted by itself that it is the chief criminal or accomplice of the current incident as a revelation of its mental state that it can admit the case, unable to deny it.
It is little short of an open declaration that even though a provocation of infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK that “can not be confirmed” is repeated or it leads to the outbreak of war, they have no responsibility for it.
As we have already foreseen and the world has witnessed at all times, this time, too, the ROK is trying hard to distort the truth and deceive the world people with groundless assertion made by it with its habitual excuse and deformed thinking.
Revealed before the world once again were the base nature and astonishing real picture of dangerous those to gamble with the lives of the people.
Clear is that ROK scum conducted a rubbish balloon campaign with provocative nature for the first time and those of the ROK have steadily aggravated the situation, far from abandoning their dirty bad habit despite our warning.
The ROK is crying that we had flied "dirty balloons" 28 times just like a guilty party filing the suit first but it is well advised to make public how many times the organizations of defectors from the DPRK did such acts before it calculates the times.
Our entire act is an essential measure taken in the principle of correspondence.
No matter how desperately the ROK may try to mislead public opinion as if our correspondence is taken without reason, it will not come up to its intention.
We have no concern about who is the main force of provoking the recent drone incident and its performers.
We only look squarely the fact that whatever the military gangsters and an organization of human scum who defected from the DPRK, they are the fellows of the shameless ROK.
As we repeat our clear stand, we will take a strong corresponding retaliatory action in disregard of ingredient in case drones carrying anti-DPRK political motivation rubbish from the ROK across the border infiltrate again into the territorial sky of the DPRK.
This is the exercise of the sovereign state's right to self-defense that cannot be considered.
Those who are not taking any proper stand to check escalation of tension and armed conflict but making a bluff and lame excuse with reckless courage, even though they made Seoul Municipality and the whole of the ROK a target and put their people on the kitchen board will certainly hear only the people's voices of criticism.
They will be well advised to worry about the immediate price for repeated provocation and cope with it.
Even though the ROK military is racking its brain to evade the responsibility for their infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK with incoherent impudence and abnormal sophism, they will certainly pay a dear price for violently infringing upon the inviolable sovereignty of our state and doing a serious harm to its security in any way.
I hope that the people will judge whether the strong and brave reckless and bold attitude of the ROK military which jumps from the frying pan into the fire will defend the genuine safety of the ROK.
As I reaffirm once again, as clarified by the DPRK Foreign Ministry, our attack time for destroying Seoul and the military force of the ROK is not clarified in our military action plan.
That time is not set by us.
However, the moment that a drone of the ROK is discovered in the sky over our capital city once again will certainly lead to a horrible disaster.
Personally, I wish that such thing will not happen. -0-

headline: Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Russian ambassador to the DPRK hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club here on Friday on the occasion of the 76th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
Present there on invitation were Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, and officials concerned.
Members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
Russian Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora made a speech at the reception.
Noting that the two countries celebrate the day of the establishment of diplomatic relations as their common holiday every year and the day of this year was decorated with special colors, he referred to the fact that Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, andKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, signed the treaty on comprehensive strategic partnership on June 19.
The treaty put on the highest level of partnership the strategic and tactical consultations and cooperative relations between the two countries which are developing successfully on the basis of the principled agreements made by the top leaders of the two countries at previous summit talks and injected great impetus into the development of the bilateral relations, he noted.
We are witnessing how rapidly the Russia-DPRK cooperation is developing in several fields, he said, adding that the one of main purposes of the treaty is to pool efforts to continuously improve the people's well-being and that the treaty provides conditions for rapid development of bilateral cooperation in the fields of education, public health, sci-tech, agriculture and so on.
Then DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui made a speech.
The traditional DPRK-Russia friendly relations have greeted a new heyday thanks to the sincerest comradely relations between the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand the respected President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, she said, adding that the three DPRK-Russia summit meetings marked a historic event which clearly proved the truthfulness of friendship and unity between the two countries and developed the DPRK-Russia relations into comprehensive strategic partnership and invincible relations of comrades-in-arms.
It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to closely boost support and solidarity with the Russian Federation in every field on the basis of the new inter-state treaty and achieve the lasting development of the invincible DPRK-Russia friendly relations, true to the high intention of the top leaders of the two countries, she said.
She expressed belief that the Russian army and people would unite around President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin as one and surely win victory in accomplishing the sacred cause of defending the sovereign right and security of the country and building an independent multi-polar world.
The participants toasted the health ofKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and the health of Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, and the steady development of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the peoples of the two countries and the comprehensive strategic partnership. -0-

headline: Mass Sports Activities Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Mass sports activities are brisk across the DPRK.
This year alone, more than 280 units across the country have become model sports units (including double) amid brisk sports activities at factories, enterprises, farms, etc. true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to make sports mass-based and part of everyday life.
The Chongryu Restaurant is organizing diverse sports events on several occasions to help its employees acquire more than one sports skill.
The Unha Technological Preparatory Centre under the Unha Trade Bureau and the Okryu Children's Hospital put the mass sports on a normal basis, thus encouraging the enthusiasm of their officials and employees for sports.
The Tansang Sportswear Manufactory under the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports and the Phungyang Farm in Jongphyong County, South Hamgyong Province are striving to encourage and popularize Taekwon-Do, the orthodox martial art of the Korean nation.
The North Hwanghae Provincial General Hospital, the Pyongyang Plastic Building Materials Factory and many other units are conducting the work to raise the public interest in sports in various forms and by various methods.
The Sangwon Cement Complex organizes national sports games including Korean wrestling and tug of war and various ball games.
The Haeju Smeltery and the Jagang Provincial Information and Communications Centre are organizing diverse sports and amusement games to make every workplace full of revolutionary optimism and enthusiasm. -0-

Even though the ROK military is racking its brain to evade the responsibility for their infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK with incoherent impudence and abnormal sophism, they will certainly pay a dear price for violently infringing upon the inviolable sovereignty of our state and doing a serious harm to its security in any way.
I hope that the people will judge whether the strong and brave reckless and bold attitude of the ROK military which jumps from the frying pan into the fire will defend the genuine safety of the ROK.
As I reaffirm once again, as clarified by the DPRK Foreign Ministry, our attack time for destroying Seoul and the military force of the ROK is not clarified in our military action plan.
That time is not set by us.
However, the moment that a drone of the ROK is discovered in the sky over our capital city once again will certainly lead to a horrible disaster.
Personally, I wish that such thing will not happen. -0-

headline: Birthday Spread to Women Centenarian
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to Ju Ok Kum, a woman centenarian living in the people's neighborhood unit No. 104 of Yongnam Workers' District, Kilju County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
Officials of the Party and power organs in the county, villagers and relatives visited Ju's house to congratulate her.
She has brought up many children to work at the posts for national defence and theatres for socialist construction. She is respected by people for her help to her family members so that they can work hard to carry out their revolutionary tasks. -0-

headline: Intellectual Property Development Exhibition Closes in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The 2024 Intellectual Property Development Exhibition closed in the DPRK.
On display at the exhibition were more than 2 600 invention certificates, patents, trademarks, industrial design rights, copyrights, etc. of substantial significance in developing economy, science and technology and culture.
There were exchanges of excellent successes and experience gained in the efforts to usher in a new era of overall development of socialism during the exhibition.
A closing ceremony took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on October 11.
Present there were Choe Tong Myong, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Sung Jong Gyu, minister of Culture, officials concerned and officials and working people of the units which presented their products.
Diplomas were awarded toKim Il SungUniversity, the Kwangchon Chicken Farm, the Samhung Economic IT Centre, and other exemplary units.
Participants, who presented excellent proposals, received relevant certificates and prizes.
Vice-Premier Jon Sung Guk made a closing address. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday:
- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued a crucial statement to condemn the ROK for its infiltration of drones into Pyongyang, a serious political and military provocation.
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to a woman centenarian living in Kilju County, North Hamgyong Province.
- The Russian ambassador to the DPRK hosted a reception on the occasion of the 76th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
- Successes have been made in various economic sectors.

Rodong Sinmun
- A political essay says that only victory and glory are always in store for the Workers' Party of Korea advancing toward the building of communist society, the ideal of mankind, by steadfastly carrying forward the Party's original ideals and spirit.
- An article calls upon all the people to turn out in the drive to bring about a miraculous victory this year.
- The 2024 Intellectual Property Development Exhibition closed.

Minju Joson
- The paper echoes what officials have said after receiving a historic discourse given byKim Jong Unto Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the WPK Central Committee.
- An editorial says that the officials should enhance their Party spirit, revolutionary spirit and popular spirit as intended by the Party Central Committee. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of WPK Central Committee
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement titled "ROK military is hard to evade its responsibility for chiefly grave infringement upon DPRK sovereignty and accomplice" on October 12:
The most childish Republic of Korea which is utterly ignorant is resorting to a stereotyped method to suit to the nature with which it was born in order to evade the responsibility for the recent drone intrusion case.
As soon as the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued a crucial statement, military gangsters of the ROK were busy trying to evade the responsibility while making a shameless and childish excuse, saying that they did not do it and have not yet grasped the situation and the military did not send drones to the north and should confirm that a non-governmental organization send drones.
It is a miscalculation if the military thinks that it can easily pass through the crucial infringement upon the sovereignty of our state, even though the military impudently asserts that they did not do it, and avoid the concern and eyes of the international community.
It would be evidently problematic if the military did not identify that drones by a non-governmental organization crossed the border at random.
The ROK military has loudly advertised its "watertight detection and tracking ability."
Does the military become blind suddenly at a flying flock of birds, mistaking it for “drones from the north”?
It has asserted that even the fact that the drones from its region crossed the border several times should be confirmed and, so I wonder what the ROK people ask for the military.
Even the leaflet-scattering over the capital city of the opposite country will be regarded as a grave politically-motivated provocation and an infringement upon sovereignty but the fact that the means which carried the leaflets is the very drones is the core of the seriousness of the recent incident.
If the military has connived at the fact that its people committed an act of openly infringing upon other's sovereignty by use of drones recognized by the world as an undeniable military multi-purpose means and at the fact that such infringement means that can be considered to be provocative can occur an incident fostering the danger of arms conflict, crossing the border of the other belligerent country the border, it is a deliberate connivance and conspiracy and only provides a clear proof that the leading figures in the drone infiltration case are none other than the military gangsters.
Even though they boasted that they are the "strong ROK army", talking about "together with the people" on the "ROK army day" some days ago, they are using the people as a shield without hesitation at a blind alley. Their sordid wordplay only reveals the meanness and baseness of the military of the ROK.
As their assertion shows, it means that though our non-governmental organizations, not the army, scatter political agitation leaflets in the sky over the presidential office in Seoul with drones, it is not problematic.
I'd liked to watch how the government of the ROK and, in particular, the military gangsters will respond to such real thing.
In conclusion, the ROK military directly committed the drone infiltration case or the provocation of infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK was committed under its positive fostering and connivance.
Indeed, the minister of National Defense of the ROK, when his petty excuse of shifting the blame to the non-governmental organization did not work on, expressed his uncertain attitude, saying that “it is impossible to confirm it strategically[ in terms of national security and strategic security.”
Such attitude of neither denying nor admitting the case proves that the military admitted by itself that it is the chief criminal or accomplice of the current incident as a revelation of its mental state that it can admit the case, unable to deny it.
It is little short of an open declaration that even though a provocation of infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK that “can not be confirmed” is repeated or it leads to the outbreak of war, they have no responsibility for it.
As we have already foreseen and the world has witnessed at all times, this time, too, the ROK is trying hard to distort the truth and deceive the world people with groundless assertion made by it with its habitual excuse and deformed thinking.
Revealed before the world once again were the base nature and astonishing real picture of dangerous those to gamble with the lives of the people.
Clear is that ROK scum conducted a rubbish balloon campaign with provocative nature for the first time and those of the ROK have steadily aggravated the situation, far from abandoning their dirty bad habit despite our warning.
The ROK is crying that we had flied "dirty balloons" 28 times just like a guilty party filing the suit first but it is well advised to make public how many times the organizations of defectors from the DPRK did such acts before it calculates the times.
Our entire act is an essential measure taken in the principle of correspondence.
No matter how desperately the ROK may try to mislead public opinion as if our correspondence is taken without reason, it will not come up to its intention.
We have no concern about who is the main force of provoking the recent drone incident and its performers.
We only look squarely the fact that whatever the military gangsters and an organization of human scum who defected from the DPRK, they are the fellows of the shameless ROK.
As we repeat our clear stand, we will take a strong corresponding retaliatory action in disregard of ingredient in case drones carrying anti-DPRK political motivation rubbish from the ROK across the border infiltrate again into the territorial sky of the DPRK.
This is the exercise of the sovereign state's right to self-defense that cannot be considered.
Those who are not taking any proper stand to check escalation of tension and armed conflict but making a bluff and lame excuse with reckless courage, even though they made Seoul Municipality and the whole of the ROK a target and put their people on the kitchen board will certainly hear only the people's voices of criticism.
They will be well advised to worry about the immediate price for repeated provocation and cope with it.
Even though the ROK military is racking its brain to evade the responsibility for their infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK with incoherent impudence and abnormal sophism, they will certainly pay a dear price for violently infringing upon the inviolable sovereignty of our state and doing a serious harm to its security in any way.
I hope that the people will judge whether the strong and brave reckless and bold attitude of the ROK military which jumps from the frying pan into the fire will defend the genuine safety of the ROK.
As I reaffirm once again, as clarified by the DPRK Foreign Ministry, our attack time for destroying Seoul and the military force of the ROK is not clarified in our military action plan.
That time is not set by us.
However, the moment that a drone of the ROK is discovered in the sky over our capital city once again will certainly lead to a horrible disaster.
Personally, I wish that such thing will not happen. -0-

headline: Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Russian ambassador to the DPRK hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club here on Friday on the occasion of the 76th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
Present there on invitation were Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, and officials concerned.
Members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
Russian Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora made a speech at the reception.
Noting that the two countries celebrate the day of the establishment of diplomatic relations as their common holiday every year and the day of this year was decorated with special colors, he referred to the fact that Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, andKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, signed the treaty on comprehensive strategic partnership on June 19.
The treaty put on the highest level of partnership the strategic and tactical consultations and cooperative relations between the two countries which are developing successfully on the basis of the principled agreements made by the top leaders of the two countries at previous summit talks and injected great impetus into the development of the bilateral relations, he noted.
We are witnessing how rapidly the Russia-DPRK cooperation is developing in several fields, he said, adding that the one of main purposes of the treaty is to pool efforts to continuously improve the people's well-being and that the treaty provides conditions for rapid development of bilateral cooperation in the fields of education, public health, sci-tech, agriculture and so on.
Then DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui made a speech.
The traditional DPRK-Russia friendly relations have greeted a new heyday thanks to the sincerest comradely relations between the respected ComradeKim Jong Unand the respected President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, she said, adding that the three DPRK-Russia summit meetings marked a historic event which clearly proved the truthfulness of friendship and unity between the two countries and developed the DPRK-Russia relations into comprehensive strategic partnership and invincible relations of comrades-in-arms.
It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to closely boost support and solidarity with the Russian Federation in every field on the basis of the new inter-state treaty and achieve the lasting development of the invincible DPRK-Russia friendly relations, true to the high intention of the top leaders of the two countries, she said.
She expressed belief that the Russian army and people would unite around President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin as one and surely win victory in accomplishing the sacred cause of defending the sovereign right and security of the country and building an independent multi-polar world.
The participants toasted the health ofKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and the health of Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, and the steady development of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the peoples of the two countries and the comprehensive strategic partnership. -0-

headline: Party-building Exploits Performed for Times and History
Mass Sports Activities Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Mass sports activities are brisk across the DPRK.
This year alone, more than 280 units across the country have become model sports units (including double) amid brisk sports activities at factories, enterprises, farms, etc. true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to make sports mass-based and part of everyday life.
The Chongryu Restaurant is organizing diverse sports events on several occasions to help its employees acquire more than one sports skill.
The Unha Technological Preparatory Centre under the Unha Trade Bureau and the Okryu Children's Hospital put the mass sports on a normal basis, thus encouraging the enthusiasm of their officials and employees for sports.
The Tansang Sportswear Manufactory under the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports and the Phungyang Farm in Jongphyong County, South Hamgyong Province are striving to encourage and popularize Taekwon-Do, the orthodox martial art of the Korean nation.
The North Hwanghae Provincial General Hospital, the Pyongyang Plastic Building Materials Factory and many other units are conducting the work to raise the public interest in sports in various forms and by various methods.
The Sangwon Cement Complex organizes national sports games including Korean wrestling and tug of war and various ball games.
The Haeju Smeltery and the Jagang Provincial Information and Communications Centre are organizing diverse sports and amusement games to make every workplace full of revolutionary optimism and enthusiasm. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of WPK Central Committee
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement "Reckless challenge hysteria will hasten the miserable end of the ROK" on October 13:
The Ministry of Defense of the puppet Republic of Korea, which went busy shirking responsibility after perpetrating an extremely dangerous politically-motivated military provocation by using even drones, world-recognized major military attack means, has finally and fully betrayed its true colors as chief provocateur and culprit.
Much upset by the frosty public gaze and media hype, the puppet Ministry of Defense slipped off its veil of ambiguity just within 24 hours and made public what it called a statement of its stand on Sunday, in which it let out a string of impudent rubbish turning black into white that branded our just will to exercise the right to self-defence as "a typical trick to breed discord in the south and turn the tide of situation" and held the DPRK "wholly accountable for the current situation." Worse still, it officially announced its reckless suicidal choice, disgustingly and impudently touting once again the "end of regime" in the DPRK.
This is just an unpardonable, malicious challenge to our state and people that offered with maximum patience an opportunity once again to it as an ultimatum, and a hideous crime of seeking to light a fuse for the outbreak of a war at any cost.
The world should correctly know those silly, stupid and dangerous ones.
They go beyond human knowledge and imagination in their recklessness, affected by weird mutations.
They defend their country and people with bluffing and tongue-lashing.
They will be in a fit of hysteria until their miserable deaths.
Such scum should be thrown into a dumping ground.
It seems that the gangsters of Seoul persist in bluffing, still failing to properly judge the circumstances and misjudging the current situation as a trade of insult.
The military gangsters of the ROK should refrain from acting rashly.
They should immediately opt for guaranteeing the prevention of recurrence of such provocation as violating the airspace of another country. -0-

headline: Statement of Spokesman for Ministry of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Grave touch-and-go military tensions are prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the ROK's wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK through infiltrations of drones into its capital city of Pyongyang.
On October 12 the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA), estimating that there is a high possibility of ROK's additional drone infiltration into our airspace above the border and the capital city, conducted relevant undertakings to fully prepare units at all levels for coping with any developments of situation, presupposing the circumstances in which immediate strikes on specific enemy targets are inevitable in confirmation of the recurrence of provocation and it is impossible to rule out the possibility of an ensuing extended armed conflict.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea made public a statement in this regard on Sunday afternoon.
The spokesman also made public that the General Staff of the KPA issued a preliminary operation order on October 12 to the combined artillery units along the border and the units taking on an important firepower task to get fully ready to open fire.
According to the spokesman's statement, the General Staff's preliminary operation order specified an instruction to place eight artillery brigades fully armed at full wartime strength on standby to open fire and complete various operational supply undertakings until 20:00 of October 13.
The General Staff instructed units and sub-units of all levels to intensify monitoring on full alert.
Anti-air observation posts have been reinforced in the capital city of Pyongyang. -0-

headline: Project for Putting Education on IT Basis of Higher Level Accelerated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Education in the DPRK pushes ahead with the project for improving the quality of education by putting it on an IT basis of higher level.
The ministry has stepped up the work to develop the nationwide pedagogic informatics system. It organized a control group for developing the system and a study group involving teachers and researchers from various universities.
Officials concerned are directing efforts to standardizing the educational data on an IT basis at educational units at all levels.
Meanwhile, they are making exact demands on relevant units to successfully carry out their assignments in order to secure IT-based educational data. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Spokesman for Ministry of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following press statement "Gambling with the lives of people will result in miserable ruin" on October 13:
The Republic of Korea persists in letting out lame excuses and impudent rubbish despite the fact that it perpetrated a grave provocation of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK.
The national security office chief of the puppet presidential office spouted such rubbish that "defiance" of the warning is "the most correct answer," far from seriously reflecting on the case and making efforts to prevent recurrence.
The territory of the ROK will be mercilessly plunged into a terrible disaster in case of recurrence. However, he asserts defiance is the correct answer. It seems that he has secured an assurance of recurrence prevention although he says he doesn't know the one behind the case.
The world has clearly heard such absurd remarks unhesitatingly let out by a guy responsible for the security of the ROK.
Any tiny spark may trigger an armed clash on the Korean peninsula physically in a state of hostilities.
So it is needless to say that the infiltration of drones playing a primary striking role on current battlefields into airspace above the capital city of a belligerent country constitutes an undeniable war provocation.
Now a hair-trigger situation, in which a war may break out any moment, is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the reckless bravery of the ROK's military.
Now that powerful attack means might be used according to our judgment and decision and the whole ROK might turn into piles of ashes, the man with the title of security office chief only busies himself with face saving, bluffing with nasty language and gambling with the lives of his people. We are curious about the follow-up rating of his behavior.
Then, let us consider once again the stand of the ROK's minister of defense taking an ambiguous stand without denying or acknowledging the current situation.
The drone that had infiltrated into the sky above the capital city of our Republic is not the one that can be flied by a civilian organization anywhere.
It is the one to be flied with special launcher or runway so such excuse that it was flied by civilians can not work.
Then, let's assume that the drone provocation was committed by a civilian organization used as an excuse, as claimed by the Ministry of Defense of the ROK.
Can it be understood that its military and police, which claim are put on "high alert", failed to notice civilian organizations flying drones across the border by using a launcher or a runway?
We have already judged that the military of the ROK is behind a series of drone infiltrations. And we warn repeatedly that we will take action according to our judgment, regarding any drones to be spotted again as the ones from the ROK and deeming it a declaration of war.
It had better interpret the meaning of the word "terrible ruin" and judge what choice we will make true to our declaration about terrible ruin. -0-

The territory of the ROK will be mercilessly plunged into a terrible disaster in case of recurrence. However, he asserts defiance is the correct answer. It seems that he has secured an assurance of recurrence prevention although he says he doesn't know the one behind the case.
The world has clearly heard such absurd remarks unhesitatingly let out by a guy responsible for the security of the ROK.
Any tiny spark may trigger an armed clash on the Korean peninsula physically in a state of hostilities.
So it is needless to say that the infiltration of drones playing a primary striking role on current battlefields into airspace above the capital city of a belligerent country constitutes an undeniable war provocation.
Now a hair-trigger situation, in which a war may break out any moment, is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the reckless bravery of the ROK's military.
Now that powerful attack means might be used according to our judgment and decision and the whole ROK might turn into piles of ashes, the man with the title of security office chief only busies himself with face saving, bluffing with nasty language and gambling with the lives of his people. We are curious about the follow-up rating of his behavior.
Then, let us consider once again the stand of the ROK's minister of defense taking an ambiguous stand without denying or acknowledging the current situation.
The drone that had infiltrated into the sky above the capital city of our Republic is not the one that can be flied by a civilian organization anywhere.
It is the one to be flied with special launcher or runway so such excuse that it was flied by civilians can not work.
Then, let's assume that the drone provocation was committed by a civilian organization used as an excuse, as claimed by the Ministry of Defense of the ROK.
Can it be understood that its military and police, which claim are put on "high alert", failed to notice civilian organizations flying drones across the border by using a launcher or a runway?
We have already judged that the military of the ROK is behind a series of drone infiltrations. And we warn repeatedly that we will take action according to our judgment, regarding any drones to be spotted again as the ones from the ROK and deeming it a declaration of war.
It had better interpret the meaning of the word "terrible ruin" and judge what choice we will make true to our declaration about terrible ruin. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of WPK Central Committee
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement "Reckless challenge hysteria will hasten the miserable end of the ROK" on October 13:
The Ministry of Defense of the puppet Republic of Korea, which went busy shirking responsibility after perpetrating an extremely dangerous politically-motivated military provocation by using even drones, world-recognized major military attack means, has finally and fully betrayed its true colors as chief provocateur and culprit.
Much upset by the frosty public gaze and media hype, the puppet Ministry of Defense slipped off its veil of ambiguity just within 24 hours and made public what it called a statement of its stand on Sunday, in which it let out a string of impudent rubbish turning black into white that branded our just will to exercise the right to self-defence as "a typical trick to breed discord in the south and turn the tide of situation" and held the DPRK "wholly accountable for the current situation." Worse still, it officially announced its reckless suicidal choice, disgustingly and impudently touting once again the "end of regime" in the DPRK.
This is just an unpardonable, malicious challenge to our state and people that offered with maximum patience an opportunity once again to it as an ultimatum, and a hideous crime of seeking to light a fuse for the outbreak of a war at any cost.
The world should correctly know those silly, stupid and dangerous ones.
They go beyond human knowledge and imagination in their recklessness, affected by weird mutations.
They defend their country and people with bluffing and tongue-lashing.
They will be in a fit of hysteria until their miserable deaths.
Such scum should be thrown into a dumping ground.
It seems that the gangsters of Seoul persist in bluffing, still failing to properly judge the circumstances and misjudging the current situation as a trade of insult.
The military gangsters of the ROK should refrain from acting rashly.
They should immediately opt for guaranteeing the prevention of recurrence of such provocation as violating the airspace of another country. -0-
