headline: Statement of Spokesman for Ministry of National Defence of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Grave touch-and-go military tensions are prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the ROK's wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK through infiltrations of drones into its capital city of Pyongyang.
On October 12 the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA), estimating that there is a high possibility of ROK's additional drone infiltration into our airspace above the border and the capital city, conducted relevant undertakings to fully prepare units at all levels for coping with any developments of situation, presupposing the circumstances in which immediate strikes on specific enemy targets are inevitable in confirmation of the recurrence of provocation and it is impossible to rule out the possibility of an ensuing extended armed conflict.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea made public a statement in this regard on Sunday afternoon.
The spokesman also made public that the General Staff of the KPA issued a preliminary operation order on October 12 to the combined artillery units along the border and the units taking on an important firepower task to get fully ready to open fire.
According to the spokesman's statement, the General Staff's preliminary operation order specified an instruction to place eight artillery brigades fully armed at full wartime strength on standby to open fire and complete various operational supply undertakings until 20:00 of October 13.
The General Staff instructed units and sub-units of all levels to intensify monitoring on full alert.
Anti-air observation posts have been reinforced in the capital city of Pyongyang. -0-

headline: Munsu Water Park in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Ten-odd years have passed since the Munsu Water Park was built in the capital city of Pyongyang in October 2013, under the noble loving care and energetic leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. In the period, at least 4.5 million working people and schoolchildren enjoyed themselves there.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unpersonally chose its site with a plan to provide the DPRK people with a modern water park. And he energetically guided the work to turn it into a comprehensive and multi-functional base for cultural and leisure activities where the working people and schoolchildren can enjoy themselves in all seasons.
This year alone, more than 700 000 working people, youth and students and many other citizens have visited the Munsu Water Park to have a good time. -0-

headline: Project for Putting Education on IT Basis of Higher Level Accelerated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Education in the DPRK pushes ahead with the project for improving the quality of education by putting it on an IT basis of higher level.
The ministry has stepped up the work to develop the nationwide pedagogic informatics system. It organized a control group for developing the system and a study group involving teachers and researchers from various universities.
Officials concerned are directing efforts to standardizing the educational data on an IT basis at educational units at all levels.
Meanwhile, they are making exact demands on relevant units to successfully carry out their assignments in order to secure IT-based educational data. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Monday:
- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Sunday released a press statement titled "Reckless challenge hysteria will hasten the miserable end of the ROK".
- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of National Defence issued a press statement as regards the fact that the ROK has persisted in letting out lame excuses and impudent rubbish after it perpetrated a grave provocation of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK.
- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of National Defence announced that the General Staff of the Korean People's Army issued an order to the combined artillery units along the border and the units taking on an important firepower task to get fully ready to open fire.
- An article and a political essay say that the whole country is seething with the strong will for thousand-fold retaliation after receiving the crucial statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
- A session of Permanent Commission of the Standing Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK took place.
- Successes have been made in different sectors of the national economy.
- The DPRK won at the 2024 Asian Table Tennis Championships.
- A meeting for account settlement and income distribution took place at the Toksong Farm in Anak County of South Hwanghae Province which has exceeded the peak-year level.
- The 2024 Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest in Celebration of the 75th Day of Physical Culture opened.
- The General Association of Koreans in China held events to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
- An international security analyst's article warned that the Japan's "reinvasion ship" will be doomed to sinking.
- The 110th candlelight rally and demonstration for impeachment of puppet Yoon Suk Yeol were staged in the puppet ROK.

Rodong Sinmun
- Women's union organizations at all levels have conducted artistic motivation team activities at major economic theaters.

Minju Joson
- An article says that the peoples of the DPRK and Russia greeted the 76th anniversary of the establishment of their diplomatic relations at a historic time when the DPRK-Russia friendly relations entered the road of fresh overall development. -0-

headline: DPRK Wins at Asian Table Tennis Championships
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Kum Yong, a player of the DPRK, placed first at the women's singles of the 2024 Asian Table Tennis Championships.
The championships, held in Astana of Kazakhstan from October 6 to 13, brought together more than 200 men and women players selected from over 20 countries and regions, including the DPRK, China, Thailand, Uzbekistan and India.
Kim Kum Yong beat her Chinese rival 3:0 in the round of 16, a player of the puppet ROK 3:1 in the quarterfinals and a player of Chinese Hong Kong 3:0 in the semi-finals and advanced into the finals.
In the finals held on October 13, she defeated her Japanese rival 3:1 and bagged a gold medal.
Meanwhile, Ri Jong Sik and Kim Kum Yong came second and Ham Yu Song and Pyon Song Gyong third in the mixed doubles. -0-

headline: Process of Producing Nutritive Powder for Children Established
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Rason Municipality of the DPRK has established a production line for nutritive powder at the Sonbong Children's Nutritive Foodstuff Factory.
The process establishment laid a foundation for supplying nutritious foodstuffs to the children in the municipality on a regular basis.
The factory produces a lot of nutritive powder every day. -0-

headline: Significant Day in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- October 14, 1945 is a significant day when PresidentKim Il Sungmade a historic speech on his triumphal return to the homeland after achieving the historic cause of national liberation.
79 years ago, a Pyongyang mass rally welcoming the President was held at the then Pyongyang Public Playground.
When the President appeared on the platform, the people broke into thunderous cheers of "Hurrah for GeneralKim Il Sung".
He waved back to the cheering masses and made a speech "Every Effort for the Building of a New, Democratic Korea".
He said in his speech: This time has come when we Korean people have to unite our strength to build a new, democratic Korea. People from all strata should display patriotic enthusiasm and turn out to build a new Korea. All people who truly love their country, their nation and democracy must unite closely and build an independent and sovereign democratic state.
When his speech was over, the masses expressed support with their enthusiastic applause and cheers.
The speech was a patriotic appeal for the building of a genuine people's new country under the banner of unity and a solemn declaration heralding the start of independent, new democratic Korea. -0-

headline: 110th Candlelight Rally and Demo Staged in Puppet ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The public anger at the Yoon Suk Yeol group, which made no scruple of committing a hideous provocation to escape from the serious impeachment crisis, is now growing stronger in the puppet ROK.
On Oct. 12, the whole areas of the ROK were seething with the public passion for massive impeachment resistance to bring into the court of people and mercilessly punish puppet Yoon and his group, the prosecution-based dictatorial force called confrontation maniac, wicked power-seeker and kingpin of corruption and irregularities.
The 110th candlelight rally and demonstration demanding the impeachment of Yoon was staged in Seoul on the theme of "Down with the despicable Yoon-Kon Hui group!"
Workers, peasants, students, lawmakers from opposition parties and many other people in the whole areas of the ROK turned out in a large-scale candlelight action for the impeachment of puppet Yoon Suk Yeol.
At the rally, people from all walks of life expressed their surging wrath at the Yoon group which is creating security uneasiness with the danger of a war and raising a whirlwind of "martial law" to tide over its worst ruling crisis.
On the recent case in which the puppet group scattered a huge number of anti-DPRK smear leaflets over the sky of Pyongyang through drone infiltration, speakers charged that the Yoon regime is scheming even a war to tide over its ruling crisis.
They pointed out that the Yoon group, driven into a tight corner, is seeking to get rid of the ruling crisis through the "martial law" by putting forward the puppet military gangsters.
The rally also referred to the strong demand for referendum urging the resignation of Yoon.
At the end of the rally, its participants staged a demonstration in the area of Seoul, holding such large placards and posters as "Let's impeach Yoon to avoid war!" and chanting slogans.
The demonstrators were joined by passers-by along streets.
Candlelight action was staged not only in Seoul but also in different regions including Kwangju and North Kyongsang Province on the same day.
Meanwhile, a students group urging the impeachment of Yoon started a sit-in strike outside the puppet National Assembly on September 21 and has continued its struggle in Seoul for 22 days. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement on Monday:
We clearly know that the military dregs of the ROK are chiefly to blame for the case of drone infiltration into Pyongyang.

headline: Int'l Security Analyst's Article on Japan's "Reinvasion" Ship
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Ryo Won, an international security analyst of the DPRK, issued the following article titled "Japan's 'reinvasion' ship will be doomed to sinking":
Being preoccupied by the ambition for reinvasion with the confrontation current of a "new Cold War" brought by the U.S., Japan gets hell-bent on the reckless moves for turning itself into a military giant, escalating the military tension in the region.
The latest attack submarine Chogei (giant whale), be officially commissioned as a main warship of the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force", revealed its shape on the sea on October 4.
This submarine is the fifth of those eight attack submarines of Taigei (big whale) type planned to be built till 2030. Reportedly this ship has been improved further than existing ones in terms of displacement, submergence capability and search function and it was also designed to ensure the launch of heavy torpedoes and anti-warship missiles.
Japan, which is draining the sea of its resources by hunting for food such whales under international protection at random, now launches into the sea menacing entities transformed into "monster whales". This is another dangerous act of harming the regional security environment.
Japan has built attack submarines one after another since it established a system of 22 submarines in 2022. Such moves were prompted by its intention to increase the promptness and effectiveness of preemptive attack by loading on those submarines long-range missiles and guided missiles to be newly developed and, at the same time, to enhance the naval operation capability and thus seize the naval supremacy.
This goes to prove that Japan is still seeking its ambition for "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
Japan is getting frantic with the possession of aircraft carriers, new-type Aegis warships and latest submarines, the development of various kinds of missiles and new-generation fighters and the deployment of such ultra-modern offensive weapons. The military expansion of Japan extending into all spheres such as outer space, sea and cyber, arouses serious concern not only in the international community but also in Japanese society.
The Japanese reactionaries give to their newly-building warships such names of notorious warships as Taigei involved in the aggressive war in the last century. The fact vividly shows the present nature of the Japan Maritime "SDF" closely resembling the old Japanese navy and their yearning for the past and revanchism.
Japan's final aim of vociferating about "threat from its neighboring countries" so often is also to cover up its extremely adventurous and provocative moves for arms buildup, which have systematically violated the regional geopolitical security balance, zealously pursuant to the U.S. policy, with a veil of lawfulness and rightness.
Far from liquidating the unprecedented blood-stained crimes committed against the peoples of Asian countries in the last century, Japan, a war criminal state, is running headlong along a reinvasion track, throwing away the veil of "pacifist country" and "exclusive defense", with the wild ambition to become the "leader" of the region again. Its arms buildup comes to the surface as the biggest threat seriously disturbing the regional peace and stability.
Japan is gradually widening the radius of its military operations in the Asia-Pacific region while talking about "the harshest and most complicated security environment after the war".  Such action will only invite serious distrust and antagonism of regional countries and, inevitably, be led to the geopolitical and strategic isolation of the island country.
Japan's "reinvasion ship", which is making the ocean dirty, pursuant to the U.S. trying to use its junior allies as the puppets dashing even at jaws of death and as bullet shields for maintaining its hegemony, will be doomed to sinking.
The end of the Imperial Japanese Army teaches it. -0-

headline: Press Statement of External Policy Office Chief of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The chief of the External Policy Office of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following press statement "The U.S. frantic anti-DPRK 'human rights' conspiratorial racket will only highlight its completely bankrupt policy toward the DPRK" on October 13:
The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" pressure racket for tarnishing the image of the dignified DPRK and justifying its illegal, hostile policy to it has reached an extremely reckless phase.
Recently, the "human rights envoy" and the roving ambassador in charge of international criminal and judicial affairs of the U.S. Department of State invited the authorities of the puppet ROK and various riff-raff "human rights" organizations to a confab in Seoul for breeding a "human rights" plot against our state. Earlier, a high-ranking official of the U.S. Department of State was closeted with those from its vassal countries on the theme of "human rights" in the UN arena.
Notably, the "human rights envoy" of the U.S. Department of State asserted that "influx of information and spread of religion" in the DPRK constitute the "core pillar of the U.S. policy toward north Korea," thus acknowledging that it is the goal of the current U.S. administration's policy toward the DPRK to bring its ideology and social system to collapse.
The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK strongly denounces and rejects the "human rights" trumpeting of the U.S., the world's worst human right abuser country, branding it as a wanton violation of the dignity and sovereignty of our state and a grave politically-motivated provocation against it.
Now the attempts to overthrow social systems of other countries and moves to interfere in their internal affairs, being openly committed by the U.S. under the signboard of "human rights, have become the root cause of fomenting political disorder and armed conflicts and causing massacres of civilians across the world. This proves that the "human rights" farce and "information influx" spearheaded by the U.S. are, indeed, the most serious threat to global peace and stability.
Witnessing the crude and mean behavior of the present U.S. administration seeking to “decorate” the finale of its term with such disgusting anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, we can clearly see the inner world of the White House exasperated by the situation of its DPRK policy that has been worn out structurally and has gone belly up politically.
The U.S. should be aware that its futile "human rights" racket will only further highlight the true colors of its "denuclearization" policy that ended in a real flop.
Steadfast is our determination and will to firmly defend our national sovereignty, political system and wellbeing of the people politically, physically and legally, coping with the U.S. and its followers' ever-aggravating anti-DPRK "human rights" moves.
The DPRK will mercilessly eliminate any objects and elements posing a threat to its sovereignty and security and continue to take practical measures to defend the rights and interests of its people with recourse to its great strength.
This will inevitably hasten the arrival of the reality that the U.S. doesn’t wish and is most afraid of. -0-

headline: Koreans in China Celebrate Birthday of WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China (GAKC) held events to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
On October 10, baskets of flowers were laid before the statue of PresidentKim Il Sungat Yuwen Middle School in Jilin by the GAKC and its affiliated organizations. And floral baskets in the names of the GAKC, the Association of Korean Women in China, the Association of Young Korean Nationals in China, and the Jilin City branch of the Jilin Regional Association, the Zhongnan Regional Association and the Dandong City branch of the Liaoning Regional Association under the GAKC and the family of Hwang Baek Ha, a Korean in China related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, were placed before the portraits of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Iland artworks depicting them at the DPRK missions in Beijing, Shenyang and Dandong of China.
A seminar on the respected ComradeKim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of ComradesKim Il SungandKim Jong IlIs Ever-Victorious" was held at the conference hall of the GAKC headquarters.
Present there were Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and other officials of the GAKC headquarters, Chairperson Han Song Ok and members of the Association of Young Korean Nationals in China and members of the Shenyang City branch of the Liaoning Regional Association.
Choe Un Bok courteously conveyed the immortal work ofKim Jong Un.
Then followed speeches.
Speakers noted thatKim Il SungandKim Jong Ilsuccessfully accomplished the historic cause of Party founding and consolidated the organizational and ideological foundation of the Party to steadily develop the WPK into the revolutionary Party of Juche, an invincible revolutionary party.
Thanks to the rare ideo-theoretical wisdom and outstanding leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong UN, the WPK has developed into the Party of ComradesKim Il SungandKim Jong Il, an era of our state-first principle, the most glorious era in the nation's history of 5 000 years, is being ushered in the DPRK and the Korean people have become the people of a powerful country looking down at the world with high national dignity, great judgment, extraordinary creative ability and plenty of pluck, they stressed.
A celebration reception was given on the same day.
Organizations affiliated to the GAKC, too, held diverse celebration events. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, released the following press statement on Monday:
We clearly know that the military dregs of the ROK are chiefly to blame for the case of drone infiltration into Pyongyang.

headline: Int'l Security Analyst's Article on Japan's "Reinvasion" Ship
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Ryo Won, an international security analyst of the DPRK, issued the following article titled "Japan's 'reinvasion' ship will be doomed to sinking":
Being preoccupied by the ambition for reinvasion with the confrontation current of a "new Cold War" brought by the U.S., Japan gets hell-bent on the reckless moves for turning itself into a military giant, escalating the military tension in the region.
The latest attack submarine Chogei (giant whale), be officially commissioned as a main warship of the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force", revealed its shape on the sea on October 4.
This submarine is the fifth of those eight attack submarines of Taigei (big whale) type planned to be built till 2030. Reportedly this ship has been improved further than existing ones in terms of displacement, submergence capability and search function and it was also designed to ensure the launch of heavy torpedoes and anti-warship missiles.
Japan, which is draining the sea of its resources by hunting for food such whales under international protection at random, now launches into the sea menacing entities transformed into "monster whales". This is another dangerous act of harming the regional security environment.
Japan has built attack submarines one after another since it established a system of 22 submarines in 2022. Such moves were prompted by its intention to increase the promptness and effectiveness of preemptive attack by loading on those submarines long-range missiles and guided missiles to be newly developed and, at the same time, to enhance the naval operation capability and thus seize the naval supremacy.
This goes to prove that Japan is still seeking its ambition for "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
Japan is getting frantic with the possession of aircraft carriers, new-type Aegis warships and latest submarines, the development of various kinds of missiles and new-generation fighters and the deployment of such ultra-modern offensive weapons. The military expansion of Japan extending into all spheres such as outer space, sea and cyber, arouses serious concern not only in the international community but also in Japanese society.
The Japanese reactionaries give to their newly-building warships such names of notorious warships as Taigei involved in the aggressive war in the last century. The fact vividly shows the present nature of the Japan Maritime "SDF" closely resembling the old Japanese navy and their yearning for the past and revanchism.
Japan's final aim of vociferating about "threat from its neighboring countries" so often is also to cover up its extremely adventurous and provocative moves for arms buildup, which have systematically violated the regional geopolitical security balance, zealously pursuant to the U.S. policy, with a veil of lawfulness and rightness.
Far from liquidating the unprecedented blood-stained crimes committed against the peoples of Asian countries in the last century, Japan, a war criminal state, is running headlong along a reinvasion track, throwing away the veil of "pacifist country" and "exclusive defense", with the wild ambition to become the "leader" of the region again. Its arms buildup comes to the surface as the biggest threat seriously disturbing the regional peace and stability.
Japan is gradually widening the radius of its military operations in the Asia-Pacific region while talking about "the harshest and most complicated security environment after the war".  Such action will only invite serious distrust and antagonism of regional countries and, inevitably, be led to the geopolitical and strategic isolation of the island country.
Japan's "reinvasion ship", which is making the ocean dirty, pursuant to the U.S. trying to use its junior allies as the puppets dashing even at jaws of death and as bullet shields for maintaining its hegemony, will be doomed to sinking.
The end of the Imperial Japanese Army teaches it. -0-

headline: Press Statement of External Policy Office Chief of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The chief of the External Policy Office of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following press statement "The U.S. frantic anti-DPRK 'human rights' conspiratorial racket will only highlight its completely bankrupt policy toward the DPRK" on October 13:
The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" pressure racket for tarnishing the image of the dignified DPRK and justifying its illegal, hostile policy to it has reached an extremely reckless phase.
Recently, the "human rights envoy" and the roving ambassador in charge of international criminal and judicial affairs of the U.S. Department of State invited the authorities of the puppet ROK and various riff-raff "human rights" organizations to a confab in Seoul for breeding a "human rights" plot against our state. Earlier, a high-ranking official of the U.S. Department of State was closeted with those from its vassal countries on the theme of "human rights" in the UN arena.
Notably, the "human rights envoy" of the U.S. Department of State asserted that "influx of information and spread of religion" in the DPRK constitute the "core pillar of the U.S. policy toward north Korea," thus acknowledging that it is the goal of the current U.S. administration's policy toward the DPRK to bring its ideology and social system to collapse.
The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK strongly denounces and rejects the "human rights" trumpeting of the U.S., the world's worst human right abuser country, branding it as a wanton violation of the dignity and sovereignty of our state and a grave politically-motivated provocation against it.
Now the attempts to overthrow social systems of other countries and moves to interfere in their internal affairs, being openly committed by the U.S. under the signboard of "human rights, have become the root cause of fomenting political disorder and armed conflicts and causing massacres of civilians across the world. This proves that the "human rights" farce and "information influx" spearheaded by the U.S. are, indeed, the most serious threat to global peace and stability.
Witnessing the crude and mean behavior of the present U.S. administration seeking to “decorate” the finale of its term with such disgusting anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, we can clearly see the inner world of the White House exasperated by the situation of its DPRK policy that has been worn out structurally and has gone belly up politically.
The U.S. should be aware that its futile "human rights" racket will only further highlight the true colors of its "denuclearization" policy that ended in a real flop.
Steadfast is our determination and will to firmly defend our national sovereignty, political system and wellbeing of the people politically, physically and legally, coping with the U.S. and its followers' ever-aggravating anti-DPRK "human rights" moves.
The DPRK will mercilessly eliminate any objects and elements posing a threat to its sovereignty and security and continue to take practical measures to defend the rights and interests of its people with recourse to its great strength.
This will inevitably hasten the arrival of the reality that the U.S. doesn’t wish and is most afraid of. -0-

headline: Many Saplings Grow in South Phyongan Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- South Phyongan Province of the DPRK is cultivating millions of saplings needed for tree planting.
Officials and employees of the provincial tree nursery have increased the production of saplings of great economic value, suited to the climate and natural features of their region, and raised many saplings good for greening.
Officials and working people in Hoechang, Yangdok and Maengsan counties grow well good species of saplings, including pine-nut tree and Larix lepolepis. -0-

headline: Process of Producing Nutritive Powder for Children Established
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Rason Municipality of the DPRK has established a production line for nutritive powder at the Sonbong Children's Nutritive Foodstuff Factory.
The process establishment laid a foundation for supplying nutritious foodstuffs to the children in the municipality on a regular basis.
The factory produces a lot of nutritive powder every day. -0-

headline: Significant Day in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- October 14, 1945 is a significant day when PresidentKim Il Sungmade a historic speech on his triumphal return to the homeland after achieving the historic cause of national liberation.
79 years ago, a Pyongyang mass rally welcoming the President was held at the then Pyongyang Public Playground.
When the President appeared on the platform, the people broke into thunderous cheers of "Hurrah for GeneralKim Il Sung".
He waved back to the cheering masses and made a speech "Every Effort for the Building of a New, Democratic Korea".
He said in his speech: This time has come when we Korean people have to unite our strength to build a new, democratic Korea. People from all strata should display patriotic enthusiasm and turn out to build a new Korea. All people who truly love their country, their nation and democracy must unite closely and build an independent and sovereign democratic state.
When his speech was over, the masses expressed support with their enthusiastic applause and cheers.
The speech was a patriotic appeal for the building of a genuine people's new country under the banner of unity and a solemn declaration heralding the start of independent, new democratic Korea. -0-

headline: Calculating Even Consumption of Condiments
story_text:
One day in November 1968, PresidentKim Il Sungvisited the then Pyongyang Soybean Paste and Sauce Factory which was newly built.
First of all, he looked round the production lines of soybean paste and sauce one by one.
After acquainting himself in detail with the production of soybean sauce and paste, he said he was very pleased to see the factory kept in good condition and stressed the need to always maintain a cultured way of production as it is a foodstuff factory.
Calculating the amount of a condiment necessary for the people on his pocket book at a technical preparation room, he said to his attendants that it is needed to calculate the production amount in consideration of the case that the people mix soybean paste and sauce in soup and dish.
Looking upon the benevolent image of the President who calculates even the consumption of condiments for the people's diet, the officials came to be full aware of their duty as devoted servants for the people. -0-

headline: Efficient X-type Water Turbines Installed at Hydro-power Stations
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The hydroelectric power sector in the DPRK steps up the installation of efficient X-type water turbines.
The Ministry of Electric Power Industry worked out a plan for installing X-type water turbines on various generators on the basis of learning about the facilities of power stations in the hydroelectric power sector. And it has pushed ahead with the installation project in cooperation with relevant units.
The Sodusu Power Station installed an X-type water turbine in a generator to increase the generating capacity.
Similar project was conducted at Thaechon and other power stations. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Convenes Consultative Meeting on National Defence and Security
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, convened a consultative meeting on national defence and security on Oct. 14.
Present there were No Kwang Chol, minister of National Defence of the DPRK, Jo Chun Ryong, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the KPA, Ri Chang Dae, minister of State Security, and commanding officers of the Artillery Bureau, Detection and Electronic Warfare Bureau and other major bureaus of the KPA General Staff.
The meeting heard a report of the director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau on the general analysis of the case of enemy's serious provocation that violated the sovereignty of the DPRK, a report of the chief of the KPA General Staff on the military counteraction plan, a report of the minister of National Defence on the measures for modernizing weaponry, a report of the WPK secretary in charge of munitions industry on the production of weapons and equipment, and a report of the minister of State Security on the situation of intelligence operation.
Kim Jong Unmade assessments and conclusions on the information and suggested measures specified in the reports of different defence and security organs.
After hearing a report on the relevant work done by the General Staff and the major combined units' combat readiness, he set forth the direction of immediate military action and indicated important tasks to be fulfilled in the operation of the war deterrent and the exercise of the right to self-defence for safeguarding the national sovereignty, security and interests.
He expressed a tough political and military stand of the WPK and the DPRK government at the consultative meeting. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Tuesday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unconvened a consultative meeting on national defence and security. (photo accompanied)
- Successes have been made in various economic sectors and units.
- Men's and women's football matches for the DPRK Championships came to an end.
- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports left here for Russia.
- A delegation of the Japanese organization for the study of the Juche idea toured different places.

Rodong Sinmun
- An article says that no matter how desperately the imperialists may resort to the inter-camp confrontation, they can never check the trend of the era of independence.
- Another article discloses the crafty moves of the U.S. and Western countries to evade the responsibility for the climate crisis and shift it onto others.

Minju Joson
- An article marks Global Handwashing Day. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's Loving Care Shown for Schoolchildren
story_text:
One day in November 2016, the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unvisited the newly-remodeled Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace.
At the room for a string music group, he listened to the playing of its members and praised them for their excellent playing. He said that the sound of playing is loud as a large number of members played instruments in a small room, referring to the wrong arrangement of the hobby room.
Earlier, looking round the fine art group room, he corrected the wrong view of officials only regarding high indoor temperature as good, and gave detailed instructions on setting up a general control room at the palace and installing a temperature sensor in each hobby room so that the temperature can be monitored in real time and automatically controlled.
Looking up to General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho put his mind on providing children with a happy palace without slightest shortcomings, the officials could not raise their heads.
Saying that if sound is too loud, the auditory sense of group members may be impaired, he stressed the need to rearrange the hobby rooms in conformity with the size and character of each hobby group at the palace.
Upon receiving his instructions, the officials hardened their determination to fulfill their duty in the education of the rising generation. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Spokesperson for Korea Association for Human Rights Studies
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Korea Association for Human Rights Studies released the following press statement on October 14:
At the recent 79th session of the UN General Assembly, a report of the "special rapporteur" on human rights situation of the DPRK, which malignantly hurts the DPRK's policy of guaranteeing genuine human rights and its true situation, was distributed as an official document of the UN.
The report is run through with such fabrications as "forcible missing and repatriation", "torture and maltreatment in detention facilities" and "suppression of free movement and speech", and inflammatory remarks taking issue with even the regular legislative activities of the DPRK, its internal affair and exercise of sovereignty.
The Korea Association for Human Rights Studies categorically rejects the report, a product of the U.S. and the West's conspiracy to escalate confrontation with the DPRK, branding it as the most hideous document for ill-intended political propaganda fabricated to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK.
The report terms the most advantageous emergency anti-epidemic measure, which firmly ensured our people's right to living when millions people lost their lives due to the global crisis caused by COVID-19, "violation of human rights." Furthermore, it even paints a black picture of the legislative measure taken by the DPRK to defend its ideology and social system from the heinous ideological and cultural poisoning by the U.S. and the West seeking the internal erosion and collapse of the sovereign state, and calls for "reproach." This constitutes a wanton violation of our sovereignty and interference in our internal affairs, which can never be pardoned.
The "special rapporteur" on human rights situation of the DPRK, who echoes the rubbish and false rumors spread by the U.S. and the vassal forces to play the role of a missionary for its anti-DPRK "human rights" conspiratorial racket is, indeed, a puppet and top-class servant of the U.S.
We keep a record of every confrontational trace of the "special rapporteur" who often visited the ROK to let out a string of offensive remarks against the DPRK like "border blockade-brought deterioration of human rights situation" and "lingering food crisis," and impudently called for "handling the human rights' situation of the DPRK in the light of global peace and security and unethical crime" in the UN arena.
It is just a disgrace to the UN advocating objectivity, impartiality, dialogue and cooperation that the title of country-specific special rapporteur, which should have disappeared long ago for being a direct product of the U.S. and the West's high-handed and arbitrary practices and extreme double-standard, still remains.
We have never recognized the "special rapporteur" on human rights situation of the DPRK and will never ever deal with the "rapporteur."
The more desperately the U.S. and the riff-raff following it, including the "special rapporteur", distort the truth and turn black into white to malignantly slander the DPRK's genuine human rights situation, the more clearly it will betray their despicable confrontational nature gripped by hostility towards the DPRK.
The U.S. and its vassal forces, which are facing ever-worsening inferiority in strength in the political and military showdown with the DPRK, are resorting to putting collective pressure on the DPRK in cooperation with each other under the pretext of the non-existent "human rights issue," but they will get nothing from the "human rights" smear campaign.
We will never tolerate the hostile forces' vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" smear campaign for tarnishing the image of the socialist system centered on the popular masses, the life and soul of all the DPRK people and the cradle of their life, but firmly safeguard the rights and interests of the people. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Convenes Consultative Meeting on National Defence and Security
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, convened a consultative meeting on national defence and security on October 14.
The meeting was attended by No Kwang Chol, minister of National Defence of the DPRK, Jo Chun Ryong, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Ri Chang Ho, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau of the KPA, Ri Chang Dae, minister of State Security, and commanding officers of the Artillery Bureau, Detection and Electronic Warfare Bureau and other major bureaus of the KPA General Staff.
The meeting heard a report of the director of the General Reconnaissance Bureau on the general analysis of the serious incident of the enemy's provocation of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK, a report of the chief of the KPA General Staff on the military counteraction plan, a report of the minister of National Defence on the measures for modernizing military technical equipment, a report of the WPK secretary in charge of the munitions industry on the production of weapons and equipment, and a report of the minister of State Security on the situation of intelligence operation.
Kim Jong Unmade assessments and conclusions on the information and suggested measures specified in the reports of different defence and security organs.
After hearing a report on the relevant work done by the General Staff and the major combined units' combat readiness, he set forth the direction of immediate military activities and indicated important tasks to be tackled in the operation of the war deterrent and the exercise of the right to self-defence for safeguarding the national sovereignty, security and interests.
He expressed a tough political and military stand of the WPK and the DPRK government at the consultative meeting. -0-

headline: Japanese Delegation Tours Pyongyang
Efficient X-type Water Turbines Installed at Hydro-power Stations
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The hydroelectric power sector in the DPRK steps up the installation of efficient X-type water turbines.
The Ministry of Electric Power Industry worked out a plan for installing X-type water turbines on various generators on the basis of learning about the facilities of power stations in the hydroelectric power sector. And it has pushed ahead with the installation project in cooperation with relevant units.
The Sodusu Power Station installed an X-type water turbine in a generator to increase the generating capacity.
Similar project was conducted at Thaechon and other power stations. -0-

headline: Women's Artistic Motivation Campaign Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Women's union organizations at all levels in the DPRK are conducting a vigorous artistic motivation campaign at major worksites.
The Pyongyang Municipal Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea organized contests of artistic motivation teams in various forms and methods at the housing and other major construction sites in the capital city.
Women's union artistic motivation teams in Hamhung City of South Hamgyong Province launched their activities at the Ryongsong Machine Complex to encourage its workers to make innovations in the production of custom-built equipment and the modernization project.
Similar activities have been conducted by the Songchon county women's union committee in South Phyongan Province and other provincial, city and county women's union organizations. -0-

headline: Japanese Delegation Tours Pyongyang
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese organization for the study of the Juche idea headed by Yoko Hayashi, vice-chairperson of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, visited the Korean Revolution Museum.
The members of the delegation looked round various rooms, being told about the undying feats of the peerlessly great man who ushered in a new era of the country's prosperity, unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years, with his rare ideological and theoretical activities and seasoned revolutionary leadership.
They also toured the Kangdong Greenhouse Complex, etc. -0-

headline: Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports Leaves for Russia
story_text: Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports led by Vice-Minister O Kwang Hyok left here by air on October 14 to take part in an international sports forum to be held in Russia. -0-

headline: Agricultural Sci-tech Achievements Made in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Officials and researchers of the Kangwon Provincial Institute of Agricultural Science in the DPRK have developed varieties of crops, cultivation technology and effective agricultural chemicals production technology.
They succeeded in breeding new varieties of wheat, soybean and peanut with high yield per hectare and strong resistance to diseases.
The research group of the institute introduced the methods of sterilizing rice seeds and producing agrochemicals based on locally available raw materials.
And it developed and produced various kinds of highly efficient multi-nutrients for rice seedlings and multi-functional seed-covering agent, thus providing a guarantee for boosting the grain yield.
The Wonsan Vegetable Sub-institute developed radish varieties rich in vitamins and minerals. -0-

headline: Celebrations Held Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Nepal, Laos, Myanmar, Pakistan, Hungary, Bulgaria, Belarus, Switzerland, Austria, Nigeria and Mexico between Oct. 2 and 9 to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Speeches were made at the events attended by personages of political parties, organizations and institutions and masses in those countries.
The general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and the chairperson of the National Democratic Confederation of Trade Unions of Nepal praised PresidentKim Il Sungfor founding the WPK and ChairmanKim Jong Ilfor building it into the party of the leader.
The secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Belarus said that the WPK is recognized as a powerful political force with influence in the international arena and its experience of struggle serves as a precious textbook for the countries aspiring after socialism.
The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that no formidable enemy dare to provoke the DPRK as all its people are firmly united around H.E.Kim Jong Unand it has tremendous military muscle.
The chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party hoped that the WPK would achieve new historic successes by holding high the banner of socialism under the leadership of ComradeKim Jong Un.
The secretary general of the Switzerland-Korea Committee noted that the respected ComradeKim Jong Unformulated the revolutionary ideology of the great ComradesKim Il SungandKim Jong Ilas Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and set it as the eternal guiding idea of the WPK and has made sure that the leadership role of the Party is enhanced in every way.
The general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that the leadership of the WPK is a sure guarantee for victoriously advancing the socialist cause and that the heroic struggle of the Korean people gives great strength and courage to the world progressives.
Congratulatory messages and letters to the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwere adopted at the events in Nepal, Hungary, Bulgaria and Switzerland. -0-

headline: Project for Updating Ryongsong Machine Complex Accelerated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A project for updating the Ryongsong Machine Complex has been accelerated.
A relevant technical manual was completed by several designing units including the Machine Factory Designing Institute under the Ministry of Machine-building Industry and the South Hamgyong Provincial Designing Institute.
The foundation work for factories and shops, set as updating projects for this year, is being hastened as scheduled.
Scientists of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering are solving the technical problems arising in manufacturing and installing equipment and facilities on the spot.
Meanwhile, the complex has conducted the work to help technicians and skilled workers guarantee the production of large machinery and equipment in the updated production line, organizing theoretical and practical training courses. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, on Wednesday:
- More than 1.4 million youth and students across the country volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army.
- An article calls for creditably carrying forward the spirit of defending the country and the revolution in the 1950s.
- The daily introduces achievements made across the country.
- The 2024 Advanced Science and Technology and Products Exhibition opened.
- The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to a woman centenarian living in Taesong District, Pyongyang.
- A national exhibition of plants - "2024 Plants in DPRK" - closed.
- An article discloses the dual behavior of the U.S. and Western countries hampering the worldwide efforts for overcoming the climate crisis. -0-

headline: Socialist Emulation Drive Brisk in Farms of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) at all levels are conducting a socialist emulation drive to successfully finish this year's farming.
The South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the UAWK has organized an emulation drive to finish harvesting and threshing and thus helped farms, workteams, sub-workteams and farmers carry out their daily plans earlier than last year.
The Pyongyang and Nampho municipal committees of the UAWK have organized various mass movements to make districts, counties and farms finish the transport of rice sheaves and threshing as soon as possible, while carrying on the work for review and appreciation significantly.
The South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the UAWK is organizing an emulation campaign for finishing threshing among farms with large area of paddy fields.
The committees of the UAWK in North Hwanghae Province, North Phyongan Province and Kaesong Municipality are conducting the work to encourage the masses' enthusiasm for the revolution and struggle to make achievements in harvesting and threshing. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, on Wednesday:
- More than 1.4 million youth and students across the country volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army.
- An article calls for creditably carrying forward the spirit of defending the country and the revolution in the 1950s.
- The daily introduces achievements made across the country.
- The 2024 Advanced Science and Technology and Products Exhibition opened.
- The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to a woman centenarian living in Taesong District, Pyongyang.
- A national exhibition of plants - "2024 Plants in DPRK" - closed.
- An article discloses the dual behavior of the U.S. and Western countries hampering the worldwide efforts for overcoming the climate crisis. -0-

headline: Many Youth and Students in DPRK Volunteer to Join or Rejoin KPA
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The whole DPRK is full of the will to annihilate the scum of the ROK who violated its inviolable sovereignty and security.
Millions of young people have turned out in the nationwide struggle to wipe out the ROK scum who committed a serious provocation of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK through a drone infiltration into its capital city to push the tense situation to the brink of war, which precipitates their self-destruction, and are now making impudent remarks like a guilty party filing the suit first.
If a war breaks out, the ROK will be wiped off the map. As it wants a war, we are willing to put an end to its existence.
The passionate young people are determined to turn out in a sacred war of destroying the enemy with the arms of the revolution. Their great enthusiasm for joining the army is being displayed in all the places of the country, including worksites where a campaign for increased production is underway, construction sites, farms having a bumper harvest, and educational institutions.
According to data available, more than 1.4 million youth league officials and youth and students across the country volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army on October 14 and 15.
The young people's zeal for joining the army is an eruption of the hatred and retaliatory spirit of the younger generation who are determined to punish the scum who committed a hideous crime to ignite a war at any cost, and end the horrible evil relationship.
Youth and students across the country signed the petitions for joining or rejoining the army out of the pledge to find out the heinous confrontation maniacs and criminals to the last one and cut off their windpipes.
The commanding officers and members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade, the young people of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex, the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill and many other working youth across the country volunteered to join the army with the spirit to resolutely wipe out the sworn enemy seeking to bring down their socialist system that represent their life and soul, and their dignified life and happiness.
At the universities across the country, includingKim Il SungUniversity, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Phyongbuk University of Technology and Sariwon Kye Ung Sang University of Agriculture, many students, including discharged officers and men, vowed to make the lunatics experience the real war and showers of fire.
The number of the angry revengers of the rising generation determined to plunge the heinous enemy into an abyss of final ruin, those who volunteered to join or rejoin the KPA, is on the increase with the passage of time. -0-

headline: Japanese Delegation Leaves
story_text: Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese organization for the study of the Juche idea headed by Yoko Hayashi, vice-chairperson of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, left here for home by air on Oct. 15. -0-

headline: Project for Updating Ryongsong Machine Complex Accelerated in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A project for updating the Ryongsong Machine Complex has been accelerated.
A relevant technical manual was completed by several designing units including the Machine Factory Designing Institute under the Ministry of Machine-building Industry and the South Hamgyong Provincial Designing Institute.
The foundation work for factories and shops, set as updating projects for this year, is being hastened as scheduled.
Scientists of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering are solving the technical problems arising in manufacturing and installing equipment and facilities on the spot.
Meanwhile, the complex has conducted the work to help technicians and skilled workers guarantee the production of large machinery and equipment in the updated production line, organizing theoretical and practical training courses. -0-

headline: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to O Sok Do, a woman centenarian living in the people's neighborhood unit No. 62 in Ryonghung-dong No. 2, Taesong District of Pyongyang.
The centenarian was deeply moved to tears by such warm loving care ofKim Jong Unproviding the birthday spread for an ordinary old woman.
She told her children to do more work for the country led by the General Secretary, the dear father of the people. -0-

headline: Roads and Railways to ROK Completely Blocked: KCNA Report
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- KCNA reported on October 16 that the roads and railways connected to the ROK in the east and west parts of the southern border of the DPRK have been completely blocked.
The report says:
Under the order No. 00122 of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the General Staff of the Korean People's Army on Oct. 15 took a measure to physically cut off the DPRK's roads and railways which lead to the ROK through the east and west sections of the southern border of the DPRK as part of the phased complete separation of its territory, where its sovereignty is exercised, from the ROK's territory.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK said that in the daytime of October 15, the 60-metre-long sections of the roads and railways in Kamho-ri, Kosong County, Kangwon Province and the 60-metre-long sections of the roads and railways in Tongnae-ri, Panmun District, Kaesong Municipality have been completely blocked through blasting.
This is an inevitable and legitimate measure taken in keeping with the requirement of the DPRK Constitution which clearly defines the ROK as a hostile state, and due to the serious security circumstances running to the unpredictable brink of war owing to the grave political and military provocations of the hostile forces.
A spokesman for the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection of the DPRK confirmed that the blasting had no negative effect on the surrounding ecological environment and that the routes linking the DPRK to the ROK have been completely separated.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK said that the DPRK will continue to take measures to permanently fortify the closed southern border. -0-

headline: Students of Revolutionary Schools in DPRK Conduct Socio-political Activities
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School in the DPRK conducted socio-political activities in North and South Hamgyong provinces during their vacation.
At the site of the construction of regional-industry factories in Hamju County, they gave an artistic motivational performance to encourage officers and men of the Korean People's Army who are displaying the valiant spirit of the KPA.
At the February 8 Vinalon Complex, Tongbong Farm in Hamju County, etc. they put on stage peculiar numbers to give strength and courage to model workers striving for the implementation of the Workers' Party of Korea's adjustment and reinforcement strategy and the completion of this year's farming.
The songs reflecting the cheerful and bold spirit of the students resounded at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House in North Hamgyong Province and the site for the construction of Onpho Working People Holiday Camp.
The students also visited the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, Ryonpho and Jungphyong greenhouse farms, the Chongjin School Uniform Factory and other units. -0-

headline: Roads and Railways to ROK Completely Blocked: KCNA Report
Efficiency of Ideological Work Increases in Kaesong Municipality of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kaesong Municipality of the DPRK is boosting the efficiency of ideological work for the officials and working people.
The Kaesong Textile Mill and the Songaksan Garment Factory in Kaesong have raised the effectiveness of ideological education through the revolutionary historic relics so as to stir up the employees' enthusiasm for production.
Through visual motivation aids and loudspeaker motivation, officials of Ryohyon and Konam farms in Kaephung District redouble the spirit of the farmers striving to successfully complete this year's farming.
Sonjok and Ryongjong farms in Panmun District have turned farm fields into places for education in the ideas and policies of the Party.
The primary information workers of Kuhwa and Taedoksan farms in Jangphung County tell the farmers about the greatness of the peerlessly great men who devoted themselves to the development of agriculture in the municipality and the improvement of the people's living standards. -0-

headline: Paektusan Geology Park - Pride of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The grand nature of the area of Mt Paektu with natural forests is our precious resource to be proud of.
The Paektusan Geology Park has many geological spots of special volcanic geological significance and great tourist value and the park zone coincides with the administrative district of Samjiyon City, Ryanggang Province.
The park which was formed by volcanic action draws a worldwide attention for its peculiar ecological, historical and cultural value.
Mt Paektu, a large-scale complex volcano, is a world volcano that had evolved for a long time.
The Paektusan volcano has the characteristics of a world volcano in various aspects including the stage and scale of eruption, the course of normal evolution and the insertion of special eruption cases, the formation of huge craters, the intensity of explosive eruption and the influence on the earth climate.
A huge volcanic cone with Janggun Peak, the highest one of Mt Paektu, as its main peak, its geological variety, formation of the Lake of Samjiyon Mubangsu, underground water falls of Rimyongsu, Namphotaesan Volcano and other grand volcanic sights can be called the original geological characteristics of Mt Paektu.
The Paektusan Geology Park is the pride of the DPRK as it has dozens of geological spots of great significance including Kanbaeksan Volcano, Sobaeksan Fantastic Rock, Pegae Hill Small Volcanic Cone and Paektu Falls. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects 2nd Corps Headquarters of KPA
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, inspected the headquarters of the 2nd Corps of the Korean People’s Army on October 17.
Accompanying him were Pak Jong Chon, secretary of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, and No Kwang Chol, minister of National Defence of the DPRK.
He was greeted on the spot by Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, and the commander and other commanding officers of the large combined unit.
The moment he arrived at the headquarters, all the officers and men raised stormy cheers of “Hurrah!” looking up to the great iron-willed commander who has ushered in a great period of upswing in developing the revolutionary armed forces with his outstanding military strategy and ideas and unexcelled art of command and is strengthening ours into an ever-victorious and invincible revolutionary army.
Kim Jong Unsent warm greetings of encouragement to the officers and men of the large combined unit, who are reliably defending the territory of our state, always maintaining full combat readiness on high alert at the forefront near the border.
There was a ceremony of receiving the Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the DPRK.
Together with the officials accompanying him,Kim Jong Unlooked round the room dedicated to the unit’s history shining with the great feats performed in defending the country and the people.
He recalled with deep emotion the undying commanding feats of our Party recorded on the sacred, praiseworthy and glorious course of development of the unit.
Noting that the unit, organized during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, produced more than 100 heroes of the DPRK, including a twice hero of the DPRK, by displaying matchless bravery during the battles behind the enemy lines and the active positional defence, and has maintained its reputation as the birthplace of the slogan “A match for a hundred” from one decade to the next and from one century to the next, he said its history is the praiseworthy epitome of the brilliant military achievements and innumerable feats of the People’s Army which is reliably supporting on the strength of arms the great cause of building a rich country with a strong army.
Saying that a sure guarantee for victory in combat and war lies in overpowering the enemy ideologically and spiritually, he stressed that when the unshakable Juche-oriented viewpoint and stand on the enemy and war is established and maintained, our army will always demonstrate its might as the most invincible one in the world.
Guided by the commander of the corps, he went to its command post.
After being briefed on the enemy situation by the commander, he acquainted himself with the combat readiness of the brigades under the corps, which have switched over to a combat readiness footing.
Meeting the major commanding officers of the corps, he went over important documents that reflect the unit’s military action plans for coping with different types of developments, and said:
The serious security circumstances around us urgently demand that our army continue to concentrate all its efforts on bolstering up the war-fighting capability and take more perfect military measures for reliably defending the security of the country through constant overwhelming combat readiness.
The impact of the changed nature of the ROK-U.S. alliance and of the enemy’s more developed different military manoeuvring of aggressive nature on our state’s security highlights more clearly the importance of strengthening its nuclear deterrent and proves the validity of its efforts.
After going over the documents, he said that the corps worked out proper military action plans to cope with different possible circumstances. And he approved the determination of the corps. Then he said:
Our army should keep in mind once again the stark fact that the ROK is a foreign and indisputable enemy state. We completely blocked the roads and railways linked to the territory of the ROK two days ago through blasting. It means not only the physical closure but also the end of the undesirable relationship with Seoul, which persistently lasted century after century, and the complete removal of the useless awareness about fellow countrymen and unrealistic idea of reunification. It also means the last declaration that when our sovereignty is violated by the ROK, a complete enemy state, our physical forces will be used unhesitatingly without being tied to the conditions any longer. As we have already declared, if our offensive forces are used under the precondition of “if,” it will be a lawful retaliatory action against the enemy state, not the fellow countrymen.
Only the peace defended with the strength powerful enough to control and deter the enemy is a reliable, safe, lasting one, and herein lies a sure guarantee for the well-being and future of our state and people.
Then he reaffirmed that our army must grow more powerful and will become powerful without fail for such genuine peace.
That day, he had a photo session with the officers and men of the headquarters of the unit.
When he came to the venue of the photo session, the officers and men broke into enthusiastic cheers with great gratitude to the invincible and iron-willed commander who taught them ever-victorious tactics and instilled matchless bravery and confidence in them and is leading our army along the road of victory.
Kim Jong Unexpressed the expectation and belief that all the officers and men of the large combined unit will reliably defend the southern border of the country by always remaining true to their mission and duty as honourable defenders and soldiers on the outposts for defending the sovereignty of the country and the safety of the people.
The shout of “Death-defying defence” let out by the soldiers looking up to him resounded far and wide in the sky of October.
All the officers and men pledged to fight death-defyingly for the great ComradeKim Jong Un, our great country, our great Party and our great people. They were full of militant zeal for always decorating the glorious colours shining with the praiseworthy history of their unit with victorious feats. -0-

headline: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of Public Security Releases Statement
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- On Friday morning, rubbish scattered by a large balloon sent by the ROK scum was found again in Hwaam-ri and Munbong-ri of Phyonggang County in Kangwon Province and in Ryonghak-ri of Cholwon County of the province near the southern border of the DPRK.
The security organs in those areas blockaded and searched the areas and forensically examined and disposed of the collected rubbish.
The Ministry of Public Security informed the KPA General Staff of the results of the examination. -0-

headline: Press Review
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in leading newspapers of the DPRK on Friday:
- The respected ComradeKim Jong Uninspected the headquarters of the 2nd Corps of the Korean People's Army. (photos accompanied).
- All workteams and sub-workteams of the Yoldusamchon Farm in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province reaped a good harvest, exceeding the peak year.
-Kim Jong Unsent a birthday spread to a woman centenarian living in Ryongyon County, South Hwanghae Province.
- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on the occasion of the 76th anniversary of the establishment of DPRK-Russia diplomatic relations.
- Organizations of overseas Koreans released press statements and statements to denounce the scum of the ROK for seriously infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.

Rodong Sinmun
- Achievements have been made in different economic sectors and units.

Minju Joson
- A political essay deals with the patriotic peasant, the precious name the Workers' Party of Korea gave the farmers who ardently love the country and make sincere efforts for the country and its people. -0-

The Paektusan Geology Park is the pride of the DPRK as it has dozens of geological spots of great significance including Kanbaeksan Volcano, Sobaeksan Fantastic Rock, Pegae Hill Small Volcanic Cone and Paektu Falls. -0-

headline: Waterway Project Brisk in South Hwanghae Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province is pushing ahead with the waterway project for next year's farming.
The province set a goal for improving the capacity of the waterway including the repair of the waterway into relevant areas and construction of ten-odd structures.
It is taking measures for ensuring the quality of the project at a high level while focusing its efforts on the construction of structures and organizing technical consultations in order to introduce advanced construction methods.
Thanks to the efforts of the officials and working people, more achievements have been made in the project. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of C.C., WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The following is the press statement of Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, titled "Do not spout absurd remarks":
We cannot but call the clan of the ROK as a really weird one.
The head of the information office of its Joint Chiefs of Staff, at a regular news briefing on Thursday, talked about "copyright" all of a sudden while grumbling about the measure taken by us to completely block the roads and railways connected to the ROK near the southern border of the DPRK physically.
He asserted that one of the three photos of explosion released by KCNA was the one taken by the ROK and we disregarded the copyright by using it without permission.
The ROK seemingly doesn't know what the blasting carried by us means and what imminent severe security crisis it faces, ignorant of the essence of the current situation. No wonder, it has gone as foolish as to hype a "rumor about photo," something completely irrelevant to the matter.
Dancing to that tune, media and so-called experts are busy with a detailed analysis, talking about "camera angle" and "shape of smoke".
They have nothing to do more significant, haven't they?
Their behavior makes even a cat laugh.
I would like to inform those idiots of the fact that the photo is a screenshot from one of the video clips released by NBC, Fox News, Reuters and other foreign media.
We cannot take a photo at that angle. So we used that photo, finding that it met our intention, being visually good and excellent in composition.
Is it problematic?
Hasn't the ROK used the photos and video clips released by KCNA when airing the news about us?
Then a question arises as to whether the ROK thought about a violation of international law and copyright when reporting the news about us with our photos and video clips.
It is their unreasonable criterion that nothing matters when they do so but when we do it, it is a violation of international law and copyright. I would like to make them unable to say anything more at once.
According to our initial investigation, Yonhap News, Kyunghyang Daily News and other media of the puppet ROK all abused the two photos of explosion opened to public by us for their news report.
It seems that it is necessary to probe into whether our approval was secured in the ROK where international law is allegedly well observed.
This is just chicanery peculiar to the ROK, the country without a parallel in the world in abusing international law, international standard, principle and generally accepted value for their benefits and hurting others.
Its Joint Chiefs of Staff in charge of defending security of its country should properly investigate the grave violation of the sovereignty and security of our Republic first, instead of disgracing itself by engaging in such a deed unbecoming to its position as photo assessment.
They will be watched until they refrain from dodging and feigning ignorance.
Explicitly speaking once again, we are clearly aware that the ROK has severely violated our sovereignty.
Curiosity arises as to how much they will get for shirking responsibility and letting out nonsense.
They are, indeed, weird ones. -0-

headline: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of Public Security Releases Statement
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on Oct. 15 to mark the 76th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
Present there on invitation were Mikhail Bogdanov, vice foreign minister, and other personages of the government, organizations and institutions, including the Federation Council of Russia, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Natural Resources and Ecology, the Ministry of Transport and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
On hand were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy members.
The participants laid a floral basket and a bouquet and made a bow before an art work depicting PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilstanding together.
Then, they looked round photos dealing with the noble career and exploits of the President and the Chairman and the undying feats performed by the respected ComradeKim Jong Unfor developing the DPRK-Russia friendly relations and their famous works and photos showing the might and development of the DPRK.
Speeches were made at the reception. -0-

headline: Statements Issued by Overseas Koreans' Organizations
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans' organizations issued press statements and statements to condemn the scum of the ROK for their serious provocation of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK.
Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China (GAKC), in a press statement on October 14 said that the GAKC and all the Koreans in China are filled with the surging anger and revenge upon the puppet ROK scum's thrice-cursed reckless act of infiltrating drones into the sky over the capital city of the DPRK to scatter the dirty political agitation rubbish.
The Yoon Suk Yeol puppet clans should not run amuck, clearly mindful that the provocation against the DPRK is a suicidal act of cutting off their windpipes with their own hands, the vice-chairman said, adding that if the puppet ROK lets drones carrying dirty political agitation rubbish fly into the sacred sky over the homeland again, disregarding the DPRK's patience and warning, they will be doomed to miserable death.
Kim Kyong Ryol, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, in a press statement said that the provocative act of the dolts unaware of their miserable position is aimed at tarnishing the image of the DPRK at any cost and maintaining their regime as good as dead.
The Social Confederation of Koreans in Far East of Russia in a statement said that the puppet ROK clans are trying to evade the responsibility through all sorts of sophisms after committing a rogue-like act without hesitation by infiltrating into the sky over the DPRK. The group of gangsters taking no account of international law clearly showed that they are the wreckers of peace, the statement noted.
The International Social Confederation of Koreans in a statement on October 13 bitterly denounced the puppet ROK clans' reckless political and military provocation against the DPRK, and strongly demanded that they make an apology before the whole world. -0-

She was deeply impressed by the loving care shown byKim Jong Unwho sent a birthday spread even to an ordinary old woman though he is busy making tireless efforts to provide the people with a happy life.
Saying that the socialist system where doctors make a preventive medical examination and all the people form a harmonious large family while helping and leading one another forward is the best in the world, she asked her descendants to do more work for the grateful motherland. -0-
