headline: Newspapers Call for More Dynamic Campaign for Increased Production
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here deal with the DPRK people's violent anger at the ROK puppets who are acting rashly, being carried away by ill-advised bravery even though they seriously infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
Rodong Sinmun in an editorial says:
Let us turn out as one in the sacred war for defending the national dignity and sovereignty, fully armed with the unwavering anti-enemy consciousness and transparent view of the principal enemy! This is the shout of annihilating the enemy resounding in all parts of the country.
The last-ditch efforts of those frightened by the spirit of our dynamic advance towards the new victory of Korean-style socialism while expanding the phase of overall development on a large scale are making the people and servicepersons in the DPRK burn with the hatred against them.
Every worksite and post are overflowing with the strong resentment of citizens volunteering to join and rejoin the People's Army. This is the stirring reality of the DPRK.
The enemies will clearly see how the strong retaliatory spirit of its people, ready to fight resolutely for defending their sacred dignity, develops with the passage of time.
All the people should more fiercely kindle the flames of the drive for increased production and creation with their surging hatred and anger at the enemy and thus strike a heavy blow at the hostile forces and further demonstrate the dignity and might of Juche Korea dynamically advancing toward a great new victory.
Minju Joson in an editorial calls upon all the officials and working people to wage a dynamic drive for increased production with the spirit of dealing the most horrible blows to the enemies and thus successfully conclude this year as a year of victory to be specially recorded in the history of the national development. -0-

Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Among them were personages of political parties, governments, organizations and institutions of different countries, including the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, the Belarus Association of Friends of Korean People Named afterKim Il SungandKim Jong Il, the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, the Belarus Association for the Study of Juche Idea, the Belarus Group for International Solidarity with the DPRK, the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea.

headline: Message of Thanks of C.C., WPK Conveyed to Employees of Komdok Mining Complex
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) sent a message of thanks to the workers and officials at the Komdok Mining Complex who finished the extension project for ore transport capacity to open up a bright prospect for increased ore production.
A meeting for conveying the message of thanks took place on Oct. 18.
Present there were Jon Hyon Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Choe Hung, general director of the General Bureau of the Tanchon Area Mining Industry, officials concerned, officials and employees of the complex, commanding officers and members of the August 28 Youth Shock Brigade.
Jon Hyon Chol conveyed a message of thanks of the WPK Central Committee.
The WPK Central Committee in the message of thanks noted that the workers of the complex and shock brigade members finished the project of conveyer system No. 9 and conveyer pit No. 72, which can remarkably raise the capacity of transporting all the ores produced in the deep and upper areas with indomitable spiritual power and courageous fighting stamina, and laid a solid foundation for increased production of minerals. This is a great success that injects vitality in the realization of the Party's readjustment and reinforcement strategy and the strengthening of the self-supporting economic foundations and gives a strong encouragement to all the people in their indomitable struggle to victoriously conclude this significant year, it stressed.
The WPK Central Committee sent warm congratulations and encouragement to the workers and officials of the complex and builders who completed the project and put it on the track of sustained and vigorous growth and prosperity with ardent patriotism and loyalty, in the spirit of devotedly implementing the Party's decision and the spirit of self-reliance.
Speeches were made there. -0-

headline: Truth about ROK's Serious Provocation of Violating DPRK's Sovereignty Uncovered: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of National Defence
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK said on Oct. 18 that the ROK military gangsters' involvement in the serious provocation of violating the DPRK's sovereignty was clearly proved through the discovery of decisive material evidence and an objective and scientific investigation into it.
According to the spokesman, the Pyongyang Municipal Security Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the DPRK on October 13 discovered the remains of a crashed drone in the area of the neighborhood No. 76, Sopho-dong No. 1, Hyongjesan District while intensively searching the districts of Pyongyang Municipality.
A joint investigation group of the Ministry of National Defence, the Ministry of State Security and other relevant specialized institutions was organized to forensically examine the remains of the drone.
As a result, it was scientifically proved that the drone came from the ROK.
Through the technical examination and analysis, the experts judged that the drone was a "light one for long-range reconnaissance" equipped with by the "Drone Operation Command" of the ROK military and that it is the type same as the vehicle-carried one opened to public at an event marking the "ROK Army Day."
From the remaining battery power and fuel of the drone, they inferred that the drone might have been used at least five to seven days ago.
In light of the drone's shape, the presumptive period of flight, the leaflet-scattering box fixed to the underpart of the drone's fuselage, etc., it is quite likely that the drone is the one which scattered leaflets over the center of Pyongyang Municipality. But the conclusion has not yet been drawn.
If the drone's involvement in the recent leaflet-scattering incident is denied, it will be evidence of another wanton violation of the airspace of our country by a military means of the ROK and it will be taken more seriously as an example of a series of provocations by the military gangsters of the hostile country.
Despite the shameless excuses made by the ROK military, the objective evidence and scientific analysis go to clearly prove the ROK committed a hostile provocation of violating the DPRK's sovereignty.
Explicitly speaking again, the DPRK is not interested in the chief culprit and perpetrators of the drone provocation but focus on the fact that the criminals, whether they are military gangsters or scum of out-of-border fugitives' organization, all belong to the clan of the hostile country.
The Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK and the General Staff of the Korean People's Army gave all units in the capital city and near the border instructions to reinforce anti-air observation posts.
The General Staff decided to keep the combined artillery units and the units with important fire duties near the border in full combat readiness, and this decision has been approved.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK warned that if a violation of the DPRK's territorial ground, air and waters by ROK's military means is discovered and confirmed again, it will be regarded as a grave military provocation against the sovereignty of the DPRK and a declaration of war and an immediate retaliatory attack will be launched. -0-

Despite the shameless excuses made by the ROK military, the objective evidence and scientific analysis go to clearly prove the ROK committed a hostile provocation of violating the DPRK's sovereignty.
Explicitly speaking again, the DPRK is not interested in the chief culprit and perpetrators of the drone provocation but focus on the fact that the criminals, whether they are military gangsters or scum of out-of-border fugitives' organization, all belong to the clan of the hostile country.
The Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK and the General Staff of the Korean People's Army gave all units in the capital city and near the border instructions to reinforce anti-air observation posts.
The General Staff decided to keep the combined artillery units and the units with important fire duties near the border in full combat readiness, and this decision has been approved.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK warned that if a violation of the DPRK's territorial ground, air and waters by ROK's military means is discovered and confirmed again, it will be regarded as a grave military provocation against the sovereignty of the DPRK and a declaration of war and an immediate retaliatory attack will be launched. -0-

headline: Newspapers Call for More Dynamic Campaign for Increased Production
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here deal with the DPRK people's violent anger at the ROK puppets who are acting rashly, being carried away by ill-advised bravery even though they seriously infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
Rodong Sinmun in an editorial says:
Let us turn out as one in the sacred war for defending the national dignity and sovereignty, fully armed with the unwavering anti-enemy consciousness and transparent view of the principal enemy! This is the shout of annihilating the enemy resounding in all parts of the country.
The last-ditch efforts of those frightened by the spirit of our dynamic advance towards the new victory of Korean-style socialism while expanding the phase of overall development on a large scale are making the people and servicepersons in the DPRK burn with the hatred against them.
Every worksite and post are overflowing with the strong resentment of citizens volunteering to join and rejoin the People's Army. This is the stirring reality of the DPRK.
The enemies will clearly see how the strong retaliatory spirit of its people, ready to fight resolutely for defending their sacred dignity, develops with the passage of time.
All the people should more fiercely kindle the flames of the drive for increased production and creation with their surging hatred and anger at the enemy and thus strike a heavy blow at the hostile forces and further demonstrate the dignity and might of Juche Korea dynamically advancing toward a great new victory.
Minju Joson in an editorial calls upon all the officials and working people to wage a dynamic drive for increased production with the spirit of dealing the most horrible blows to the enemies and thus successfully conclude this year as a year of victory to be specially recorded in the history of the national development. -0-

headline: Truth about ROK's Serious Provocation of Violating DPRK's Sovereignty Uncovered: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of National Defence
Truth about ROK's Serious Provocation of Violating DPRK's Sovereignty Uncovered: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of National Defence
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK said on Oct. 18 that the ROK military gangsters' involvement in the serious provocation of violating the DPRK's sovereignty was clearly proved through the discovery of decisive material evidence and an objective and scientific investigation into it.
According to the spokesman, the Pyongyang Municipal Security Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the DPRK on October 13 discovered the remains of a crashed drone in the area of the neighborhood No. 76, Sopho-dong No. 1, Hyongjesan District while intensively searching the districts of Pyongyang Municipality.
A joint investigation group of the Ministry of National Defence, the Ministry of State Security and other relevant specialized institutions was organized to forensically examine the remains of the drone.
As a result, it was scientifically proved that the drone came from the ROK.
Through the technical examination and analysis, the experts judged that the drone was a "light one for long-range reconnaissance" equipped with by the "Drone Operation Command" of the ROK military and that it is the type same as the vehicle-carried one opened to public at an event marking the "ROK Army Day."
From the remaining battery power and fuel of the drone, they inferred that the drone might have been used at least five to seven days ago.
In light of the drone's shape, the presumptive period of flight, the leaflet-scattering box fixed to the underpart of the drone's fuselage, etc., it is quite likely that the drone is the one which scattered leaflets over the center of Pyongyang Municipality. But the conclusion has not yet been drawn.
If the drone's involvement in the recent leaflet-scattering incident is denied, it will be evidence of another wanton violation of the airspace of our country by a military means of the ROK and it will be taken more seriously as an example of a series of provocations by the military gangsters of the hostile country.
Despite the shameless excuses made by the ROK military, the objective evidence and scientific analysis go to clearly prove the ROK committed a hostile provocation of violating the DPRK's sovereignty.
Explicitly speaking again, the DPRK is not interested in the chief culprit and perpetrators of the drone provocation but focus on the fact that the criminals, whether they are military gangsters or scum of out-of-border fugitives' organization, all belong to the clan of the hostile country.
The Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK and the General Staff of the Korean People's Army gave all units in the capital city and near the border instructions to reinforce anti-air observation posts.
The General Staff decided to keep the combined artillery units and the units with important fire duties near the border in full combat readiness, and this decision has been approved.
A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK warned that if a violation of the DPRK's territorial ground, air and waters by ROK's military means is discovered and confirmed again, it will be regarded as a grave military provocation against the sovereignty of the DPRK and a declaration of war and an immediate retaliatory attack will be launched. -0-

headline: Farmers Move into New Houses in DPRK
Jungphyong Greenhouse Farm Associated with Benevolent Father's Warm Love for People
Farmers Move into New Houses in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- New villages have appeared in Sunghwa-ri and Yonhap-ri of Unsan County, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK.
The modern houses, built there with the local features and all the living conditions, are associated with the devoted efforts of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unto make the agricultural workers enjoy a highly civilized rural life.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Kim Man Jo, secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials of the Party and power organs, builders and agricultural workers in Unsan County.
Kang Myong Ryong, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address and then the licenses for the use of houses were conveyed there.
Amid a cheerful dancing party, farmers began moving into their new houses. Officials visited new houses to share the joy with their owners. -0-

headline: Home-visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves Pyongyang
story_text: Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of students in their final year at Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Ryu Chang Sun, head of its administrative department, left Pyongyang by air on October 19. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui Issues Press Statement
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui on October 19 made public the following press statement titled "The countries involved in imposing illegal and outrageous sanctions on the DPRK will have to pay a dear price":
Contrary to the recognized principles of international law with sovereignty equality and noninterference in internal affairs as their core, the U.S. and its vassal countries are working hard to revive the structure of sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, which went bankrupt structurally and is on the verge of collapse.
The "multilateral sanctions monitoring team," which allegedly acts on behalf of the panel of experts, a has-been involved in monitoring the implementation of the UN "sanctions resolutions" for more than 10 years, is utterly unlawful and illegitimate in terms of its justification for existence and purpose, and its existence itself constitutes a denial of the UN Charter.
I express serious concern and regret at the U.S. habitual misconduct of arbitrarily flouting the international order in pursuit of its hegemonic interests, and vehemently condemn and reject it as a challenge to international justice and the most undisguised violation of the DPRK's sovereignty.
The U.S.-led sanctions against the DPRK are by no means a new experience for us.
However, the unilateral behavior of the U.S., obsessed with the suicidal concept of pressure without sound thinking and sense of reality, and of some countries blindly following it has emerged as a threatening entity shaking the international relations to their foundations and seriously polluting the world security environment.
The emergence of another hostile threatening factor calls for ceaselessly adding new factors to the corresponding counteraction force for deterring it.
Wrong practice is bound to entail an inevitable reaction and corresponding punishment.
If the U.S. expected that it can surprise the DPRK and stop its advance with such worn-out means as sanctions and pressure, it is just a fatal misjudgment.
As clarified by the president of the State Affairs of the DPRK, the pain the U.S. has inflicted on our people has provoked a towering rage towards the U.S. and this has become a decisive factor and a strategic opportunity for redoubling our strength.
If the U.S. seeks to control the world by dint of high-handed and arbitrary practices, self-righteousness and prejudice, more countries will become interested in putting an end to the American-style hegemony and it will bring earlier the emergence of the anti-U.S. global solidarity structure.
The DPRK remains steadfast in its will to safeguard its sovereign rights, development and interests, regional and global peace and security to cope with the ever more undisguised sinister and hostile scheme of the U.S. and its satellite countries.
I take this opportunity to recall the criminal act of the ROK which violated the sovereignty and territory of the DPRK and caused the current mishap, and make it clear that the U.S. will be held accountable for it.
We will correctly remember the U.S. and the ROK, which have taken the lead in illegal and outrageous sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, and Japan, Canada, Britain, France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Australia and New Zealand, which actively joined it, and record all their hostile acts.
The forces involved in the smear campaign against the DPRK will have to pay a dear price for it. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Xi Jinping
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on October 16.
The reply message says:
The respected Comrade General Secretary,
I express my heartfelt thanks to you for sending a message of greeting on the occasion of the 75th founding anniversary of the People's Republic of China.
For 75 years since the founding of the new China, the Communist Party of China has united and led the peoples of different nations throughout the country, performing two miracles of achieving rapid economic development and long-term social stability, and the great prosperity of the Chinese nation has entered an irreversible historical process.
The Chinese people will work tirelessly to push forward with the cause of building a powerful country and achieving national prosperity comprehensively through the modernization of the Chinese style, more firmly united behind the Party Central Committee.
I sincerely hope that the fraternal DPRK people will continue to achieve fresh successes by promoting the cause of socialist construction under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by you, Comrade General Secretary.
China and the DPRK are linked by the same mountain and rivers, and the traditional friendship between the two countries is growing stronger with the passage of time.
I am willing to make greater contributions, together with you, Comrade General Secretary, to leading the traditional China-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations to sustainable and stable development, steadily promoting the well-being of the peoples of the two countries and safeguarding regional and global peace, stability, development and prosperity.
I wish you good health and success in your work.
I wish your country prosperity and your people happiness and well-being. -0-

headline: People Fully Armed with Class Consciousness Are Sure to Win: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun says in an article on Sunday that the decisive factor of a victory in the fierce class struggle against the hostile forces lies in our own strength, the ideological and mental strength of all the people fully armed with class consciousness.
Class consciousness is the life of the revolutionary people, and the victory of socialism precisely means the one of class principle, the article notes, and goes on:
The absolute prestige and reputation of an independent power shining in the present century while containing the hostile forces by dint of strong power are attributable to the strong class self-respect, fortitude and death-defying resistance will of the Korean people.
As the class will of the people to prove the validity and invincibility of Korean-style socialism with the irresistibility of collectivism remains unshakeable, Juche-oriented socialism will continue to emerge victorious, further expanding the absolute force capable of completely putting an end to the moves of the hostile forces.
Class self-respect means the spirit of achieving self-development by one's own efforts.
The might of self-reliance and self-development precisely means the might of science and technology.
The manifestation of the transparent class consciousness of all the people to frustrate the enemies' moves by dint of Juche-oriented science and technology means the growth of the Juche-oriented power.
The DPRK will emerge as a socialist power prospering with self-sustenance and self-respect in the near future, thanks to the indomitable efforts of all the people to make the might of self-development more invincible while looking down the enemy with high class self-respect. -0-

headline: DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui Issues Press Statement
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui on October 19 made public the following press statement titled "The countries involved in imposing illegal and outrageous sanctions on the DPRK will have to pay a dear price":
Contrary to the recognized principles of international law with sovereignty equality and noninterference in internal affairs as their core, the U.S. and its vassal countries are working hard to revive the structure of sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, which went bankrupt structurally and is on the verge of collapse.
The "multilateral sanctions monitoring team," which allegedly acts on behalf of the panel of experts, a has-been involved in monitoring the implementation of the UN "sanctions resolutions" for more than 10 years, is utterly unlawful and illegitimate in terms of its justification for existence and purpose, and its existence itself constitutes a denial of the UN Charter.
I express serious concern and regret at the U.S. habitual misconduct of arbitrarily flouting the international order in pursuit of its hegemonic interests, and vehemently condemn and reject it as a challenge to international justice and the most undisguised violation of the DPRK's sovereignty.
The U.S.-led sanctions against the DPRK are by no means a new experience for us.
However, the unilateral behavior of the U.S., obsessed with the suicidal concept of pressure without sound thinking and sense of reality, and of some countries blindly following it has emerged as a threatening entity shaking the international relations to their foundations and seriously polluting the world security environment.
The emergence of another hostile threatening factor calls for ceaselessly adding new factors to the corresponding counteraction force for deterring it.
Wrong practice is bound to entail an inevitable reaction and corresponding punishment.
If the U.S. expected that it can surprise the DPRK and stop its advance with such worn-out means as sanctions and pressure, it is just a fatal misjudgment.
As clarified by the president of the State Affairs of the DPRK, the pain the U.S. has inflicted on our people has provoked a towering rage towards the U.S. and this has become a decisive factor and a strategic opportunity for redoubling our strength.
If the U.S. seeks to control the world by dint of high-handed and arbitrary practices, self-righteousness and prejudice, more countries will become interested in putting an end to the American-style hegemony and it will bring earlier the emergence of the anti-U.S. global solidarity structure.
The DPRK remains steadfast in its will to safeguard its sovereign rights, development and interests, regional and global peace and security to cope with the ever more undisguised sinister and hostile scheme of the U.S. and its satellite countries.
I take this opportunity to recall the criminal act of the ROK which violated the sovereignty and territory of the DPRK and caused the current mishap, and make it clear that the U.S. will be held accountable for it.
We will correctly remember the U.S. and the ROK, which have taken the lead in illegal and outrageous sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, and Japan, Canada, Britain, France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Australia and New Zealand, which actively joined it, and record all their hostile acts.
The forces involved in the smear campaign against the DPRK will have to pay a dear price for it. -0-

headline: Sapling Production Increased in North Hamgyong Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Officials and working people in the field of forest management in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK are making innovations in sapling production.
The province has produced over 300 million saplings of more than 50 species including over 900 000 zelkova saplings this year by putting the sapling production on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Xi Jinping
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on October 16.
The reply message says:
The respected Comrade General Secretary,
I express my heartfelt thanks to you for sending a message of greeting on the occasion of the 75th founding anniversary of the People's Republic of China.
For 75 years since the founding of the new China, the Communist Party of China has united and led the peoples of different nations throughout the country, performing two miracles of achieving rapid economic development and long-term social stability, and the great prosperity of the Chinese nation has entered an irreversible historical process.
The Chinese people will work tirelessly to push forward with the cause of building a powerful country and achieving national prosperity comprehensively through the modernization of the Chinese style, more firmly united behind the Party Central Committee.
I sincerely hope that the fraternal DPRK people will continue to achieve fresh successes by promoting the cause of socialist construction under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by you, Comrade General Secretary.
China and the DPRK are linked by the same mountain and rivers, and the traditional friendship between the two countries is growing stronger with the passage of time.
I am willing to make greater contributions, together with you, Comrade General Secretary, to leading the traditional China-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations to sustainable and stable development, steadily promoting the well-being of the peoples of the two countries and safeguarding regional and global peace, stability, development and prosperity.
I wish you good health and success in your work.
I wish your country prosperity and your people happiness and well-being. -0-

headline: Press Statement by Vice-Minister for Int'l Organizations of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Gyong, vice-minister for International Organizations of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, released the following press statement on Sunday:
As regards a measure taken by the DPRK of physically breaking the roads and railways in the section of its side connected to the ROK completely, UN Secretary-General Guterres on Oct. 15 made seriously improper remarks, emphasizing the importance of restraint, and demanding the restoration of all relevant communication channels as soon as possible.
He successfully played the role of a spokesman for the U.S., repeating like an automatic responder such stereotyped remarks as "abidance by the UNSC resolutions" and "complete and verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula" which have nothing to do with the above-said issue.
I express deep displeasure over and categorically reject the remarks of interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK unhesitatingly let loose by the UN secretary-general, the supreme official of the UN whose life and soul are objectivity and impartiality, contrary to the UN Charter's principle of respect for sovereignty and non-interference in internal affairs.
Whether we dismantle roads and railway facilities or newly build them in the territory where the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised, it pertains to the DPRK's sovereign right from A to Z and it is not a matter to be meddled in by the UN secretary-general.
To be rightful, he should have condemned the ROK military for encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK by infiltrating drones, military attack means, into even the sky above its capital city a few days ago.
He is taking issue with the self-defensive measure taken by the DPRK army in its territory, not making even a word about the ROK's wanton infringement upon the DPRK's sovereignty. This is an unpardonable and unfair behavior of double-standards.
The UN secretary-general made the prejudiced remarks, instead of standing at a strictly neutral position in the present situation on the Korean peninsula where the possibility of armed conflict is becoming a reality. It is little short of giving a green light to the U.S. and the ROK army's attempt to ignite a war against the DPRK.
In case an incident which nobody wants occurs on the Korean peninsula due to the reckless military temerity of the ROK with the back of the U.S., the UN secretary-general will never be free from responsibility for it as he incited the warmongers' fever with an undisguised behavior of availing himself of and following them. -0-

headline: People Fully Armed with Class Consciousness Are Sure to Win: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun says in an article on Sunday that the decisive factor of a victory in the fierce class struggle against the hostile forces lies in our own strength, the ideological and mental strength of all the people fully armed with class consciousness.
Class consciousness is the life of the revolutionary people, and the victory of socialism precisely means the one of class principle, the article notes, and goes on:
The absolute prestige and reputation of an independent power shining in the present century while containing the hostile forces by dint of strong power are attributable to the strong class self-respect, fortitude and death-defying resistance will of the Korean people.
As the class will of the people to prove the validity and invincibility of Korean-style socialism with the irresistibility of collectivism remains unshakeable, Juche-oriented socialism will continue to emerge victorious, further expanding the absolute force capable of completely putting an end to the moves of the hostile forces.
Class self-respect means the spirit of achieving self-development by one's own efforts.
The might of self-reliance and self-development precisely means the might of science and technology.
The manifestation of the transparent class consciousness of all the people to frustrate the enemies' moves by dint of Juche-oriented science and technology means the growth of the Juche-oriented power.
The DPRK will emerge as a socialist power prospering with self-sustenance and self-respect in the near future, thanks to the indomitable efforts of all the people to make the might of self-development more invincible while looking down the enemy with high class self-respect. -0-

headline: Increased Production at Wheat Processing Bases in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The modern wheat processing bases built across the DPRK are keeping production going at a high rate.
Nampho, Haeju, Songrim, Wonsan and Hamhung wheat processing factories and wheat processing bases in cities and countries are producing a lot of flour every day.
The quality wheat flour is contributing to improving the people's diet. -0-

headline: Joint On-line Seminar Held by Brazilian Political Parties and Organizations on 79th Founding Anniversary of WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A joint on-line seminar titled "The Workers' Party of Korea shining with its 79-year long history" held by Brazilian political parties and organizations on Oct. 11 to mark the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK.
Present there were personages of political parties and organizations, members of the Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in Brazil.
Speeches were made there.
A member of the National Political Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party said that the WPK has successfully played its role as the guiding force leading the independent and prosperous socialist construction to victory as it has been led by PresidentKim Il Sung, ChairmanKim Jong Iland the respected ComradeKim Jong Un, and that under the leadership ofKim Jong Un, the WPK will always emerge victorious in the future, too.
The chairperson of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairperson of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics, the chairperson of the Brazilian Center for Peace and Solidarity with Peoples and the official representative of the Brazilian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association lauded the WPK founded by PresidentKim Il Sung, founder of the Juche idea and great revolutionary, as the iron-willed vanguard ranks successfully carrying forward the glorious revolutionary traditions.
Meanwhile, a joint celebration meeting of Venezuelan political parties took place on Oct. 9 on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK. -0-

headline: Standard Pharmacies Newly Built in Ryanggang Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Ten-odd standard pharmacies were newly built in Ryanggang Province of the DPRK.
The standard pharmacies have sections for sale, prescription, manufacture, etc and boards of noticing common knowledge for use of medicines
Cities and counties in the province are paying attention to running standard pharmacies in a responsible way. -0-

headline: Struggle Staged in Puppet ROK to Demand Resignation of Yoon Group
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A massive struggle is going on in the puppet ROK to demand the resignation of the puppet Yoon Suk Yeol group, which is escalating the danger of war through serious provocations against the DPRK and driving the population into the abyss of destruction through illegal prosecution-based fascist dictatorship and arbitrary practices.
On Oct. 19, an anti-war peace rally was held in Seoul under the sponsorship of such organizations as the headquarters of movement for the impeachment of the Yoon Suk Yeol regime and the people's action.
Speakers there denounced the Yoon group for resorting to military provocations through drone infiltration and leaflet-scattering operations, not content with ceaseless war drills. The group, driven into a tight corner due to its untold evil deeds and fascist dictatorship which fomented the war crisis and resulted in economic bankruptcy, people's destitution and disasters, is engrossed in war gambling with the lives of the people to get rid of its ruling crisis, and such action should never be allowed, they said.
On the same day, there took place the 111th candlelight rally and demonstration on the theme of "Down with Yoon-Kon Hui, the war tyrant and kingpin of injustices!"
The speakers at the candlelight rally charged that Yoon is instigating the military to provoke armed conflict in a bid to maintain his power and wielding the prosecution dictatorship to hush up the hideous scandals of his wife Kim Kon Hui and, in this way, driving the whole ROK into the crucible of war and the cesspool of corruption.
Meanwhile, the candlelight action made public a "bill on impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol" carrying the public demand.
In the rally, there was a ceremony of tearing down placards with the letters "trickster for war martial law" and the dirty looks of Yoon group and Kim Kon Hui.
Then a resolution on intensive candlelight demonstrations in October was read out.
At the end of the rally, its participants staged a demonstration, chanting slogans and holding large placards and posters with such letters reading "Down with Yoon-Kon Hui!"
The demonstrators with candlelight in their hands expressed their will to continue the struggle until puppet Yoon has been impeached. -0-

headline: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un as Outstanding Leader
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- An era of comprehensive development of socialism being opened up on this land amid the vigorous struggle to create a world-class example of building an independent and powerful state is a brilliant fruition brought about by the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un, peerlessly great man and outstanding leader of the Juche revolution, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article, and goes on:
The era of comprehensive development of socialism is a heyday of the strengthened national power, in which development is simultaneously made in all fields, including politics, national defence, economy and culture, to demonstrate the dignity and prestige of a powerful country.
The great ComradeKim Jong Un's noble ideals and profound thinking are a fundamental source that brought an era of a true power.
He made a radical development in the politics and national defence, which is a great achievement for posterity. And he has continued this thinking to develop all sectors of socialist construction and all regions of the country simultaneously to the world level, while working his heart and soul to put ill-balanced national economy on a normal track and reduce the regional differences.
He has completely settled all problems arising in politics and economy, diplomacy, military affairs and all other fields and sectors. His revolutionary leadership is an offensive leadership of braving all sorts of hardships and a people-oriented leadership of giving full play to initiative, creativeness and activity of the masses.
The presentation of high goal and clear-cut orientation for fresh and development-oriented attainments, the great progress at once and the series of creation at the same time--they are main features of the revolutionary leadership of the General Secretary creating examples of the times in succession.
His extraordinary revolutionary leadership bringing about world-level successes by dint of strong wind of creation through a bold and big operation at a great leaping speed for uninterrupted innovation steers the steadfast trend of socialist development and the dynamic advance of the times.
His love and devotion is the most ardent love and self-sacrificing devotion.
Pains for the country and people mean the highest honor. This is the noble view cherished in his mind and herein lies all his joy, happiness, speculation and practice.
The General Secretary is the greatest man in the world as he is making a new great and glorious history of powerful socialist Korea with his undying feats, and the era of comprehensive development of socialism will be always brilliant with his great august name. -0-

headline: Framework for Next Year's Irrigation Project Hastened in S. Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- South Phyongan Province of the DPRK has propelled in a foresighted way the frameworks for the construction of pumping stations planned for next year's irrigation project.
The framework for pumping stations and their interior and exterior plastering were completed in Phyongsong, Tokchon and Anju cities and other regions in a short span of time.
The province has intensified the work for next year's irrigation project while consolidating its successes. -0-

The framework for pumping stations and their interior and exterior plastering were completed in Phyongsong, Tokchon and Anju cities and other regions in a short span of time.
The province has intensified the work for next year's irrigation project while consolidating its successes. -0-

headline: Advanced Equipment Management System Developed in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The intelligence development institute underKim Il SungUniversity in the DPRK developed a system for monitoring machine conditions and diagnosing trouble, called "Jinungjindan" (intelligence diagnosis).
This advanced equipment management system helps monitor the state of machinery in real time and determine the time of maintenance by predicting the trouble. It also makes it possible to analyzes the monitoring data and give help to finding out the trouble and maintain the equipment according to its state, thus contributing to prolonging its life.
"Jinungjindan" 2.4 was selected as one of the ten top IT products in 2024. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun of the DPRK Monday:
- An article says that the respected ComradeKim Jong Unis an outstanding leader who ushered in the era of comprehensive development of socialism.
- A meeting took place to mark the 10th anniversary ofKim Jong Un's field guidance to the Yonphung Scientists Holiday Camp.
- Successes are being made in different parts of the country.
- An article says that the new generation of Chongryon is growing up to be patriotic pillars under the flag of the great country.
- A rally for peace against war and candlelight rally and demonstration were staged in the puppet ROK in demand of the resignation of the Yoon Suk Yeol group.
- An article says that no matter what farce the U.S. and Japan may stage in international arena, they can never cover up their true colors as warmongers and their ambition for space hegemony. -0-

headline: Struggle Staged in Puppet ROK to Demand Resignation of Yoon Group
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A massive struggle is going on in the puppet ROK to demand the resignation of the puppet Yoon Suk Yeol group, which is escalating the danger of war through serious provocations against the DPRK and driving the population into the abyss of destruction through illegal prosecution-based fascist dictatorship and arbitrary practices.
On Oct. 19, an anti-war peace rally was held in Seoul under the sponsorship of such organizations as the headquarters of movement for the impeachment of the Yoon Suk Yeol regime and the people's action.
Speakers there denounced the Yoon group for resorting to military provocations through drone infiltration and leaflet-scattering operations, not content with ceaseless war drills. The group, driven into a tight corner due to its untold evil deeds and fascist dictatorship which fomented the war crisis and resulted in economic bankruptcy, people's destitution and disasters, is engrossed in war gambling with the lives of the people to get rid of its ruling crisis, and such action should never be allowed, they said.
On the same day, there took place the 111th candlelight rally and demonstration on the theme of "Down with Yoon-Kon Hui, the war tyrant and kingpin of injustices!"
The speakers at the candlelight rally charged that Yoon is instigating the military to provoke armed conflict in a bid to maintain his power and wielding the prosecution dictatorship to hush up the hideous scandals of his wife Kim Kon Hui and, in this way, driving the whole ROK into the crucible of war and the cesspool of corruption.
Meanwhile, the candlelight action made public a "bill on impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol" carrying the public demand.
In the rally, there was a ceremony of tearing down placards with the letters "trickster for war martial law" and the dirty looks of Yoon group and Kim Kon Hui.
Then a resolution on intensive candlelight demonstrations in October was read out.
At the end of the rally, its participants staged a demonstration, chanting slogans and holding large placards and posters with such letters reading "Down with Yoon-Kon Hui!"
The demonstrators with candlelight in their hands expressed their will to continue the struggle until puppet Yoon has been impeached. -0-

headline: Review of Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Following are major news items and articles in Rodong Sinmun of the DPRK Monday:
- An article says that the respected ComradeKim Jong Unis an outstanding leader who ushered in the era of comprehensive development of socialism.
- A meeting took place to mark the 10th anniversary ofKim Jong Un's field guidance to the Yonphung Scientists Holiday Camp.
- Successes are being made in different parts of the country.
- An article says that the new generation of Chongryon is growing up to be patriotic pillars under the flag of the great country.
- A rally for peace against war and candlelight rally and demonstration were staged in the puppet ROK in demand of the resignation of the Yoon Suk Yeol group.
- An article says that no matter what farce the U.S. and Japan may stage in international arena, they can never cover up their true colors as warmongers and their ambition for space hegemony. -0-

headline: Advanced Equipment Management System Developed in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The intelligence development institute underKim Il SungUniversity in the DPRK developed a system for monitoring machine conditions and diagnosing trouble, called "Jinungjindan" (intelligence diagnosis).
This advanced equipment management system helps monitor the state of machinery in real time and determine the time of maintenance by predicting the trouble. It also makes it possible to analyzes the monitoring data and give help to finding out the trouble and maintain the equipment according to its state, thus contributing to prolonging its life.
"Jinungjindan" 2.4 was selected as one of the ten top IT products in 2024. -0-

headline: Standard Pharmacies Newly Built in Ryanggang Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Ten-odd standard pharmacies were newly built in Ryanggang Province of the DPRK.
The standard pharmacies have sections for sale, prescription, manufacture, etc and boards of noticing common knowledge for use of medicines
Cities and counties in the province are paying attention to running standard pharmacies in a responsible way. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site for Recovery in Flood-hit Areas of Jagang Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, gave field guidance at the construction site for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas in Jagang Province on Oct. 21.
He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won and Ri Il Hwan, secretaries of the C.C., WPK, and relevant cadres of the Party Central Committee.
He was greeted on the spot by Pak Hun, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Pak Song Chol, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, and commanding officers of the provincial regiments of Party members involved in the recovery project.
Builders of the regiments of Party members, who were dispatched to the rehabilitation areas in Jagang Province in order to implement the decision of the Party Central Committee on splendidly building dwelling houses as early as possible in the flood-hit areas of North Phyongan, Jagang and Ryanggang provinces that were severely destroyed by flooding in July, have completed the housing construction in the main by powerfully waging all-night construction struggle and are vigorously pushing ahead with the internal construction work at the final stage.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unwent round the construction site for rehabilitation and learned in detail about the progress of housing construction.
He acknowledged the painstaking efforts of the builders and gave warm encouragement to them who are devoting their pure conscience and sincere efforts at the difficult and labor-consuming posts true to the call of the Party, fully displaying the spirit of devoted service for the people, extraordinary sense of responsibility and strong practical ability.
Expressing satisfaction over the fact that the flood-hit areas, reduced into ruin in an instant due to unexpected natural disaster, are undergoing a radical change without any sign of disaster, he highly appreciated the precious feats of the combatants of the regiments of Party members who are faithfully discharging their noble mission and duty as the members of the Workers' Party at the rehabilitation project site for the people in the flood-hit areas, far away from their dear houses and workplaces.
He called for working hard to bring earlier the happy moment of providing good houses for the flood victims who are waiting for the day of living in new villages and new houses even at this moment.
He referred to the fact that a series of deviations have been revealed in the design and construction of multi- and low-storied houses in the flood-hit areas, and analyzed their reasons. And he clarified the measures to be taken by the state in the future in overcoming the relevant matters arising in the rehabilitation and in launching a vigorous struggle for the overall regional construction.
Recalling that he has already stressed many times that architecture is an extension of politics as it is criterion showing the degree of the idea, national power and civilization in a visual way, and, therefore, even if a building is built, we should regard it as the one related with the self-respect, dignity and honor of our times, he said that some deviations underrating the structural quality have yet been revealed and they should be rectified.
Just like monumental edifices rising all over the country, the dwelling houses under construction for the flood victims, too, are precious assets of the state and the people that should be guaranteed forever, and therefore, it is necessary to overcome even the slightest shortcomings perfectly and direct greater efforts to ensuring perfection, he said, adding that a decision will be made to prolong the completion of the housing projects for the disaster areas, scheduled to be finished by early November, to early December.
He gave detailed instructions on taking practical measures to ensure that the inhabitants and schoolchildren of the flood-hit areas staying in Pyongyang could not feel inconvenience in their living, as regards the delay of the housing construction.
Noting that lots of houses for the flood victims are being built all at once in every flood-hit area of the country thanks to the heroic struggle of the Party members, youths and service personnel and to the support of all the people in the country, he said this gigantic work is not confined to the practical issue for housing construction but a crucial political issue of defending the character of our style socialist system based on the people-first principle and demonstrating its advantages. And he set forth the tasks for completing the project, calling on all the builders to further fully display their extraordinary patriotic enthusiasm and indomitable will so as to successfully complete the construction of houses and provide them to the flood victims with delight.
He stressed the need to further enhance the requirements and role of construction control organs.
He also gave detailed instructions on the important tasks such as the issue of ensuring timely and responsible transport and supply of materials without hindering the schedule of the project, the issue of properly greening the residential areas along with the housing construction and the issue of taking good care of the builders' living conditions.
That day the Secretariat of the WPK Central Committee decided to newly dispatch the chief and the political chief of the field headquarters for rehabilitating the flood-hit areas in Jagang Province.
Expressing expectation and belief that the Party members, youths and service personnel, whom the Party Central Committee dispatched to the difficult and arduous yet sacred and worthwhile struggle with deep trust, would remain faithful to their heavy mission to the end in the patriotic construction theaters for the country and the people, he ardently called for making redoubled efforts once again to build a splendid paradise for the people in the flood-hit areas without fail.
All the builders were filled with a firm determination to make the flames of loyalty and patriotism flare up more highly and vigorously struggle for the socialist country, responding with a firm pledge to the ardent call of the Party Central Committee. -0-

headline: Mission of Service Workers
story_text:
One day in April 1967, ChairmanKim Jong Ilvisited a shop in Pyongyang.
Saying that he came to the shop as he heard that it renders good order services, he demanded the ordering book.
Reading out the list of goods ordered by a newly-married couple in the book, he asked a saleswoman if the shop had fully supplied the ordered goods.
Expressing satisfaction over her positive answer, he said that it was the spirit of service.
He looked carefully the book once again and asked the saleswoman again if she had been to the house of the newly-married couple.
Hearing her negative answer, he said with regrettable voice that she would not know whether the couple had a bookcase or not.
He said that it can not be said that the shop fully meets the demand of inhabitants even though it writes an ordering book and accepts orders from them. He warmly instructed that in order to sincerely promote the convenience of the inhabitants, it is necessary to visit their houses and commercial workers should become mothers responsible for the people's living.
The instructions given by him that day were precious teachings reminding the service workers responsible for the people's living of their mission once again. -0-

headline: Press Statement of Kim Yo Jong, Vice Department Director of C.C., WPK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, issued the following press statement on Tuesday:
The reckless infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK by the ROK military gangsters is a hideous military provocation that can never be pardoned.
Seoul will have to experience at first hand so as to know properly how dangerous act it committed and how terrible and fatal the consequences it brought on itself are.
A military provocation against a nuclear weapons state may be led to horrible situation, unimaginable for politicians and military experts in any big or small country in the world with their normal thinking to experience. So, there will be no such instance except one recently made by lunatics of the ROK and Ukraine.
Such deed can be done only by lunatics in the Seoul and Kiev regimes.
Seoul and Kiev are exact counterparts in going about begging and letting loose reckless remarks against nuclear weapons states at random without follow-up capability.
It seems to be a common feature of bad dogs bred by the U.S.
The DPRK detective agencies' investigation into the drones from the ROK is going on and the truth behind the despicable provocation of the ROK military gangsters will be analyzed further in detail.
No one knows how our retaliation and revenge will be completed.
A lot of political motivational rubbish sent by the ROK scum was discovered and removed in many parts of the DPRK on October 21, too.
The brute courage of the Seoul authorities to jump into fire with brushwood on their backs, far from reflecting on their conducts and being prudent, will bring the danger of destruction of all the scum. And they will be denounced by everyone else. -0-

headline: Importance of Scientific Farming
story_text:
In the presence of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un, a splendid banquet for labor innovators and persons of meritorious service, who took part in the celebrations of the 73rd birthday of the DPRK, was given in the garden of the headquarters building of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee on September 8, 2021.
On this significant day, agricultural officials and workers had the honor of meeting the General Secretary before others.
The General Secretary repeatedly stressed the importance of scientific farming, indicating in detail the tasks and ways for doing farming well.
Saying that agricultural production should be put on a scientific, IT and intensive basis by raising a strong wind of scientific farming, he added that the per-hectare yield of grain is increasing in recent years as compared with the past despite the unfavorable weather conditions in the country because the agricultural workers have conducted farming in a scientific way.
He stressed the need to disseminate advanced agricultural science and technology and new farming methods to the officials and working people in the agricultural field on a regular basis through the state computer network.
The agricultural officials and workers could hardly repress their excitement, looking up to him who is working heart and soul for the country's farming. -0-

headline: Railway Transport Field of DPRK Gives Priority to Transport for Flood Damage Recovery
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Workers in the field of railway transport of the DPRK are striving to carry the materials for recovering from flood damage on a top priority basis.
The Ministry of Railways has taken measures to shorten the time of train stay at railway stations, while grasping the operation of locomotives and freight cars in time.
The Pyongyang Railway Bureau exploits locomotive and freight car reserves to the maximum to form intensive transport trains to suit the increased amount of freight transport and put efforts on cutting down the turnaround time of freight cars.
The Kaechon Railway Bureau has taken detailed measures for putting operation of trains on a normal basis. -0-

headline: WPK Praised Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- In congratulatory messages and letters on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), foreign figures highly praised the WPK.
The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said:
HEKim Jong Unhas laid the foundation for the development of the Party by setting forth the unique idea and theory on Party building in the new era.
He has thoroughly embodied the people-first political idea and the selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people in the Party building and activities, thus translating the people's dreams and ideals into reality.
Under the outstanding leadership of HEKim Jong Un, a new era of comprehensive national rejuvenation is being ushered in and the DPRK is shedding its rays as a fortress of independence and justice.
The chairman of the Finland-Korea Society and the national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico said that the DPRK could work unprecedented miracles and usher in a new era of self-respect and prosperity under the severe condition in which others might have collapse a hundred times. It was thanks to the experienced and seasoned leadership of the WPK which has always taken the initiative and turned misfortune and adversity into blessing and prosperity, they added.
The chairman of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and the chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party said that the guiding force of the WPK which puts the dignity and national power of the DPRK on the highest level and confidently leads it toward a brighter future is the fundamental source of epochal changes and miracles.
The chairperson of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and the chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism expressed belief that the future of the DPRK would be rosy as the great Party is leading its people to victory, firmly holding fast to the helm of the revolution.
The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, the chairperson of the Motherland Party of Türkiye, the national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, the national leader of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist) and other party leaders, too, expressed full support and solidarity to the cause of the WPK, highly praising the great personality of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a heyday of the Party building in the new era. -0-

headline: WPK Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations and personages in different countries made public statements and articles to mark the 79th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
The New Communist Party of Britain and the Korean Friendship Association UK in a joint statement stressed that the party-building cause of Juche pioneered and advanced by the great leaders ComradeKim Il Sungand ComradeKim Jong Ilis being creditably carried forward by the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
The general secretary of the Communist Party of DR Congo said in a statement that the DPRK could make an eye-opening development despite the worldwide political upheaval and unprecedented difficulties as the WPK has invariably uplifted the banner of socialism.
The chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in their statements praised the exploits of PresidentKim Il Sungfor Party founding and the glorious course of the ever-victorious WPK.
The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania in an article titled "Party serving the people" said that the WPK has made selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people for nearly 80 years, regarding the people-first principle as its political idea.
The chairman of the Supreme Council of the National Socialist Party of Romania in an article titled "The lifeblood of the WPK" said that ComradeKim Jong Unis uniting all the people as one with the scientific line correctly reflecting the requirements of the reality and opening up a phase of turn and a broad avenue to prosperity despite the worst difficulties.
The general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy in an article titled "Congratulations to the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK" praised the undying feats of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho has developed the WPK into the steel-strong ranks advancing by dint of ideology and unity.
Meanwhile, the chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made a speech titled "Root of Workers' Party of Korea" through radio Citta Aperta on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the WPK. He referred to the historic roots of the WPK and its popular character and steadfast stand for independence against imperialism. -0-

headline: Electricity Production Goes up in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex in the DPRK makes progress in the production of electricity.
The complex has produced 700 million more kWh of electricity up to now this year as compared with the same period of last year.
It finished the annual overhaul project in the first half of the year, thus providing a guarantee for boosting the electricity production. -0-

headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's Loving Care for Orphans
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Baby Home and the Pyongyang Orphanage called palaces of children are situated on the picturesque Taedong River bank.
The baby home and the orphanage with all conditions and environment for nursing, education and living are the cradles of happiness for orphans, built under the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Un's noble loving care for posterity.
After initiating the construction of the baby home and the orphanage, the General Secretary chose their sites at the best place, guided their layouts and gave field guidance at the construction sites several times, indicating the orientation and ways for the construction.
One day in October 2014, he visited the completed baby home and the orphanage and said with satisfaction that there would be no such wonderful home for children in the world as them.
Saying that all the elements of the baby home and the orphanage are suitable for living environment and educational places, he gave precious instructions on enhancing the responsibility and role of the nursery school and kindergarten teachers, stressing that it is more important to bring up the children well than to build such establishments.
The song "We Are the Happiest in the World" is always heard at the baby home and orphanage built thanks to the paternal loving care of the General Secretary who spares nothing for the children. -0-

headline: Public Support to Railway Sector Intensified
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- North Phyongan Province of the DPRK is actively aiding the railway sector.
Unjon County provided enough cement, aggregate and other materials needed for sprucing up the appearance of Unam Railway Station, and repaired defective parts in the railway section in time to contribute to the safe operation of trains.
Sakju County carried out the cracking and replenishment of more than 2 000 cubic meters of ballast in a short span of time and repaired the retaining walls as required by technical regulations to ensure the safety of the railway roadbed.
Pakchon County encouraged the working people to replace the boundary stones in the section extending several kilometers and supply a large amount of supplies to the railway platoons.
Meanwhile, the provincial people's committee, the provincial general hospital and other units have rendered material and moral assistance to the railway field. -0-

headline: Vietnamese Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
story_text: Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Vietnam led by Executive Deputy Minister Nguyen Minh Vu arrived here by air on Oct. 22. -0-

headline: WPK Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations and personages in different countries made public statements and articles to mark the 79th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
The New Communist Party of Britain and the Korean Friendship Association UK in a joint statement stressed that the party-building cause of Juche pioneered and advanced by the great leaders ComradeKim Il Sungand ComradeKim Jong Ilis being creditably carried forward by the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
The general secretary of the Communist Party of DR Congo said in a statement that the DPRK could make an eye-opening development despite the worldwide political upheaval and unprecedented difficulties as the WPK has invariably uplifted the banner of socialism.
The chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in their statements praised the exploits of PresidentKim Il Sungfor Party founding and the glorious course of the ever-victorious WPK.
The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania in an article titled "Party serving the people" said that the WPK has made selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people for nearly 80 years, regarding the people-first principle as its political idea.
The chairman of the Supreme Council of the National Socialist Party of Romania in an article titled "The lifeblood of the WPK" said that ComradeKim Jong Unis uniting all the people as one with the scientific line correctly reflecting the requirements of the reality and opening up a phase of turn and a broad avenue to prosperity despite the worst difficulties.
The general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy in an article titled "Congratulations to the 79th founding anniversary of the WPK" praised the undying feats of the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unwho has developed the WPK into the steel-strong ranks advancing by dint of ideology and unity.
Meanwhile, the chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made a speech titled "Root of Workers' Party of Korea" through radio Citta Aperta on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the WPK. He referred to the historic roots of the WPK and its popular character and steadfast stand for independence against imperialism. -0-

headline: System for Measuring Growth and Nutritive Conditions of Children Developed
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Medical Science in the DPRK developed a system capable of measuring and estimating the growth and nutritive conditions of children in real time, to contribute to putting the nutrition care on a scientific basis.
The system helps measure the statures, weights, girths, etc. of children and their nutrition and estimate their growth and nutrition intake.
It was registered as an excellent IT product at the 2023 National Exhibition of IT Successes. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Vietnamese President
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to Luong Cong, president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on Oct. 22.
The message said:
I extend warm congratulations to you on your election as president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
Your assumption of heavy responsibility as the president of the state is an expression of the deep trust and expectation of the Communist Party of Vietnam and all the Vietnamese people.
Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish you success in your responsible work, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and two countries would develop in conformity with the common socialist cause and the interests of peoples of the two countries. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Inspects Strategic Missile Bases
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, inspected strategic missile bases.
He was accompanied by Kim Jong Sik, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.
The respected ComradeKim Jong Unexamined the readiness for action of strategic deterrence directly connected with the security of the country, including the important functions and capabilities of launch-related facilities in the missile bases and the strategic missile combat duty.
He appreciated the services of the missile soldiers in the strategic missile bases for fulfilling the sacred duty they have assumed before the country and the people, being always on combat duty in a tight posture as required by the prevailing situation.
Noting that the strategic missile force is the core force playing a pivotal role in the DPRK's war deterrence, he stressed that it is an important principle of the strategy for building the national defence consistently maintained by the WPK to technically modernize overall armed forces by giving priority to the strategic missile force in the future, too.
As was stressed on several occasions recently, the U.S. strategic nuclear means pose ever-increasing threat to the security environment of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the long-term threats urgently demand that the DPRK more definitely bolster its war deterrence and take a thorough and strict counteraction posture of the nuclear forces, he said.
He stressed the need to further modernize and fortify the strategic missile bases and make all bases fully ready to keep thorough counteraction posture capable of promptly dealing a strategic counterblow to the enemies at any time in different circumstances. -0-

headline: Electricity Production Goes up in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 23 (KCNA) -- The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex in the DPRK makes progress in the production of electricity.
The complex has produced 700 million more kWh of electricity up to now this year as compared with the same period of last year.
It finished the annual overhaul project in the first half of the year, thus providing a guarantee for boosting the electricity production. -0-

headline: National Heritage Conservation Brisk in DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unmade public the famous work "National Heritage Conservation Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" on October 24, 2014.
In the work he clarified the firm will of the Workers' Party of Korea to glorify the DPRK as a world-class advanced civilized nation with a long history and brilliant culture and a prosperous power, true to the noble intention of PresidentKim Il Sungand ChairmanKim Jong Ilwho correctly formulated the 5 000-year-long history of the nation and demonstrated the superiority of the Korean nation to the world.
He also indicated the importance of the work for protecting national heritage and the tasks and ways for doing this work well.
Thanks to the immortal guidelines, the work for protecting national heritage in the DPRK has been conducted as a nationwide and all-people campaign and many successes made in the course of this work.
Many objects, including the custom of making kimchi, the Yangdok hot spring culture and the Kyongsong ceramic technology were newly registered as part of world, national and local intangible cultural heritage, and natural monuments, adding to cultural heritage of the Korean nation.
The Rangnang Museum was built to intensively show the excellent history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation and relics worthy of national treasure were unearthed in different parts of the country.
A geographical information system program for national heritage dealing with photos, maps and explanations of historical relics was developed and an e-book on scenic spots and natural monuments, natural heritage of the country, was completed and activities were conducted to put the national heritage conservation on a scientific basis.
Meanwhile, the work for restoring tangible heritage and natural heritage damaged by natural factors was pushed ahead with in different parts of the country. -0-

headline: Myohyangsan Medical Appliances Factory
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Myohyangsan Medical Appliances Factory in the DPRK is a model factory leading the development of the country's medical appliances industry.
The factory, which has put production and management on a high scientific and IT basis, is precious fruition of the warm loving care and devoted efforts made by the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unto make sure that the people lead a highly civilized life in good health under the socialist public health system.
Out of his intention to bring about a turn in the country's medical appliances industry and public health, the General Secretary visited the factory many times and set a high target to modernize the factory and took measures to implement it.
One day in October 2019, he visited the factory to learn about its modernization, saying that it was perfect in both architectural and technical aspects as its interior and exterior met the requirements of an icon factory in the medical field along with its excellent architectural style, clean environment of its surroundings and well-distributed space.
Watching the trial medical appliances produced by the factory, he said that it is necessary to design them well to suit the actual conditions of hospitals and constitutions of patients and steadily update them in an innovative way so as to develop and produce high-performance quality medical appliances.
Under his guidance, the factory, built as a model of the country's medical appliances industry, has developed tens of kinds of modern medical appliances and remarkably increased the production capacity.
The factory has sent medical appliances to provincial, city and county-level curative and preventive organs and hospitals in mountainous counties.
Recently, it sent hundreds of medical equipment and appliances, including high-performance combined dental treatment machines, to curative and preventive organs. -0-
