Winter Wheat Cultivation Area Expands in South Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK has increased the area of winter wheat cultivation by 9 000 hectares more than last year, while sowing winter wheat seeds in the optimum season.
The province is pushing ahead with the work to bring about due fruition in the wheat farming next year by properly manuring and cultivating wheat given the increased area. -0-

headline: Winter Wheat Cultivation Area Expands in South Hwanghae Province of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK has increased the area of winter wheat cultivation by 9 000 hectares more than last year, while sowing winter wheat seeds in the optimum season.
The province is pushing ahead with the work to bring about due fruition in the wheat farming next year by properly manuring and cultivating wheat given the increased area. -0-

headline: Mass Movement of Trade Union Organizations Brisk in North Phyongan Province
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Trade union officials and members in North Phyongan Province of the DPRK are conducting a brisk mass movement in theatres for recovery from flood damage.
The provincial trade union committee has encouraged builders to work miracles through an agitprop campaign.
Many trade union lecturers conducted diverse agitprop activities at the rehabilitation sites in Hadan-ri, Sinuiju City.
Trade union members of the Sinuiju Textile Mill, the Sinuiju Footwear Factory, the Sinuiju Port and the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory conducted a night support shock brigade activity for making blocks, building walls and reinforcing bar, and thus gave vitality to overall construction.
Trade union organizations in Uiju County, too, have conducted a shock brigade campaign to contribute to speeding up the construction of dwelling houses in a qualitative way.
Trade union members of the provincial land and environmental conservation bureau, the provincial telecommunications management bureau and other units went to the recovery sites with aid materials, and conducted agitation activities during a break. -0-

headline: Talks between Senior Diplomatic Officials of DPRK and Vietnam Held
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Talks between Pak Sang Gil, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and Nguyen Minh Vu, executive deputy minister of Foreign Affairs of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, took place here on October 23.
Present there from the DPRK side were officials of the Foreign Ministry and from the Vietnamese side were members of the delegation of the Vietnamese Foreign Ministry and the Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK.
At the talks both sides discussed in depth the issues of expanding exchange and cooperation in various fields between the two countries and developing the bilateral friendly relations with a long history and tradition onto a new high stage, and reached a consensus of views on them. -0-

headline: Talks between Senior Diplomatic Officials of DPRK and Vietnam Held
Celebrations Held in Russia
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place at the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee and the Amur Regional Branch Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia and the Far East Science Library to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
Speeches were made at the events attended by personages of relevant units and masses.
The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the WPK has recorded only victory in its long history since its foundation, guided by outstanding leaders.
Such a party enjoying absolute support and trust of the people as the WPK can never be found in the world, he said, adding it is the immortal exploits of the great ComradesKim Il SungandKim Jong Iland the brilliant fruition of the outstanding leadership of the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is creditably carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.
The first secretary of the Amur Regional Branch Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the WPK, founded by ComradeKim Il Sungand built by ComradeKim Jong Ilinto an ever-victorious party, has performed a series of world-startling miracles by wisely leading the building of a powerful socialist nation, holdingKim Jong Unas its head.
The chairman and members of the Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia praised the exploits the great leadersKim Il SungandKim Jong Ilperformed in the building of a Juche-oriented revolutionary party, expressing belief that the Korean people would continue to register great successes in bolstering up self-reliant defence capability and building socialism under the seasoned guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un.
Congratulatory messages toKim Jong Unwere adopted at the events. -0-

headline: 2024 Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest in Celebration of 75th Day of Physical Culture
Symposium on Intangible Cultural Heritage Conservation Held
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A symposium on the intangible cultural heritage conservation took place at the Sci-Tech Complex in the DPRK on October 23 to mark the tenth anniversary of the publication of the respected ComradeKim Jong Un's immortal work "National Heritage Conservation Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation".
Present there were officials, teachers, researchers and students in the field of national heritage conservation and relevant units and exemplary officials and working people in the work for protecting intangible cultural heritages.
Speeches were made by Hwang Kwang Il, director of the Bureau for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, Kang Pok Sil, a teacher ofKim Il SungUniversity, Mun Kyong Ho, manager of the Okryu Restaurant, Pak Ryong Un, dean of a faculty of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts, Ri Ae Ryong, a doctor of Mangyongdae District Hospital, Kyong Nam Chol, head of a department of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun University of Music and Dance, etc.
Speakers said thatKim Jong Un, who is always paying deep attention to inheriting and developing the excellent culture and history of the Korean nation, has wisely led the work for protecting intangible cultural heritages.
They noted that the work for preserving and glorifying the soul of the nation in all social life has been conducted with vigor over the past decade.
The successes made in the work for protecting intangible cultural heritages are a precious fruition of the Workers' Party of Korea's correct policy for protecting national heritage, which regards it as an important affair of the revolution and construction to preserve and glorify the national character, they stressed. -0-

headline: G7 Is Developing into Global War Contractor Group: KCNA Commentary
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- G7 that has come under worldwide criticism recently held a meeting of defense ministers in Napoli of Italy for the first time in its history.
At the recent confab attended by the defense ministers of G7 and even representatives of the European Union and NATO under the manipulation of the U.S., they made public a "joint statement" inciting the inter-camp confrontation, while making reckless remarks that the "framework of international security has been plunged into graver danger" by such independent and sovereign states as the DPRK, Russia and China.
G7, formed as a group for the interests of a few countries to facilitate the "economic buildup" of the West in the 1970s, held a meeting of defense ministers, the first of its kind, which is unfit for its "mission and duty".
The "moneymaking group", which is not entitled to represent the international community and "supervise or control" the sovereign states in terms of its structure, impudently dealt with global security. This shows that G7 has turned definitely into a "club of war", not a "club of economy".
It is a vivid manifestation of the double standards, a wanton challenge to international peace and an open declaration of new Cold War in the world that they justify the expansion of their defense industry and term sovereign states' exercise of legitimate rights "threats", while talking about "incompatibility-brought confrontation".
Today G7 has become the primary political servant for ensuring the U.S. hegemony.
G7's grave moves to further foster and expand the war of aggression under the pompous signboard of "international security and prosperity" are getting ever more undisguised in the Korean peninsula.
G7's interference in the Korean peninsula issue actually means the military expansion of NATO, the global war alliance.
NATO has invited the puppet ROK to its summit since 2022 and its secretary general was recently closeted with puppet Yoon Suk Yeol to discuss the intensified "cooperation system" against the DPRK.
Meanwhile, Western countries, NATO member states and member states of G7, which account for the backbone of the U.S.-led “UN Command”, are directly involved in the war drills for aggression against the DPRK.
Western countries are working hard to make the flames of war in Europe spill over into Asia, claiming "Asia and Europe are inseparable in terms of security". This grave reality seriously teaches that G7 has rapidly developed into a global "war contractor group".
The U.S. is now scheming to establish an axis of war serving its strategy for hegemony by rallying all its servants, including G7, in which war criminal states that inflicted huge damage on mankind in the last century hold a majority, and NATO, the worst-ever group seeking military confrontation.
G7 is committing an act of robbing others in broad daylight without shame and getting increasingly vocal in condemning someone's measures for bolstering up self-defensive capabilities. It had better look at its despicable image reflected in the eyes of the international community before pointing an accusing finger at others.
The more desperately G7, which is no more than a "shadow" of the U.S., slanders the DPRK's policy of the state nuclear force, bereft of reason, the more clearly it will betray its criminal colors as a harasser of peace, confrontation maniac and war merchant.
Explicitly speaking again, those who seek to deprive the DPRK of its inviolable right will have to pay a high price for it. -0-

topic: WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities
headline: Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Friendship Tower
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) --Kim Jong Un, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a wreath to the Friendship Tower on Oct. 25 on the occasion of the 74th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
Written on the ribbon of the wreath sent by the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwere letters reading "We will remember the martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers forever".
Upon authorization, Ri Il Hwan, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, laid the wreath before the tower. -0-

headline: Devoted Efforts for Country's Agricultural Development
Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Abroad
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The respected ComradeKim Jong Unreceived congratulatory messages and letters from different countries on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
They came from the general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the general secretary of the Syrian Communist Party (Unified), the general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, the general secretary of the Arab Democratic Union Party of Syria, the general secretary of the Al Ahd al Watani Party of Syria, the general secretary of the Syrian Arab Socialist Union Party, the general secretary of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine, the general secretary of the Palestine Liberation Democratic Front, the general secretary of the Palestinian Popular Struggle Front, the chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, the chairman of the Motherland Party of Türkiye, the general secretary of the Jordanian Communist Party, the general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, the general chairperson and the general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Indonesian Rural Reconstruction Movement Party, the general secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, the general secretary of the C.C., All-India Forward Bloc, the chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, the chairman of the Supreme Council of the National Socialist Party of Romania, the chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, the chairman of the Socialist Political Party "For Just Russia-Patriots-Truth", the chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the chairman of the National Salvation Front of Russia, the chairman of the C.C., Communist Party "Russian Communists", the chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, the first secretary of the C.C., Bulgarian Communist Party, the first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Belarus, the general secretary of the  Communist Party of Switzerland, the chairman and the international secretary of the Communist Party in Sweden, the chairman and the secretary general of the C.C., Slovak Communist Party, the general secretary of the C.C., Czechoslovak Communist Party, the chairman and the international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, the general secretary and concurrently international secretary of the Serbian Communist Party, the general secretary and the international secretary of the C.C., New Yugoslav Communist Party, the general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, the national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, the general secretary of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party of Namibia, the secretary general of the African National Congress of South Africa, the general secretary of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party, the general secretary of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front, the general secretary of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania, the general secretary of the Communist Party of the DR Congo, the general secretary of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, the first secretary of the Workers' World Party of the United States of America, the national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, the general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the general secretary of the Marxist-Leninist Communist Party of Brazil, the first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action), the national leader of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the Communist Party of Australia and the National Leadership of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay.
The congratulatory messages and letters also came from the deputy general secretary of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the international secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the People of Spain, the first deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, a member of the National Committee of the Socialist Workers' Party of United States of America, the secretary for International Relations of the Brazilian Communist Party and the co-chairman of the Board of Directors of theKim Il Sung-Kim Jong IlFoundation and other high-ranking personages of political, social and economic circles in China, Russia, Nepal, Lebanon, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Singapore, Cambodia, Thailand, Pakistan, Palestine, Iraq, Iran, India, Japan, Norway, Denmark, Germany, Romania, Hungary, Bulgaria, Belarus, Switzerland, Sweden, the Czech Republic, France, Finland, Croatia, Poland, Serbia, Britain, Austria, Iceland, Italy, Spain, Nigeria, South Africa, Equatorial Guinea, Brazil, Venezuela, Colombia, Peru, Ecuador and Australia, representatives of groups for the study of the Juche idea and missions of international organizations here.
Meanwhile, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea received a message of greeting from the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia. -0-

headline: Press Statement of External Policy Office Chief of DPRK Foreign Ministry
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The chief of the External Policy Office of the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Saturday released the following press statement titled "The U.S. will be held wholly responsible for pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an uncontrollable one":
Amid the extreme tension prolonging on the Korean peninsula due to the recent crucial provocation of the ROK against the DPRK, the U.S. more openly reveals its military confrontational attempt against the DPRK.
From October 21, the U.S., together with the ROK military warmongers, has staged a large-scale joint air drill Freedom Flag by drawing the Australian Air Force into the Korean peninsula. And it has resorted to extreme confrontation hysteria, openly claiming that the purpose of the drill is aimed at the DPRK.
The U.S. and the ROK are trumpeting that they would master the compound operation capability by mobilizing fighters and drones for the first time and conduct exercises for increasing the survivability in airborne infiltration into an enemy's position through the large-scale joint air drill which integrates the annual combined joint formation drill and a joint air drill Vigilant Defense.
The military drill of the U.S. and the ROK, which shows the offensive and aggressive nature more vividly in its scale, content and character, is a very dangerous military provocation aimed at preemptive and surprise strike at the DPRK.
The U.S. is staging "joint air re-supply drill" and "joint river-crossing drill" with the ROK and a large-scale marine corps' joint military drill Keen Sword with Japan. At the same time, it is further escalating the military tension while dispatching the super-large nuclear carrier George Washington task force around the Korean peninsula.
We strongly denounce the U.S. hostile act of resorting to reckless military demonstration with its allies, not content with the present political and military tension on the Korean peninsula which is exposed to the danger of a touch-and-go explosion, as a clear threat and a grave provocation to the security of the region.
The U.S. can never cover up its criminal nature of driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into an uncontrollable one with any rhetoric.
It is a fact known to the world that the ROK committed illegal and grave provocation of openly infiltrating military attack means into the sky above a sovereign state under the shelter of "military cooperation" with someone.
The DPRK keeps in sight the dark shadow of the U.S. which is hidden behind the fearless provocative acts of the ROK.
The U.S. has patronized the ROK's scattering of political motivational rubbish over the territory of the DPRK as the so-called "freedom of expression" and instigated the bellicose hysteria of its ally with frequent deployment of strategic assets and ceaseless joint military drills. The U.S. confrontation history will be exactly recorded and calculated.
If a situation that no one wishes is created on the Korean peninsula, the U.S., the arch criminal and mastermind escalating the tension in the region, will be held wholly responsible for it. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Sinphyong County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- A praiseworthy entity of creating rural civilization in the new era has appeared at the Sonam Farm in Sinphyong County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
The low-and single-storied houses of various forms designed in line with the characteristic of the mountainous region are the agricultural workers' home of happiness.
Attending the ceremony for moving into new houses were Kim Sok Jun, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party and power organs and agricultural workers in Sinphyong County.
Kim Son Il, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, made a congratulatory address.
The farmers who received licenses for using houses expressed their thanks to the respected ComradeKim Jong Unwho is ushering in a fresh phase of the socialist rural development with his tireless guidance.
Amid the festive mood, officials visited the farmers' families to congratulate them upon moving into the new houses. -0-

headline: DPRK Ambassador Presents Credentials to President of Equatorial Guinea
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK ambassador presented his credentials to the president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea on October 24.
Ambassador Ri Jae Son courteously conveyed the warm greetings ofKim Jong Un, president of the State Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, to President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo.
The president expressed deep thanks for this and asked the ambassador to convey his best wishes to HEKim Jong Un.
Extending sincere congratulations to the DPRK on its signal achievements made under the seasoned leadership of HEKim Jong Un, he expressed the stand to further develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries in various fields. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Hyesan City of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- New houses have appeared at the Kanggu Vegetable Farm in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province of the DPRK.
The modern houses, built in harmony with the surrounding environment, are a striking demonstration of the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's rural construction policy on turning all rural villages across the country into rich and cultured ideal socialist villages in the near future.
Present at the ceremony for moving into those houses were Ri Song Il, secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, and officials of the Party and power organs and agricultural workers in Hyesan City.
Kim Chol Nam, chairman of the Ryanggang Provincial People's Committee, made a congratulatory address. Then the licenses for the use of houses were conveyed to agricultural workers and speeches made. -0-

headline: Loving Care for Orphans
DPRK Men's Football Team Qualified for 2025 AFC U-17 Asian Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The qualifying matches for the 2025 AFC U-17 Asian Cup are being held divided into ten groups.
The DPRK team belongs to group A and the matches of the group A are taking place in Jordan.
The DPRK team beat the Chinese Hong Kong team 8:2, Syrian team 2:1 and Iranian team 4:1 and played the last match with the Jordanian team on October 25. It beat its rival 3:0 in the match.
The DPRK team obtained 12 points in the total score and took the first place in the group to win the qualification for the 2025 AFC U-17 Asian Cup. -0-

headline: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of National Defence Makes Public Final Results of Investigation into Case of Grave Infringement upon Sovereignty by Drone from ROK
Inter-Provincial Mass Sports Contest Brisk in DPRK
DPRK Advances into Semi-finals of 2024 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A quarterfinal match for the 2024 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup took place between the DPRK and Polish teams on Oct. 26.
The DPRK team beat its Polish rival 1:0 in the match.
The semi-finals between the DPRK and U.S. teams will be held on Oct. 30. -0-

headline: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of National Defence Makes Public Final Results of Investigation into Case of Grave Infringement upon Sovereignty by Drone from ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK released Sunday the final results of investigation into the case of infringement upon its sovereignty which confirmed the take-off point and route and purpose of intrusion by the drone from the ROK found in the area of the DPRK capital city.
According to the spokesman, under the instruction of the DPRK government on scientifically and thoroughly proving the truth behind the case of the grave infringement upon the country's sovereignty by a drone, a military means recognized by the world, the joint investigation group involving the Ministry of National Defence, the Ministry of State Security and other relevant specialized organs completely dismantled the flight control module from the remains of a crashed enemy drone and analyzed the flight plan and flight log in a comprehensive way.
The results of analysis of the flight control program of the enemy drone conducted by the joint investigation group indefensibly and clearly proved the most vulgar and shameless provocative nature of the ROK military gangsters who have persistently evaded the responsibility for the illegal intrusion by their drone into the sky above the capital city of the DPRK.
The collected evidence data include 238 flight plans and flight logs worked out between June 5, 2023 and October 8, 2024, and the remaining data except the data of October 8 are the data of flight in the territory of the ROK.
According to the analysis of the flight control program, a plan for scattering political motivational rubbish is to be worked out when the flight plan is drawn out, and when the drone reaches the position reflected in the scattering plan, the flight control module is to send an electrical signal to the scattering means.
The flight data number of the enemy drone crashed after intruding into the DPRK on October 8 was analyzed.
The plan for scattering political motivational rubbish and the scattering log were recorded correctly in the enemy drone.
It was proved that the drone of the ROK military gangsters which took off at Paekryong Island at 23:25:30 on Oct. 8 and intruded into the territorial air of the DPRK flied over Jangyon County of South Hwanghae Province and the waters around the Cho Islet till the waters around Namjoap Islet, and then over Chollima District, Nampho Municipality and intruded into the capital city of the DPRK.
The enemy drone scattered the political motivational rubbish in the sky above the area between the building of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and Sungri Station of the Pyongyang Metro at 1:32:8 on Oct. 9 and in the sky above the building of the Ministry of National Defence at 1:35:11.
The confirmed objective and scientific evidence data expose that the intrusion by the drone is aimed at scattering the anti-DPRK political motivational rubbish and that the principal of the hostile infringement upon the DPRK sovereignty is none other than the puppet ROK military gangsters.
The spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence stressed once again that the last warning to the dangerous and reckless, political and military provocation by the ROK military gangsters which went beyond the limit of patience has already been made.
In the case of infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK reoccurs due to the blind trust in the master, seizing the ROK, the most vulgar and malignant rogue state, and its extremely bad habit of challenge, the source of all misfortunes and provocations will disappear forever by the merciless offensive of the DPRK. -0-

story_text:
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, issued the following press statement on Sunday:
An unidentified drone appeared in the sky above Seoul and leaflets criticizing puppet Yoon were scattered.
The military, individual organization or any individual of the DPRK did not let fly a drone. We can not confirm it and it is worthless to give answer to it.
This is an assumed situation.
Under such situation, I'd like to see once how the dirty curs in Seoul bark.
The world may also be curious about it. -0-

headline: 112th Candlelight Rally and Demo in Puppet ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A massive struggle is being intensified in the puppet ROK to impeach the puppet Yoon Suk Yeol regime getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK war moves, pursuant to the U.S. policy for hegemony.
The 112th candlelight rally and demonstration were staged in Seoul on Oct. 26.
The broad masses took part in the rally and demonstration. They gave vent to towering anger and curse at puppet Yoon Suk Yeol, the war maniac and fascist dictator, chanting such slogans as "Down with the war-seeking regime" and "Expel  Yoon Suk Yeol on the strength of population".
They charged that Yoon has turned the ROK into a scapegoat and a war theatre for outsiders, ceaselessly staging war drills with the U.S. and Japan and other forces.
The longer Yoon stays in power, the more critical the life of the population will be, they said, stressing that Yoon, the war maniac, should be impeached at once for peace.
At the candlelight rally, an appeal was read out to call on the people from all walks of life to join in the struggle for the impeachment of Yoon-Kon Hui who have ignored and maltreated the population and pursued only war and confrontation to maintain the power.
On the same day, there was a meeting of voters for impeaching puppet Yoon in North Jolla Province. Its participants warned that it is the will of the people to impeach Yoon and if lawmakers turn down this public mindset, they will become a target of punishment. And they stressed that Yoon should be ousted from power without fail on the strength of the population.
Meanwhile, various organizations and puppet political parties issued protest statements and commentaries all at once over the fact that the puppet Yoon group, upset by the ever-mounting public mindset on impeachment, is getting frantic with the wholesale suppression of media.
Media and many organizations in the puppet ROK said that such suppression is an expression of the last-ditch efforts of the fascist regime driven into the crisis of ruin, adding that the Yoon's impeachment is the trend of the times and the candlelight for impeachment will get fiercer and the population will surely impeach Yoon within this year. -0-

headline: Spokesman for DPRK Ministry of National Defence Makes Public Final Results of Investigation into Case of Grave Infringement upon Sovereignty by Drone from ROK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence of the DPRK released Sunday the final results of investigation into the case of infringement upon its sovereignty which confirmed the take-off point and route and purpose of intrusion by the drone from the ROK found in the area of the DPRK capital city.
According to the spokesman, under the instruction of the DPRK government on scientifically and thoroughly proving the truth behind the case of the grave infringement upon the country's sovereignty by a drone, a military means recognized by the world, the joint investigation group involving the Ministry of National Defence, the Ministry of State Security and other relevant specialized organs completely dismantled the flight control module from the remains of a crashed enemy drone and analyzed the flight plan and flight log in a comprehensive way.
The results of analysis of the flight control program of the enemy drone conducted by the joint investigation group indefensibly and clearly proved the most vulgar and shameless provocative nature of the ROK military gangsters who have persistently evaded the responsibility for the illegal intrusion by their drone into the sky above the capital city of the DPRK.
The collected evidence data include 238 flight plans and flight logs worked out between June 5, 2023 and October 8, 2024, and the remaining data except the data of October 8 are the data of flight in the territory of the ROK.
According to the analysis of the flight control program, a plan for scattering political motivational rubbish is to be worked out when the flight plan is drawn out, and when the drone reaches the position reflected in the scattering plan, the flight control module is to send an electrical signal to the scattering means.
The flight data number of the enemy drone crashed after intruding into the DPRK on October 8 was analyzed.
The plan for scattering political motivational rubbish and the scattering log were recorded correctly in the enemy drone.
It was proved that the drone of the ROK military gangsters which took off at Paekryong Island at 23:25:30 on Oct. 8 and intruded into the territorial air of the DPRK flied over Jangyon County of South Hwanghae Province and the waters around the Cho Islet till the waters around Namjoap Islet, and then over Chollima District, Nampho Municipality and intruded into the capital city of the DPRK.
The enemy drone scattered the political motivational rubbish in the sky above the area between the building of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and Sungri Station of the Pyongyang Metro at 1:32:8 on Oct. 9 and in the sky above the building of the Ministry of National Defence at 1:35:11.
The confirmed objective and scientific evidence data expose that the intrusion by the drone is aimed at scattering the anti-DPRK political motivational rubbish and that the principal of the hostile infringement upon the DPRK sovereignty is none other than the puppet ROK military gangsters.
The spokesman for the Ministry of National Defence stressed once again that the last warning to the dangerous and reckless, political and military provocation by the ROK military gangsters which went beyond the limit of patience has already been made.
In the case of infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK reoccurs due to the blind trust in the master, seizing the ROK, the most vulgar and malignant rogue state, and its extremely bad habit of challenge, the source of all misfortunes and provocations will disappear forever by the merciless offensive of the DPRK. -0-

headline:
Standard of Modernization Taught by Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
[2024.10.29.]
story_text:
One day in July 2016, the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unvisited a factory and looked round its combined control room.
Seeing the general interface of the integrated production system on a large display board, he said with pleasure that it is wonderful and that the integrated production system has developed a lot.
An official explained a measuring device to him, saying that all of operators want it to be installed at their machines first.
Listening to the official, the General Secretary expressed his great satisfaction and said it is truly successful modernization when the workers have appreciated after operating equipment.
The official was given a great shock as he had regarded modernization as a technical undertaking for further developing production lines or machinery and equipment, without clear standards.
Looking at the official, the General Secretary stressed that the order of objects to be updated should be set as demanded by the workers.
The official came to realize once again that the people's demands and interests are the absolute standard of all work. -0-

headline: President Kim Il Sung's Benevolence for Workers
story_text:
PresidentKim Il Sunghosted a banquet for exemplary workers on May 1, 1947.
Acknowledging the cheering workers at the banquet hall, he congratulated them on their labour successes.
He shook hands with them one by one in praise of their exploits. Then he recognized a pitman among them.
Shaking hands with him, he told the audience that the pitman fulfilled his yearly plan for national economy ahead of schedule. Asking the audience to drink the first toast to good health and happiness of all coal miners, the backbone of national economy, he offered a cup to the pitman.
At that time the pitman told the President that the first toast would be made to good health of the President who liberated the nation and built a people-oriented country. Gently declining the offer, the President said that he was the host of the banquet and they were the guests so the first toast was for the workers.
All the participants were moved to tears by his warm benevolence. -0-

headline: To Train Paragons of Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, Spirit of the Blizzards of Paektu
Many Hectares of Land Realigned in DPRK
story_text:

Thanks to the devoted efforts of officials and members of the shock brigade in charge of the project, more than 1 200 hectares of land have been realigned into standardized fields up to now from late September. -0-

headline: Pyongyang Musical Instrument Factory
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Musical Instrument Factory is the mother factory of the musical instrument industry of the DPRK, which contributes to the development of the Juche-oriented musical art and the cultural life of the people.
The factory, which was born into the country's first musical instrument manufacturing base, left a clear mark in the development of the country's musical instrument industry under the care of the peerlessly great men.
With a far-reaching plan to build the base for producing musical instruments after the war, PresidentKim Il Sungfounded the State Musical Instrument Manufacturing Research Institute, the predecessor of the factory, in October 1953 and solved the problems arising in the production of musical instruments.
The factory made the first test goods of the accordion in October 1955 and piano No. 1 in July 1961.
In October 1962, ChairmanKim Jong Ilvisited the factory and said that the production of musical instruments is an art, adding that only when we develop national instruments can the socialist national culture and art be brought into fuller bloom and Juche be established in the field of producing musical instruments.
True to his instructions, the officials, technicians and workers of the factory carried out the task of finding out national musical instruments and of improving 50 kinds of national musical instruments including kayagum, Janggo and Jangsaenap, thus contributing to the development of the national musical art of the country.
Under his guidance the factory successfully manufactured an accordion "Unbangul" and developed and completed the bayan and other instruments in Korean style.
Under the guidance of the respected ComradeKim Jong Untaking all necessary steps for production, the factory is now taking the lead in the drive to produce musical instruments. -0-

headline: Invincible Is Sacred Revolutionary Cause of WPK: Rodong Sinmun
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The invincibility of the Korean revolution and the rosy future of our cause are firmly guaranteed by the Workers' Party of Korea's great philosophy of trust, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
The WPK is the powerful general staff of the revolution which confidently leads the Korean revolution and socialist construction to rapid development and comprehensive upsurge with the philosophy of trust, the article says, and goes on:
The WPK's philosophy of trust is an ideological and theoretical weapon for training the powerful driving force of the revolution to provide a fundamental guarantee for victory in the revolution.
The WPK is victoriously advancing the revolution and construction, regarding trust as the weapon of realizing the politics as it serves as the fundamental factor in firmly uniting the popular masses, the masters directly responsible for accomplishing the revolutionary cause, with one intention and will.
Today the WPK is developing the noble relations of trust, respect, devotion and obligation between the leader and the masses into the eternal national custom of the DPRK, adding heroic epics startling the world people to the new history of the Juche revolution.
The ardent love and trust shown by the respected General SecretaryKim Jong Unto the beloved people and service personnel of the Korean People's Army during his visit to different parts of the country were the source of matchless heroism and collective innovations at worksites and posts.
The WPK is a powerful political leadership organization which adorns a new era of the Juche revolution with victories and miracles by dint of the philosophy of trust.
The fighting programme and practical strategies clarified by the WPK at the Party Congress and other major meetings are all consistent with the validity of its cause and its trust in the future.
The energetic leadership of the WPK, which firmly trusts the people and redoubles their confidence in victory, courage, strength and fighting spirit in the difficult days, serves as the driving force that has brought about substantial progress and practical successes in all fields of state and social life.
Nothing can block the dynamic advance of the DPRK as it is led by the WPK which is proving the validity of the revolutionary cause through an indomitable struggle, defending the eternal vitality of socialism, the ideal and future of mankind, and dynamically advancing its steady development.
Our revolutionary cause is sure to win thanks to the WPK's philosophy of trust. -0-

headline: Greetings to FM of Venezuela
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greeting to Yvan Eduardo Gil Pinto, foreign minister of the People's Power of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on Oct. 28 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism, extending firm support and solidarity to the Venezuelan people's efforts for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving its stability and development. -0-

story_text:

They were seen off at Pyongyang International Airport by Kim Jong Gyu, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK. -0-

headline: Greetings from FM of Venezuela
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, foreign minister of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Yvan Eduardo Gil Pinto, foreign minister of the People's Power of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on Oct. 28 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
Reaffirming the Bolivarian government's will to boost cooperation for promoting the socio-economic development between the two countries, the message expressed the stand to continue friendly dialogue in the international arena so as to consolidate the multi-polar world, a guarantee for peace, justice and the right to self-determination. -0-

headline: New Houses Built in Pongsan County of DPRK
story_text:
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- More dwelling houses have appeared at the Unjong Stock-breeding Farm under the North Hwanghae Provincial Rural Economy Committee in the DPRK.
The beautiful village with modern houses and nurseries built along the foot of a sunny mountain show the development of rural areas in the country.
Present at the ceremony for moving into new houses were Mun Chang Il, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Party and power organs and agricultural workers in Pongsan County.
Kim Il Hwan, vice-chairman of the provincial people's committee, made a congratulatory address.
Then, the licenses for the use of houses were conveyed to the agricultural workers and speeches made there. -0-
